40013036	Dokopa Jisasame endakali kambu andake doko pena latala baa andaka kolandea. Dopa piamopa baanya disaipele dupa baa peteasa ipupala lamaiyoo, “Eenya tanu koopa makande pyoo kongali laleno dokonya tenge doko naima langi,” leami.
40013037	Dopa leaminopa baame yanu pyao, “Ee wai epe lyandeamo akali doko, Endakalinya Ikiningi doko.
40013038	Ee doko, isa yuu dake. Wai epe lyandeamo doko, Goteme isingi endakali dupa. Dee tanu koo dupa, akali koo dokome isingi endakali dupa.
40013039	Tanu koo lyandeamo akali yandapipi doko, Satane. Wambu pitamo gii doko, yuu dake etatamo doko. Dee nee mandyuu mau pingi akali dupa, enjele dupa.
40013040	Dopana, tanu koo dupa yukuoo elyambu petala itatenya soo yangengema, mana mendai dokoaka yuu dake etatamo gii dokopa seta.
40013041	Endakalinya Ikiningi dokome baanya enjele dupa epena latamopa dupame ipupala, koo pina lao mapisingi endakalipi tanga lao koo pingi endakalipi dupa baame isingi endakali dupa-pipa awapa katatamino dupa nyoo elyambu pitami.
40013042	Dopa petala koo dupa itate andake dokonya soo pyandataminopa dupame dokonya katao ee lao yamataka lao nenge gilyoo katatami.
40013043	Dokopa endakali tolatae dupa niki tele pyoo dupanya Takangeme isingi dokonya katatamina, nyakama kalekaita singi dupame pii doko salapapena!” Jisasame lea.
40013044	“Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi doko munipi opale epe mendapua eenya yalo petae kateamo dopale. Akali mendeme doko kandasetala sanga pyambea-pyaa. Dopa petala baa mona yaepao pao baanya oapi dupa pitakame muni nyepala ee doko sambea-pyaana,” lea.
40013045	“Dee Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi doko mamakumi pisinisa andake pingi akali mendeme mamaku epe dupa kutao kateamo dopale.
40013046	Akali dokome mamaku eteteaka epe yole andake pupenge mende kutao kandatala dokopa, baame pao baanya oapi dupa pitakame muni nyepala mamaku doko sambea-pyaana,” lea.
40013047	“Dee Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi doko akali dupame wapaka nyingi mandi gulangala jepae mende endaki petenya pyandatala wapaka tata tata dupa pitaka nyingi dopale.
40013048	Tumbatelyamopa wapaka nyingi akali dupame pyalya lao lembasa nyepala isa pituu yapengema. Yapapala epe dupa nyakamanya pengenya pyandatala koo dupa nepengema.
40013049	-
40013050	Dopana, yuu dake etatamo gii dokopa mana mendai dokoaka seta. Enjele dupa ipupala endakali tolatae dupa-pipa koo pingi katatamino dupa yapao nyepala, itate andake dokonya soo pyandatami. Dopa pitaminopa dokonya katao ee lao yamataka lao nenge gilyoo katatamina,” Jisasame lea.
40013051	Jisasame dokaita pisoo, “Nyakamame pii dutupa pitaka masilyamipi? lea. Dopa leamopa dokaitame baa lamaiyoo, “Masilyamanona,” leami.
40013052	Dokopa baame dokaita kandao, “Gotenya pii lapae masingi endakali Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi dokonya mana nyepeamino dupa pitaka akali anda tange dopale. Baame baanya oapi singi palo dokonya oapi enenge wambataepi epe silyamo dupa nyoo kamanda pyalyingina,” lea-pyaa.
40013053	Jisasame pii kongali dutupa lamaiyoo etapala yuu doko yakinatala pea.
40013054	Baanya yuu tenge dokonya pupala endakali dupa nyakamanya losuu anda dokonya mana lamaiya. Dopa piamopa dupame walu latala lao pituu, “Akali dakeme masepae datupa anjatae nyia laape? Baame kalai pupu lapae dupa aipa petala pilya kanjemape?
40013055	Akali dake kapendaa dokonya ikiningi daa kandamuape? Baanya endangi doko Matia daa kandamuape? Baanya kaiminingi dupa Jemesapi, Josepepi, Saimonepi, Jutasapi dutupa daa kandamuape?
40013056	Baanya pimalenge dupa pitaka naima-pipa ae napilyamape? Dopana, baame pilyamo datupa pitaka anja mana nyia laape?” leami.
40013057	Dopa latala dupame baa kandao mona koo palyiami. Dopa piaminosa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Yuu dupa pitakanya potopesa mende andanda semaingimaka doko, baanya yuu tengepi baanya palupi dupame iki baa kilya kandengemana,” lea.
40013058	Dupame masoo minala nayaminosa baame kalai pupu lapae longo yuu dokonya napia.
40014001	Gii dokopa yuu yakane isingi akali Etote lenge dokome Jisasame pilyamo lapae dupa sia-pyaa.
40014002	Sepala baanya kalai akali dupa lamaiyoo, “Akali doko Jone Kaimbu Pingi doko. Baa malunya sakatapya dokonya baame kalai pupu lapae dupa pyoo kalyamona,” lea-pyaa.
40014003	-
40014004	Doko wamba Etoteme dapa pia-pyaa: baanya kaiminingi Pilipa etanenge Etotiasa lenge doko baa tondao nyia-pyaa. Dopa piamosa Jone Kaimbu Pingi dokome Etote lamaiyoo, “Embame enda doko tondao nyilino doko kopeta pilinona,” lea-pyaa. Dopa lati siamosa Etoteme Etotiasa lao masetala Etoteme Jone ŋili kendeme anjetala anjingi andaka pyandea-pyaa.
40014005	Baame Jone pyao kumasotoo lao masiamoaka doko, Juta endakali dupame potopesana lao masiaminosa dupa paka kayapala kaya-pyaa.
40014006	-
40014007	Koto mende Etotenya mandenge gii dokonya akali limbao petamino kaina dokonya Etotiasa wanenge doko lyia-pyaa. Lyiamopa Etoteme auumi kumapala wanaku doko dapa lamaiya-pyaa: “Nambame kiningi etete langilyona, embame opale mende namba-kisa dii lao tee lateno doko nambame kapa pao dyaapona,” lea-pyaa.
40014008	Dokopa wanaku dokonya endangi dokome baa pii mende lamaitiamopa dapa lea-pyaa: “Embame Jone Kaimbu Pingi dokonya aiyomba doko kepao pelesanya setapala dasa namba dii!” lea-pyaa.
40014009	Dopa leamosa Kiŋi Etote mona kenda kaya-pyaa. Dopa piamoaka doko, wamba baame pii, “Kiningi etete langilyona,” lao leamo dokopi, akali limbao peteamino dupapi lao masetala, “Lelyamo doko baa maiyepa!” lea-pyaa.
40014010	Dopa latala baame yanda singi mende anjingi andaka pupala Jonenya aiyomba doko kepao nyala pena lea-pyaa.
40014011	Pena lateamopa Jonenya aiyomba doko kepanyetala pelesa mendenya setapala ipao wanaku doko maiya-pyaa. Maitiamopa minao endangi peteasa pea-pyaa.
40014012	Dopa petamopa Jonenya disaipele dupa ipupala baa nyoo pao malu piami-pyaa. Malu petala dokopa dupame Jisasa ipao lamaiyami.
40014013	Jisasame pii doko sepala, baame yuu doko yakinatala sipi mendenya pituu endakali napalenge yuu mendakaita baa iki pea. Peamopa endakali dupame sepala nyakamanya yuu taono dupa yakinatala baa watao endaki pete kilikili dokonya peami-pyaa.
40014014	Peaminopa Jisasa netesa pao pyakamatala, endakali kambu andake mende kateamino kandea-pyaa. Kandatala baame dokaita kondome kumapala, dokaitanya endakali yaina pyapae dupa mee jakamaiya-pyaa.
40014015	Dokopa alemandi baanya disaipele dupame baa kateasa ipupala lao pituu, “Dakaita endakali napalengema lamo dokonya yuu kuilyamona, taono yakane dupanya pao tange nee sambama pena laa!” leami.
40014016	Dopa leaminopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Daa, dupa napenana, nyakamameaka dokaita nee maiyepa!” lea.
40014017	Dopa leamopa dupame baa lamaiyoo, “Angenya naimanya nee longo nasilyamo. Betesa yuungi-pipa wapaka lapoma iki silyamona,” leami.
40014018	Dokopa baame lao pituu, “Dutupa nyoo minao ae ipupa,” lea.
40014019	Dopa latala baame endakali dupa tanu dupanya petena lea. Petena latala baame betesa yuungi wapaka lapoma pyoo siamo dutupa nyepala, kaiti-kisa kandalyetae katao yaka pilino lea. Dopa latala betesa dutupa konjepala baanya disaipele dupa maiyamopa, dupame endakali dupa mokosoo maiyami.
40014020	Dokaita pitakame nao tiaka kayateaminopa, kakana siamo dupa disaipele dupame nyoo baseketa mandi kingi ita-kisa dee lapomanya mandyuu tumbasiami.
40014021	Nee neamino endakali dupa pitaka enda wanepi dupa itaki napyao akali iki taosene yuungipi mendeme neami.
40014022	Dokopa Jisasame baanya disaipele dupa sipi dokonya pituu endaki pete ongonya yangitena wambao pao katena latala, baame endakali dupa pena lea.
40014023	Pena latala baa iki loma salanya yuu manda dokonya pea. Pupala yuu kuala epeamopa baa iki dokonya katea-pyaa.
40014024	Dokopa sipi dokonya pituu endaki pete kainasale paanya peaminopa poo andake mende paanya peamino dokaita-kaita lao ipupala, endaki doko buli piamo dokome sipi doko yangi pyasa-pyasa pia.
40014025	Yuu yongalanya pee payamopa Jisasa baa endaki pete ketae dokonya moko katao disaipele dupa peteamino dokonya epea.
40014026	Dupame baa endaki pete ketae dokonya moko katao payamo kandatala etete walu leami. Dopa petala dupame, “Doko timango mende lamo!” lao pakame kumapala ae leami.
40014027	Dopa leaminopa Jisasame dokaita yapa lamaiyoo, “Namba kalyona, nyakama paka nakaenya, mona palyepa!” lea.
40014028	Dokopa Pitame baa lamaiyoo, “Kamongo, embaka tamo kandao doko, embame namba endaki ketae moko katao emba kalyeno dokonya ipu laa,” lea.
40014029	Dopa leamopa Jisasame, “Emba ipu!” lea. Dokopa Pitame sipi doko yakinatala endaki ketae dokonya moko katao Jisasa kateamo dokonya paanya pea.
40014030	Peamoaka doko, baame poo leamo doko kandatala paka kayapala baa endakinya landa pyalanya pia. Dopa petala baame, “Kamongo, embame namba nisa!” lao ae lea.
40014031	Dopa leamopa Jisasame yapa pyakamatala Pita minatala lamaiyoo, “Kuki masoo miningi! Aipuma embame mona lapo palyalepe?” lea.
40014032	Dopa lateamopa sipi dokonya pyakalyiambinopa poo doko yatu lea.
40014033	Dokopa disaipele sipinya peteamino dupame, “Kiningi etete, emba Gote Ikiningi lamona,” lao tama piami.
40014034	Dokaitame endaki pete dokonya yangi-kaita Genesatete yuu dokonya pao pyakameami.
40014035	Yuu dokaita tange endakali dupame Jisasa lamo lao kandatala, yuu dosa singi dupa pitakanya wai leaminopa yaina pyapae dupa pitaka soo epeami.
40014036	Dopa petala dupame Jisasa kandao, “Yaina pyapae dupame embanya yonge pee ketae pingi londe dokonya puna dosa iki kingimi watandenalena,” lao kyoto joo leami. Dokopa Jisasanya yonge peenya watandeamino endakali dupa pitakanya yaina dupa mee jiami.
40015001	-
40015002	Gii dokopa akali Patasipi mana setapae masingi akalipi mendapuame Jetusaleme katao Jisasa kateasa ipupala dapa lao pisiami: “Embanya disaipele dupame mana wambatae naimanya yumbangeme seteamino dupa aipuma yalengemape? Dupame nee nalanya dokopa kingi kaimbu pingili pyoo napingima lamo!” leami.
40015003	Dopa leaminopa Jisasame dupanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Doko aipuma nyakamame nyakama tangenya mana wambatae dupa watao minatala, Gotenya mana setapae dake yalengemape?
40015004	Wamba Goteme lao pituu, ‘Embanya endangi takangepa dolapo andanda semaiyoo katape!’ dee, ‘Endakali mendeme baanya endangi tamopi takange tamopi mende kandao pii koo latamo doko, baa kumina lao pyao kumasepengena,’ lea.
40015005	-
40015006	Dopaka doko, endakali mendeme baanya endangi takangepi mende kandao, ‘Wamba nambame emba nisoo oapi dioliaka doko indupa nambame Gote maitapuna,’ latamopa nyakamame baanya endangi takangepi andanda semaiyoo nakatapenge jilyamona lengema. Dopa pyoo nyakamanya mana wambatae dupa watao minalanya Gotenya pii doko mee injisingima.
40015007	Wamba potopesa Aisayame nyakama minakasingima akali nyakama makande pyokondape pyoo dapa lea-pyaa:
40015008	‘Endakali tata dakeme kambumi namba lalyingimaka doko, nyakamanya moname namba-pipa kopala naengema.
40015009	Dupame endakalinya mana setapae dupanya mana lao pituu, “Dake Gotenya mana setapaena,” lengema. Dopa latala dupame namba mee ambe tama pingimana,’ lea-pyaana,” lea.
40015010	Jisasame endakali kambu piamino dupa epena latala lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame sepala masokondape pyepape!
40015011	Nengekaita penge dokome endakali koyasala naenge. Dopaka doko, nengekaitanya epenge dokome endakali koyasingina,” lea.
40015012	Gii dokopa disaipele dupame ipupala baa lamaiyoo, “Patasi dupame embanya pii doko sepala imbu kaelyamino doko embame kandelepe?” leami.
40015013	Baame dokaitanya pii yanu pyao, “Nambanya Takange kaitinya katenge dokome waingi pokala nayamo dupa pitaka pingi-pipa yukuota.
40015014	Dopana nyakamame dupa katena kayalapape. Lenge monda dupame lenge monda yango dupa kaitini laitaka pingima. Akali lenge monda mendeme lenge monda yango mende kaitini laitaka pipyali kandao doko, dolapo lapota yuli mendenya mangambilina,” Jisasame lea.
40015015	Dopa leamopa Pitame baa lamaiyoo, “Embame kongali leleno dokonya tenge doko naima langi,” lea.
40015016	Dopa leamopa Jisasame lao pituu, “Nyakamame apata masala naengemakape?
40015017	Kini, nengekaita penge dupa pitaka inginya pupilyamopa, tao nepenge doko nyakamame masala naelyamipi?
40015018	Dopaka doko, monanya palenge dupa nengekaitanya epenge dupame endakali koyasingi.
40015019	-
40015020	Monanya paliuu pyakalyingi dupa datupa: masingi koopi, endakali pyao kumasingipi, kepo kolengepi, endakalipi nyele-nyele paengepi, pake nengepi, sambo pii lengepi, lamba lengepi dopale dupame endakali koyasingi. Dopaka doko, endakali mendeme kingi kaimbu napinya mee nee nyoo nelyamo dokome baa koyasala naengena,” Jisasame lea.
40015021	Jisasame yuu doko yakinatala yuu taono Tayapa Saitonepanya yuu siamo dupanya pea.
40015022	Peamopa Kenane enda mende yuu dokaita petenge doko ipupala puu lao lao pituu, “Akali Andake, emba Dapiti Yumbange, embame namba kondo kayape! Enjele koo mendeme nambanya wanenge doko etete koyasilyamona,” lea.
40015023	Dopa leamopa Jisasame pii mende yanu pyao baa lamaiya naya. Dokopa baanya disaipele dupame ipupala baa lamaiyoo, “Enda dakeme wii lata-lata pyoo naima watao epelyamona, embame baa pena laa!” leami.
40015024	Dopa leaminopa Jisasame dupanya pii yanu pyao, “Goteme namba Isataele tata dupanya mendapua mena sipisipi alu petae joo kalyamino dupanya iki puu leana,” lea.
40015025	Dopa leamoaka doko, enda dokome ipao baa kateamo dosa luma lakapala lao pituu, “Akali Andake, embame namba nisa!” lea.
40015026	Dokopa Jisasame baanya pii doko yanu pyao, “Naimame wanenya nee dupa nyepala pyale lao yana dupa maitamanopa auu napitana,” lea.
40015027	Dokopa enda dokome lao pituu, “Akali Andake, embame kiningi leenoaka doko, yana dupame endakali yana tange dupanya nee katai pyapae isa kopo lelyamo dupa nyoo nengemana,” lea.
40015028	Dopa leamopa Jisasame enda doko lamaiyoo, “Enda, embame kyoto joo masoo minao petenge lamona, embame pyakapyali lao masilinoli pyekenana,” lea. Dopa leamo gii dokopaka baanya wanenge doko mee jia-pyaa.
40015029	Jisasame yuu doko yakinatala endaki Galili pete tengesa dosale epea. Ipupala manda mendenya lalyoo pupala petea.
40015030	Peteamo dokonya endakali kambu longo dupa ipao pituu, endakali moko koopi, lenge mondapi, kuli uanga petaepi, mumaapi dee waka yainame pyapae longo mendapuapi apata laminao ipupala, baanya moko kateamo dosa setami. Seteaminopa baame dupa mee injisia.
40015031	Dopa piamo doko endakali kambu piamino dupame kandeaminopa, mumaa dupame pii lao, kuli uanga petae dupa tolao, moko koo dupa kaita payao, lenge monda dupa lenge tao piaminosa, dupame mona andapala Isataelemanya Gote doko lao lalyiami.
40015032	Dokopa Jisasame baanya disaipele dupa epena latala lamaiyoo, “Endakali dakaita yuu gii tepoma namba-pipa katapumano doko, indupa dupa nee natami nasilyamo dokonya dupa kondome kumilyo. Nambame dakaita mee pena latopa aopyoo latala kaitinisa lopome lawambe latala lombapae setamina, mee pena nalatowana,” lea.
40015033	Dokopa disaipele dupame baa lamaiyoo, “Endakali napalenge yuu dakenya naimame endakali kambu dakeme tiaka nao nena lao maiyanya betesa longo dupa anjatae nyakamaimape?” leami.
40015034	Dopa leaminopa baame dokaita pisoo, “Nyakamanya betesa akipate silyape?” lea. Dopa leamopa dokaitame baa lamaiyoo, “Betesa kalange-pipa wapaka yakane mendalapopi silyamona,” leami.
40015035	Dokopa Jisasame endakali dupa isa petena lea.
40015036	Dopa latala baame betesa kalange dutupapi wapaka dupapi nyepala, Gote lao yaka pilino latala konjia. Konjepala baanya disaipele dupa maiyamopa, dupame endakali dupa mokosoo maiyami.
40015037	Maiyaminopa dokaita pitakame nao tiaka kayateaminopa, kakana siamo dupa disaipele dupame baseketa mandi kalangenya mandyuu tumbasiami.
40015038	Endakali nee neamino dupa pitaka enda wanepi dupa itaki napyao akali iki taosene kitomendeme neami.
40015039	Napeaminopa Jisasame endakali dupa pena latala, baa sipi mendenya pituu yuu taono Makatana-tena pea.
40016001	Dokopa Patasipi Satyusipi mendapuame Jisasa kateasa ipupala baa minao makande pyoo baame kaitinya-tae kongali mende kandamana pina leami.
40016002	Dopa leaminoaka doko, baame dokaitanya pii yanu pyao, [“Yuu kualanya kone yuu pumbuti yuu pilyamopa nyakamame, ‘Kaiti kate pilyamona, paina pyaapome lamo,’ lengema.
40016003	Dee yuu yongalanya puli ita waiyepae paelyamopa nyakamame, ‘Kaiti iminjeta kate pyata pilyamona, aiyuu ipapome lamo,’ lengema. Nyakamame kaiti doko kandatala opa pyaapome lamo apa pyaapome lamo lao yapengemaka doko, indupa gii dakepa kongali dupa nyakamame yapapenge nanjilyape?]
40016004	Endakali indupa palelyamino dupame Gote yakinenge kooma lamo! Nyakamame kongali mende kandamana lelyaminoaka doko, nambame kongali mende pyakala nayatoo. Goteme akali Jonaa-kisa kongali piamo dokoaka makande petae setana,” lea. Dopa latala baame dupa yakinatala pea.
40016005	Dokopa disaipele dupame endaki pete dokonya yangitena paanya betesa kame setala peami-pyaa.
40016006	Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Kandeleno! Nyakamame Patasipi Satyusipi dupanya iisa dupame nyakama koyasetamina wandyuu kalyepape!” lea.
40016007	Dopa leamopa dupame nyakama betesa nasiamo tenge dokonya nyakamalapo leami.
40016008	Dopa leamino doko Jisasame kandatala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakama kuki masoo miningi dupame, aipuma betesa nasilyamo lao nyakamalapo mende lamai-lamai pilyamipi?
40016009	Nyakamame masetala naelyamipi? Nambame betesa yuungi akali taosene yuungi dupanya konjakamaiyo doko kame silyamipi? Dopa piopa kakana siamo dupa nyakamame baseketa mandi akipatenya mandyuu tumbasiamipi?
40016010	Dee nambame betesa kalange akali taosene kitomende dupanya konjakamaiyo dokopa kakana siamo dupa nyakamame baseketa mandi akipatenya mandyuu tumbasiamipi?
40016011	Nambame betesanya lao nalalo doko, aipa petala nyakamame masala naelyamipi? Patasipi Satyusipi dupanya iisa dupame nyakama koyasetamina kandao kalyepape lalona,” lea.
40016012	Dokopa betesanya palyingi iisa doko kandao laa nayao Patasipi Satyusipi dupame mana lamaingi iisa jepae dupanya kandao kalyepape lalame lamona lao disaipele dupame masiami.
40016013	Jisasa baa yuu taono Sisatia Pilipae-tena pea. Pupala baanya disaipele dupa pisoo, “Endakali dupame Endakalinya Ikiningi doko kandao apina lengemape?” lea.
40016014	Dupame yanu pyao, “Yangimi emba kandao Jone Kaimbu Pingi dokona, yangimi Ilainjana, yangimi Jetemaya tamopi potopesa waka dupanya mende tamopina lengemana,” leami.
40016015	Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Dopaka doko, nyakamame namba kandao apina lengemape?” lea.
40016016	Dokopa Saimone Pitame baa kandao, “Emba Kataisa Gote saka katenge dokonya Ikiningi dokona,” lea.
40016017	Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Saimone, Jone ikiningi, emba mona yaepasetae. Doko embame pii kiningi leleno dake endakali mendeme langya naya. Daa. Nambanya Takange kaitinya katenge dokome emba-kisa panasia.
40016018	Nambame emba kandao dapa langilyoaka: Pita, emba kana yangapae kyoto. Kana yangapae doko-kisa nambame nambanya sosa doko sakatasoto. Yuu koo dokonya pupu lapae dokome sosa doko nyoo isa palyala nayata.
40016019	Nambame Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi dokonya kii dupa emba dito. Embame isa yuu dakenya mende pyakilyina kayakamaitino doko, kaitinya pyakilyina kayakamaitaka. Embame isa yuu dakenya mende yukuokamaitino doko, kaitinya yukuokamaitakana,” lea.
40016020	Dopa latala baame disaipele dupa kyoto joo lamaiyoo, “Namba Kataisa dokona lao mendaipi mende lamaiya nayalapape!” lea.
40016021	Gii dokopa pituu Jisasame baanya disaipele dupa panao dapa lamaiya: “Namba Jetusaleme pupenge. Patopa isingi akalipi, pitisa mupapi, mana setapae masingi akalipi dupame tanda longo ditala namba pyao kumasetataminopa kote teponya Goteme dee sakatasetana,” lea.
40016022	Dopa leamopa Pitame Jisasa laminao umbisale pupala pyalanya lao, “Kamongo, emba dopa etete napina! Goteme emba kondo kaenana!” lea.
40016023	Dopa lao pyalanya leamopa Jisasame kandapilyetala Pita lamaiyoo, “Satane, emba nao puu! Embame namba koo pyaale lao makande pilino. Embame Gotenya masingi doko masala naenya, endakalinya masingi doko masilinona,” lea.
40016024	Dokopa Jisasame baanya disaipele dupa lamaiyoo, “Endakali mendeme namba watao payatoo lao masetamo kandao doko, baame baa tange kame setala baanya ita poko doko nyoo soo namba watao paena.
40016025	Endakali mendeme baa tange isoo auu pyoo katapu laka lao masetamo kandao doko, baa alu pita. Dopaka doko, endakali mendeme namba lao masetala baa tange kame setamo kandao doko, baa auu pyoo katata.
40016026	Doko, endakali mendeme yuunya oapi dupa pitaka nyoo setao katapala baa koyatamo kandao doko, oapi dupa pitakame aipa petala baa nisetape? Dee aki mendeme baa tange kii tamao nyepengepe?
40016027	Endakalinya Ikiningi doko baanya enjele dupa-pipa baanya Takangenya tii pipae doko tambetambe kapa pao ipata. Ipupala endakali mendai mendai lao dupame mana minataminoli pyoo yanu pyata.
40016028	Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, endakali ae kalyamino datupanya mendapua kumapala nayataminopa Endakalinya Ikiningi dokome kiŋi joo isala ipatamo gii doko kandatamina,” Jisasame dopa lea.
40017001	Koto tokange pateamopa Jisasame Pitapi, Jemesapi, Jemesa kaiminingi Jonepi dutupa laminao yuu manda ketae mendenya pupala nyakama iki kateami-pyaa.
40017002	Kateaminopa dutupanya enombasa Jisasa baa waka jia-pyaa. Baanya lengelyaapi doko tii pyoo niki tele pia-pyaa. Dee baanya yonge pee dupa kyoo lao pakenana timbokopaele jia-pyaa.
40017003	Dokopa akali Mosesepa Ilainjapa Jisasa-pipa awapa pii lao kateambinopa dutupame kandeami-pyaa.
40017004	Kandatala Pitame Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Kamongo, naima angenya katamanopa auu pilyamona, embame kapana lao maseteno kandao doko, nambame angenya aiyaa anda tepo pitoo. Mende embanya, mende Mosesenya, mende Ilainjanyana,” lea-pyaa.
40017005	Pitame pii doko lao mee kateamopa kopa etete kyoo lapae mendeme ipupala dokaita sanga pia-pyaa. Dopa piamopa kopa tambetambe dokonya pii mende lea dokome, “Doo kalyamo doko nambanya Ikiningi etete mona setenge doko kalyamo. Nambame baa kandao etete mona epe palyingina, nyakamame baanya pii doko sakamaiyepape!” lea-pyaa.
40017006	Dokopa disaipele dutupame pii doko soo etete pakame kumapala tombauli siami-pyaa.
40017007	Dopa piaminopa Jisasame ipao dutupa watandatala lao pituu, “Nyakama paka nakaenya, sakatalapa!” lea-pyaa.
40017008	Dopa leamopa dupame kandalyetala endakali waka mende nakandao Jisasa baa iki kateamo kandeami-pyaa.
40017009	Dokaitame yuu manda dokonya katao lanao ipao pituu Jisasame kyoto joo dutupa lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame kanjimino doko mende lamaiya nayalapape. Lamaiya nayawaka katao Endakalinya Ikiningi doko malunya sakatasetamo gii dokonya tuu laapapena,” lea-pyaa.
40017010	Dokopa disaipele dupame Jisasa pisoo, “Mana setapae masingi akali dupame aipuma, ‘Ilainja wambao ipupengena,’ lengemape?” leami.
40017011	Jisasame dutupanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Kini, Ilainjame dupa pitaka dee katengeli pina lao tolasalanya ipupenge.
40017012	Dopaka doko, Ilainja ipateana lao nambame nyakama langilyo. Ipateamopa endakali dupame baa lamo lao nakandenya, baa-kisa pyuani kayamino dupa pitaka piami. Dupame mana mendai dopaka pyoo Endakalinya Ikiningi doko tanda maitamina,” lea.
40017013	Dokopa disaipele dupame baame Jone Kaimbu Pingi doko kandao lalumuna lao masiami.
40017014	-
40017015	Endakali kambu pyao kateamino dokonya dutupa ipateaminopa akali mendeme Jisasa kateasa ipao baa lao luma lakapala lamaiyoo, “Akali Andake, embame nambanya wane doko kondo kyayakape! Baa mandipaeme nyilyamosa paa longo itatenya tapa endakinya mangata pyoo etete koyao tanda nao katenge.
40017016	Nambame baa laminao embanya disaipele dupa katamisa epoaka doko, dupame kapa pao mee injisala nayalaminona,” lea.
40017017	Dopa leamopa Jisasame lao pituu, “Kanau! Masoo minala naenge uanga pyoo paengema endakali nyakama! Oo koto koto ongo namba nyakama-pipaka tole katatama laape? Nyakamame nambaka nenge nyoo katatami laape? Wane doko laminao namba kalyosa ipupa!” lea.
40017018	Jisasame wane doko-kisa enjele koo paleamo dokome wane doko yakinena lao pyalanya leamopa yakinatala pea. Peamo gii dokopaka wane doko mee jia.
40017019	Maitakao Jisasa iki peteamopa disaipele dupame ipupala baa pisoo, “Aipuma naimame enjele koo doko kapa pao watao napyalamape?” leami.
40017020	Dopa leaminopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakama kuki iki masoo minilyamino dokonya kapa nanjalamo. Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyo, nyakamame awa wainginya dii palenge dopale joo masoo minapimili kandao doko, opale mendaipi mende pyaanya kokala nayamili. Nyakamame yuu manda dake lamaiyoo, ‘Emba asa nasina omosa sala puu!’ lapiminopa kapa pao pupyali.
40017021	[Dopaka doko, loma sowapi nee nanenya kayawapi pingi dokonya-kaita iki enjele koo dopale dupa watao pingi. Kaitini waka mendenya-kaita daana,” lea.]
40017022	Galili yuu dokonya Jisasapi baanya disaipele dupapi pao kambu pyatala baame dupa lamaiyoo, “Akali mendeme Endakalinya Ikiningi doko endakali dupa laitaka pyaanya enge nyalanya pilyamo.
40017023	Laitaka pitamopa dupame baa pyao kumasetataminopa koto teponya Goteme baa dee sakatasetana,” lea. Dopa leamopa disaipele dupame mona etete kendame kumiami.
40017024	Dupa pao yuu taono Kapaneame dokonya pyakameaminopa losuu anda andake dokonya takisa nyingi akali dupame Pita kateasa ipupala baa pisoo, “Nyakamanya mana lenge akali dokome losuu anda andake dokonya takisa pingipi napingipi?” leami.
40017025	Dopa leaminopa Pitame lao pituu, “Kini pingi daape,” latala andaka kolandea. Kolandeamopa Jisasame wambao Pita lamaiyoo, “Saimone, embame aipa lao masilipi? Yuu dakenya kiŋi dupame takisa tata tata dupa api-kisa nyingimape? Dupame yuu tenge tange dupa-kisa nyingimape, pande katamana lao epenge endakali dupa-kisa nyingimape?” lea.
40017026	Pitame yanu pyao, “Katamana lao epenge endakali waka dupa-kisa nyingimana,” lea. Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Dopa tamo doko, yuu tenge tange dupame takisa napyapenge.
40017027	Dopaka doko, naimame akali dokaita kenda pisala nayamana. Dopana, emba endaki pete dokonya wapaka nyingi uku doko pyandala puu. Pyandatala wapaka wambao nyeteno doko nyoo nengekaita angapu lakyetala muni mende palyapomona nyepe. Muni doko nyepala losuu anda andake dokonya nalimba lapotanya takisa pyao dupa maipina,” Jisasame dopa lea.
40018001	Gii mendai dokopaka disaipele dupame Jisasa kateasa ipupala baa pisoo, “Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi endakali dupanya api alyasale joo kalyape?” leami.
40018002	-
40018003	Dopa leaminopa Jisasame wane koo mende epena latala dokaitanya kaina dokonya katasetala lao pituu, “Nyakama kapilyetala wane koo nanjetamino kandao doko, Kaitinya Katenge dokome nyakama etete isala nayatana lao nambame nyakama kiningi langilyo.
40018004	Endakali mendeme baa tange anasale jetala wane koo dopale jingi doko Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi endakali dupanya alyasale katenge.
40018005	Dee endakali mendeme namba lao masetala wane koo dapale mende lanyilyamo dokome namba lanyingiakana,” lea.
40018006	“Endakali mendeme namba lao masoo miningi wane koo datupanya mendeme koo pina lao mapisetamo doko, baa etete koyata. Baame dopa pitame lao kana etete andake mende mangenya anjetala nyokaimbatamopa kumina lao solowata pete andake kaina dokonya soo pyandamili kandao doko, baa kuki yaka jipyali.
40018007	Koo pina lao mapisingi yuunya endakali dupa koyatami iki lamo! Koo pina lao mapisingi mana dupa kapa pao sepengeaka doko, endakali mendeme mapisetamo doko, baa koyata iki lamo!
40018008	“Embanya kingi mokopi mendeme emba koo pyaale lao mapisia kandeno doko, kepanya nepape! Emba kingi tamopi moko tamopi tanoma kateta lete etete katenge ongonya pateno doko, auu pyoo katate. Kingi mokopi pitaka kateta itate konjala naenge dokonya soo pyandatamo doko, auu pyoo nakatate.
40018009	Dee embanya lenge dokome emba koo pyaale lao mapisia kandeno doko, lukunya nepape! Emba lenge mendai iki tao lete etete katenge ongonya pateno doko, auu pyoo katate. Emba lenge lapota tapeta ita tao katenge yuu koo dokonya soo pyandatamo doko, auu pyoo nakatatena,” lea.
40018010	“Nyakamame wane koo datupanya mendaipi mende angi mende daa lamo lao masetamina kandao kalyepape. Nambame nyakama langilyona, wane koo dupa isingi enjele dupa koteaka lao nambanya Takange kaitinya katenge doko-pipa awapa katengema.
40018011	[Endakalinya Ikiningi dokome endakali alu petae dupa pyoo nyala epea.]
40018012	“Nyakamame aipa lao masilyamipi? Akali mendenya mena sipisipi andate mendai katatamo kandao doko, dutupanya mendai alu pitamopa baame aipa pitape? Baame sipisipi kingi ita mange mendai wakyoo-kisa dee mange mendai wakyoo dutupa tanu nao pau manda mendenya katena latala mendai alu pitamo doko pao kutata daape!
40018013	Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, baame kutao kandatatamo kandao doko, mendai doko kandao etete mona yaepata. Sipisipi kingi ita mange mendai wakyoo-kisa dee mange mendai wakyoo alu napitamino dutupa dopa pyoo mona yaepala nayata.
40018014	Dopaka pyoo nyakamanya Takange kaitinya katenge dokome wane koo datupanya mende alu napipya laka lao masingina,” Jisasame lea.
40018015	“Embanya endakali yango mendeme emba koo pingitamo kandao doko, emba baa katatasa pao nyalambo iki pitipala baanya koo pitamo doko lao panasoo lamaipi. Lamaitinopa baame embanya pii setamo kandao doko, embame embanya endakali yango doko dee lanyete.
40018016	Baame embanya pii nasetamo kandao doko, pii pepa pyapae singili pyoo, ‘Lapo tepopi mendeme pii dupa pitaka sokondape petala kyoto injisetaminopana,’ embame mendalapo lanyepala deaka lamaiya pupi.
40018017	Baame dutupanya pii nasetamo kandao doko, embame sosa doko lamaipi. Dee baame sosanya apata pii nasetamo kandao doko, baa netesa endakalipi takisa nyingi akalipi dopale lamo lao masepe.
40018018	“Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, nyakamame isa yuu dakenya mende pyakilyina kayakamaitamino doko, kaitinya pyakilyina kayakamaitaka. Dee nyakamame isa yuu dakenya mende yukuokamaitamino doko, kaitinya yukuokamaitaka.
40018019	“Dee nambame pii mende nyakama dapa langilyo: nyakamanya endakali lapomame isa yuu dakenya katao mona mendai palyetala mende pyekena lao loma soo tee latambino kandao doko, nambanya Takange kaitinya katenge dokome kapa pao pyakamaita.
40018020	Doko, endakali lapo tepopi mendatupame namba lao masetala mendasa kambu pyao pilyami dosa namba dupa-pipa awapa katengena,” Jisasame lea.
40018021	Dokopa Pitame ipupala Jisasa pisoo lao pituu, “Kamongo, nambanya endakali yango mendeme paa akipatesa namba koo pingyetamopa nambame baanya koo yanu doko kayapengepe? Paa kalangesa kayapengepe?” lea.
40018022	Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Paa kalangesa daa. Kingi itaka kalange dupanya paa kalangesa lao lelyo.
40018023	Dopana, Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi doko akali kiŋi mendeme baanya kalai akali dupa-kisa yanu siamo dupa pyekena latoo lao masoo kateamo dopale.
40018024	Kiŋi dokome tee pyao yanu dupa pyekena lao kateamopa kalai akali dupanya mende laminao epeami-pyaa. Akali doko-kisa baanya muni yanu yakiaka etete longo sia-pyaa.
40018025	Baame yanu doko kapa pao pyapenge nanjiamosa baanya akali andake dokome lao pituu, ‘Nyakamame akali dake, baanya endapi, wanepi, dee baanya oapapi dupa pitakame muni nyepala yanu doko pyakalapape!’ lea-pyaa.
40018026	Dopa leamopa kalai akali dokome baa lao luma lakapala, ‘Nambame embanya muni dupa pitaka yanu pyakatona, embame namba maka nakaenya malisepoko!’ lea-pyaa.
40018027	Dokopa akali andake dokome kalai akali doko kondome kumao baanya yanu doko kayapala baa yakinea-pyaa.
40018028	“Dopa peteamopa kalai akali dokome pupala baanya kalai akali yango mende kandanyia-pyaa. Akali doko-kisa baanya muni yanu kina andate mendai sia-pyaa. Dokonya baame baa minatala mange minao lakatete pyoo pituu, ‘Embame nambanya yanu doko pyaka!’ lea-pyaa.
40018029	Dopa leamopa baanya kalai akali yango dokome tombauli sepala, ‘Nambame embanya muni dupa yanu pyakatona, embame namba maka nakaenya malisepoko!’ lea-pyaa.
40018030	Dopa leamoaka doko, baame malisala nayatowana lao masetala, akali dokome muni dupa yanu pyao etapalaka andaka ipatana anjoo pyandala pena lea-pyaa.
40018031	Dokopa baanya kalai akali yango dupame piamo doko kandatala mona etete kenda kayapala, doko pitaka nyakamanya akali andake doko pao lamaiyami-pyaa.
40018032	Lamaiyaminopa akali andake dokome baa epena latala lamaiyoo, ‘Emba kalai akali koo lamo! Embame namba pisipino dokonya nambame nambanya yanu emba-kisa sipumu doko pitaka kayapu.
40018033	Nambame emba kondo kayapu dopaka pyoo embame embanya kalai akali yango doko kondo kayapili, yaka nanjipyalipi?’ lea-pyaa.
40018034	Dopa latala akali andake dokome imbu kayapala baanya kalai akali doko anjingi andaka tanda maiyoo isingi akali dupanya kingilyaka maiyoo pituu, ‘Akali dakeme nambanya muni dupa pitaka yanu pyao etapalaka andaka ipatana anjoo soo pupa,’ lea-pyaana,” Jisasame lea.
40018035	Dopa latala baame kongali pii doko etasoo lao pituu, “Nyakama mendai mendai lao dupame nyakamanya endakali yango mendeme koo pingyetamo dupanya yanu dupa kiningi etete kayala nayatamino kandao doko, nambanya Takange kaitinya katenge dokome nyakama mendai dopaka pitana,” lea.
40019001	Jisasame pii dutupa lamaiyoo etapala, Galili yuu doko yakinatala Jutia yuu dokonya endaki Jotane yangitena pea.
40019002	Dokopa endakali kambu longome baa watao peaminopa baame endakali dokaitanya yaina dupa yuu dokonya mee jakamaiya.
40019003	Dopa piamopa Patasi mendapuame ipupala baa minao makande pyoo lao pituu, “Enda watao pingi tenge dupanya mendenya-kaita akali mendeme baanya enda doko pena lao watao pyatamopa naimanya mana setapae dupanya kapa patape napatape?” leami.
40019004	Dopa leaminopa baame yanu pyao, “Nyakamame pii dake itaki napiamipi? ‘Tee piamo dokopa Pyoo Injiamo dokome endapa akalipa lao wasia-pyaa.’
40019005	Dopa petala baame lao pituu, ‘Tenge dokonya akalimi baanya endangi takangepa yakinatala, baanya etanengepa kopatala dolapo yonge mendai joo pititambina,’ lea-pyaa.
40019006	Dopana dolapo lapoma joo napetenya, yonge mendai joo pititambi. Goteme nyoo pyasetae doko endakalimi wakale pyoloo napipengena,” Jisasame lea.
40019007	Dopa leamopa Patasi dupame baa lamaiyoo, “‘Akali mendeme baanya enda doko watao pyao pituu, watao pingi pepa mende maitala watao pyapengena,’ lao Moseseme mana setekea-pyoomo doko aipuma setea laape?” leami.
40019008	Dokopa Jisasame dokaitanya pii yanu pyao, “Nyakama tuu-tuu piaminosa enda watenge kaita doko Moseseme nyakamanya setekeamoaka doko, wamba tee piamo dokopa mana doko nasia-pyaa.
40019009	Dopana nambame nyakama dapa langilyo: akali mendenya etanenge dokome kepo kolala nayatamopa, baame mee watao pyapala enda waka mende lanyetamo kandao doko, akali dokome kepo kolatana,” lea.
40019010	Dopa leamopa baanya disaipele dupame baa lamaiyoo, “Enda akalipa tole pyao petenge mana doko dopale tamo kandao doko, akalimi enda lanyala nayao katataminopa auu pitana,” leami.
40019011	Dopa leaminopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Endakali pitakame kapa pao dopa napitami. Goteme endakali mendapua mana doko maiyamo dupame iki pitami.
40019012	Akali mendapua enda nanyepenge jepae mandeami dupame enda nanyoo mee katengema. Mendapua lakapo nyepae dupame kapa pao enda lanyala naengema. Dee mendapuame Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi doko lao masetala enda lanyala naengemaka. Mana doko kapa pao watao minatamo dokome mininana,” Jisasame lea.
40019013	Gii dokopa endakali mendapuame wane wanakupi koo dupa-kisa Jisasame kingi setapala sekena lao laminao epeami. Dopaka doko, disaipele dupame dokaita pyalanya leami.
40019014	Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Wane wanakupi koo dupa epekena kaita lyokala nayakalapa! Kaitinya Katenge dokome wane wanakupi dapale joo kalyamino endakali dupa isoo kalyamona,” lea.
40019015	Dopa latala baame dokaita-kisa kingi setapala yuu doko yakinatala pea.
40019016	Yuu mendepa akali mende Jisasa kateasa ipupala lao pituu, “Mana Lenge Akali, tenda namba lete etete katatopa lao mana epe aki mende minawape?” lea.
40019017	Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Aipuma embame aki mana mende epepe lao namba kandao pisilipi? Mendai iki baa epe. Emba lete etete kalyanya masii kandeno doko, mana setapae dupa watao minape!” lea.
40019018	Dopa lateamopa akali dokome baa pisoo, “Mana setapae dupa andutupape?” lea. Dokopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “‘Embame endakali pyao kumasala nayape. Embame kepo kolala nayape. Embame pake nala nayape. Embame endakali mende minakasalanya sambo laa nayape.
40019019	Embanya endangi takangepa dolapo andanda semaiyoo katape. Dee embame emba tange auu kaengeli pyoo endakali yango dupa auu kayao katapena,’” Jisasame lea.
40019020	Dokopa akali dokome pii yanu pyao, “Mana setapae dutupa pitaka nambame watao minio doko mee minawaka kalyona, dee aki mende nambame pipenge jilyape?” lea.
40019021	Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Emba tolalakao tolatae katatoo lao maseteno kandao doko, emba pupala embanya oapi dupame muni nyepala endakali tipya dupa maipi. Dopa pitinopa embanya epe etete dupa kaitinya sakatana, embame namba watao ipupi,” lea.
40019022	Dopa leamopa akali dokome sepala baanya oapi etete longo singi dokonyana, mona etete kenda kayao yakinatala pea.
40019023	Dokopa Jisasame disaipele dupa lamaiyoo, “Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, kamongo mendeme baa Kaitinya Katenge dokome isina lao kalyanya lekeleke tata.
40019024	Dee mendeaka nyakama langilyona, mena kamele mendeme kepo tii mendenya kolandalanya lekeleke tapyaliaka doko, kamongo mendeme baa Goteme isina lao kalyanya etete lekeleke tapyalina,” lea.
40019025	Dokopa disaipele dupame pii dutupa soo etete walu latala lao pituu, “Dopa tamo kandao doko, api kapa pao pyoo nyepae katatape?” leami.
40019026	Dopa leaminopa Jisasame dokaita kandatae soo yanu pyao, “Endakalimi kapa pao dopa napipengeaka doko, Goteme dupa pitaka kapa pao pingina,” lea.
40019027	Dokopa Pitame baa lamaiyoo, “Kandeleno, naimame dupa pitaka yakinatala emba watao paelyamano dokonya tenda naimame aki mende nyetamape?” lea.
40019028	Dopa leamopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, tenda dupa pitaka enenge jetamo gii dokopa Endakalinya Ikiningi doko etete kamongao kiŋi petenge toko dokonya pitita. Gii dokopa nyakama namba watao paelyamino dupame Isataele tata kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapoma dupanya pii tolasakamaiyanya kiŋi petenge toko kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapoma dupanya pititamiaka.
40019029	Dee namba lao masetala anda tamopi, kaiminingi tamopi, pimalenge tamopi, takange tamopi, endangi tamopi, wane tamopi, ee tamopi dupa yakineamino endakali dupa pitakame dupanya yanu etete longo waa palyoo nyepala dee lete etete katatamiaka.
40019030	Dopaka doko, enomba nyoo katenge endakali longo dupa maita-kaita katatami. Maita-kaita katenge longo dupa enomba nyoo katatamina,” Jisasame dopa lea.
40020001	“Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi doko akali mendeme yongama wamba sakatatala akali mendapuame baanya getepe ee dokonya kalai pyekena lao lanyala peamo dopale.
40020002	Pupala ee tange dokome akali mendatupa-pipa pii lao wasoo mona mendai palyetala, muni kina mendai mendai lao yuu gii mendainya singili pyoo nyalapalena latala, akali dutupame baanya getepe ee dokonya kalai pyaa pena lea-pyaa.
40020003	Maitakao baame yongama kiloko mange mendai wakyoapi mendenya dee kamapisa pupala kandeamopa, akali mendapua mee dupanya kateami-pyaa.
40020004	Kateaminopa baame dupa lamaiyoo, ‘Nyakama apata getepe ee dokonya kalai pyaa pupa. Nambame nyakama yole yaka dyaapona,’ lea-pyaa.
40020005	Dopa lateamopa akali dupa kalai pyaa peami-pyaa. Pateaminopa kotaka andawai pungupungupi, alemandi kiloko tepopi dupanya deaka patapu dopaka pia-pyaa.
40020006	“Dopa petala alemandi kiloko yuungi laanya piamopa baa deaka pupala akali mendapua mee kateamino kandatala dupa lamaiyoo, ‘Aipuma nyakama indupa gii dake pitaka mee dakenya katalamipi?’ lea-pyaa.
40020007	Dopa leamopa dupame yanu pyao, ‘Akali mendeme naima kalai nandyomona,’ leami-pyaa. Dokopa baame dupa lamaiyoo, ‘Nyakama apata nambanya getepe ee dokonya kalai pyaa pupa,’ lea-pyaa.
40020008	“Yuu kualanya piamopa akali ee tange dokome ee isingi akali doko lamaiyoo, ‘Embame kalai akali dupa epena latala yole maipi. Maiyanya pituu embame kalai akali etete maitakao ipamino dupa wambao maima-maima pyoo maiyoo pao, tee pyao ipamino dokonya tuu lape,’ lea-pyaa.
40020009	Dokopa akali mendatupa kiloko yuungi laanya piamopa ipao kalai piamino dupa muni kina mendai mendai lao nyiami-pyaa.
40020010	Dee akali wambao yongama sakatao kalai piamino dupame ipupala nyakama muni mendalapo apata nyalamano lao masiaminoaka doko, dupa apata kina mendai mendai lawaka nyiami-pyaa.
40020011	-
40020012	Nyepala dokopa dupame akali ee tange doko kandao imbu kayapala mumu lao lao pituu, ‘Akali etete maitakao ipamino datupame kiloko gii mendai iki kalai pimino doko, naima niki popome kumao indupa gii doko pitaka lekeleke tao kalai pyemano. Dopaka doko, embame dupa naima-pipa kapa kapa lao yole pilinona,’ leami-pyaa.
40020013	“Dopa leaminopa baame yanu pyao akali dupanya mende kandao dapa lea-pyaa: ‘Kaimia, nambame emba koo pingyala naelyona, emba muni kina mendai nyatalena lao nalimba mona mendai palyala nayalambape?
40020014	Embanya yole doko nyoo puu. Nambame emba yole dyoo dopaka pyoo akali maita pyao ipao kalai pyomo doko maitoo lao masetala maiyo.
40020015	Nambanya muni dokome mendita mende pitoo lao masoto doko kapa pao napitope? Dee nambame auu pyoo dokonya emba mona koo palyilipi?’ akali ee tange dokome dopa lea-pyaa.
40020016	Dopaka pyoo endakali enomba nyoo katenge dupa maita-kaita katatami. Maita-kaita katenge dupa enomba nyoo katatamina,” Jisasame lea.
40020017	-
40020018	Jisasa Jetusaleme pao pituu, baanya disaipele kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapoma dutupa iki lanyepala kaitinisa dapa lamaiya: “Kandeleno! Naima indupa Jetusaleme pelyamano. Akali mendeme Endakalinya Ikiningi doko enge nyepala pitisa mupapi mana setapae masingi akalipi dupa laitaka pitamopa dupame baa kosa lao pyao kumasemana latami.
40020019	Dopa latala dupame baa endakali tata waka dupanya kingilyaka maitaminopa, dokaitame baa kandao lamba lao konjame pyapala ita pokonya pyao yukuotami. Dopa pitaminopa koto teponya Goteme baa dee sakatasetana,” Jisasame lea.
40020020	Gii dokopa akali Sepete ikiningi mendalapo endangi dokome laminao Jisasa kateasa ipao luma lakapala baa-kisa mendita mende tee lea-pyaa.
40020021	Dokopa Jisasame baa pisoo, “Embame aki mende auu kaelepe?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa enda dokome baa lamaiyoo, “Emba kiŋi jeteno gii dokopa nambanya wane dalaponya mende embanya kingi tolae-kaita katata mende koya-kaita katata lao laa,” lea-pyaa.
40020022	Dopa leamopa Jisasame lao pituu, “Nyakamame lelyamino doko masokondape napilyamino. Wane nyalambome kapo penge namba nato dokonya kapa pao natambipi?” lea-pyaa. Dokopa dolapome baa lamaiyoo, “Nalimba kapana nambana,” leambi-pyaa.
40020023	Dopa leambinopa Jisasame dolapo lamaiyoo, “Kiningi etete nyalambome nambanya kapo penge dokonya natambiaka doko, nambanya kingi tolae-kaita petena lengepi koya-kaita katena lengepi doko nambanya kalai daa. Nambanya Takangeme katatamina lao yapao nyiamo endakali dupa katatamina,” lea-pyaa.
40020024	Dopa pilyamino lapae doko disaipele kingi ita dutupame sepala nyalambo kaiminingipa dolapo imbu kayami.
40020025	Dopa piaminopa Jisasame dokaita pitaka epena latala lamaiyoo, “Endakali tata dupanya yuu isingi akali kenge singi kalyamino dupame endakali dupanya alyasale joo katengema doko nyakamame masilyamino. Dee dupanya akali andake dupame nyakamanya pii watao minekena lao kyoto jingima doko nyakamame masilyaminoaka.
40020026	Dopaka doko, nyakamame dopa napinya, nyakamanya mende akali andake joo katapuli lao masetamo kandao doko, nyakamanya kalai akali joo katapenge.
40020027	Dee nyakamanya mende enomba nyoo katapuli lao masetamo kandao doko, nyakamanya kendemane joo katapenge.
40020028	Dopaka pyoo Endakalinya Ikiningi dokome baanya kalai pyekena lao naepea. Baame endakali dupa nisoo kii tamao nyalanya baa tangeme kumala epeana,” Jisasame lea.
40020029	Dupame yuu taono Jeteko doko yakinatala peaminopa endakali kambu andake mendeme Jisasa watao peami.
40020030	Dokopa akali lenge monda lapoma kaitinisa peteambi-pyaa. Akali dolapome Jisasa epelyamo leamino sepala dolapome puu lao ae lao, “Dapiti Yumbange! Kamongo! Embame nalimba kondo kayape!” leambi.
40020031	Dopa leambinopa endakali dupame dolapo pii kaena lao pyalanya leami. Dopa leaminoaka doko, akali dolapome dee eteteaka puu lao ae lao, “Dapiti Yumbange! Kamongo! Embame nalimba kondo kayape!” leambi.
40020032	Dokopa Jisasa ipao katapala akali dolapo epena latala lamaiyoo, “Nambame nyalambonya aipa pyakapili lao masilyambipi?” lea.
40020033	Dopa leamopa akali dolapome baa lamaiyoo, “Kamongo, embame nalimbanya lenge tasakapili lao masilyambanona,” leambi.
40020034	Dopa leambinopa Jisasame dolapo kondome kumapala baanya kingimi dolaponya lengenya watandeamo awapaka lenge talu petala baa watao peambi.
40021001	-
40021002	Dokaita Jetusaleme tengesale pao pituu, Olipimanda yuu dokonya taono Betepasi dokonya peami. Pao pituu dokopa Jisasame disaipele lapoma wambao pena lao lamaiyoo, “Yuu taono yakane nyalambonya enomba-kaita omo silyamo ongonya pupala, mena dongi mende anjetae yakane apata katatambinopa, nyalambome pupae kanjambinona, liangao minao ipupape.
40021003	Endakali mendeme nyalambo kandao pii mende lea kandeno doko, nyalambome baa lamaiyoo, ‘Kamongo dokome kalai mende dongi dalapome pipenge jilyamona,’ laapape. Dopa latambinopa yapa pealapomona,” lea.
40021004	Dopa piamo dokome akali potopesa mendeme pii mende dapa leamo doko angi jia:
40021005	“Nyakamame Sayone tange dupa dapa lamaiyepape: Indupa nyakamanya kiŋi doko nyakama katamisa epelyamo kanjepa. Endakali andanda semaiyoo katenge doko dongi maita dokonya pituu epelyamo. Baa dongi mendenya yakane dokonya maitanya pituu epelyamona,” lea-pyaa.
40021006	Disaipele dolapome pupala Jisasame leamoli piambi-pyaa.
40021007	Dopa petala dolapome dongi matakai dokonya yakane doko kateta minao epeambi. Ipupala nyalambonya yonge pee ketae pingi dolapo dongi maita dolaponya ketae seteambinopa, Jisasa dongi yakane dokonya pyakalyetala pituu pea.
40021008	Peamopa endakali kambu andake mendeme nyakamanya yonge pee ketae pingi dupa kaitini dokonya kuiyoo seteami. Yangi dupame ita yoko dupa yandao kaitini dokonya kuiyoo setami.
40021009	Dee endakali dupa wambata maita pyata pyoo pao pituu puu lao dapa lao wee leami: “Dapiti Yumbange, embame pyoo nyoo katape! Akali epelyamo dake auu pisetaena Kamongo Goteme epena lapumopa epelyamo! Etete Ketae Kaitinya Katenge, embame pyoo nyoo katapena,” leami.
40021010	Jisasa Jetusaleme pyakameamopa Jetusaleme tange dupa pitakame walu latala lao pituu, “Akali dake apipi?” leami.
40021011	Dopa leaminopa endakali awapa peamino dupame, “Baa Jisasa lenge Galili yuu taono Nasatete tange potopesa dokona,” leami.
40021012	Jisasa baa losuu anda andake katenge kame dokonya pupala topo setao peteamino endakali dupapi sambao kateamino endakali dupapi dupa watao pyapala, muni aloo pingi akali dupanya tepolo tokopi yaka maileome topo nyingi akali dupanya petenge tokopi dupa lokalyinya nepea.
40021013	Dopa petala baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Gotenya pii pepa pyapae singi dokonya, ‘Nambanya anda doko kandao endakalimi loma singi andana latamina,’ lapae silyamo. Dopaka doko, nyakamame anda dake pake nao makongao paenge endakali dupa yalo pingi kananda injisilyaminona,” lea.
40021014	Endakali lenge mondapi moko koopi dupa Jisasa kateasa losuu anda andake kame dokonya epeaminopa baame dupa mee injisia.
40021015	Dopa piamopa pitisa mupapi mana setapae masingi akalipi dupame Jisasanya kalai pupu lapae piamo dupa kandata, dee wane kole dupame losuu anda andake kame dokonya katao, “Dapiti Yumbange, embame pyoo nyoo katape!” lao wee leamino doko sepa petala imbumi kumiami.
40021016	Dopa petala dokaitame baa lamaiyoo, “Wane dupame pii lelyamino doko embame silipi?” leami. Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Kini, nambame silyona, pii mende dapa lapae silyamo: ‘Embame wane koopi ŋaŋapi dupanya nengekaita lumbakamainopa dupame emba lalyokondape piamina,’ lapae silyamo doko nyakamame itaki pyala nayamipi?” lea.
40021017	Dopa latala baame dokaita yakinatala Jetusaleme dokonya kamalyatena pao yuu taono Betani dokonya palea.
40021018	Jisasa yongama wamba dee Jetusaleme pilyoo pituu baa lopo kaya.
40021019	Lopo kayapala baame piki ita mende kaitini lembasa kateamo kandatala dokonya pea. Peamoaka doko, dii mende kutao nakandao yoko iki pyoo kateamo kandea. Dokopa baame piki ita doko kandao, “Embame tanga tangapi dii mende dee namanditi, etete daana!” lea. Dopa lalu piamopa piki ita doko sapuiya.
40021020	Dopa piamo doko disaipele dupame kandao mona andapala lao pituu, “Piki ita dake aipa petala pupae lao sapuilyape?” leami.
40021021	Dokopa Jisasame dokaitanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, nyakamame masoo minao katao mona lapo palya nayatamino kandao doko, nambame piki ita dake pilyoli pyoo nyakamame kapa pao pitami. Nyakamame doko iki pyaa nayao dee yuu manda dake kandao, sakatalala solowata pete andake dokonya mangena latamino kandao doko, lataminoli pita.
40021022	Nyakamame masoo minao loma soo tee latamino dupa pitaka nyetamina,” Jisasame lea.
40021023	Jisasa losuu anda andake dokonya pilyetala endakali dupa mana lamaiyoo kateamopa, pitisa mupapi Jutamanya isingi akalipi dupame baa kateasa ipupala lao pituu, “Embame apinya pii minao kalai datupa pilipi? Apimi kalai datupa emba-kisa seteape?” leami.
40021024	Dokopa Jisasame dokaitanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Nambame nyakama pii mende pisilyoakana, nyakamame yanu pyakatamino kandao doko, nambame kalai datupa dokonya pii minao pilyona lao nyakama langitoaka.
40021025	Joneme kaimbu pyakamaiyamo doko apimi pina leape? Goteme pina leape, pande endakalimi pina leamipi?” lea. Dokopa dokaitame pii doko sepala nyakamalapo lao pituu, “Naimame, ‘Goteme pina leana,’ latamano kandao doko, ‘Aipuma nyakamame Jonenya pii doko masoo minala nayamipi?’ lata.
40021026	Dee, ‘Endakalimi pina leamina,’ latamano kandao doko, endakali pitakame Jone doko akali potopesana lao masingima dokonya paka pyaumuna,” lao nyakamalapo leami.
40021027	Dopa latala dokaitame Jisasanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Naimame masala naelyamanona,” leami. Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Doko tamo doko, nambame kalai pilyo datupa pii leamo doko nyakama langya nayatoakana,” lea.
40021028	Dee Jisasame lao pituu, “Akali mendenya wane lapoma kateambi-pyaana salapape! Dolaponya takange dokome ipao wane mupa doko lamaiyoo, ‘Emba indupa getepe ee dokonya kalai pyaa puu,’ lea-pyaa.
40021029	Dopa leamopa wane dokome yanu pyao, ‘Namba daana,’ lea-pyaa. Dopa leamoaka doko, maitakao mona aloo petala pea-pyaa.
40021030	Takange dokome wane mende doko kateasa pao dopaka lamaiya-pyaa. Dopa lamaiyamopa, ‘Apane, yaka lumu,’ leamoaka doko, angi napea-pyaa.
40021031	Dopa latala wane dolaponya andukumi takangenya masiamoli pia lusilyamape?” lao Jisasame dokaita pisia. Dopa lao pisiamopa endakali dupame lao pituu, “Wane mupa dokome lumuna,” leami. Dopa leaminopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Dee nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, takisa nyingi akalipi kepo kolao paenge endapi dupame nyakama nyoo maita pyatala Goteme isina lao kalyanya ipao wambelyamino.
40021032	Doko aipumape? Jone Kaimbu Pingi doko nyakama kateamisa ipupala mana tolatae doko laitaka peteamoaka doko, nyakamame baa masala nayami. Dopaka doko, takisa nyingi akalipi kepo kolao paenge endapi dupame masiami. Dopa piamino doko nyakamame kandatala mona aloo petala baa masala nayamina,” Jisasame lea.
40021033	Jisasame, “Dee kongali pii mende lelyona, salapape,” latala lao pituu, “Akali yuu andake singi mende katea-pyaa. Akali dokome getepe ee mende kakopatala pokea-pyaa. Pokatala baame getepe ee dokonya getepe dii lyao indyalanya yuli mende lakea-pyaa. Dee isoo pititamo anda ketae mende piaka-pyaa. Dopa petala akali mendapuame ee doko isakao katena latala, baa yuu londati mendakaita pao katea-pyaa.
40021034	Dopa petala yuu mende getepe wambu pingi gii doko ipateamopa baame baanya kendemane mendapuame ee isakamaingi akali dupa kateamisa pupala, getepe dii mendapua lyao peekena lao nyakala pena lea-pyaa.
40021035	Peaminopa ee isakamaingi akali dupame baanya kendemane dupa minatala, mende pyao indyepala mende kumi pyao kumasoo, mende kaname pyao takyoo piami-pyaa.
40021036	Dopa peteaminopa akali ee tange dokome dee kendemane mendatupa pena lea-pyaa. Wamba pena leamoli pyoo pena laa nayao dee longole pena lea-pyaa. Dopa piamopa ee isakamaingi dupame wamba piaminoliaka piami-pyaa.
40021037	Dee etao doko baame baanya ikiningi doko dokaita kateamisa pena lao pituu, ‘Dupame nambanya ikiningi doko andanda semaitamina,’ lao masetala pena lea-pyaa.
40021038	Dopa leamoaka doko, ee isakamaingi dutupame wane doko epeamo kandatala nyakamalapo lao pituu, ‘Wane dakeme takangenya moya nyepengena, yapa pyao kumasema! Pyao kumasetala baanya ee moya nyepenge dake naima nyetamana,’ leami-pyaa.
40021039	Dopa latala dokaitame baa minatala ee dokonya kamalyatena soo pyandatala pyao kumasiami-pyaa.
40021040	“Dopana akali ee tange dokome ipupala ee isakamaingi dupa aipa pitape?” lea.
40021041	Dopa leamopa dupame baa lamaiyoo, “Akali koo dokaita tanda maiyoo pyao kumaseta. Dopa petala baame getepe ee doko akali waka mendapuame isakao katena latamopa, wambu pingi gii dokonya dupame getepe dii lyao maiyakamaitamina,” leami.
40021042	Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame Gotenya pii pepa pyapae singi dake itaki pyatala nayamipi? ‘Anda pingi akali dupame anda pingina daa latala nepeamino doko pingina mupa jetea. Kamongome dopa pipumu doko, naimame kandamanopa auu etete pilyamona,’ lapae silyamo.
40021043	Dopana, nambame nyakama dapa langilyo: Goteme nyakama dee isala nayao baame isingi dokonya dii manditamino endakali dupa iseta.
40021044	[Endakali mendeme kana doko-ketae lombao sepala baa indyuu tale pita. Dee kana dokome endakali mende pyao takyembatamo kandao doko, endakali doko etete kunguma jetana,” lea.]
40021045	Dopa lao Jisasame pii kongali leamo dupa pitisa mupapi Patasipi dupame sepala, “Naima kandao lalumu,” lao masiami.
40021046	Dopa lao masetala baa anjemana lao kaita kutiaminoaka doko, endakali kambu kateamino dupame Jisasa baa potopesana lao masiaminosa paka kayami.
40022001	-
40022002	Jisasame dee kongali pii mendapua dokaita lamaiyoo lao pituu, “Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi doko kiŋi mendenya ikiningi doko enda keleamopa baame nee andake mende yawakamaiyamo dopale.
40022003	Kiŋi dokome endakali wamba epena lateamo dupa nee andake dokonya nala epena lao baanya kendemane mendapuame lanyala pena lea-pyaa. Dopaka doko, dokaitame nala ipumana lao masala nayami-pyaa.
40022004	Dopa piaminosa baame kendemane mendatupa pena lao pituu, ‘Nambame endakali wamba epena lateo dutupa kandao dapa lamaiyepape: “Baame baanya nee andake doko depa latelyamo. Baanya mena pulumakao maipa dupapi dee pulumakao andapae dupapi pyapalamo. Dupa pitaka depa latae sepelyamona, nyakama dokonya nala ipupa,” lao lamaiyepape!’ lea-pyaa.
40022005	Dokopa dokaitame lamaiyaminoaka doko, tuu petala nyakamanya masiamili piami-pyaa. Dupanya mende baanya eenya pea-pyaa. Mende baanya pisinisa dupanya pea-pyaa.
40022006	Dee yangimi kiŋi dokonya kendemane dupa minatala mana koo minao pyao kumasiami-pyaa.
40022007	Dopa piamino doko soo kiŋi dokome imbu kayapala baanya yanda singi amii dupa pena lateamopa, dupame pupala kendemane pyao kumasiamino endakali dutupa pyao kumasetala dutupanya yuu taono doko pyao yangeami-pyaa.
40022008	“Dokopa kiŋi dokome baanya kendemane dupa lamaiyoo, ‘Nambanya nee andake doko depa latae sepelyamoaka doko, nala epena leo endakali dupa kooma lamo.
40022009	Dopana nyakamame kaitini kembo dupanya pupala endakali kutao kandatamino dupa pitaka nee andake dakenya nala epena lamaiyepape!’ lea-pyaa.
40022010	Dopa lateamopa kendemane dokaitame kaitini dupanya pupala, endakali koopi epepi kandeamili pyoo laminao ipao kambu pyateaminopa, enda kelyao nee napenge anda doko etete tumbiami-pyaa.
40022011	“Peteamino dokonya kiŋi dokome endakali dokaita kanjanya kolandatala kandeamopa, akali mende yonge pee enda kelenge giinya pingi doko napyoo mee peteamo kandea-pyaa.
40022012	Kandatala baame baa lamaiyoo, ‘Kaimia, embanya yonge pee enda kelenge giinya pingi doko napyene lamo doko aipa petala emba dakenya kolandalepe?’ lao pisia-pyaa. Dopa lao pisiamopa akali dokome pii mende lapenge nanjia-pyaa.
40022013	Dopa piamopa kiŋi dokome kendemane dupa lamaiyoo, ‘Nyakamame baanya kingi mokopi dupa yaki petala yuu etete iminjetae dokonya baa soo pyale laapa! Dokonya katao baa ee lao yamataka lao nenge gilyoo katatana,’ kiŋi dokome dopa lea-pyaa.
40022014	Epena latae endakali longo katengemaka doko, yapao nyepae kuki iki katengemana,” Jisasame lea.
40022015	Dokopa akali Patasi dupame pupala kambu pyao pituu Jisasame pii mende latamo dokonya-kaita baa-kisa tenge setamana lao masetala pii wasiami-pyaa.
40022016	Dopa petala nyakamanya disaipele mendapuapi dee Kiŋi Etote tata mendapuapi dupa Jisasa kateasa pena leaminopa dupame pupala baa kandao lao pituu, “Mana Lenge Akali, emba pii kiningi lenge akalina, embame kiningi pii lao Goteme endakali dupame pipimili lao masingili pyoo mana lamailino lao masilyamano. Embame endakali dupa paka nakayapala itange kandao mokosala nanenge.
40022017	Dopana, naimanya mana setapae dupanya aipa lapae silyape? Kapomane Isingi Mupa dokonya takisa dupa naimame pyakamaipengepe, pande kayapenge? Embame aipa lao masilipi? Naima langi,” leami.
40022018	Dopaka doko, Jisasame dupanya mana koo doko kandatala lao pituu, “Nyakama endakali minakasingi akali! Aipuma nyakamame namba minao makande pilyamipi?
40022019	-
40022020	Nyakamame takisa pyapenge muni ongonya mende namba laitaka pyepa!” lea. Dokopa dokaitame muni mende maitiaminopa baame dokaita pisoo, “Muni dakenya endakali lengelyaapi wasetae kalyamopi kenge pyatae kalyamopi doko apinyape?” lea.
40022021	Dopa leamopa dokaitame lao pituu, “Doko Kapomane Isingi Mupa dokonya kalyamona,” leami. Dopa leaminopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Dopa tamo doko, opale Kapomane Isingi Mupa dokonya dupa tange maiyakamaiyepape. Dee opale Gotenya dupa Gote tangeaka maiyakamaiyepape,” lea.
40022022	Dokaitame pii dutupa sepala mona andao baa yakinatala peami.
40022023	-
40022024	Koto gii dokopaka akali Satyusi mendapua Jisasa kateasa epeami. Dupame endakali kumapala dee sakatala naengena lengema. Akali dupame ipupala Jisasa pisoo, “Mana Lenge Akali, wamba Moseseme dapa lea-pyaa: ‘Akali mende wane manja nayao mee kumatamo kandao doko, baanya kaiminingi mendeme enda walyakae doko pisetala wane manditamo dupa kaiminingi kumapae dokonya manjakamaitana,’ lapae silyamo.
40022025	Gii mendepa akali mendenya ikiningi kalange naima-pipa kateamano dokonya mupa dokome enda nyepala wane manja nayao baa mee kumia. Kumateamopa kaiminingi lapo dokome enda walyakae doko baa pisia.
40022026	-
40022027	Dokome dopaka piamopa kaiminingi tepo dokome enda dokoaka pisia. Dopaka pyoo kaiminingi kalange dutupa pitakame enda dokoaka nyepala pitaka kumateaminopa maitakao enda doko kumia.
40022028	Dopana, endakali kumapae dupa dee sakatatamino gii dokopa enda mendai dokoaka kaiminingi kalange dutupa pitakame wamba nyiamino doko apinya joo pitita laape?” leami.
40022029	Dokopa Jisasame dokaitanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Nyakamame Gotenya pii pepa pyapae singi doko masala nayao baanya pupu lapae doko masala nayawaka pingima. Tenge dokonya nyakamame etete kopeta lelyamino.
40022030	Endakali kumapae dupa dee sakatatamino gii dokopa endakalipa nyala nayao kaitinya enjele dupa katengemali pyoo katatami.
40022031	-
40022032	Endakali kumapae dupa dee sakatatamina lao Goteme nyakamanya pii pepa pyao setekeamo doko itaki napiamipi? Baame dapa lea-pyaa: ‘Namba Apotakamepi, Aisakepi, Jekopepi, dutupanya Gote dokona,’ lapae silyamo. Baa endakali lete katenge dupanya Gotena, kumapae dupanya daana,” Jisasame lea.
40022033	Dopa leamopa endakali kambu piamino dupame baanya mana leamo dutupa sepala walu leami.
40022034	Jisasame pii dutupa leamo dokome Satyusi dupanya nengekaita lyokapya lapae doko Patasi dupame sepala, baa kateasa ipao kapeami.
40022035	-
40022036	Kapatala dokaitanya mana setapae masingi akali mendeme Jisasa minao makande pyaanya pisoo pituu, “Mana Lenge Akali, mana setapae dupanya anduku mupa joo silyape?” lea.
40022037	Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “‘Embame embanya Kamongo Gote auu kayao katao, embanya monapi, imambupi, masingipi dutupa pitaka baa iki maitae katape.’
40022038	Mana setapae doko etete andake mupa.
40022039	Dee mendai dopaleaka lapo doko dake: ‘Embame emba tange auu kaengeli pyoo embanya endakali yango doko auu kayao katape.’
40022040	Mana setapae lapoma dolapome Moseseme pii pepa piamo dupa pitakapi potopesame pii pepa piamino dupapi dupa tumunya minalyoo silyamona,” Jisasame lea.
40022041	-
40022042	Patasi dupa kapatae kateaminopa Jisasame dokaita pisoo, “Nyakamame Kataisa doko kandao apina lao masilyamipi? Baa apinya yumbangepe?” lea. Dokopa dupame baanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Baa Dapitinya yumbangena,” leami.
40022043	Dopa leaminopa baame dupa lamaiyoo, “Dopa tamo kandao doko, Dapitimi aki mende masetala baanya yumbange doko kandao ‘Kamongona’ lea-pyaape? Doko, Oli Sipitisa dokome Dapitinya mona sakatasiamopa baame dapa lea-pyaana lapae silyamo:
40022044	‘Kamongo Gote dokome nambanya Kamongo doko lamaiyoo, “Emba nambanya kingi tolae-kaita katape. Katatenopa nambame embanya yandapipili dupa embanya moko pundipundi ongonya katena latona,” lea-pyaana,’ lea.
40022045	Dopana wamba Dapitimi Kataisa doko kandao ‘Kamongona’ latamo kandao doko, aipa petala baa Dapiti yumbange jilyape?” lea.
40022046	Dopa lateamopa akali mendaipi mendeme Jisasanya pii doko kapa pao yanu pyapenge etete nanjia. Koto gii dokonya pituu tee pyao akali mendeme pii mende dee baa pisalanya paka kayami.
40023001	-
40023002	Dokopa Jisasame endakali kambu piamino dupapi baanya disaipele dupapi dupa lamaiyoo lao pituu, “Mana setapae masingi akalipi Patasipi dupame Mosesenya panda nyoo kalyamino.
40023003	Dopana, dupame nyakama langitaminoli pyoo dupa pitaka watao minao pyepape. Dopaka doko, dupame mana minataminoli pyoo naminalapape. Doko, dupa tangeme lelyaminoli pyoo napingima.
40023004	Dee dupame kenda pipae dupa andake pyoo yaki pipala, endakali dupanya lataiyanya nyoo sakamaingima. Dopa pingimaka doko, dupame etete kukipi mende kingi maiya naengema.
40023005	Dupame kalai pilyami dupa pitaka endakalimi kandapimili lao pingima. Dopa pina lao dupame Gotenya pii pepa pyapae dokonya mendatupa pepa pyao nyepala mata joo peta kitambuk joo piseta pingima. Dupame nyakamanya yonge pee kisa pingi puna dupanya yati pipaek dupa londe pyoo anjinya pyandata pingimaka.
40023006	Dee dupame nee andake nelyami dupanya petenge toko enomba nyoo dupanyapi, losuu anda dupanya enomba nyoo petenge toko dupanyapi dupanya pilyanya auu kaengema.
40023007	Kamapi dupanya endakali dupame nyakama lasa lata ‘Mana Lenge Akalina’ lata, pipimili lao auu kaengemaka.
40023008	Dopaka doko, endakali dupame nyakama kandao ‘Mana Lenge Akalina’ lena lao kayala nayalapape. Doko, nyakamanya Mana Lenge Akali mendai iki katamopa nyakama pitaka kaiminingiaka kalyamino.
40023009	Dee nyakamame isa yuu dakenya endakali mende nyakamanya ‘Takangena’ laa nayalapape. Kaitinya katenge doko iki nyakamanya Takange.
40023010	Endakali dupame nyakama kandao ‘Akali Andakena’ lena lao kayala nayalapapeaka. Nyakamanya Akali Andake mendai iki kalyamo. Doko baa Kataisa.
40023011	Nyakamanya mende alyasale joo katatamo doko, nyakamanya kalai pyekenge akali joo katapenge.
40023012	Endakali mende tangeme alyasale joo katatamo doko, anasale joo katena lata. Dee endakali mende tangeme anasale joo katatamo doko, alyasale joo katena latana,” lea.
40023013	“Mana Ais 5:8-25* setapae masingi akalipi Patasipi nyakama koyatami iki lamo! Nyakama endakali minakasingi akali! Nyakamame endakali dupa Kaitinya Katenge dokome isala naena lao kaitini lyokakamaingima. Nyakama isina lao nakatenya dee endakali isina lao kalyanya pipimino dupa isina lao kayala naelyaminoaka.
40023014	[“Mana setapae masingi akalipi Patasipi nyakama koyatami iki lamo! Nyakama endakali minakasingi akali! Nyakamame enda walyakae dupanya anda yuupi dupa minamao nyepakamaitala, endakali dupame nyakama epepe lao masina lao loma londe pyoo singima. Dokonya Goteme nyakama-kisa kenda pipae etete andake mende setata.]
40023015	“Mana setapae masingi akalipi Patasipi nyakama koyatami iki lamo! Nyakama endakali minakasingi akali! Nyakamame endakali mende Juta injisalanya solowata pete andake dupanya yangi-kaita pata yuu dupanya mendasa pata pingima. Dopa petala nyakamame endakali mende nyepa pilyamino dokome nyakamanya mana koo dupa ita minao yuu koo dokonya mupa joo pupenge endakali injisingima.
40023016	“Kaitini laitaka pingi akali lenge monda nyakama koyatami iki lamo! Nyakamame endakali dupa dapa lao mana lamaingima: ‘Endakali mendeme losuu anda andake dake mauwana kiningi etete dopa pitona latamo dokome latamoli napipenge. Dopaka doko, endakali dokome losuu anda andake dokonya golome wasepae dupa mauwana kiningi etete dopa pitona latamo dokome kayala nayao latamoli pipengena,’ lamaingima.
40023017	Nyakama lenge monda kyakaenge! Angi doko andukupi? Golome wasepae dupape, pande golome wasepae dupa Gotenyana lao makande pingi losuu anda andake dokope?
40023018	Dee nyakamame endakali dupa dapa lao mana lamaingimaka: ‘Endakali mendeme losuu anda andake dokonya kundi maingi olata toko doko mauwana kiningi etete dopa pitona latamo dokome latamoli napipenge. Dopaka doko, endakali mendeme opale epe mende Gotenya lao setapae olata toko ketae dokonya singi doko mauwana latamo dokome kayala nayao latamoli pipengena,’ lamaingima.
40023019	Nyakama lenge monda daape! Angi doko andukupi? Opale epe setapae dokope, pande setapae doko Gotenyana lao makande pingi olata toko dokope?
40023020	Dopana, endakali mendeme olata toko doko mauwana lelyamo dokome olata toko dokopi opale epe Gotenya lao setapae olata toko dokonya singi dupa pitaka apata kandao lenge.
40023021	Dee endakali mendeme losuu anda andake doko mauwana lelyamo dokome losuu anda andake dokonya katenge doko apata kandao lenge.
40023022	Dee endakali mendeme kaiti doko mauwana lelyamo dokome Gotenya isoo petenge toko dokopa toko dokonya petenge dokopa apata kandao lenge.
40023023	“Mana setapae masingi akalipi Patasipi nyakama koyatami iki lamo! Nyakama endakali minakasingi akali! Nyakamame takae mondai itamaiyapi dupa paa kingi ita lao mokosepala mende doko Gote maingima. Dopa pingimaka doko, mana tolatae miningipi, kondo kayamaingipi, lelyamoli pingipi, mana setapae dupanya pii angi dopale dupa nyakamame watao naminingima. Nyakamame mendatupa dutupa yakinala nayao pituu angi datupa watao miningima pyali yaka.
40023024	Kaitini laitaka pingi dupa nyakama lenge monda daape! Nyakamanya kapo penge dupanya pongena mende pelyamo doko nyoo nepengemaka doko, mena kamele dupa mee goe lengema daape!
40023025	“Mana setapae masingi akalipi Patasipi nyakama koyatami iki lamo! Nyakama endakali minakasingi akali! Nyakamame nyakamanya kapopi pelesapi dupanya ketae-kaita iki kunanya nepao katengema. Dopa pingimaka doko, pake nyilyamino dupapi pyuani kayao pilyamino dupapi dupame kapo pelesapi dupanya koko-kaita tumbatae katena kaengema.
40023026	Lenge monda Patasi! Wambao embame kapo dupanya koko-kaita katenge dupa kunanya nepape. Dopa pitinopa ketae-kaita kunapayaka seta.
40023027	“Mana setapae masingi akalipi Patasipi nyakama koyatami iki lamo! Nyakama endakali minakasingi akali! Nyakama endakali malu dupanya akaipu wai nyetae katengeli pyoo kalyamino. Endakali dupame ketae-kaita kandelyaminopa etete epe jilyamoaka doko, koko-kaita endakali kumapae kuli akipi tamopae dupame tumbatae katenge.
40023028	Dokaita joo endakali dupame nyakama ketae kandao epepe lao masingima. Dopaka doko, nyakamanya koko-kaita sambo epe jili pingipi, mana setapae tanga lao koo pingipi dupame tumbatae kalyamona,” Jisasame lea.
40023029	“Mana setapae masingi akalipi Patasipi nyakama koyatami iki lamo! Nyakama endakali minakasingi akali! Nyakamame potopesa kumiami dupanya malu dupa makande pyoo, malu ketae dupanya anda auu pipae dupa pinya katengema. Dee nyakamame endakali tolatae kumiami malu kananda dupa yati pingimaka.
40023030	Dopa pyoo pituu, ‘Wamba naimanya yumbange dupa kateami gii dokopa naima kateamali kandao doko, naimame dupa-pipa awapa potopesa dupa pyao kumasala nayamalina,’ lengema.
40023031	Nyakamame dopa lelyamino dokome nyakama tangemeaka potopesa pyao kumasiamino dupanya mandipaena lao panasingima.
40023032	Dopana, nyakamame nyakamanya yumbange dupame tee piamino doko pyoo etasalapape!
40023033	Nyakama kanopato! Kanopato pambeanya mandipae! Goteme nyakama yuu koo dokonya nyoo pyandatamo doko, aipa petala nyakamame wandyatamipi?
40023034	Tenge dokonya minao nambame nyakama dapa langilyona salapape: nambame potopesapi, mana kandenge akalipi, pii lapae masingi akalipi dupa nyakama katatamisa epena lato. Dopa pitopa nyakamame dupanya mendapua pyao kumasetami. Mendapua pyao ita pokonya yukuotami. Dee mendapua nyakamanya losuu andaka dupanya konjame pyapala yuu taono mendenya watao pyata mendenya watao pyata pitami.
40023035	Nyakamame dopa pitaminosa wamba akali tolatae kateamino dupa pitaka pyao kumasiamino dokonya tenge doko nyakama-kisa seta. Dopa piamino mana doko wamba akali tolatae Epolo lenge doko pyao kumasiamino dokonya pituu tee pyatala, akali Betokayanya ikiningi Sakataya lenge doko losuu anda andake dokopa olata toko dokopa dolaponya kainanya pyanya seteamino dokonya tuu lea-pyaa.
40023036	Dopa piamino dupa pitakanya yanu doko Goteme endakali indupa palelyamino dupa-kisa nyetana lao nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona,” lea.
40023037	“Kanau! Kanau! Jetusaleme tange! Nyakamame potopesa dupa pyao kumasoo dee Goteme epena latae akali dupa kaname pyao kumasoaka katengema! Gii longo paka nambame nyakama nyoo limbatala yaka matakaimi yakane dupa papa pundipundi yapu nengeli pitoo lao masoo katewaka doko, nyakamame tanga leami!
40023038	Dokopa nambame nyakamanya anda doko yakinatekelyona, doko mee katakata.
40023039	Ongonya nambame nyakama langilyona, indupa pituu tee pyao nyakamame namba etete nakandawaka katao, ‘Akali epelyamo dake auu pisetaena, Kamongo Goteme epena lapumopa epelyamona,’ latamino gii dokonya tuu latamina,” Jisasame lea.
40024001	Jisasame losuu anda andake kame doko yakinatala peamopa, baanya disaipele dupame losuu anda katenge dosa anda petae katenge dupa baa laitaka pyaanya epeami.
40024002	Dopa piaminopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Kini, nyakamame datupa pitaka kandelyamipi? Kandelyaminoaka doko, nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, ae kaname petae kalyamo datupanya mendaipi mende kalyamoli petae katena lao kayala nayao, pitaka kalunya nepatamina,” lea.
40024003	Olipimanda yuu dokonya Jisasa peteamopa baanya disaipele dupame elyakao ipupala baa pisoo, “Embame laleno dutupa andukupa pitana lao lalepe? Aki mende pitamopa naimame kandatala emba dee ipanya pilino, yuu dake etalanya pilyamo lao masetama laape? Dokonya embame naima langi,” leami.
40024004	Jisasame yanu pyao dokaita lamaiyoo, “Endakali mendeme nyakama minao kyakasetana kandao kalyepape.
40024005	Tenge doko endakali longome namba epele lao ipupala, ‘Namba Kataisa dokona,’ lao endakali longo minao kyakasetami.
40024006	Yanda andake dupa pitaminopa kii-kau latapi, yanda andake dupa pilyamino lapaepi dupa nyakamame setami. Sepala paka kayatamina paka nakayalapape. Dopale dupa ipupengeaka doko, yuu etenge gii doko dokopa ipatala nayata.
40024007	Akali tata mendeme tata mende yanda pimaita, kiŋi mendenya isingi tata mendeme kiŋi mendenya isingi tata mende yanda pimaita pitami. Dee yuu wakale wakale dupanya lopo andake dupa sepa titiwali dupa minata pita.
40024008	Dopaka doko, pitamo dutupa pitaka enda wane maita pyalanya tee pingi dopale joo pita.
40024009	“Gii dokopa endakali mendapuame nyakama tanda dyuu kenda pisina lao maitami. Dopa pitaminopa dupame nyakama pyao kumasetami. Nyakamame nambanya lao pii lamaitaminosa endakali paliuu pelyamo dupa pitakame nyakama imbu kaengitami.
40024010	Gii dokopa endakali longome masoo miningi doko yakinatami. Dupame nyakamalapo yandapipi dupanya kingilyaka mende mai mai pyoo mende imbu kayamai kayamai pitami.
40024011	Endakali sambo potopesa longo mendapuame ipupala endakali longo minao kyakasetami.
40024012	Mana setapae yalenge mana doko etete andatamosa endakali longo dupanya auu kayamaingi mana doko kupa palita.
40024013	Dopaka doko, endakali mendeme kyoto joaka katao baa etatamo doko pyoo nyepae katata.
40024014	Dee Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi dokonya lao Wai Pii Epe doko yuu dupa pitakanya endakali paliuu pelyamo dupa pitakame sina lao lamaitami. Lamaiyoo etapatamino dokopa yuu etenge gii doko ipatana,” lea.
40024015	“Losuu anda andake koyasingi aii pyapae doko kandao wamba Goteme potopesa Daniele-kisa lungu petala leamo doko panda etete epe dokonya katatamopa nyakamame kandatami. (Pii dake itaki pyatamo endakali dokome tenge doko masepenge.)
40024016	Kandatala dokopa Jutia yuu dokonya katatamino endakali dupa yuu manda dupanya paka pyakao pupenge jeta.
40024017	Endakali mende baanya anda patakisa katatamo dokome baanya oapi andakote setamo dupa nyalanya napupenge jeta.
40024018	Dee endakali mende eesa katatamo dokome baanya yonge pee ketae pingi doko nyalanya pilyala nayapengeaka jeta.
40024019	Enda wane tongatapi enda wane andu nengepi dupa gii dokopa etete kondo pita!
40024020	Nyakamame koo kana palitamopapi Sambasa gii mendenyapi paka pyakao napataminopana loma soo kalyepape.
40024021	Gii dokopa kenda pipae andake ipatamo dokome yuupi kaitipi tee piamo dokopa pituu indupa tuu lao kenda pipae epeamo dupa pitaka ita minata. Dee kenda pipae dopale mende tenda tendapi etete naipataka.
40024022	Goteme yuu gii dupa kaketatona lao masala nayali kandao doko, endakali mendaipi mende nakatatama jipyali. Dopaka doko, baame baanya yapao nyepae endakali dupa lao masetala yuu gii dupa kaketata.
40024023	“Gii dokopa endakali mendeme nyakama langyoo, ‘Kataisa doko asa kalyamo kanjepa! Amasa kalyamo kanjepa!’ lea kandeno doko, baame kiningi lelyamona lao nyakamame masala nayalapape.
40024024	Doko, sambo kataisapi sambo potopesapi longo dupa ipupala kongalipi kalai paka pipaepi dupa pitami. Dupame Gotenya yapao nyepae endakali dupa kapa pao minao kyakasepenge jipyali kandao doko, kyakasimili.
40024025	Kandeleno! Nambame nyakama ene pimopa langitilyo.
40024026	“Dopana, endakali mendapuame nyakama langyoo, ‘Baa endakali napalenge yuu dokonya kalyamona,’ leami kandeno doko, nyakama dosa napupape. Dee dupame, ‘Baa asa yalo petae kalyamo kanjepa!’ leami kandeno doko, kiningi lelyaminona lao masala nayalapape.
40024027	Doko, niki pyakaengesa-kaita pituu yuu wapaka pilyamo doko pyoo niki landa pingisa-kaitapi yuu pitakanya tii piyoko lenge. Dopaka pyoo Endakalinya Ikiningi doko ipata.
40024028	Opale mende kumapae silya mendasa yaka lakepame dupa ipao kambu pingimana,” Jisasame lea.
40024029	“Gii dupanya kenda pipae ipatamo dupa etalu petatamopa niki doko iminjoo, kana doko tii napyoo, kaiti-kisa bui katenge dupa kondao isa ipao, kaitinya kuingi dupa ema-ema pyoo pita.
40024030	Dokopa Endakalinya Ikiningi doko ipatamo dokonya kongali doko kaiti-kisa pitamopa, yuunya endakali tata dupa pitakame etete ee lao yamataka latami. Dupame Endakalinya Ikiningi doko kaitinya kopa ketae dokonya pupu lao etete tii pyoo ipatamo kandatami.
40024031	Beto mende puu lao latamopa baame baanya enjele dupa pena lata. Dupame pupala yuunya lita yangi yangipi dupanya baanya yapao nyepae endakali dupa nyoo elyambu pitami. Kini yuu lita dokonya pituu yuu lita yangi-kaita tuu lao nyoo elyambu pitamina,” lea.
40024032	“Nyakamame piki ita dupanya makande doko masalapape. Mange dupa kanga latala yoko ŋaŋa pyakalyilyamo doko kandatala nyakamame aiyuu kana palyanya pilyamona lao masingima.
40024033	Dokotekee joo pitamo dutupa pitaka nyakamame kandatala yuu etalanya tengesa petelyamona lao masalapape.
40024034	Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyo, endakali indupa palelyamino dupa kumao etapala nayataminopa dutupa pitaka pita.
40024035	Yuupi kaitipi dupa kapa pao alu pitamoaka doko, nambanya pii dupa kapa pao alu napitana,” Jisasame lea.
40024036	“Endakali mendaipi mendeme yuu etenge gii doko andukupa ipatape, kiloko gii andukunya ipatape lao masala naengema. Enjele kaiti-kisa katenge dupame masala naengema. Ikiningi dokome apata masala naengeaka. Takange dokome iki masingi.
40024037	Wamba akali Noa kateamo gii dokopa endakali dupame pyoo kateaminoliaka pyoo katataminopa Endakalinya Ikiningi doko dee ipata.
40024038	Wamba endaki andake doko ipatala nayamopa endakali dupame neepi endakipi dupa nao katao, akali dupa enda lanyoo, enda dupa akali pao Noa endakinya paenge sipi dokonya kolandeamo gii dokonya tuu leami-pyaa.
40024039	Dupame aipa pitape lao masala nayawaka kateaminopa endaki andake dokome ipupala dokaita pitaka pyao soo pea-pyaana, tenda Endakalinya Ikiningi doko ipatamopa dopaka pita.
40024040	Gii dokopa endakali lapoma eenya katatambino dolaponya mende enjele dupame lanyepala mende yakinatami.
40024041	Dee enda lapomame palawa wasalanya wiisa dii takyoo indyuu pititambino dolaponya mende dupame lanyepala mende yakinatami.
40024042	Dopana, nyakamanya Kamongo doko andukupa ipatape lao masala naelyamino dokonya lenge tao kalyepape.
40024043	Nyakamame dake masalapape: akali anda tange dokome pake nenge akali mende kuka dokonya gii ongopa ipapomo lao wambao masetali kandao doko, baa lenge tao katapala baanya anda doko kaluina lao kayala nayatali.
40024044	Dopana, Endakalinya Ikiningi doko naipapomo lao masetami gii mendenyaka ipatana, nyakama apata depa latae kalyepape!” lea.
40024045	“Lelyamoli pyoo kalai pyakamaingi mona palenge akali kendemane doko apipi? Baa kamongo dokome baanya kendemane waka dupa isoo nee napenge gii dii lao makosoo maiyoo katena lenge kendemane doko daape.
40024046	Baame kalai auu pyoaka pyoo katatamopa baanya kamongo doko andaka pilyoo ipatamo kandao doko, baa mona yaepata.
40024047	Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyo, kamongo dokome baanya oapi dupa pitaka baanya kendemane dokome isakao katena lata.
40024048	-
40024049	Dopaka doko, baa kendemane koo tamo kandao baanya moname, ‘Nambanya kamongo doko yasoo waka ipatana,’ lao masetala, baame baanya kendemane yango dupa pyapapu waene nao kyakao paenge dupa-pipa neepi waenepi awapa nao katata.
40024050	Dopa pyoo katao baanya kamongo doko naipapomo lao masoo ambe lao katatamo gii dokopaka ipata.
40024051	Ipupala kamongo dokome baa pyao etete indyepala minakasingi endakali dupa-pipa awapa katena lao katata. Dopa petatamopa baa dokonya katao ee lao yamataka lao nenge gilyoo katatana,” Jisasame dopa lea.
40025001	“Endakalinya Ikiningi doko dee ipatamopa Kaitinya Katenge dokome isetamo doko, enda mapuakae kingi ita mende peteamino dupame akali enda kelyapala ipatamo doko kandanyemana latala, nyakamanya lama dupa kaiyoo minao peamino dopale jeta.
40025002	Enda dupanya yuungi masala naenge. Dee yuungi masepae.
40025003	Enda masala naenge dutupame nyakamanya lama minao pao pituu olipi ipange kamuoo namandeami-pyaa.
40025004	Dopaka doko, enda masepae dutupame nyakamanya lama dupa minao penge dupanya olipi ipange kamuoo mandyuu peami-pyaa.
40025005	Pupala akali doko enda kelyapala yapa naepeamosa, enda dokaita pitaka lemongati kayapala paleami-pyaa.
40025006	“Dokopa kuka andatombe dokonya wii mende epeamo dokome, ‘Akali enda kelyalamo doko olo epelyamona, nyakamame kandanyalapale pupa!’ lea-pyaa.
40025007	Dopa leamopa enda mapuakae dutupa pitaka sakatatala nyakamanya lama dupa depa leami-pyaa.
40025008	Dokopa enda masala naenge dutupame enda masepae dutupa lamaiyoo, ‘Naimanya lama datupa konjalanya pilyamona nyakamanya olipi ipange dupanya mendatupa naima dyepa,’ leami-pyaa.
40025009	Dopa leaminoaka doko, enda masepae dutupame dolotupanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo lao pituu, ‘Olipi ipange atupame naimapi nyakamapi pitaka kapa napyapome lamona, sisoa andaka pupala nyakamanya waka sambatamino doko kapana,’ leami-pyaa.
40025010	Dopa leaminopa dokaitame sisoa andaka sambala pateaminopa enda keleamo akali doko epea-pyaa. Epeamopa enda depa latae peteamino dutupa baa-pipa enda watapae dokonya nee nalanya andaka kolandateaminopa kaitini pai lea-pyaa.
