40025011	“Maitakao enda mapuakae mendatupa dutupame ipupala lao pituu, ‘Akali Andake! Akali Andake! Naima ipumana kaitini lumba!’ leami-pyaa.
40025012	Dopa leaminoaka doko, baame dokaitanya pii yanu pyao, ‘Nambame nayakama etete masala naelyona,’ lea-pyaa.
40025013	Dopa lea-pyaana, nyakamame yuu giipi kilokopi andukunya ipatape lao masala naelyaminona, lenge tao kalyepape,” Jisasame lea.
40025014	“Kaitinya Katenge dokome isetamo doko, akali mende baa yuu tependa mendakaita katama paanya pituu baame baanya kendemane dupa epena latala baanya oapi dupa pitaka isekena lao maiyamo dopale jeta.
40025015	Baame baanya kendemane dupa kandakondape petala, dupanya kalai pipenge jiamoli pyoo dupa mendai mendai lao muni mokosoo maiya-pyaa. Mende muni kina taosene yuungi maitala, mende taosene lapoma maitala, dee mende taosene mendai maiya-pyaa. Dopa petala baa paanya piamo dokonya pea-pyaa.
40025016	Pateamo dokopa muni taosene yuungi nyiamo akali dokome pupae lao pao muni dutupame pisinisa kalai petala dee taosene yuungiaka konda pyoo nyia-pyaa.
40025017	Mendai dopaka pyoo muni taosene lapoma nyiamo akali dokome pisinisa kalai petala taosene lapomaka konda pyoo nyia-pyaa.
40025018	Dopaka doko, muni taosene mendai nyiamo akali dokome pao yuli tombapala baanya kamongo dokonya muni dutupa yuli pia-pyaa.
40025019	“Yuu longo pateamopa, maitakao kendemane dokaitanya kamongo doko dee pilyoo ipupala, muni maiyamo dokonya dutupa-pipa pii lao wasalanya pia-pyaa.
40025020	Dopa piamopa muni taosene yuungi nyiamo akali dokome taosene yuungi dee konda pyoo minao ipupala lao pituu, ‘Akali Andake, embame namba muni taosene yuungi diino doko, nambame taosene yuungiaka potopesa nyiona, kanda,’ lea-pyaa.
40025021	Dopa leamopa baanya kamongo dokome baa lamaiyoo, ‘Kalai yaka pyekee lamo! Emba kendemane epe dokome auu pii lamo. Embame kalai kuki dutupa nambame leoli pyoo auu pyoo isii lamo dokonya nambame emba longo dupa isoo kata latoo. Embapa nambapa mona yaepao katambana ipu,’ lea-pyaa.
40025022	“Dokopa akali muni taosene lapoma nyiamo dokome apata ipupala lao pituu, ‘Akali Andake, embame namba muni taosene lapoma diino doko, nambame taosene lapomaka potopesa nyiona, kanda,’ lea-pyaa.
40025023	Dopa leamopa baanya kamongo dokome baa lamaiyoo, ‘Kalai yaka pyekee lamo! Emba kendemane epe dokome auu pii lamo. Embame kalai kuki dutupa nambame leoli pyoo auu pyoo isii lamo dokonya nambame emba longo dupa isoo kata latoo. Embapa nambapa mona yaepao katambana ipu,’ lea-pyaa.
40025024	“Dokopa muni taosene mendai nyiamo akali dokome apata ipupala lao pituu, ‘Akali Andake, emba akali tomba neleno nambame kandenge. Embame eenya waingi pokala naeleno dupanya yukuoo nao, dee waingi lyandala naeleno dupanya mandyuu nao pingi kandapi.
40025025	Dopa pingi dokonya nambame paka kayapala embanya muni dutupa pao yuli piona, embanya muni datupa ae silyamo, kanda,’ lea-pyaa.
40025026	-
40025027	“Dopa leamopa baanya kamongo dokome baa lamaiyoo, ‘Emba akali koo maka kayapae lamo! Nambame eenya waingi pokala naelyo dupanya yukuoo nao, waingi lyandala naelyo dupanya mandyuu nelyopi dupa embame kandenge lumu doko, nambanya muni dupa potopesa mandenge beŋe mendenya pyasekeeli kandao doko, namba dee pilyoo ipupala nambanya muni dutupa-pipa potopesa mendatupa apata nyipuli.
40025028	Dopana, nyakamame muni taosene mendai doko yukuoo nyepala taosene kingi ita mendai minilyamo akali doko maiyepa.
40025029	Doko aipuma? Opale singi endakali dupa pitaka nambame mendatupa apata konda pyoo maitopa dupa-kisa longo seta. Dopaka doko, opale nasingi endakali doko-kisa setamo dolapo nyokonyoto.
40025030	Dopana, nyakamame kendemane koo dake yuu etete iminjetae koo dokonya soo pyale laapa! Dokonya katao baa ee lao yamataka lao nenge gilyoo katatana,’ kamongo dokome dopa lea-pyaana,” Jisasame lea.
40025031	“Tenda Endakalinya Ikiningi doko baanya tii pipae dokonya tambetambe enjele dupa pitaka-pipa awapa ipupala, baa etete kamongao kiŋi petenge toko dokonya pitita.
40025032	Pititamo dokonya endakali paliuu pelyamo dupa pitaka baanya enombasa nyoo limbatami. Dopa pitaminopa mena sipisipi setao katenge akali mendeme sipisipipi memepi wakale mokosingili pyoo baame endakali dupa mokoseta.
40025033	Mokosoo pituu baame mena sipisipi jepae dupa baanya kingi tolae-kaita katena latala meme jepae dupa kingi koya-kaita katena lata.
40025034	“Dokopa kiŋi dokome kingi tolae-kaita katatamino dupa lamaiyoo lao pituu, ‘Nyakama nambanya Takangeme auu piseteana ipupa! Yuupi kaitipi tee piamo dokopa baame isingi panda doko nyakamanyana lao depa lanya setekeamo dokona nyala ipupa.
40025035	Wamba namba lopo kayopa nyakamame nee diami. Endaki nanu kayopa kamuoo diami. Opone joo epeopa lanyiami.
40025036	Yambale napyoo kateopa diami. Yaina siopa kanja epeami. Anjetae paleopa kanja epeamiakana,’ kiŋi dokome dopa lata.
40025037	Dopa latamopa endakali tolatae dupame yanu pyao: ‘Akali Andake, naimame andukupa emba lopo kayenopa kandatala nee diamape? Andukupa endaki nanu kayenopa kamuoo diamape?
40025038	Andukupa opone joo epeenopa kandatala lanyiamape? Andukupa yambale napyoo kateenopa diamape?
40025039	Andukupa naimame emba yaina siinopapi anjetae paleenopapi kandatala kanja epeamape?’ latami.
40025040	Dopa lataminopa kiŋi dokome dokaita lamaiyoo dapa lata: ‘Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, nambanya kaiminingi datupanya koo mende nisiamino dokome, namba nisiamiakana,’ lata.
40025041	“Dopa latala baame kingi koya-kaita katatamino dupa lamaiyoo lao pituu, ‘Nyakama watao pyataena namba yakinatala pupa! Goteme Satanepi Satanenya enjele koopi dupanya lao itate konjala naenge setakamaiyamo dokonya nyakama pupa!
40025042	Wamba namba lopo kayopa nyakamame nee nandiami. Endaki nanu kayopa kamuoo nandiami.
40025043	Opone joo epeopa lanyala nayami. Yambale napyoo kateopa nandiami. Yaina siopapi anjetae paleopapi kanja naepeamina,’ lata.
40025044	Dopa latamopa dokaitame apata yanu pyao, ‘Akali Andake, andukupa naimame emba lopo kayenopapi, endaki nanu kayenopapi, opone joo epeenopapi, yambale napyoo kateenopapi, yaina siinopapi, anjetae paleenopapi kandatala nisala nayamape?’ latami.
40025045	Dopa lataminopa kiŋi dokome dokaita lamaiyoo, ‘Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, nyakamame endakali datupanya koo mende nisala nayamino dokome, namba nisala nayamiakana,’ lata.
40025046	Dopa latala Goteme endakali dokaita yanu nyetamopa tanda nao etete katatami. Dopaka doko, endakali tolatae dupa lete etete katatamina,” Jisasame dopa lea.
40026001	-
40026002	Jisasame pii manapi dokaita pitaka lamaiyoo etapala, baanya disaipele dupa lamaiyoo, “Koto lapoma sepatamopa Napinya Kayamo Gii ipata doko nyakamame masilyamino. Dokopa endakali mendapuame Endakalinya Ikiningi doko ita pokonya pyao yukuina lao akali mendeme dokaitanya kingilyaka maitana,” lea.
40026003	Gii undinaka pitisa mupapi Jutamanya isingi akalipi dupa, pitisa mupa Kayapasa lenge dokonya andaka kambu piami-pyaa.
40026004	Dopa petala dokaitame waa katao Jisasa anjetala pyao kumasemana lao kambuiyami-pyaa.
40026005	Dopa piaminoaka doko, dee dupame lao pituu, “Aopyoo latala endakali dupame pyao pilya pyana pitamina, gii epe dokonya dopa napimanalena,” leami-pyaa.
40026006	Jisasa baa yuu taono Betani dokonya akali kopetali Saimone lenge dokonya andaka petea.
40026007	Dokopa enda mendeme wele penge yakane mendenya wele tunduma pipaeme tumbatae muni longome sambenge mende minao Jisasa peteasa epea. Dopa petala baame wele doko aiyombanya kai lao kai pyakamaiya.
40026008	Dopa piamo doko disaipele dupame kandatala imbu kayao, “Aipuma wele dake mee maa yangelya kanjemape!
40026009	Wele dake endakalimi sambapiminopa yole andake nyepala endakali tipya dupa maipenge jipyalina,” leami.
40026010	Dopa leamino doko Jisasame sepala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Aipuma nyakamame enda dake kenda pisilyamipi? Baame namba-kisa kalai epe wakane mende pyakalamo.
40026011	Endakali tipya dupa koteaka lao nyakama-pipa katengemaka doko, namba nyakama-pipa koteaka lao nakatatama.
40026012	Enda dakeme wele dake nambanya yongenya kai lao kai pyakalamo dokome namba malu pina lao depa lalamo.
40026013	Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, Wai Pii Epe doko yuu dupa pitakanya lamaitaminoli pyoo, endakali dupame enda dake masina lao baame pyomo doko lao tayatamiakana,” Jisasame lea.
40026014	-
40026015	Gii dokopa disaipele kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapoma dupanya mende Jutasa Isaketiote lenge doko pitisa mupa dupa kateamisa pupala baame dokaita pisoo, “Nambame Jisasa nyakama laitaka pitoo nyakamame namba aki mende ditamipi?” lea-pyaa. Dokopa dokaitame baa muni silipa kingi ita tepoma maiyami-pyaa.
40026016	Gii dokopa tee pyao baame Jisasa dokaita laitaka pyaanya kaitini mende kutao katea-pyaa.
40026017	Betesanya iisa napalyoo nenge gii mupa dokonya disaipele dupame Jisasa kateasa ipupala baa lamaiyoo, “Napinya Kayamo Nee doko emba natale andusa naimame depa lakamili lao masilipi?” leami.
40026018	Dopa leaminopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame yuu taono Jetusaleme dokonya pupala akali mende kanjaminona doko dapa lamaiyepape: ‘Mana Lenge Akali dokome, “Nambanya gii doko tengesa petelyamona,” laamo. “Napinya Kayamo Nee doko nambame nambanya disaipele dupa-pipa embanya andaka natoo,” laamona,’ lao lamaiyepape,” lea.
40026019	Dokopa disaipele dupame Jisasame leamoli petala Napinya Kayamo Nee doko depa leami.
40026020	Yuu kualanya piamopa Jisasa baa disaipele kingi ita-kisa dee lapoma dutupa-pipa nee nao peteami.
40026021	Nao pituu baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamanya mendeme namba enge nyipimina yandapipi dupa laitaka pyaaminona lao nyakama kiningi langilyona,” lea.
40026022	Dopa leamopa dokaitame mona etete kenda kayapala mendai mendai lawame baa pisoo, “Kamongo, embame leeno doko, namba kandao leepe?” laa laa peami.
40026023	Dopa leaminopa Jisasame yanu pyao, “Nambapa disanya nee poyao nyilyambano akali dokome namba yandapipi dupa laitaka pyaapomo.
40026024	Kini, Endakalinya Ikiningi dokonya lao Gotenya pii pepa pyapae singi dokonya lapae silyamoli pyoo, baa kumalapomo. Dopaka doko, Endakalinya Ikiningi doko enge nyilyamo akali doko koyata iki lamo! Akali doko endangimi manja nayali kandao baa yaka jipyalina,” lea.
40026025	Dopa leamopa baa enge nyiamo akali Jutasa dokome yanu pyao, “Mana Lenge Akali, embame leeno doko, nambame lao leepe?” lea. Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Emba tangeme latelenona,” lea.
40026026	Dupa-pipa nee nao pituu Jisasame betesa mende nyepala Gote lao yaka pilino latala konjia. Konjepala baanya disaipele dupa maiyoo pituu, “Dake nambanya yonge dokona, nyoo nalapa,” lea.
40026027	Dee baame kapo penge mende nyepala yaka pilino latala dokaita maiyoo pituu, “Nyakama pitakame nyoo nalapa.
40026028	Dake nambanya taiyoko dokona, koo dupa kunanya nepakalanya kai lekelyo dokome endakali dupa pitakanya Goteme pii lao seteamo doko angi injisilyamo.
40026029	Dee nambame nyakama langilyona, indupa pituu nambame getepe ipange dake nala nayawaka katao tenda nambanya Takangeme isingi dokonya, nyakama-pipa awapa getepe ipange enenge doko natamano gii dokonya tuu latona,” Jisasame lea.
40026030	Dopa lateamopa dokaitame wee mende latao pituu kamanda pyakalyetala Olipimanda dokonya peami.
40026031	Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Indupa kuka gii dakepa nyakama pitakame namba yakinatala lombapae salamino. Doko, Gotenya pii pepa pyapae singi dokonya, ‘Sipisipi setao katenge doko nambame pyatopa, sipisipi ambo doko polao wakale puu puu pyoo patamina,’ lapae silyamo.
40026032	Dopaka doko, Goteme namba dee sakatasetatamopa nyakama nyoo maita pyatala Galili yuu dokonya wambatona,” lea.
40026033	Dokopa Pitame Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Yangi dupa pitakame emba yakinatala lombapae setamino kandao, nambame dopa napyaapo etete daana,” lea.
40026034	Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Nambame emba kiningi langilyona, indupa kuka gii dakenya yaka pauli pii ene laanya pitamopa, paa tepomasa embame namba nakandengena laapenona,” lea.
40026035	Dee Pitame yanu pyao, “Namba embapa awapa kumatambano doko kapakana, nambame emba nakandengena etete laa nayalapona,” lea. Dopa leamopa disaipele dupa pitakame dopaka leami.
40026036	Dokopa Jisasa baanya disaipele dupa-pipa yuu Gesemani lenge dokonya peami. Pupala baame dupa lamaiyoo, “Namba omosa loma sala pelyona nyakama asa pilyepa,” lea.
40026037	-
40026038	Dopa latala baame Pitapi Sepete ikiningi dolapopi laminao pea. Pupala baa mona etete kenda kayapala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nambanya mona doko etete kenda petala kumapenge julumuna, nyakama asa kandao katamana kalyepape!” lea-pyaa.
40026039	Dopa latala baa kuki umbisale pao yuunya tombauli sepala loma soo pituu, “Nambanya Takange, embame namba-kisa kenda pipae silyamo dake nyoo nepakapenge jia kandeno doko, nyoo nepakape! Dopaka doko, nambame masilyoli napinya, embame masetenoli pipi,” lea-pyaa.
40026040	Dopa lao loma setala ipao disaipele tepoma dutupa kandeamopa luu palyasiamisa baame Pita lamaiyoo, “Anematupa, aipa petala gii kuki iki dutupanya nyakamame namba-pipa kapa pao kandao isoo nakatalamipi?
40026041	Makande pingi dupanya nyakama pao koyatamane lao kandao isoo loma soo kalyepape. Moname pyuani kaelyamoaka doko, yongeme papa tambuingina,” lea-pyaa.
40026042	Dopa latala Jisasame dee paa lapo pyoo pao loma soo pituu, “Nambanya Takange, nambame kenda pipae dake kayala nayao nyepengeaka jia kandeno doko, embame masetenoli pipi,” lea-pyaa.
40026043	Dopa latala dee ipao disaipele dutupa kandeamopa lemongati kayapala luu paliuu kateami-pyaa.
40026044	Jisasame dutupa yakinatala dee paa tepo pyoo loma sala pupala pii wamba leamo dutupaka lao loma sia-pyaa.
40026045	-
40026046	Loma setala baame ipao disaipele dutupa lamaiyoo, “Nyakama mee luaka paliuu koto nyilyamipi? Kandeleno! Gii doko ipatelyamo. Akali mendeme Endakalinya Ikiningi doko koo pingi endakali dupa laitaka pyaapomona, mona nyakama sakatalapa. Namba enge nyipumu akali doko ipatelyamona, kanjepa!” lea-pyaa.
40026047	Jisasame dopa lao kateamopaka baanya disaipele kingi ita-kisa dee lapoma dutupanya mende Jutasa lenge doko epea. Baa-pipa awapa endakali kambu andake mendeme konjuapi kolyepepi dupa minao, pitisa mupapi Jutamanya isingi akalipi dupame pena leaminopa epeami.
40026048	Jisasa enge nyiamo akali dokome endakali kambu doko wambao lamaiyoo, “Nambame akali mende nunu pio kondeno doko, baana, nyakamame minalapape!” lea-pyaa.
40026049	Dopa lamaitala ipao baa Jisasa kateasa tolao pupala, “Mana Lenge Akali, emba asa katalepe?” latala baa nunu pia.
40026050	Dopa piamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Kaimia, embame angi pyaanya ipate doko yapa pii!” lea. Dokopa dokaitame ipao baa minatala anjiami.
40026051	Dopa piaminopa Jisasa-pipa awapa kateamino dupanya mendeme baanya konjua doko kolanyetala, pitisa mupa dokonya kendemane mendenya kale doko taka lanya nepea.
40026052	Dopa piamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Embanya konjua doko palenge andanda dokonya mandi! Konjua minao yanda pingi dupa pitaka, konjuameaka kumingi.
40026053	Nambame nambanya Takangeme namba nisina lao wii lapupa baame gii dokopaka enjele tata kingi ita-kisa dee lapoma ita minao etete longo epena lapyalina lao embame masala naelepe?
40026054	Dopaka doko, nambame dopa pipuli kandao, Gotenya pii pepa pyapae singi dokonya dopaka pitana lapae silyamo doko aipa petala angi jipyalipi?” Jisasame lea.
40026055	Dopa latala dokopa baame endakali kambu doko lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame akali pake nao makongao paenge mende anjala epele lao konjuapi kolyepepi dupa minao namba anjala epelyamipi? Nambame koteaka lao losuu anda andake dokonya endakali dupa mana lamaiyoo kateo dokopa nyakamame namba anjala nayami.
40026056	Dopaka doko, potopesa dupame pii pepa piami dupa angi jina lao dutupa pitaka pilyamona,” lea. Dokopa disaipele dupa pitakame Jisasa yakinatala paka peami.
40026057	Jisasa anjiamino akali dupame baa laminao pitisa mupa Kayapasa kateasa peaminopa, mana setapae masingi akalipi isingi akalipi dupa ipao dokonya kambu piami-pyaa.
40026058	Dokopa Pitame Jisasa watao tependale joo pea-pyaa. Pupala pitisa mupa dokonya anda kamapisa kolamatala aipa pilyamipi lao kandatoo latala lome kambu isoo katenge dupa-pipa petea-pyaa.
40026059	Pitisa mupapi kanjole dupa pitakapimi Jisasa pyao kumasemana latala akali mendapuame baa-kisa sambo pii setao kosimi lena lao kutiami-pyaa.
40026060	-
40026061	Dokopa akali longo ipupala Jisasa-kisa sambo pii setao kosimi leami-pyaa. Dopa piaminopaka doko, baa pyao kumasepenge tenge mende kandao nanyiami-pyaa. Dee ete pyoo akali lapoma ipupala lao pituu, “Akali dakeme dapa lea: ‘Gotenya losuu anda andake doko kapa pao lakyepala, yuu gii tepoma pito,’ leana,” leambi-pyaa.
40026062	Dokopa pitisa mupa dokome toya katapala Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Pii emba kandao lelyambino dake embame yanu napilino doko, aipa pyoo lelyambipi?” lea-pyaa.
40026063	Dopa leamoaka doko, Jisasa ema napia-pyaa. Dokopa pitisa mupa dokome dee baa lamaiyoo, “Nambame emba pii mende pisilyona embame Gote lete katenge doko lao masetala angi langipi. Emba Gote Ikiningi, Kataisa dokope?” lea-pyaa.
40026064	Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Embame lateleno. Dopaka doko, nambame nyakama dapa langilyo: indupa pituu tenda tuu lao Endakalinya Ikiningi doko Gote etete pupu lapae dokonya kingi tolae dokonya katao kaitinya kopa ketae dokonya ipatamo nyakamame kandatamina,” lea-pyaa.
40026065	Dopa leamosa pitisa mupa dokome baa tangenya yonge pee dupa minao lapyepala lao pituu, “Baame Gote kilya kandao lelyamo. Aipuma naimame endakali mendapuanya pii deaka nyetamape? Epapu baame Gote kilya kandao pii lelyamo doko nyakamame sepelyamino!
40026066	Sepala nyakamame aipa lao masilyamipi?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa dupame baanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Pyao kumasepenge julumuna,” leami-pyaa.
40026067	-
40026068	Dopa latala dupame baanya lengelyaapinya sopakalimi pyapala kii momangame piami-pyaa. Dee mendapuame baa pyao pituu, “Kataisa, akali dokome pilyamo lao embame laa!” leami-pyaa.
40026069	Pita anda kamapisa peteamopa pitisa mupa dokonya kalai pyakamaiyoo petenge enda dupanya mendeme baa peteamo dosa ipupala lao pituu, “Emba apata akali Galili tange Jisasa dokopa awapa katengembana,” lea-pyaa.
40026070	Dopaka doko, Pitame endakali dupa pitakanya enombasa tanga lao lao pituu, “Embame leeno doko namba nakandengena,” lea-pyaa.
40026071	Dopa latala baa pao lome kambu dosa peteamopa dee kalai pingi enda waka mendeme kandatala endakali dosa kateami dupa lamaiyoo, “Baa Nasatete tange Jisasa dokopa awapa katengembana,” lea-pyaa.
40026072	Dokopa Pitame deaka tanga lao, “Namba akali doko etete nakandenge mauwana,” lea-pyaa.
40026073	Dee kuki maitakawale akali dosa kateami dupame ipupala Pita kandao, “Embanya pii dokome panalumuna, kiningi etete emba akali dupanya mendeaka lamona,” leami-pyaa.
40026074	Dopa lateaminopa Pitame lao pituu, “Namba akali doko nakandenge mauwana, sambo lato kandao doko, Goteme namba pinana,” lea-pyaa. Dopa lalu piamopa yaka pauli pii mende lea-pyaa.
40026075	Wamba Jisasame Pita kandao, “Yaka pauli pii ene laanya pitamopa embame paa tepomasa namba nakandengena laapeno,” leamo doko Pitame masia-pyaa. Masetala kamaka pao ee lao yamataka lea-pyaa.
40027001	Dokopa pitisa mupa dupapi Jutamanya isingi akali dupapi dupa pitakame Jisasa pyao kumasepenge dokonya lao yongama wamba kambuiyami-pyaa.
40027002	Dopa petala dupame Jisasa kendeme anjetala anjoo soo pao kapomane andake Pailate maiyami-pyaa.
40027003	Jisasa enge nyiamo akali Jutasa dokome kandeamopa dupame baa pyao kumasemana leaminosa, baa mona kenda kayapala muni silipa kingi ita tepoma nyiamo dutupa pitisa mupapi Jutamanya isingi akalipi dupa kateamisa yukuoo minakamaiyoo pea-pyaa.
40027004	Dopa petala baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Akali mana koopi naminingi mende nambame koo pyoo enge nyio dokonya baa kumata lamona,” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamoaka doko, dokaitame lao pituu, “Doko naimanya kalaipi? Daa, embanya kalaina,” leami-pyaa.
40027005	Dokopa baame muni dutupa losuu anda andake dokonya kainanya pyale latala pea-pyaa. Pupala baame baa tange kende katatala yukuotae katea-pyaa.
40027006	Pitisa mupa dupame muni dutupa yapao nyepala lao pituu, “Endakali pyao kumasalanya muni datupame enge nyepae dokonya, losuu anda andakenya muni singi dokonya setala nayapengena,” leami-pyaa.
40027007	Dokonya dupame pii wasoo latala, endakali waka kumatami dupa malu pipengena lao, akali titopene penge akipi yuumi wasingi dokonya yuu doko muni dutupame sambeami-pyaa.
40027008	Tenge dokonya endakali dupame yuu doko kandao kenge Taiyokopausa leami doko indupa mee lelyaminoaka.
40027009	-
40027010	Dopa piamino dokome pii mende wamba Goteme potopesa Jetamaya lungu piamopa baame dapa leamo doko etete angi jia-pyaa: “Isataele endakali dupame pii lao wasetala muni silipa kingi ita tepoma baapa kapana lateamino muni dutupa nyepala, Kamongo dokome namba langiamoli pyoo titopene akipi wasingi akali dokonya yuu doko sambeamina,” lea-pyaa.
40027011	Jisasa baa kapomane andake dokonya enombasa kateamopa kapomane andake dokome baa pisoo, “Emba Jutamanya kiŋi dokope?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa Jisasame yanu pyao, “Embame latelenona,” lea-pyaa.
40027012	Dokopa pitisa mupapi Jutamanya isingi akalipi dupame baa-kisa tenge seteaminopa, baame yanu pyao mende nalea-pyaa.
40027013	Dopa piamopa Pailateme baa lamaiyoo, “Emba-kisa tenge longo setao pii lelyamino dupa embame nasilipi?” lea-pyaa.
40027014	Dopa leamopa Jisasame pii leamino dupanya mendaipi mende yanu pyao baa lamaiya naya-pyaa. Dopa piamopa kapomane andake doko etete mona andea-pyaa.
40027015	Ee kana dii lao Napinya Kayamo Gii epe doko epelyali pyoo, kapomane andake dokome endakali anjetae palelyami dupanya mendai mende endakali dupame mokekena lelyamili pyoo mokata pyakamaingi-pyaa.
40027016	Dee akali Batapasa lenge mendeme pundu nyilyamosa kenge singi mende anjiami doko gii dokopa anjetae palea-pyaa.
40027017	Dokonya endakali dupa ipao kambu pyateaminopa Pailateme dokaita pisoo, “Nambame nyakamanya api mokakapili lao masilyamipi? Batapasa dokope, pande Kataisa lengema Jisasa dokope?” lea-pyaa.
40027018	Dopa leamo doko, dupame Jisasa tilya maitala baa maiyamino doko masetala dopa lea-pyaa.
40027019	Pailate baa kosa lao petenge toko dokonya peteamopa, baanya etanengeme, “Embame akali tolatae doko mende napipi. Nambame kuka kombeame baa kandao neame kumalona,” lanya pea-pyaa.
40027020	Dopaka doko, pitisa mupapi isingi akalipi dupame endakali kambu piamino dupa lamaiyoo, “Batapasa mokatala Jisasa pyao kumasina Pailate lamaiyepa,” lao lungu piami-pyaa.
40027021	Dopa piaminopa kapomane andake dokome dokaita pisoo, “Nambame akali lapoma dolaponya anduku nyakamanya mokakapili lao masilyamipi?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa dokaitame yanu pyao, “Batapasana,” leami-pyaa.
40027022	Dokopa Pailateme lao pituu, “Dopa tamo doko, nambame Kataisa lengema Jisasa doko aipa pyuape?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa dokaita pitakame lao pituu, “Ita pokonya pyao yuka!” leami-pyaa.
40027023	Dopa leaminoaka doko, baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Baame koo aki mende piape?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa dokaitame eteteaka puu lao lao, “Baa pyao yuka!” leami-pyaa.
40027024	Dokopa Pailateme dokaitanya pii doko nyoo isa palyala nayatopa pyao pyaamini lamo lao kandatala, endaki mendalapo nyoo endakali dupanya enombasa baanya kingi kaimbu pyao pituu, “Akali dake taiyoko nyilyamino dokonya tenge doko namba-kisa nasilyamo. Doko nyakamanya kalaina,” lea-pyaa.
40027025	Dopa leamopa endakali dupa pitakame yanu pyao, “Dokonya tenge doko naimapi naimanya wane dupa-kisa sinana!” leami-pyaa.
40027026	Dokopa Pailateme Batapasa doko mokatakamaitala, Jisasa konjame pyapala pyao yukuina lao yanda singi dupa maiya-pyaa.
40027027	Dokopa kapomane andake dokonya yanda singi dupame Jisasa laminao kapomane andake petenge anda dokonya kolandatala, yanda singi tata doko pitaka epena latala Jisasa kateasa kambu piami-pyaa.
40027028	Dopa petala dupame baanya yonge pee pingi dupa lyokao nyepala kate pyapaele ketae pingi mendeme baa yapu neami-pyaa.
40027029	Dee dupame ikililyambu mendapua nyoo langapu pipala Jisasanya aiyombanya petakamaitala, kyoo konja mende baanya kingi tolae-kaita minasakamaiyami-pyaa. Dopa petala dupame baa kandao minakasoo luma lakao lamba lao lao pituu, “Jutamanya Kiŋi, emba auu pyoo katape!” leami-pyaa.
40027030	Dee dupame baa sopakalimi pyapa kyoo konja doko nyepala baanya aiyombanya pyapa piami-pyaa.
40027031	Dupame baa minakasoo etapala dokopa yonge pee wamba pyakamaiyamino doko lyokao nyepala, baanya dupa tange petakamaitala baa pyao yukualanya laminao peami-pyaa.
40027032	Paon kamalyatena pyakamatala akali Saitini tange Saimone lenge mende kandanyetala yanda singi dupame Jisasanya ita poko doko sakamaina leami.
40027033	Dokopa dupame yuu Golokota lenge dokonya pao pyakameami. Kenge Golokota dokonya tenge doko Matenakulimanda lengema.
40027034	Yuu Golokota dokonya pyakamatala yanda singi dupame matasini etete kaa pipae mendapuame pyasilya pyasena petala waene mende baa maiyaminopa nakande setala kaya.
40027035	Dokopa yanda singi dupame baa ita pokonya pyao yukuotala, kana yakane dupa pyasoo male pyoo ita miniamino akali dupame Jisasanya yonge pee dupa mokosoo nyiami.
40027036	Dopa petala dupame Jisasa isoo dosa peteami.
40027037	Jisasa-kisa tenge seteami pepa pyapae doko baanya aiyomba sia ketae dosa yukuiyami. Pepa dokonya, “Dake Jisasa, Jutamanya Kiŋi dokona,” latae katea.
40027038	Dokopa pake nao makongao paenge akali lapoma Jisasa-pipa awapa pyao yukuiyami. Mende doko baanya kingi tolae-kaita, mende doko koya-kaita yukuiyami.
40027039	-
40027040	Jisasa pyao yukuotae kateamo dokonya-kaita endakali payamino dupame Jisasa kilya kandao aiyomba ema-ema pyoo dapa leami: “‘Losuu anda andake doko lakyepala yuu gii tepoma pitona,’ leeno akali dake! Emba Gotenya Ikiningi tamo kandao doko, emba tangeme pupu latala ita poko doko yakinatala isa ipu!” leami.
40027041	-
40027042	Mendai dopaka pyoo, pitisa mupapi, mana setapae masingi akalipi, Jutamanya isingi akalipi dupame Jisasa kandao dapa lao lamba leamiaka: “Baame endakali waka dupa nisiamoaka doko, baa tange kapa pao nisala naelyamo. Kini, baa naima Isataele dupanya Kiŋi tamo kandao doko, naimame baa lao masoo minamana, epapu ita poko doko yakinatala isa epena.
40027043	Baame Gote masokondape pingi daape. Dee baame baa Gotenya Ikiningina lenge. Dopana, Goteme baa auu kayatamo kandao doko, epapu baa pyoo nyinana,” leami.
40027044	Akali pake nao makongao paenge baa-pipa awapa pyao yukuotae kateamino dolapome apata mendai dopaka pyoo baa kandao pii koo leambi.
40027045	Kotaka andawai pungupungu dokonya pituu, yuu doko pitaka kuiyatala kuiyatayaka katao pao alemandi kiloko tepo lea.
40027046	Kiloko tepopi mendenya Jisasame etete puu lao lao, “Eli, Eli, lema sapakatani!” lea. Dopa leamo doko kapilyoo, “Nambanya Gote, nambanya Gote, embame namba aipuma yakinelepe?” lea.
40027047	Dopa leamo doko endakali dosa kateamino dupanya mendapuame sepala lao pituu, “Ilainja lao wii lelyamona,” leami.
40027048	Dopa latala dupanya mendeme alo pyao pao koma jepae mende waene kaa pipae mendenya poyatala itakali mendenya tuku petala Jisasa nena lao makapusakamaiya.
40027049	Dopaka doko, yangi dupame lao pituu, “Ilainjame baa pyoo nyala epelyape lao kandamana maliseta!” leami.
40027050	Dokopa Jisasame deaka etete puu lao ae latala kumia.
40027051	-
40027052	Dokopa losuu anda andake dokonya lapalapa pyatu doko ketae ulusa pituu kanguoo yuunya tuu latala lapo pyoloo pia-pyaa. Dee yuu doko titiwali minao, kana yale dupa longapae buu minao, endakali malu dupanya kaitini dupa lumbao, Gotenya endakali isa palipiami dupanya longo mendapua sakatasoo pia-pyaa.
40027053	Dupame nyakamanya malu dupa yakinatala, maitakao Jisasa sakateamo dokopa yuu taono etete epe Jetusaleme dokonya peaminopa endakali longo dupame kandeami.
40027054	Yanda singi amii isingi dokopi baa-pipa awapa Jisasa isoo kateamino dupapimi titiwali miniapi piamo dupa pitakapi kandao etete pakame kumapala lao pituu, “Kiningi etete akali dake Gote Ikiningi lamona,” leami.
40027055	Enda longo mendapua Galili pituu Jisasa nisoo awapa epeamino dupame kuki tependale pituu dokonya piamo dupa kandatae peteami.
40027056	Enda peteamino dupanya mendatupa Matia Makatala tange dokopi, Jemesa Josepepanya endangi Matia dokopi, Sepete ikiningi dolaponya endangi dokopi dutupa dokonya peteami.
40027057	Yuu alemanjeteamopa akali Atimatia tange kamongo Josepe lenge mende epea. Baa Jisasanya disaipele joo katengeaka.
40027058	Akali dokome Pailate peteasa pupala Jisasa dina lao tee lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa yanda singi dupame kondao nyoo maina lea-pyaa.
40027059	-
40027060	Dokopa Josepeme Jisasa nyoo lapalapa kyoto epe mendeme ambo pyapala malu pipenge kananda enenge mende baanya tumbinya setea dokonya setea-pyaa. Setapala kana andake mende kapilya mina-mina pyoo minao pao malu kambu doko piti petala baa pea-pyaa.
40027061	Dopa piamo dosa enda Matia Makatala tange dokopa dee Matia lenge waka mende dokopame kandamatae peteambi-pyaa.
40027062	-
40027063	Sambasanya opale depa lenge kalai yuungi doko pateamopa taita dopa pyoo pitisa mupapi Patasipi dupame Pailate peteasa ipao kambu pyatala lao pituu, “Akali Andake, pii mende sambo lenge akali dokome mee katao pituu, ‘Koto teponya namba dee sakatatona,’ lea doko naimame masilyamano.
40027064	Dopa leana aopyoo latala baanya disaipele dupame pao baa nyoo yalo petala endakali dupa lamaiyoo, ‘Baa sakatapyana,’ latamina, malu doko isokondape pyoo isoo katao koto tepo dokonya tuu lena lape. Dopa pitamino kandao doko, wamba sambo leamo doko maitakao sambo dokome ita minatana,” leami-pyaa.
40027065	Dopa leaminopa Pailateme dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame yanda singi mendatupa nyoo pupala malu doko pyokondape pyoo petae katena lao pipenge jetali pyoo pyepape,” lea-pyaa.
40027066	Dokopa dupame pupala malu doko pingili petae katelyape lao kandapengena latala, kongali pyoo wakaiya kateami-pyaa. Dopa petala yanda singi dupame isokondape pyoo katena leami-pyaa.
40028001	Sambasa gii doko pateamopa Sandeenya yongama niki pyakayalanya pia-kaita Matia Makatala tange dokopa Matia mende dokopa dolapome malu doko kanja peambi-pyaa.
40028002	Peambinopa, pupae lao titiwali andake mende miniamopa Gotenya enjele mende kaitinya katao isa ipupala pao kana doko kapilya mina-mina pyoo nyoo kapya latala dokonya ketae petea-pyaa.
40028003	Baanya lengelyaapi doko polepole pyoo, yonge pee doko kyoo lao pakenana timbokopaele jia-pyaa.
40028004	Dopa piamopa malu isetae kateamino dupa pakame kumao etete walu latala kumapae jiami-pyaa.
40028005	Dokopa enjele dokome enda dolapo lamaiyoo, “Nyalambo paka nakayalapape. Nyalambome Jisasa ita pokonya pyao yukuiyamino doko kutilyambino lao nambame masilyo.
40028006	Baa angenya nasilyamo. Wamba baame leamoli pyoo sakatatalamona baa seteamino dakenya kanja ipupa.
40028007	Kandatala, yapa pao baanya disaipele dupa dapa lamaiyepape: ‘Baa malunya sakatatala Galili yuu dokonya wambao pame lamo, nyakamame baa yuu dokonya kandatamina,’ nambame nyalambo langitilyo doko masalapape!” lea-pyaa.
40028008	Dopa leamopa enda dolapome malu doko yapa yakinatala paka kayao pituaka doko, mona etete yaepatala baanya disaipele dupa lamaiyakamaiyanya alo piambi-pyaa.
40028009	Alo pyao peambinopa Jisasame kaitinisa kandanyetala, “Wanalapo, anja paanya epelyambipi?” lea-pyaa. Dokopa dolapome tengesa ipao luma lakapala baanya mokonya minao baa tama piambi-pyaa.
40028010	Dopa piambinopa Jisasame enda dolapo lamaiyoo, “Paka nakaenya, nambanya kaiminingi dupa katatamisa pupala Galili pena lamaiyepape. Dupame namba dokonya kandatamina,” lea-pyaa.
40028011	Enda dolapo peambinopa, malu isetae kateamino yanda singi dupanya mendapuame yuu taono dokonya pupala piamo dupa pitaka pitisa mupa dupa lamaiyami-pyaa.
40028012	Dokopa pitisa mupapi isingi akalipi dupa-pipa pii lao kambuatala muni longo mendapua yanda singi dupa maiyami-pyaa.
40028013	Maitala dapa lena leami-pyaa: “‘Naima luu palipamanopa Jisasanya disaipele dupame kuka ipupala baa nyoo pamini lamona,’ laapape.
40028014	Dee kapomane andake dokome pii dake setamo kandao doko, naimame mende lata-lata pitamanopa nyakama-kisa pundu nasetana,” leami-pyaa.
40028015	Dopa lateaminopa yanda singi dupame muni dutupa nyepala dupame pina leamiliaka piami-pyaa. Dopa piamino dokonya atome doko Juta endakali dupa-kisa tayateamopa dupame lawaka katao indupa tuu lelyamino.
40028016	Disaipele kingi ita-kisa dee mendai dutupa wamba Jisasame Galili yuu dokonya manda mendenya patamina leamo dokonya peami.
40028017	Dokonya pao Jisasa kandatala baa lao luma lakapala tama piami. Dopa piaminoaka doko, mendapuame mona lapo paleami.
40028018	Dokopa Jisasa baa tengesa ipupala dokaita lamaiyoo pituu, “Yuupi kaitipi dupa isepenge pupu lapae doko pitaka Goteme namba ditilyamo.
40028019	Dopana nyakama pupala endakali paliuu pelyamo dupa pitaka nambanya disaipele injisalapape. Dopa pyoo pituu, Takange dokopi, Ikiningi dokopi, Oli Sipitisa dokopi dutupanya kenge doko lao kaimbu pyakamaiyepape.
40028020	Dee piipi manapi nambame nyakama langio kandeno, dupa pitaka minina lao lamaiyepape. Namba nyakama-pipa koteaka lao awapaka katao yuu etatamo gii doko kandao nyetona, masalapape!” Jisasame dopa lea.
41001001	Jisasa Kataisa Gotenya Ikiningi doko kandao Wai Pii Epe tee piamo doko.
41001002	Potopesa Aisayanya buku dokonya dapa lao pyatae silyamo: “Kandeleno! Nambame nambanya wai minao paenge akali doko embanya wambao pekena latopa embanya kaita doko depa lanya setakata.
41001003	Endakali napalenge yuu dokonya akali mendeme katapala wii lao, ‘Kamongonya kaitini doko depa lanya setakamaiyepape! Baanya kaitini dupa tolasakamaiyepape,’ lea-pyaana,” lapae silyamo.
41001004	Dopaka pyoo Jone Kaimbu Pingi dokome endakali napalenge yuu dokonya ipao katapala, “Endakali dupanya koo dupa kunanya nepekena lao nyakama mona kapilyetala kaimbu nyalapape,” lao lamaiyoo katea-pyaa.
41001005	Dopa piamopa Jutia yuu doko pitakanya tangepi Jetusaleme tange dupa pitakapi baa kateamo dokonya ipupala nyakamanya koo pingi dupa lao panata piaminopa, baame endaki Jotane dokonya dupanya kaimbu pyata pyakamaiya-pyaa.
41001006	Jone baa yonge pee piamo doko mena kamele itimi wasepae pyoo, matapu mena pulumakao yanungimi wasepae pyoo katea-pyaa. Nee neamo dupa pauyombopi ambulya kakasa lingi dupapi dupa nao katea-pyaa.
41001007	Baame endakali dupa pii lamaiyoo pituu dapa lea-pyaa: “Akali etete pupu lapae namba ita minao doko maita pyao epelyamo. Nambame pongatala baanya moko pee pingi kende dolapo tata lakamaipenge namba epe daa.
41001008	Nambame nyakamanya kaimbu endakimi pyekelyona, baame Oli Sipitisa dokome nyakamanya kaimbu pyakatana,” lea-pyaa.
41001009	Gii dokopa Jisasa baa Galili yuu dokonya Nasatete katao epeamopa Joneme endaki Jotane dokonya kaimbu pyakamaiya-pyaa.
41001010	Kaimbu pyatakamaiyamopa baame endaki doko yakinatala ketae pyakalyulu petala kandeamopa kaiti doko saa papa laloo petala Oli Sipitisa doko yaka maileo joo baa-kisa epea-pyaa.
41001011	Kaiti-kisa katao pii mende lea dokome, “Emba nambanya Ikiningi etete mona setenge dokona, embame nambanya mona epe palisekelenona,” lea-pyaa.
41001012	Dokopa Oli Sipitisa dokome endakali napalenge mendasa baa pena lao pyasia-pyaa.
41001013	Baa endakali napalenge yuu dokonya kote kingi ita kitomende kateamopa, Sataneme baa minao makande pia-pyaa. Baa mena yakapi kapua dupa-pipa tole kateamopa enjele dupame baa nisiami-pyaa.
41001014	Jone anjeteamino dokopa Jisasame Galili yuu dokonya ipupala Gotenya Wai Pii Epe doko lamaiya-pyaa.
41001015	Baame lao pituu, “Yuu gii doko indupa etete ipatelyamo. Goteme isingi doko tengesa petelyamona, nyakama mona kapilyetala Wai Pii Epe doko masoo minalapa!” lea-pyaa.
41001016	Jisasa baa endaki Galili pete lemba dokonya pao pituu Saimonepa Saimone kaiminingi Endutupame wapaka nyingi mandi mende endaki pete dokonya pyandao wapaka nyoo kateambino kandea-pyaa. Akali dolapome wapaka nyoo pisinisa pingimba-pyaa.
41001017	Jisasame dolapo lamaiyoo, “Nambame nyilyambo endakali lanyingi akali injisotona, nyilyambome namba watao ipupa,” lea-pyaa.
41001018	Gii dokopaka akali dolapome wapaka nyingi dupa yakinatala baa watao peambi-pyaa.
41001019	Baa dee kuki ulipisale pupala akali Sepete ikiningi Jemesa dokopa baanya kaiminingi Jone dokopa dolapome sipinya pituu nyilyambonya wapaka nyingi mandi dupa wasoo peteambino kandea-pyaa.
41001020	Kandatala baame dolapo epena lea-pyaa. Dokopa dolapome nyilyambonya takange Sepete doko kalai akali dupa-pipa sipi dokonya yakinatala baa watao peambi-pyaa.
41001021	Dupa yuu taono Kapaneame dokonya peami-pyaa. Pao pyakamatala baame Sambasa gii dokonya losuu anda dokonya kolandatala endakali dupa mana lamaiya-pyaa.
41001022	Baame mana leamo dupa sepala endakali dupa walu lao paka kayami-pyaa. Doko mana setapae masingi akali dupame mana lengemali pyoo baame mana laa naenya, baa-kisa pupu lapae singi joo mana lea-pyaa.
41001023	-
41001024	Gii dokopa nyakamanya losuu anda dokonya akali enjele koo paleta mende peteamo dokome ae lao lao pituu, “Nasatete tange Jisasa, emba Gotenya akali epe etete doko kalyeno nambame kandengena, embame naima aipa pyaa epepe? Embame naima minao koyasala epepe?” lea-pyaa.
41001025	Dokopa Jisasame baa pyalanya lao, “Embame embanya nengekaita lyokatala akali dake yakinatala puu!” lea-pyaa.
41001026	Dopa leamopa enjele koo dokome akali doko minao walu lasia-pyaa. Dopa petala ae andake mende latala akali doko yakinatala pea-pyaa.
41001027	Dopa piamopa endakali dupa pitakame mona andapala mende lamai lamai pyoo, “Doko aipa pilya kanjemape? Doko mana enenge mende lamo! Mana doko pupu lapae singi mende lamo! Baame enjele koo dupame mende pina lelyamopa lelyali pingima lamona,” leami-pyaa.
41001028	Dokopa Jisasanya lao pii atome doko Galili yuu doko pitakanya taya-pyaa.
41001029	Jisasa Saimone Endutu Jemesa Jonepi akali dutupame losuu anda doko yakinatala Saimone Endutupanya andaka peami-pyaa.
41001030	Pao pyakamalu piamino dokopa endakali dupame Saimonenya enda imange doko yonge itaita piamosa yaina siamo doko Jisasa lamaiyami-pyaa.
41001031	Lamaitiaminopa baame enda doko siasa pupala baanya kinginya minatala sakatasia-pyaa. Dokopa yonge itaita piamo doko mee jeteamopa enda dokome dokaitanya nee yangakamaiya-pyaa.
41001032	Yuu kualanya niki landa piamopa endakali mendapuame endakali yaina pyapae dupa pitakapi dee enjele koo paletapi dupa laminao baa kateasa epeami-pyaa.
41001033	Endakali yuu taono doko tange dupa pitaka anda kambu dokonya kapatae kateami-pyaa.
41001034	Endakali yaina tata wakale wakaleme pyapae longo dupa baame mee injisakamaiya-pyaa. Dee baame enjele koo longo dupa watao pyakamaiya-pyaa. Enjele koo dupame baa kandengema dokonyana dupame pii mende lena lao kayala naya-pyaa.
41001035	Yongama yuu yongalanya iminjetae kateamopa Jisasa baa sakatao kamanda pyakalyetala endakali napalenge yuu mendenya pupala dokonya loma soo katea-pyaa.
41001036	Dokopa Saimone mauwapi dee baa-pipe awapa kateami dupame baa kutao peami-pyaa.
41001037	Pao kandatala baa lamaiyoo, “Endakali pitakame emba kutilyaminona,” leami-pyaa.
41001038	Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nambame yuu taono yakane tengesa silyamo dokaitanya apata pii lamaitoo dupanya mendakaita muaa. Namba tenge dokonyaka epeona,” lea-pyaa.
41001039	Dopa latala baame Galili yuu doko pitakanya pao nyakamanya losuu anda kateamo dupanya pii lamaiya-pyaa. Dee enjele koo dupa watao pyakamaiyaka-pyaa.
41001040	Akali kopetali mende Jisasa kateasa ipao luma lakapala baa lamaiyoo, “Embame nambanya kopetali doko mee jakatoo lao maseteno kandao doko, kapa pao mee jakalapenona,” lea-pyaa.
41001041	Dokopa Jisasame akali doko kondo kayapala kingimi watandatala baa lamaiyoo, “Nambame emba mee jipili lao masilyona, emba mee jaa!” lea-pyaa.
41001042	Dopa lalu piamopa akali dokonya kopetali yaina doko mee jia-pyaa.
41001043	-
41001044	Dokopa Jisasame kyoto joo baa lamaiyoo, “Kandeleno! Embame endakali mendaipi mende lamaiya naenya, pitisa dokome emba kandena puu! Dopa petala emba mee jilino doko dokaitame kandena laitaka pyoo wamba Moseseme mana seteamoli pyoo opale mende Gote lao kundi maiyalena,” lea-pyaa.
41001045	Jisasame dopa leamoaka doko, baame pupala pii dokonya longo lao lao taya-pyaa. Dopa piamo dokonya Jisasame yuu taono mendenya kapa pao panao dee napea-pyaa. Baa endakali napalenge yuu dupanya katea-pyaa. Dopa piamopa yuu dupa pitakanya katao endakali dupa baa kateasa ipata piami-pyaa.
41002001	Gii mendatupa pateamopa maitakao Jisasame baa yuu taono Kapaneame dokonya dee pilyia-pyaa. Dokopa baa andaka kalyamo lapae doko siami-pyaa.
41002002	Sepala dokopa endakali longo ipao kapeaminosa panda nasia-pyaa. Anda kamapi dupanya apata panda nasiaka-pyaa. Dopa piamopa baame dokaita pii lamaiya-pyaa.
41002003	Baa kateamo dokonya akali papa tambotae mende akali kitomendeme soo epeami-pyaa.
41002004	Panda tumbiamosa dupame akali doko Jisasa kateamo dosa soo ipupenge nanjia-pyaa. Dopa pianya Jisasa kateamo dosa anda doko tungupala akali papa tambotae doko lapa tokonya paleta isa pyandeami-pyaa.
41002005	Dokopa Jisasame akali kitomende dokaitanya masoo miniamino doko kandatala, akali papa tambotae doko lamaiyoo, “Wane, embanya koo dupa kunanya nepekelyona,” lea-pyaa.
41002006	-
41002007	Dokonya mana setapae masingi akali mendapua peteamino dupame nyakamanya mona koko masoo pituu, “Baame aipuma dopa lelya kanjemape? Baame Gote kilya kandao lelyamo. Apimi kapa pao koo dupa kunao nepakamailyona latape? Goteme iki kapa pao koo dupa kunao nepakamailyona lapengena,” lao masiami-pyaa.
41002008	Dopa lao masiamino dokopaka masiamino doko Jisasa baanya moname masetala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Aipuma nyakamame nyakamanya moname dopa lao masilyamipi?
41002009	Akali papa tambotae dake kandao anduku laa nayapengepe? Akali dakenya koo dupa kunao nepakamailyona lapenge dokope, pande baa sakatatala baanya lapa toko doko nyoo soo kaita pena lapenge dokope?
41002010	Dopaka doko, Endakalinya Ikiningi dokome isa yuu dakenya katao endakali dupanya koo dupa kunanya nepenge pupu lapae doko baa-kisa singi lamo lao kanjepalena,” lea-pyaa. Dopa latala baame akali papa tambotae dapa lamaiya-pyaa.
41002011	“Emba sakata! Sakatatala embanya lapa toko doko nyoo soo andaka puu lelyona,” lea-pyaa.
41002012	Dopa leamo dokopa akali dokome pupae sakatatala endakali dupa pitakanya enomba dokonya baanya lapa toko doko nyoo soo kamanda pea-pyaa. Dopa piamosa endakali dupa pitakame doko kandao mona andapala Gote lao lalyoo, “Wamba naimame opale mende etete nakandeamana,” leami-pyaa.
41002013	Jisasa baa endaki pete lemba dokonya deaka pea-pyaa. Dokopa endakali kambu doko pitaka baa kateamo dokonya epeaminopa baame dokaita mana lamaiya-pyaa.
41002014	Lamaitala baa kaita pao pituu Aopiasa ikiningi Lipai lenge doko takisa nyingi anda dokonya peteamo kandatala baa lamaiyoo, “Embame namba watao ipu,” lea-pyaa. Dokopa baa sakatatala Jisasa watao pea-pyaa.
41002015	Maitakao Jisasa baa Lipainya andaka nee nao peteamo dokonya takisa nyingi akalipi mana koo minao paenge longo mendapuame Jisasapi baanya disaipelepi dupa-pipa awapa nee nao peteami-pyaa. Doko, dokaita longome baa watao peami-pyaa.
41002016	Patasi dupanya mana setapae masingi akali dupame kandeaminopa mana koo minao paenge endakalipi takisa nyingi akalipi dupa-pipa baame nee nao peteanya baanya disaipele dupa pisoo, “Baame takisa nyingi akalipi mana koo minao paenge endakalipi dupa-pipa nee nao pituu kalyamo doko aipuma pilyape?” leami-pyaa.
41002017	Dopa leamino doko Jisasame sepala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Endakali yaina napingi dupa dokosaa katatasa pupenge nanjilyamo. Endakali yaina pyapae dupa pupenge jilyamo. Nambame endakali tolatae dupa epena laanya naepeo. Endakali mana koo minao paenge dupa epena laanya epeona,” lea-pyaa.
41002018	Jonenya disaipele dupapi akali Patasi dupapi dupame Gote lao masalanya nee nanenya kayapala mee kateami-pyaa. Dopa piaminopa endakali dupame ipao Jisasa pisoo, “Jonenya disaipele dupapi Patasi dupanya disaipele dupapi dupame nee nanenya kayapala mee kalyamino doko, aipuma embanya disaipele dupame nee nanenya kayala naelyamipi?” leami-pyaa.
41002019	Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Akali mendeme enda kelyapala watapae pyao baanya kaita miningi dupa-pipa awapa kalyamo gii dokopa baanya kaita miningi dupame nee dokonya nanenya kapa pao kaengemape? Daa, enda kelelyamo akali doko dupa-pipa kalyamo dokopa dupame nee nanenya kapa pao kayala naengema.
41002020	Dopaka doko, yuu gii mende ipatamo dokopa enda kelenge akali doko dupanya kainanya nyokonyetatamopa dupame nee nanao katatamina,” lea-pyaa.
41002021	“Endakali mendaipi mendeme lapalapa kangupae enenge mendeme yonge pee wambatae mendenya tii telya dokonya kii pimbala naenge. Endakali mendeme dopa pitamo kandao doko, enenge doko inungunyetala wambatae doko kangutamopa tii andake tata.
41002022	Dee endakali mendaipi mendeme waene enenge doko mena meme yanungimi penge wasepae wambatae dupanya kambuoo pisala naenge. Mendeme dopa pitamo kandao doko, waene dokome bolo lapala penge dupa polata. Dopa pitamopa waenepa pengepa lapota koyata. Dopaka doko, waene enenge doko penge enengenyaka pisepengena,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
41002023	Jisasa baa Sambasa gii mendenya wiisa ee kaina mendenya kaita peamopa, baanya disaipele dupame baa-pipa awapa pao pituu wiisa dii dupa kii lao nyepa nyepa pyoo peami-pyaa.
41002024	Dopa piaminopa, Patasi dupame baa lamaiyoo, “Kanau! Sambasa gii dokonya daa latae singi mana doko aipuma akali dakaitame minilyamipi?” leami-pyaa.
41002025	-
41002026	Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Dapitimi piamo doko nyakamame pepanya itaki napiamipi? Wamba akali Apayata doko pitisa mupa joo kateamo dokopa Dapitipi baa-pipa awapa kateamino akali dupapi nee daa jiamosa lopo kayapala Dapitimi Gotenya losuu anda dokonya kolandatala betesa Gotenya lao setapae pitisa dupame iki napenge dupa nyepala baa-pipa awapa kateamino dupa maiyoo nea-pyaana,” lea-pyaa.
41002027	Dopa latala baame dokaita dee lamaiyoo, “Goteme endakali lao masetala Sambasa gii doko setea-pyaa. Sambasa gii doko lao masetala endakali wapuala naya-pyaa.
41002028	Tenge dokonya, Endakalinya Ikiningi dokome Sambasa gii doko apata isoo kalyamoakana,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
41003001	Yuu mende Jisasa baa Jutamanya losuu anda dokonya deaka peamopa akali kingi kumapae mende dokonya petea-pyaa.
41003002	Endakali mendapuame baa kosimi lamana latala baame akali doko Sambasa gii dokonya mee injisilyape lao isokondape pyoo peteami-pyaa.
41003003	Jisasame akali kingi kumapae doko lamaiyoo, “Emba sakatatala kaina angenya ipao kata,” lea-pyaa.
41003004	Dopa latala baame endakali dupa lamaiyoo, “Sambasa gii dokonya koo pipenge doko kapa pelyape, pande epe pipenge doko kapa pelyape? Dee endakali pyao kumasepenge doko kapa pelyape, pande pyoo nyepenge doko kapa pelyape? lea-pyaa. Dopaka doko, dokaita ema napiami-pyaa.
41003005	Baame dokaita kandayoko lao kandatala imbu kaya-pyaa. Dokaitame nyakamanya mona kana jiaminosa baame dokaita kandao mona kenda kaya-pyaa. Dopa petala akali kingi kumapae doko lamaiyoo, “Embanya kingi tinoka,” lea-pyaa. Baanya kingi doko tinokateamopa dee auu pia-pyaa.
41003006	Dopa piamopa Patasi dupame pupae kamanda pupala Kiŋi Etote tata dupa-pipa Jisasa aipa petala pyao kumasemape lao kambuiyami-pyaa.
41003007	-
41003008	Jisasapi baanya disaipele dupapi endaki pete dokonya peami-pyaa. Galili tange kambu longo mendeme baa watao peami-pyaa. Dee Jutia tangepi, Jetusaleme tangepi, Itumia tangepi, endaki Jotane yangitena tangepi, Taya tangepi, Saitone tangepi dupame baame pilyamo lapae dupa sepala baa kateamo dokonya kambu longo dupa epeami-pyaa.
41003009	Dopa piaminosa endakali kambu dokome baa katao tambukinatamini latala sipi yakane mende baanya disaipele dupame depa lanya setekena lea-pyaa.
41003010	Baame endakali yaina pyapae longo mee injisiamo dokonya endakali yaina pyapae dupa pitakame baa watandamana latala tuu tuu lao epeaminosa lea-pyaa.
41003011	Enjele koo dupame baa kandatala, baa kateamo dosa tombauli sepala puu lao ae lao, “Emba Gote Ikiningina,” lata piami-pyaa.
41003012	Dokopa baame kyoto joo dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame namba lao panala nayalapape eteteaka daana,” lea-pyaa.
41003013	Jisasa baa yuu manda mendenya pea-pyaa. Pupala akali mendapua baame yapao nyotoo lao masiamo dupa epena leamopa dupa baa kateamo dokonya epeami-pyaa.
41003014	Epeaminopa baame akali kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapoma baa-pipa tole katamana lao makande pia-pyaa. Dee akali dutupame pii lamaiya pena latona lao makande pia-pyaa.
41003015	Baame dupa pupu lapae maitopa enjele koo dupa watao pyatamina lao masetala dopa pia-pyaa.
41003016	Baame akali kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapoma dutupa makande petala Saimone kandao kenge Pita lea-pyaa.
41003017	Dee baame Sepete ikiningi Jemesapa Jonepa dolapo kandao kenge Boanesisa lea-pyaa. Dokonya tenge doko dolapo kaiti toka lelyamo dokonya ikiningi.
41003018	-
41003019	Baame Endutupi, Pilipapi, Batolomyupi, Matyupi, Tomasapi, Aopiasa ikiningi Jemesa dokopi, Tatiasapi, Saimone kenge mende Kenanayosa lengema dokopi, Jisasa enge nyiamo akali Jutasa Isaketiote dokopi dutupa makande pia-pyaa.
41003020	Dopa petala Jisasa baa andaka epea-pyaa. Dokopa endakali kambu mende deaka ipao kambu piaminosa Jisasa baa baanya disaipele dupa-pipa nee napenge nanjia-pyaa.
41003021	Dopa pilyamo lapae doko baanya palu dupame sepala baa kii minao nyala epeami-pyaa. Doko, endakali dupame, “Baa kyekelyamona,” leaminosa dopa piami-pyaa.
41003022	Mana setapae masingi akali Jetusaleme katao lanao epeamino dupame lao pituu, “Belesapulu doko baa-kisa palelyamo. Dee enjele koo dupa isingi doko mambele baame enjele koo dupa watao pilyamona,” leami-pyaa.
41003023	Dopa leaminopa baame dokaita epena latala kongali mendapua dapa lamaiya-pyaa. “Sataneme Satane tange aipa petala kapa pao watao pyatape?
41003024	Yuu dupanya kiŋi mendeme isingi tata mende wakale pyoloo petala yanda pitambino kandao doko, tata doko kapa pao auu pyoo nakatata.
41003025	Anda mendenya palu dupa wakale pyoloo petala yanda pitamino kandao doko, anda doko kapa pao auu pyoo nakatata.
41003026	Dee Satane dokome baa tangeaka wakale pyoloo petala yanda pitamo kandao doko, baa kapa pao kalya nayata. Daa, baa etata.
41003027	“Dopaka doko, endakali mendeme akali pupu lapae dokonya andaka kolandatala baanya pinju dupa kapa pao pyao nanyeta. Dopa pyaanya tamo kandao doko, wambao akali pupu lapae doko kendeme yaki pinya setapala dokopa baanya andaka pinju setamo dupa pyao nyeta.
41003028	Kiningi nambame nyakama langilyona, endakali dupanya koo dupa pitakapi Gote kandao lamba lenge dupa pitakapi dupa Goteme kunanya nepakamaita.
41003029	Dopaka doko, endakali mendeme Oli Sipitisa kandao lamba latamo kandao doko, tendapi baanya koo doko baa-kisa etete seta. Baanya koo doko tenda tendapi soaka patana,” lea-pyaa.
41003030	Baa-kisa enjele koo mende palelyamona leamino dokonya baame dopa lea-pyaa.
41003031	Jisasanya endangi kaiminingipi dupa ipao kamanda katapala baa kamanda epena lao mendapuame lanyala pena leami-pyaa.
41003032	Endakali baa kakopao peteamino dupame Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Yaa, embanya endangi kaiminingipi dupa ipao kamanda katapala emba kutilyaminona,” leami-pyaa.
41003033	Jisasame yanu pyao, “Nambanya endangi doko apipi? Nambanya kaiminingi dupa apitupape?” lea-pyaa.
41003034	Jisasame baa kakopao peteamino dupa kandayoko lao kandatala, “Datupa nambanya endangipi kaiminingipina, kanjepape.
41003035	Goteme masingili pingima endakali dupa nambanya kaiminingipi, pimalengepi, endangipina,” lea-pyaa.
41004001	Paa mendepa deaka Jisasame endaki pete singi dosa endakali dupa mana lamaiyoo katea-pyaa. Endakali eteteaka longo mendapua ipao baa kateamo dosa kambu piami-pyaa. Dopa piaminosa baa sipi mendenya pyakalyetala ongonya peteamopa sipi doko endakinya sia-pyaa. Dopa piamopa endakali doko pitaka endaki pete lemba dokonya kateami-pyaa.
41004002	Dokopa baame kongali lao endakali dupa mana longo lao dapa lamaiya-pyaa:
41004003	“Nyakamame salapape! Akali mendeme ee wai lyandala pea-pyaa.
41004004	Pupala lyandeamopa yangi kaitininya pea-pyaa. Peamo dupa yaka dupame ipupala nao eteami-pyaa.
41004005	Yangi kana-kisa yuu epao napalengenya pea-pyaa. Yuu epao napalenge dokonyana wai dupa pupae langa lea-pyaa.
41004006	Langa leamoaka doko, niki teamo dokome pyao nea-pyaa. Dupa pingi pyalakao napiamosa sapuiya-pyaa.
41004007	Yangi lyiki tenge palengenya pea-pyaa. Lyiki dupa andapala ee wai dupa kuii pyambea-pyaa. Dopa piamopa dii namandea-pyaa.
41004008	Dopaka doko, yangi lyandeamo dupa yuu epenya pupala langa lao andapala dii mandea-pyaa. Yangimi kingi ita tepoma, yangimi kingi ita tokange, yangimi andate mendai lao mandea-pyaana,” lea-pyaa.
41004009	Dopa latala baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakama kalekaita singi dupame pii doko salapapena!” lea-pyaa.
41004010	Maitakao Jisasa baa iki kateamopa akali kingi ita-kisa dee lapoma dupapi dee endakali baa-pipa tole kateamino dupapimi kongali pii dupanya baa pisiami-pyaa.
41004011	Dokopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Goteme baanya isingi dokonya yalo petae doko nyakama laitaka petelyamo. Dopaka doko, netesa endakali dupame dupa pitaka kongaliaka silyamino.
41004012	Dupame kandokondape pitamiaka doko, angi doko nakandena lawapi, dupame sokondape pitamiaka doko, angi doko masala naena lawapi, dupame mona kapilyetaminopa Goteme nyakamanya koo pingi dupa kunanya nepakamaitone latala dopa pilyamona,” lea-pyaa.
41004013	Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame kongali pii dake masala naelyamino doko, aipa petala kongali pii waka dupa pitaka masetamipi?
41004014	Ee wai lyandala peamo akali dokome Gotenya pii doko lyandelyamo.
41004015	Endakali mendapua wai yangi kaitininya peamo dopalema. Endakali dopale dupame pii doko sepelyamino gii dokopaka Sataneme ipupala pii nyakama-kisa ee wai joo lyandatae silyamo doko nyoo nepenge.
41004016	Dopaka pyoo endakali yangi dupa ee wai kana palenge yuunya peamo dopalema. Dupame pii doko sepala mona yaepao lee mendai nyingima.
41004017	Dopaka doko, dupame moname auu pyoo masala nayao gii kuki iki katengema. Dupame pii doko watao minilyaminosa, dupa minao kenda pisowapi watao pyawapi pingima. Dopa pilyaminopa yapa yakinengema.
41004018	Dee endakali yangi mendapua ee wai lyiki tenge palengenya peamo dopalema dupame pii doko singima.
41004019	Singimaka doko, isa yuunya auu pyoo katapu laka lao nea kaenge dupapi, munipi oapi dupa auu kaengepi, dee opale waka nyipu laka lao masingi dupapi dupame pii doko pyalya minilyamo dokopa endakali dupame kapa pao dii namandengema.
41004020	Dopaka doko, endakali yangi dupa ee wai yuu epenya peamo dopalema. Dupame pii doko sepala nyoo minatala dii mandengema. Yangimi kingi ita tepoma, yangimi kingi ita tokange, yangimi andate mendai lao mandengemana,” Jisasame dopa lea-pyaa.
41004021	Dopa latala baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Endakali mendeme lama kaiyepae mende titopene penge kokopi palenge toko pundipundipi dupanya setalanya minao epengepe? Daa, setapenge panda dokonya setalanya minao epenge.
41004022	Doko, opale yalo petae silyamo dupa panatae seta. Opale sanga pyatae silyamo dupa lopalyetae seta.
41004023	Nyakama kalekaita singi tamo kandao doko, pii doko salapapena!” lea-pyaa.
41004024	Dopa latala dee baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame pii silyamino doko masokondape pyepape. Nyakamame endakali mende-kisa mana minataminoli pyoaka Goteme nyakama-kisa minata. Dee mana mendapua baame waipa soo minataka.
41004025	Opale singi endakali doko konda pyoo maita. Opale nasingi endakali doko-kisa setamo dolapo nyokonyetana,” lea-pyaa.
41004026	Dopa latala dee baame dapa lea-pyaa: “Goteme isingi doko akali mendeme ee wai yuunya lyandenge dopale.
41004027	Baame lyandatala kuka luu palipa yuu yongelyamopa sakatata pilyamopa ee wai doko langa latala andenge. Dopa pilyamopa baame aipa petala langa lao andelyape lao nakandenge.
41004028	Wambao yoko pingi. Dopa petala mange pyakalyingi. Mange ongonya dii lyoo wambu pingi.
41004029	Wambu petala napenge gii doko epelyamopa akali dokome uaa pepo dokome lyingina,” lea-pyaa.
41004030	Jisasame dokaita dapa lao pisia-pyaa. “Naimame Goteme isingi doko aipalena lamape? Aki mendepa makande pyoo kongali lamape?
41004031	Doko masete dii dopale. Endakali mendeme masete wai doko yuunya lyandenge. Isa yuu dakenya ee wai waka dupa pitakame ita minao masete dii doko etete yakane mende.
41004032	Dii doko lyandataesa langa latala andao ee wai waka eenya pokatae dupa pitaka ita miningi. Dokonya wangya dupa andake jilyamopa luu lelya dupanya yaka dupame kapa pao anda pingimana,” lea-pyaa.
41004033	Baame kongali pii dopale dupa longo lao endakali dupame sepenge jiali pyoo lamaiyoo katea-pyaa.
41004034	Baame pii mende mee lamaiya nayao kongali lawaka lamaiya-pyaa. Dopa petala baanya disaipele dupa iki kateamino dokopa kongali dupa pitakanya tenge dupa lamaita pia-pyaa.
41004035	Gii dokondinaka alemandi Jisasame baanya disaipele dupa lamaiyoo, “Naima endaki pete dakenya omotena muaa,” lea-pyaa.
41004036	Dopa leamopa dupame endakali kambu doko yakinatala Jisasa sipi peteamo dokonya peteta laminao peami-pyaa. Dee sipi waka mendatupa apata tole peamiaka-pyaa.
41004037	Peaminopa poo andake mende leamopa endaki buli piamo dokome tandyuu sipi dokonya kolandea-pyaa. Dopa petala sipi doko endakimi tumbalanya pia-pyaa.
41004038	Jisasa baa sipi ongonya maitakaita sanda mendenya aiyomba setapala palipia-pyaa. Palipiamopa dupame baa pyale tatala, “Mana Lenge Akali, naima kumalanya pilyamano doko embame angi mende daana lao masilipi?” leami-pyaa.
41004039	Dokopa baame sakatatala poo doko kaena lea-pyaa. Endaki pete doko lamaiyoo, “Emba yatu laa! Ema napinya mee saa!” lea-pyaa. Dokopa poo doko yatu leamopa endaki kuki emapi mende napia-pyaa.
41004040	Dokopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Aipuma nyakama paka kaelyamipi? Nyakamame masoo minatala naelyamipi?” lea-pyaa.
41004041	Akali dupa etete paka kayapala nyakamalapo lao pituu, “Poopa endakipa dolapome pii sakamaingimba lamo doko akali dake api laa kanjemape?” leami-pyaa.
41005001	Dokopa dokaita endaki pete dokonya omotena pupala Getasa tangemanya yuu dokonya peami-pyaa.
41005002	Jisasa baa sipi doko yakinatala peamopa akali enjele koo paleta mendeme endakali malu kananda dupanya katao ipao baa kandanyulu pia-pyaa.
41005003	Baa endakali malu dupanya palenge-pyaa. Endakali mendaipi mendeme kapa pao baa anjala naengema-pyaa. Nili kendepi kapa daaka-pyaa.
41005004	Paa longosa dupame baa kingipi mokopi dupa ŋili kendepi anengapupi dupame anjeta pilyaminopa anengapu dupa pindanya nepatala ŋili kende dupa takyoo nepenge-pyaa. Dopa pilyamopa endakali mendaipi mendeme kapa pao baa minao tambo lasapenge nanjingi-pyaa.
41005005	Kuka kotakapi koteaka lao baa endakali malupi yuu mandapi dupanyaka paliuu katenge-pyaa. Baame puu lao ae lao katao baanya yonge doko tange kaname konjeta pingi-pyaa.
41005006	Jisasa londatili kateamopa baame kandatala alo pyao ipupala baa kateamo dosa luma lakea-pyaa.
41005007	Dopa petala baame puu lao ae latala, “Jisasa emba Gote Etete Ketae Katenge dokonya Ikiningi, embame namba aipa pitipi? Nambame Gotenya kenge doko lao embame namba tanda andake nandipoko,” lea-pyaa.
41005008	Doko, Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Enjele koo, embame akali dake yakinatala kamanda ipu,” leamosa dopa lea-pyaa.
41005009	Dokopa Jisasame baa pisoo, “Emba kenge apipi?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa akali dokome yanu pyao, “Naima longo dokonya nambanya kenge Longo lengena,” lea-pyaa.
41005010	Dopa latala Jisasame enjele koo dutupame yuu dake yakinatala pena laa naena lao baame kongo lea-pyaa.
41005011	Mena elyambu mende yuu manda kilikili dokonya nao kateami-pyaa.
41005012	Dokopa enjele koo dupame Jisasa kandao, “Naima mena dupanya koko landa pyamana dupa kalyamino dokonya pupa lapoko,” leami-pyaa.
41005013	Dopa leaminopa Jisasame pena kaya-pyaa. Dokopa enjele koo dupame akali doko yakinatala mena dupa-kisa pao landa piami-pyaa. Dopa peteaminopa mena elyambu doko alo pyao pao papatale mendenya pyakatala endaki pete dokonya tumbitambi napala kumiami-pyaa. Mena dupa taosene lapoma jowapi mende-pyaa.
41005014	Dopa piamopa mena setao katenge akali dupa paka pupala yuu taono dokonyapi mee yuupi dupanya pao lamaiyami-pyaa. Dokopa endakali dupame piamo doko kanja epeami-pyaa.
41005015	Dupa Jisasa kateamo dokonya ipupala kandeaminopa wamba enjele koo longo paleta katenge akali doko indupa yonge pee dupa pyoo mona paliuu peteamo kandatala paka kayami-pyaa.
41005016	Piamo doko lengeme kandeamino endakali dupame enjele koo paleta akali doko-kisa piamo dokonya lawapi dee mena dupanya lawapi endakali epeamino dupa lamaiyami-pyaa.
41005017	Dokopa dupame Jisasa baa nyakamanya yuu doko yakinatala pena lao kongo leami-pyaa.
41005018	Dopa leaminopa baa sipi ongonya pyakalyiamopa wamba enjele koo paleta kateamo dokome baa apata buaako lea-pyaa.
41005019	Dopa leamopa Jisasame ongonya ŋee nalea-pyaa. Nee nalenya baa lamaiyoo, “Embame embanya andaka emba palu dupa katatamisa puu. Pupala Kamongo dokome embanya pyakalamo dupapi dee emba kondo kayalamo dokopi dutupa dupa lamaipina,” lea-pyaa.
41005020	Dopa leamopa akali dokome pupala baa-kisa Jisasame piamo dupa pitaka Dekapolisa yuu dokonya panao lamaiya-pyaa. Dopa piamopa endakali dupa pitakame sepala mona andeami-pyaa.
41005021	Jisasa baa sipi dokonya pituu endaki pete dokonya yangitena dee pilyia-pyaa. Endaki pete lemba dokonya endakali kambu andake mendeme ipao baa kateasa limbiami-pyaa.
41005022	Dokopa Jutamanya losuu anda isingi akali dupanya mende Jaitasa lenge doko epea-pyaa. Ipao Jisasa kandatala baanya moko kateamo dosa tombauli sepala, kyoto joo dapa lao Jisasa-kisa tee lea-pyaa: “Nambanya wanenge doko kumalanya pilyamona, baa mee jetala saka pena embame ipao baa kingimi watandatalena,” lea-pyaa.
41005023	Dopa leamopa Jisasa baa-pipa awapa peambi-pyaa.
41005024	Dopa piaminopa endakali longome baa watao pupala katao tambukiniami-pyaa.
41005025	Enda mende ee kana kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapoma dupanya andaka nao paliti-paliti singi mende katea-pyaa.
41005026	Enda dokome dokosaa longo dupa-kisa tanda longo nao muni akipi dupa pitaka nepeamoaka doko, kuki yaka nanjoo etete koyamopa petea-pyaa.
41005027	Enda dokome Jisasanya lao pii doko sepala endakali kambu dokonya Jisasanya maita-kaita ipupala baanya yonge pee dokonya kingimi watandea-pyaa.
41005028	Enda dokome, “Nambame baanya yonge peenya iki watandato kandao doko, nambanya yaina doko mee jakalapomona,” lao masetala dopa pia-pyaa.
41005029	Kinina dokopa lee mendai enda dokonya andaka nao paliti-paliti singi doko yatu lea-pyaa. Dopa piamopa enda dokome baanya yaina doko etalumu lao masia-pyaa.
41005030	Dokopa awapa Jisasame baanya pupu lapae mendapua puumu lao sepala endakali kambu kateamino dupa kandapilyetala, “Apimi nambanya yonge peenya kingimi watandelyape?” lea-pyaa.
41005031	Baanya disaipele dupame yanu pyao, “Emba katao tambukinelyamino endakali kambu doko emba tangeme kandao pituu embame, ‘Apimi namba kingimi watandelyape?’ leepe?” leami-pyaa.
41005032	Dopa leaminopa apimi pyaape lao kanjanya Jisasame kandayoko lea-pyaa.
41005033	Dopa piamopa enda dokome baa-kisa piamo dutupa pitaka masetala paka kayao walu lao ipao Jisasanya moko kateamo dosa tombauli sepala baame piamo dupa pitaka panao baa lamaiya-pyaa.
41005034	Dokopa baame enda doko lamaiyoo, “Wanaku, embame masoo minapino dokome emba mee injisetelyamo. Embanya yaina doko mee jilyamona emba mona yaepatala puu,” lea-pyaa.
41005035	Dopa lao kateamopa Jutamanya losuu anda isingi akali dokonya andaka katao akali mendapuame ipupala, “Embanya wanaku doko kumatalamona, aipa lao Mana Lenge Akali doko minao dee kenda pisetepe?” leami-pyaa.
41005036	Dopa leamino doko Jisasame soo nasili petala losuu anda isingi akali doko lamaiyoo, “Embame paka nakaenya masoo minao katape,” lea-pyaa.
41005037	Dopa latala baame endakali pitaka baa watao naepena latala Pitapi, Jemesapi, Jemesa kaiminingi Jonepi dutupa-pipa iki peami-pyaa.
41005038	Pao losuu anda isingi akali dokonya andaka kolandeami-pyaa. Jisasame kandeamopa endakali dupame pii longo lao ee lao yako lao kateamino kandea-pyaa.
41005039	Dopa petala baame andaka kolandatala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Aipuma nyakama pii longo lao ee lao kalyamipi? Wanaku doko kumala nayalamo. Baa luu palelyamona,” lea-pyaa.
41005040	Dopa leamopa endakali dupame baa kilya kandao gii kayami-pyaa. Dopaka doko, baame dokaita pitaka watao kamanda pyalyetala wanaku dokonya endangi takangepapi dee baa-pipa tole payamino dutupapi dutupa-pipa iki wanaku kumapae doko siamo palo dokonya peami-pyaa.
41005041	Pupala wanaku dokonya kinginya minatala baa lamaiyoo, “Talita kumu,” lea-pyaa. Pii doko kapilyoo, “Wanaku, emba nambame sakata lelyona,” lea-pyaa.
41005042	Dopa leamo dokopa wanaku doko sakatatala paya-pyaa. Dopa piamopa dupame doko kandatala etete walu lao mona andeami-pyaa. Wanaku doko ee kana kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapoma patae-pyaa.
41005043	Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Endakali mendeme doko setana lamaiya nayalapape,” lao etete kyoto joo lamaiya-pyaa. Dopa latala, “Nyakamame nee mendapua nena maiyepa,” lea-pyaa.
41006001	Jisasame yuu doko yakinatala baa tangenya yuu tenge dokonya pea-pyaa.
41006002	Pupala Sambasa gii doko epeamopa baame Jutamanya losuu anda dokonya mana lamaiya-pyaa. Lamaiyamopa pii siamino endakali longo dupame walu latala lao pituu, “Baame mana datupa anjatae nyia laape? Masepae baa maiya lamo doko aipale laa kanjemape? Baame kalai pupu lapae dopale dupa aipa petala pilya kanjemape?
41006003	Akali dake akali kamonda kalai pingi doko daa kandamuape? Baa enda Matia ikiningi, Jemesapi, Josisapi, Jutasapi, Saimonepi dutupanya kaiminingi daape? Baanya pimalenge dupa ae naima-pipa awapa napilyamape?” leami-pyaa. Dopa latala dupame Jisasa kandao mona koo palyiami-pyaa.
41006004	Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Yuu dupa pitakanya potopesa mende andanda semaingimaka doko, baanya yuu tengepi, baa tatapi, baa palupi dupame iki baa andanda semaiya naengemana,” lea-pyaa.
41006005	Dokopa baame kalai pupu lapae mende yuu doo kapa pao napia-pyaa. Dopaka doko, baame endakali yaina pyapae kuki mendatupa-kisa iki kingi setapa pyoo mee injisia-pyaa.
41006006	Endakali dupame masoo minala nayaminosa baa mona andea-pyaa. Maitakao Jisasa baa yuu taono yakane soo peamo dupanya pao endakali dupa mana lamaiya-pyaa.
41006007	Jisasame akali disaipele kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapoma dutupa epena latala enjele koo dupa watao pina lao pupu lasetala dupa lapo lapo lao pena lea-pyaa.
41006008	Pena lao pituu dapa pyepape lea-pyaa: “Nyakama kaita patamino dokonya mende naminao pangali iki minao pupape. Nee mende manja nayalapape. Nokaina mandipenge mende manja nayalapape. Muni mende manja nayalapape.
41006009	Dopaka doko, nyakama moko pee pyoo pupape. Yonge pee lapoma lao pyoo napupape,” lea-pyaa.
41006010	Dopa latala dee baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakama anda mendenya kolandeami kandeno doko, yuu dokonya katataminoli pyoo anda dokonyaka kalyepape.
41006011	Yuu mendenya tange endakali dupame nyakama taeme ipamini lamo lao lanyala nayawapi nyakamanya pii doko nasowapi piami kandeno doko, nyakamame yuu doko yakinatala pupape. Pao pituu dupame kandatala masina lao nyakamanya mokonya kuni kungumapi patatamo dupa lyanda lanya nepalapapena,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
41006012	Dopa leamopa dupame pupala endakali dupa mona kapilyina lao pii lamaiyami-pyaa.
41006013	Pii lamaiyoo pituu enjele koo longo mendapua watao piami-pyaa. Dee endakali yaina pyapae longo mendapuanya olipi ipange kai latakamaitala yaina dupa mee injisiami-pyaa.
41006014	Jisasanya kenge doko yuu dupa pitakanya taya-pyaa. Dopa piamopa Kiŋi Etote dokome Jisasanya lao pii doko sia-pyaa. Dupame lao pituu, “Jone Kaimbu Pingi doko malunya sakatatala kalai pupu lapae dupa pyoo kalyamona,” leami-pyaa.
41006015	Yangi dupame lao pituu, “Baa Ilainjana,” leami-pyaa. Yangi dupame, “Baa potopesa kateamino dopale potopesa mendena,” leami-pyaa.
41006016	Etoteme pii doko sepala lao pituu, “Wamba nambame mange kepeo Jone doko sakatapyana,” lea-pyaa.
41006017	-
41006018	Wamba akali Etote dokome baanya kaiminingi Pilipa etanenge Etotiasa lenge doko tondao nyia-pyaa. Dopa piamopa, Joneme Etote lamaiyoo, “Embame embanya kaimininginya etanenge tondao nyilino doko kopeta pilinona,” lea-pyaa. Dopa lati siamosa Etoteme enda Etotiasa doko lao masetala baameaka yanda singi mendapuame Jone doko anjina latala anjingi andaka ŋili kendeme anjinya palyia-pyaa.
41006019	Doko, enda Etotiasa dokome Jone imbu kayapala pyao kumasalanya piamopa kapa napea-pyaa.
41006020	Doko, Etoteme Jone doko akali tolatae epe etete mende lamo lao kandatala baa paka kayapala auu pyoo isoo katea-pyaa. Baame Jonenya pii dupa sepala epao mona andeamoaka doko, baanya pii doko auu kayao sia-pyaa.
41006021	Jone pyapenge gii angi mende enda Etotiasa dokome kandao nyia-pyaa. Etotenya mandenge gii doko epeamopa baame akali andake dupapi, yanda singi amii isingi mupa dupapi, Galili tange akali andake dupapi dupanya nee yangakamaiya-pyaa.
41006022	Dopa piamopa nee nao peteamino dokonya Etotiasa wanenge doko ipao kolandatala lyia-pyaa. Dokopa Etote mauwapi dee baa-pipa awapa nee nao peteamino dupame etete auu kayami-pyaa. Dopa petala Kiŋi Etote dokome wanaku doko lamaiyoo, “Embame opale mende namba-kisa tee lateno doko embame latenoli pyoo nambame emba dyaapona,” lea-pyaa.
41006023	Baame lao pituu, “Opale mende embame nambame isoo kalyo dokonya yangipa kapa lao tee lateli pyoo kiningi etete nambame dyaapona,” lea-pyaa.
41006024	Dopa leamopa wanaku doko endangi peteasa pupala endangi pisoo, “Aki mende dina lao tee lawape?” lea-pyaa. Endangimi baa lamaiyoo, “Jone Kaimbu Pingi dokonya aiyomba doko dina lape,” lea-pyaa.
41006025	Dokopa wanaku dokome pupae yapa kiŋi doko peteasa ipupala, “Embame Jone Kaimbu Pingi dokonya aiyomba doko kepao pelesa mendenya setapala epapuaka dipi laka lao masilyona,” lao tee lea-pyaa.
41006026	Dopa leamopa kiŋi doko etete mona kenda kaya-pyaa. Dopa piamoaka doko, wambao baame etete kiningi lelyona leamo dokopi dee endakali baa-pipa awapa peteamino dupapi lao masetala wanaku dokonya pii nepala nayatoo lao masia-pyaa.
41006027	Dopa lao masetala dokopaka yanda singi mendeme Jonenya aiyomba doko kepao nyala pena lea-pyaa. Dokopa yanda singi dokome anjingi andaka pupala Jonenya aiyomba doko kepao nyia-pyaa.
41006028	Kepao nyepala pelesa mendenya setapala nyoo ipao wanaku doko maiya-pyaa. Wanaku dokome nyoo baanya endangi maiya-pyaa.
41006029	Dokopa Jonenya disaipele dupame doko sepala baa nyoo pao malu piami-pyaa.
41006030	Kote mendepa aposele dupa Jisasa kateamo dokonya ipao kambu pyatala nyakamame opale piami dupa pitakapi pii mana lamaiyamipi dupa dopa pipuma lao baa lamaiyami-pyaa.
41006031	Dokopa endakali longo dupa pata ipata piaminopa Jisasapi baanya disaipele dupapi nee napenge gii nasia-pyaa. Dopa piamosa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Naima iki endakali napalenge yuu mendakaita kuki koto nyemana mona ipupa,” lea-pyaa.
41006032	Dopa leamopa dokaita sipi mendenya pao pyakalyetala nyakama iki endakali napalenge yuu mendakaita peami-pyaa.
41006033	Peaminopa endakali longo dupame dutupa lamo lao kandatala yuu taono dupa pitakanya tange endakali dupame mee kaitini alo pyatala nyakama wambao pao kateami-pyaa.
41006034	Jisasame netesa pao pyakamatala endakali kambu andake mende kateamino kandea-pyaa. Dokaita sipisipi setao katenge akali mende nakatenge dopale joo kateamino kandatala kondome kumapala baame opale longonya lao mana lamaiya-pyaa.
41006035	Indupa niki lenge landa pyalanya piamopa baanya disaipele dupame baa kateasa ipupala lao pituu, “Yuu dakenya endakali napalengema lamo. Dee indupa yuu kualanya pilyamoaka.
41006036	Dopa pilyamona embame dokaita ee silyamo dupanyapi yuu taono yakane soo pelyamo dupanyapi nee akipi tange sambao nama pena laa,” leami-pyaa.
41006037	Dopaka doko, baame yanu pyao dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamameaka dokaita nee maiyepa,” lea-pyaa. Dokaitame baa lamaiyoo, “Naimame pupala muni kina andate lapoma dupame betesa sambapala endakali datupa nena lao maimape?” leami-pyaa.
41006038	Dopa leaminopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Betesa akipate silyape lao kanja pupa,” lea-pyaa. Dokaitame kandatala baa lamaiyoo, “Betesa yuungi wapaka lapoma pyoo silyamona,” leami-pyaa.
41006039	Baame disaipele dupa lamaiyoo, “Tanu dupanya endakali dupa pitaka wakale wakale lao kambu pyao petena laapa,” lea-pyaa.
41006040	Dokopa endakali dupa andate mendai lawapi kingi ita yuungi lawapi kambu pyao peteami-pyaa.
41006041	Dopa piaminopa baame betesa yuungi wapaka lapoma pyoo siamo dutupa nyepala kaiti-kisa kandalyetae katao yaka pilino lea-pyaa. Yaka pilino latala baame betesa dutupa konjepala baanya disaipele dupame mokosoo maina lao maiya-pyaa. Dopa petala baame wapaka lapoma dolapo endakali dupa pitakanya konjakamaiyaka-pyaa.
41006042	Dopa piamopa dokaita pitakame nao tiaka kayami-pyaa.
41006043	Dokopa disaipele dupame betesapi wapakapi konjepae kakana siamo dupa nyoo baseketa mandi kingi ita-kisa dee lapomanya mandyuu tumbasiami-pyaa.
41006044	Nee neamino akali dupa taosene yuungimi neami-pyaa.
41006045	Dokopa Jisasame baanya disaipele dupa sipi dokonya pyakalyina latala endaki pete ongonya yangitena Betesaita yuu ongonya wambao pao katena latala baame endakali dupa pena lea-pyaa.
41006046	Baame endakali dupa pena lao lasa latala baa loma salanya yuu manda mendenya pea-pyaa.
41006047	Pupala Jisasa baa iki katea-pyaa. Yuu kuala epeamopa sipi doko endaki pete kaina dokonya pea-pyaa.
41006048	Dokopa poo andake mende paanya peamino dokaita-kaita lao epeamosa dokaitame lekeleke tao endaki tandyuu peamino Jisasame kandea-pyaa. Kandatala yuu yongalanya pee payamopa baa endaki pete ketae dokonya moko katao ipupala dokaita nyoo maita pyalanya pia-pyaa.
41006049	Baa endaki pete ketae dokonya moko katao payamo kandatala dupame timango mende lamo lao masetala ae leami-pyaa.
41006050	Dokaita pitakame baa kandatala pakame kumiami-pyaa. Dokopa yapa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Namba kalyona, nyakama paka nakaenya, mona palyepa!” lea-pyaa.
41006051	Dopa latala dokaita sipinya peteamino dokonya pyakalyiamopa poo leamo doko yatu lea-pyaa. Dopa piamopa dokaitame etete mona andeami-pyaa.
41006052	Dupame betesa neamino tenge doko masala nayao mona pyakilyia-pyaa.
41006053	Dokopa dupa endaki pete dokonya yangi-kaita pupala Genesatete yuu ongonya sipi doko minao seteami-pyaa.
41006054	Dupame sipi doko yakinatala epeaminopa endakali dupame pupae Jisasa epelyamo lao kandeami-pyaa.
41006055	Baa lamo lao kandatala endakali dupame yuu doo siamo dupa pitakanya alo pyao pupala endakali yaina pyapae dupa lapa tokonya setapala soo epeami-pyaa. Baa dosa kalyamo leamili pyoo soo ipata piami-pyaa.
41006056	Baa yuu taono andakepi yakanepi mee yuupi dupanya peamoli pyoo endakali dupame endakali yaina pyapae dupa lapa tokonya setapala soo ipupala kamapi dupanya setapa piami-pyaa. Dopa petala baanya yonge pee ketae pingi londe dokonya puna dosa iki watandenalena lao kyoto joo leami-pyaa. Baanya yonge peenya watandeamino endakali dupa pitakanya yaina dupa mee jeta piami-pyaa.
41007001	Akali Patasipi mana setapae masingi akali mendapuapi Jetusaleme katao epeamino dupame Jisasa kateamo dokonya kambu piami-pyaa.
41007002	Dopa petala baanya disaipele dupanya mendapuame kingi kaimala pipaeme mee nee neamino kandeami-pyaa. Dopa piamino dokome disaipele dupame kingi kaimbu pyala nayao mee nee nelyamino lao panea-pyaa.
41007003	Doko, Patasipi dee Juta endakali dupa pitakapimi nyakamanya yumbangenya mana dupa watao nee nalanya kingi kaimbu pyaokondape petala nee nengema-pyaa.
41007004	Dupame kamapisa pao ipupala kaimbu pyala naelyamino doko mee nee nala naengema-pyaa. Dee dupame yumbangenya mana longo mendapua nyiamino dupa watao minao kapo pengepi, endaki pengepi, disa kapaeme wasepaepi dupa kaimbu pingima-pyaa.
41007005	Patasi dupapi mana setapae masingi akali dupapimi Jisasa pisoo, “Embanya disaipele dupa kingi kaimbu pyala nayao mee nee nelyamino doko, mana wambatae naimanya yumbangeme seteamino dupa dupame aipuma watao minala naelyamipi?” leami-pyaa.
41007006	Dopa leaminopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Wamba potopesa Aisayame nyakama minakasingima akali dupa makande pyokondape pyoo dapa lea pyaa: ‘Endakali tata dakeme kambumi namba lalyingimaka doko, nyakamanya moname namba-pipa kopala naengema.
41007007	Dupame endakalinya mana setapae dupa mana lao pituu, “Dake Gotenya mana setapaena,” lengema. Dopa latala dupame namba mee ambe tama pingimana,’ lapae silyamo.
41007008	Nyakamame Gotenya mana setapae dupa nepatala endakalinya mana dupa watao minao kalyaminona,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
41007009	Dee baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame nyakama tangenya mana dupa watao minamana latala Gotenya mana setapae dupa waa katao angoelyamino.
41007010	Moseseme lao pituu, ‘Embanya endangi takangepa dolapo andanda semaiyoo katape.’ Dee, ‘Endakali mendeme baanya endangi tamopi takange tamopi mende kandao pii koo latamo doko baa kumina lao pyao kumasepengena,’ lea-pyaa.
41007011	-
41007012	Dopaka doko, endakali mendeme baanya endangi takangepi mende kandao, ‘Wamba nambame emba nisoo oapi dioliaka doko, indupa nambame Gote maitapuna,’ latamopa nyakamame baanya endangi takangepi mende nisala naena lao daa lengema.
41007013	Nyakamame nyakamanya mana wambatae dupa watao mana lapimino dokome Gotenya pii doko mee injisingima. Dee nyakamame mana opale longo minilyaminoakana,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
41007014	Dokopa Jisasame endakali kambu piamino dupa baa kateamo dokonya dee epena latala lamaiyoo, “Nyakama pitakame pii nambame lelyo dake sepala masokondape pyepape!
41007015	Opale kamanda silya mende endakali mende-kisa landa pilya dokome kapa pao baa minao koyasala naenge. Endakali mende-kisa opale koko palelya mende kamanda epelya dokome baa minao koyasingi.
41007016	[Nyakama kalekaita singi tamo kandao doko, pii doko salapapena!” Jisasame lea-pyaa.]
41007017	Jisasame endakali kambu doko yakinatala andaka kolandeamo dokopa baanya disaipele dupame pii kongali leamo dokonya baa tipa piami-pyaa.
41007018	Dopa piaminopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame apata masala naengemakape? Opale kamanda singi doko pitaka endakali mende-kisa landa pyatala endakali doko kapa pao koyasala naenge doko nyakamame masala naelyamipi?
41007019	Doko, mona koko landa pyala naenya, inginya landa pyatala ii anda dokonya pengena,” lea-pyaa. (Dopa leamo dokome nee tata dutupa pitaka auu pisoo lea-pyaa.)
41007020	Dopa latala dee baame lao pituu, “Opale endakali koko paliuu kamanda epenge dokome endakali doko koyasingi.
41007021	-
41007023	Endakali dupanya monanya paliuu masingi koo datupa kamanda epenge: endakalipi nyele-nyele paengepi, pake nengepi, endakali pyao kumasingipi, kepo kolengepi, oapi nyipu laka lao masingipi, koo pingipi, minakasingipi, luiyawaka paengepi, opale lengeme kandatala putiti kaengepi, lamba lengepi, alyasale joo kalyo lao masingipi, kyakaenge mana miningipi koo dutupa pitaka monanya paliuu kamanda ipupala endakali dupa koyasingina,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
41007024	Dopa latala baame yuu doko yakinatala yuu taono Taya dokonya yuu siamo dupanya pea-pyaa. Pupala baa anda mendenya kolandatala endakali mendeme baa nakandamili lao masia-pyaa. Dopa lao masiamoaka doko, baa kapa pao yalo pipenge nanjia-pyaa.
41007025	Dokopa enda mendeme Jisasa dokonya pelyamo leamino sepala yapa anda dokonya kolandatala baanya moko siamo dosa tombauli sia-pyaa. Enda dokonya wanenge doko-kisa enjele koo mende palenge-pyaa.
41007026	Enda doko Gitiki pii lenge Pinisia enda Sitia tange mende-pyaa. Enda dokome baanya wanenge-kisa enjele koo palenge doko Jisasame watao pyakamaina lea-pyaa.
41007027	Dopa leamopa Jisasame enda doko lamaiyoo, “Naimame wanenya nee dupa nyepala pyale lao yana dupa maitamanopa auu napitana wambao wane dupa nee nao tiaka kayatena kaya,” lea-pyaa.
41007028	Enda dokome yanu pyao baa lamaiyoo, “Akali Andake, embame kini leeno. Dopaka doko, wane dupame nee nao katai pyao nepelyamino dupa yana toko pundipundi kalyami dupame nyoo nengemakana,” lea-pyaa.
41007029	Dokopa Jisasame enda doko lamaiyoo, “Embame dopa lao pii leeno ongonya enjele koo dokome embanya wanenge doko yakinatala patelyamona emba andaka puu,” lea-pyaa.
41007030	Enda dokome andaka pupala baanya wanenge doko tokonya paliuu siamo kandea-pyaa. Enjele koo dokome wanaku doko yakinatala patea-pyaa.
41007031	Dee baa yuu taono Taya dokonya yuu siamo dupa yakinatala Saitonepa Dekapolisapa yuu dolaponya-kaita pao endaki Galili pete dokonya pilyia-pyaa.
41007032	Dokopa endakali mendapuame akali kembau mumaa mende baa kateamo dokonya laminao ipupala baame kingimi minina leami-pyaa.
