41007033	Dopa piaminopa Jisasame endakali kambu doko yakinatala akali doko iki laminao umbisale pupala baanya kingi kondenge dolapo akali dokonya kale kaita pyandakamaiya-pyaa. Dopa petala sopokali tasoo nepatala kekenya watandakamaiya-pyaa.
41007034	Dopa petala kaiti-kisa kandalyetae katao mona ŋee latala, “Epata,” lea-pyaa. Epata doko kapilyoo lumba lea-pyaa.
41007035	Dopa leamopa akali dokonya kalekaita dolapo lumbapa keke doko lee mendai tolata piamopa baame pii tolao lea-pyaa.
41007036	Dopa piamo doko endakali dupame endakali mendaipi mende lamaiya naena lao baame kyoto joo daa lea-pyaa. Dopa leamoaka doko, dupame lamaima-lamaima pyoo lamaiyoo tayami-pyaa.
41007037	Endakali dupame walu lao mona andapala lao pituu, “Baame dupa pitaka auu pyoo pilyamo. Kale kembau dupame pii sina latala dee mumaa dupame pii lena lelyamona,” leami-pyaa.
41008001	Gii dokopa endakali kambu andake mende deaka ipao kateaminopa dupanya nee natami nasia-pyaa. Dokopa Jisasame baanya disaipele dupa epena latala dapa lamaiya-pyaa:
41008002	“Endakali dakaita namba-pipa yuu gii tepoma katapumano doko, indupa dupa nee natami nasilyamo dokonya dupa kondome kumilyo.
41008003	Dupa nee nanao nambame mee nyakamanya andaka pena latopa yangi dupa tependa tangena lawambe latala kaitinisa lombapae setamina,” lea-pyaa.
41008004	Disaipele dupame baa lamaiyoo, “Endakali napalenge yuu dakenya naimame nee anjatae kapa pao nyepala endakali dakaita tiaka nao nena lao maitamape?” leami-pyaa.
41008005	Baame dokaita pisoo, “Nyakamanya betesa akipate silyape?” lea-pyaa. Dupame, “Kalange silyamona,” leami-pyaa.
41008006	Dopa leaminopa baame endakali kambu doko isa petena lea-pyaa. Dopa latala betesa kalange dutupa nyepala Gote lao yaka pilino latala konjia-pyaa. Konjepala baanya disaipele dupame mokosoo maina lao maiya-pyaa. Maiyamopa baanya disaipele dupame endakali kambu peteamino dupanya mokosoo maiyami-pyaa.
41008007	Dupanya wapaka yakane kuki mendatupa apata siaka-pyaa. Baame dutupa Gote lao yaka pilino latala dutupa apata mokosoo maina lea-pyaa.
41008008	Endakali dokaitame nao tiaka kayateaminopa konjepae kakana siamo dupa baseketa mandi kalangenya mandyuu tumbasiami-pyaa.
41008009	Endakali dupa taosene kitomende jowapi mende-pyaa. Dupa nee napeaminopa baame pena lea-pyaa.
41008010	Dopa latala baanya disaipele dupa-pipa sipi mendenya pyakalyetala yuu taono Dalamanutatena peami-pyaa.
41008011	Dokopa Patasi dupame ipupala Jisasa pii yanda pimaiyami-pyaa. Dupame baa minao makande pyoo baame kaitinya-tae kongali mende pina leami-pyaa.
41008012	Dopa leaminopa Jisasame etete mona ŋee latala, “Aipuma endakali indupa palelyamino dupame kongali mende pii lelyamipi? Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, endakali indupa palelyamino dupa kongali mende laitaka napitowana,” lea-pyaa.
41008013	Dopa latala baame dokaita yakinatala sipi dokonya dee pyakalyetala endaki pete dokonya yangitena pea-pyaa.
41008014	Dokopa disaipele dupame betesa namandyuu kame setala peami-pyaa. Sipi peteamino dokonya betesa mende nasiamopa mendai iki sia-pyaa.
41008015	Jisasame dokaita kyoto joo lamaiyoo, “Kandeleno! Patasi dupapi dee Etote mauwapinya iisa dupame nyakama koyasetamina wandyuu kalyepape!” lea-pyaa.
41008016	Dopa leamopa dupame betesa nasiamo tenge dokonya nyakamalapo leami-pyaa.
41008017	Dopa leamino doko Jisasame kandatala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame aipuma betesa nasilyamo lao mende lamai lamai pilyamipi? Nyakama mona napalengepe? Nyakamame masala naelyamipi? Nyakama mona pyakilyetae kalyape?
41008018	Nyakama lenge tenge dokome nakandelyamipi? Nyakama kale katenge dokome nasilyamipi? Nyakamame kame setelyamipi?
41008019	Nambame betesa yuungi nyepala akali taosene yuungimi nena lao konjakamaiyo ongonya konjepae kakana siamo dupa nyakamame baseketa mandi akipatenya mandyuu tumbasiamipi?” Jisasame lea-pyaa. Dupame baa lamaiyoo, “Kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapomanyana,” leami-pyaa.
41008020	Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nambame betesa kalange nyepala endakali taosene kitomendeme nena lao konjakamaiyo dokonya konjepae kakana siamo dupa nyakamame baseketa mandi akipatenya mandyuu tumbasiamipi?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa dokaitame, “Mandi kalangenyana,” leami-pyaa.
41008021	Dopa leaminopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakama masetala naelyamiakape?” lea-pyaa.
41008022	Dokopa dupa Betesaita yuu dokonya epeami-pyaa. Epeaminopa endakali dupame akali lenge monda mende baa kateamo ongonya laminao ipupala baame watandena leami-pyaa.
41008023	Jisasame akali lenge monda doko kii nyepala yuu taono yakane doko yakinatala kii minao mendasale pea-pyaa. Pupala baame akali dokonya lenge dolaponya sopokali tasinya pisetala, baanya kingi dolapome baa minia-pyaa. Dopa petala, “Embame opale mende kandelepe?” lao baa pisia-pyaa.
41008024	Dopa leamopa baa lenge talyetala, “Nambame endakali dupa kandelyo. Dupa ita mendapua kaita paele pipiminopa kandelyona,” lea-pyaa.
41008025	Dokopa Jisasame akali dokonya lenge dolapo deaka kingimi minia-pyaa. Dopa piamopa akali dokome kandokondape pyoo kandea-pyaa. Baanya lenge dee auu pyoo tapala baame dupa pitaka auu pyoo kandea-pyaa.
41008026	Dopa piamopa Jisasame akali doko andaka pena latala lao pituu, “Emba yuu taono yakane dokonya napupi,” lea-pyaa.
41008027	Jisasapi baanya disaipele dupapi Sisatia Pilipae yuu dokonya yuu taono yakane dupanya peami-pyaa. Pao pituu Jisasame baanya disaipele dupa pisoo, “Endakali dupame namba kandao apina lengemape?” lea-pyaa.
41008028	Dopa leamopa dupame yanu pyao, “Yangimi emba kandao Jone Kaimbu Pingi dokona lengema. Yangimi Ilainjana lengema. Yangimi potopesa dupanya mendena lengemana,” leami-pyaa.
41008029	Dopa leaminopa Jisasame dokaita pisoo, “Dopaka doko, nyakamame namba kandao apina lengemape?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa Pitame yanu pyao, “Emba Kataisa dokona,” lea-pyaa.
41008030	Dopa leamopa Jisasame dokaita kyoto joo lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame namba dokona lao endakali mendaipi mende lamaiya nayalapapena,” lea-pyaa.
41008031	Jisasame baanya disaipele dupa panao lamaiyoo, “Endakalinya Ikiningi dokome tanda longo lao napenge. Isingi akalipi, pitisa mupapi, mana setapae masingi akalipi dupame baa daa latala pyao kumasetami. Dopa petataminopa koto teponya baa dee sakatatana,” lea-pyaa.
41008032	Jisasame pii dutupa panao lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa Pitame baa laminao umbisale pupala pyalanya lea-pyaa.
41008033	Dopa leamoaka doko, baame kapilyetala baanya disaipele dupa kandatala Pita pyalanya lao, “Satane, emba nao puu! Embame Gotenya masingi doko masala naenya endakalinya masingi doko masilinona,” lea-pyaa.
41008034	Dopa latala baame endakali kambu dokopi baanya disaipele dupapi epena lea-pyaa. Epena latala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Endakali mendeme namba watao payatoo lao masetamo kandao doko, baame baa tange kame setala baanya ita poko doko nyoo soo namba watao paena.
41008035	Endakali mendeme baa tange isoo auu pyoo katapu laka lao masetamo kandao doko, baa alu pita. Dopaka doko, endakali mendeme nambapa Wai Pii Epe dokopa lao masetala baa tange kame setamo kandao doko, baa auu pyoo katata.
41008036	Doko, endakali mendeme yuunya oapi dupa pitaka nyoo setao katapala baa koyatamo kandao doko, oapi dupa pitakame aipa petala baa nisetape?
41008037	Dee aki mendeme baa tange kapa pao kii tamao nyepengepe?
41008038	Endakali kepo kolenge koo pingi palelyamino dupanya mendeme nambapi nambanya piipi dupanya elya kayatamo kandao doko, Endakalinya Ikiningi doko Takangenya tii pipae dokonya tambetambe enjele etete epe dupa-pipa tole ipatamo dokopa baame apata endakali doko kandao elya kayatana,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
41009001	Dopa latala baame dee dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, endakali ae kalyamino datupanya mendapua kumapala nayataminopa Goteme pupu lapae dokome panao isala ipatamo kandatamina,” lea-pyaa.
41009002	Koto tokange pateamopa Jisasame Pitapi, Jemesapi, Jonepi dutupa laminao yuu manda ketae mendenya pupala nyakama iki kateami-pyaa. Kateaminopa dutupanya enombasa Jisasa baa waka jia-pyaa.
41009003	Baanya yonge pee dupa etete kyoo lao lenge lipilipi pia-pyaa. Isa yuu angenya yonge pee akipi kaimbu pingi endakali mendeme baanya yonge pee kyoo leamo dopale joo kaimbu pyao kyoo lasala naengema.
41009004	Dokopa akali Ilainjapa Mosesepa ipupala Jisasa-pipa awapa pii lao kateaminopa dutupame kandeami-pyaa.
41009005	Kandatala Pitame Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Mana Lenge Akali, naima angenya katapumanopa auu pilyamona, naimame aiyaa anda tepoma pimana. Mende embanya, mende Mosesenya, mende Ilainjanyana,” lea-pyaa.
41009006	Doko, nyakama paka kayamino dokomena, Pitame pii leamo doko aipa lelyope lao masala nayao lea-pyaa.
41009007	Dopa leamopa kopa mendeme ipupala dokaita sanga pia-pyaa. Kopa dokonya-kaita pii mende lao epea dokome, “Doo kalyamo doko nambanya Ikiningi etete mona setenge dokona, nyakamame baanya pii doko sakamaiyepape!” lea-pyaa.
41009008	Dokopa dupame pupae kandayoko lao kandeaminopa endakali mendaipi mende nakandao Jisasa iki nyakama-pipa awapa kateamo kandeami-pyaa.
41009009	Dokaita yuu manda dokonya katao lanao ipao pituu Jisasame kyoto joo dutupa lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame kanjimino doko endakali mende lamaiya nayalapape. Dopaka doko, Endakalinya Ikiningi doko malunya sakatatamopa endakali dupa lamaipenge jetana,” lea-pyaa.
41009010	Baame pii leamo doko dupame watao minatala nyakamalapo mende pisa pisa pyoo, “Malunya dee sakatenge doko aki laape?” leami-pyaa.
41009011	Dopa petala dupame baa pisoo, “Mana setapae masingi akali dupame aipuma, ‘Ilainja wambao ipupengena,’ lengemape?” leami-pyaa.
41009012	Baame yanu pyao dokaita lamaiyoo, “Dupa pitaka dee katengeli pina lao tolasalanya Ilainja doko wambao ipupenge. Dopaka doko, pii pepa pyapae singi dokonya, ‘Endakalinya Ikiningi doko tanda longo lao natana, dee angi mende daana latala koo jinya nepatamina,’ lapae silyamo doko aipa lao silya kanjemape?
41009013	Dopaka doko, nambame nyakama langilyona, Ilainja doko ipatea. Ipateamopa endakali dupame baa kandao pii pepa pyapae silyamoli pyoo baa-kisa pyuani kayamino dupa pitaka piamina,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
41009014	Dutupa disaipele yangi dokaita kateamisa pilyiaminopa endakali kambu andake mendeme disaipele dokaita katao kakopeaminopa, mana setapae masingi akali mendapua-pipa pii yanda pyoo kateamino kandeami-pyaa.
41009015	Endakali kambu piamino dupa pitakame Jisasa epeamo kanju petala mona andao walu leami-pyaa. Dopa petala dupame alo pyao baa tengesa ipupala yaka epene lamo leami-pyaa.
41009016	Dokopa baame pii lao pituu, “Nyakama aipuma pii yanda pilyamipi?” lea-pyaa.
41009017	Endakali kambu kateamino dupanya mendeme yanu pyao, “Mana Lenge Akali, enjele koo mendeme nambanya wane doko mumaa injisingi dokonya baa emba katapisa laminao epo.
41009018	Enjele koo dokome baa minao lungu pilyamoli pyoo lombapae singi. Dopa pilyamopa wane doko nengekaita kambuapupuaka mandyuu, nenge kitakato lao, kingi mokopi tinokao tuii lenge. Nambame embanya disaipele dupame enjele koo watao pyakamaina laloaka doko, dupame kapa pao watao pyala nayalaminona,” lea-pyaa.
41009019	Dopa leamopa Jisasame lao pituu, “Kanau! Masoo minala naengema endakali nyakama! Oo koto koto ongo namba nyakama-pipaka tole katatama laape? Nyakamame nambaka nenge nyoo katatami laape? Nyakamame baa laminao namba kalyo asa ipupa,” lea-pyaa.
41009020	Dupame wane doko laminao baa kateasa epeami-pyaa. Dopa piaminopa enjele koo dokome Jisasa kanju katao wane doko minao walu lasiamopa nengekaita kambuapupuaka mandyuu alemale lao lombapae sia-pyaa.
41009021	Jisasame takange doko tipa pyoo, “Gii andukupa wane dake tee pyao dopa piape?” lea-pyaa. Baame yanu pyao, “Koosa tee pyao pia.
41009022	Paa longosa enjele koo dokome baa soo itatenya yangata endakinya soo pyandata pyoo kumasalanya pingina, embame opale mende kapa pao piti tamo kandao doko, naima kondo kayao nisepe,” lea-pyaa.
41009023	Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “‘Embame opale mende kapa pao piti tamo kandao doko,’ leeno doko masoo miningi endakali dokome dupa pitaka kapa pao pingina,” lea-pyaa.
41009024	Dopa leamopa wane dokonya takange dokome ae latala, “Nambame masoo minilyoaka doko, kuki masoo minilyo dokonya embame nisepe,” lea-pyaa.
41009025	Dopa leamopa endakali kambu dupame yapa ipao Jisasa baa katao kakopeamino kandatala baame enjele koo doko pyalanya lao, “Emba enjele koo mumaa kembau dokome wane dake yakinatala puu lelyona, emba baa-kisa dee naipupi,” lea-pyaa.
41009026	Dopa leamopa enjele koo dokome puu lao ae latala, wane doko minao etete walu lasetala baa yakinatala pea-pyaa. Peamopa wane doko kumapae joo sia-pyaa. Dopa piamosa endakali longome, “Baa kumatelyamona,” leami-pyaa.
41009027	Dopaka doko, Jisasame wane dokonya kinginya minatala minalyiamopa wane doko sakatao toya katea-pyaa.
41009028	Jisasa andaka kolandeamopa baanya disaipele dupa baa-pipa iki katao baa pisoo, “Aipuma naimame enjele koo doko kapa pao watao pyala nayalamape?” leami-pyaa.
41009029	Dopa leaminopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Enjele koo tata dopale doko loma singisa iki kapa pao yakinatala pengena,” lea-pyaa.
41009030	Jisasapi baanya disaipele dupapimi yuu doko yakinatala Galili yuu dokonya-kaita peami-pyaa. Pao pituu endakali mendeme nakandapya laka lao Jisasame masia-pyaa.
41009031	Doko, baame baanya disaipele dupa mana lamaiyoo pea-pyaa. Baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Akali mendeme Endakalinya Ikiningi doko enge nyepala endakali dupa laitaka pilyamona, dupame baa pyao kumasetami. Dopa pitaminoaka doko, koto teponya dee malunya sakatatana,” lea-pyaa.
41009032	Dopaka doko, pii leamo doko disaipele dupame masala nayapala baa pisalanya paka kayami-pyaa.
41009033	Dokaita Kapaneame yuu dokonya epeami-pyaa. Ipao andaka kolandatala baame dutupa pisoo, “Nyakamame kaitinisa aki mendenya laloo pyoo lao ipamipi?” lea-pyaa.
41009034	Dopa leamopa dupa ema napiami-pyaa. Doko, kaitinisa ipao pituu nyakamanya api alyasale joo kalyape lao laloo pyoo epeamino dokonya ema napiami-pyaa.
41009035	Dokopa baa isa pitipala baanya disaipele kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapoma dutupa epena latala lamaiyoo, “Enomba nyoo katapuli lao masetamo endakali dokome baa etete maita-kaita katapala endakali dupa pitakanya kalai akali joo katapengena,” lea-pyaa.
41009036	-
41009037	Dopa latala baame wane koo mende lanyepala dokaitanya kaina dokonya katasia-pyaa. Dopa petala baame wane doko kopinyetala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Endakali mendeme namba lao masetala wane koo dapale mende lanyilyamo dokome namba lanyingiaka. Namba lanyilyamo dokome namba lanyala naenge. Daa, namba puu leamo doko lanyingina,” lea-pyaa.
41009038	Joneme baa lamaiyoo, “Mana Lenge Akali, akali mendeme embanya kenge doko lao enjele koo dupa watao pyapumopa naimame kandatala baa naima watao napaenge dokonyana baanya kalai doko kaena lao daa lapumana,” lea-pyaa.
41009039	Dopaka doko, Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame baanya kalai doko kaena lao daa nalalapape! Doko, endakali mendeme nambanya kenge doko lao kalai pupu lapae mende pilyamo dokome kapa pao namba kandao yapa pii koo laa naenge.
41009040	Endakali mendeme naima yandapipi nanjoo kalyamo doko naima tata joo katenge.
41009041	Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, nyakama Kataisanya joo katataminosa endakali mendeme nyakama endaki penge mendenya nalapale lao ditamo endakali dokonya yole doko eteteaka kapa pao alu napita.
41009042	“Endakali mendeme namba lao masoo miningi wane koo datupanya mendeme koo pina lao mapisetamo doko, baa etete koyata. Baame dopa pitame lao kana etete andake mende mangenya anjetala solowata pete andake dokonya soo pyandamili kandao doko, baa kuki yaka jipyali.
41009043	Embanya kingi mendeme emba koo pyaale lao mapisia kandeno doko, kepanya nepape. Emba kingi tanoma kateta lete etete katenge dokonya pateno doko, auu pyoo katate. Emba kingi lapota kateta itate konjala naenge yuu koo ongonya pateno doko, auu pyoo nakatate.
41009044	[Yuu koo ongonya endakali dupa-kisa nene anda pilyamo dupa pyoo yapa etala naenge. Itate doko tao yapa konjala naengeaka.]
41009045	Dee embanya moko mendeme emba koo pyaale lao mapisia kandeno doko, kepanya nepape. Emba moko tanoma kateta lete etete katenge ongonya pateno doko, auu pyoo katate. Emba moko lapota kateta yuu koo dokonya soo pyandatamo doko, auu pyoo nakatate.
41009046	[Yuu koo ongonya endakali dupa-kisa nene anda pilyamo dupa pyoo yapa etala naenge. Itate doko tao yapa konjala naengeaka.]
41009047	Embanya lenge dokome emba koo pyaale lao mapisia kandeno doko, lukunya nepape. Emba lenge mendai iki tao Goteme isingi dokonya pateno doko, auu pyoo katate. Emba lenge lapota tapeta yuu koo dokonya soo pyandatamo doko, auu pyoo nakatate.
41009048	[Yuu koo ongonya endakali dupa-kisa nene anda pilyamo dupa pyoo yapa etala naenge. Itate doko tao yapa konjala naengeaka.]
41009049	“Aipi neenya katenge dokaita joo itate doko endakali dupa pitaka-kisa ipata.
41009050	Aipi doko epeaka doko, tende napitamopa nyakamame dee aipa petala tenda pisepengepa? Nyakama aipi katatae joo mona setaloo pyoo kalyepape,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
41010001	Jisasame Kapaneame yuu doko yakinatala Jutia yuu dokonyapi dee endaki Jotane yangitenapi pea-pyaa. Dokopa endakali kambu mendeme deaka ipao baa kateamo dokonya kambu piami-pyaa. Dopa piaminopa baame pingiliaka pyoo endakali dupa deaka mana lamaiya-pyaa.
41010002	Dopa piamopa Patasi mendapuame ipupala baa minao makande pyoo lao pituu, “Akali mendeme baanya enda doko pena lao watao pyatamopa naimanya mana setapae dupanya kapa patape napatape?” leami-pyaa.
41010003	Dopa leaminopa baame yanu pyao dokaita lamaiyoo, “Wamba Moseseme nyakamame aipa pyepape lea-pyaape?” lea-pyaa.
41010004	Dupame lao pituu, “Akali mendeme baanya enda doko watao pyao pituu watao pilyona lao pepa mende pyapala watao pyatamo doko Moseseme kapana lea-pyaana,” leami-pyaa.
41010005	Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame tuu-tuu piaminosa mana doko nyakamanya pepa pyanya setekea-pyaa.
41010006	Dopaka doko, Goteme tee pyao yuupi kaitipi wasiamo dokopa endapi akalipi lao wasia-pyaa.
41010007	Tenge dokonya akalimi baanya endangi takangepa yakinatala, baanya etanengepa kopatambi.
41010008	Dopa pitamopa dolapo yonge mendai joo pititambi. Dolapo lapoma joo napetenya, yonge mendai joo pititambi.
41010009	Dopana, Goteme nyoo pyasetae doko endakalimi wakale pyoloo napipengena,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
41010010	Dopa lateamopa baanya disaipele dupame pii leamo dokonya deaka andaka Jisasa pisiami-pyaa.
41010011	Dokopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Akali mendeme baanya etanenge doko watao pyapala enda waka mende lanyetamo dokome enda wambatae doko lyaa minata.
41010012	Dee enda mendeme baanya akalingi doko yakinatala akali waka patamo kandao doko, kepo kolawaka nyetana,” lea-pyaa.
41010013	Jisasa kateamo dokonya endakali mendapuame wane wanakupi koo dupa baame watandena lao laminao epeami-pyaa. Dopaka doko, disaipele dupame dokaita pyalanya leami-pyaa.
41010014	Dokopa Jisasame kandatala imbu kayapala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Wane wanakupi koo dupa epekena kaita lyokala nayakalapa! Doko, Goteme wane wanakupi dapale joo kalyamino endakali dupa isoo kalyamo.
41010015	Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, wane wanakupi koo dupame nyakama Goteme isina lao katengemali pyoo endakali mende nakatatamo kandao doko, baa kapa pao Goteme isina lao nakatatana,” lea-pyaa.
41010016	Dopa latala baame wane wanakupi koo dupa kopinyetala kingimi auu pisia-pyaa.
41010017	Dopa petala baa paanya kaitini nyiamopa akali mendeme alo pyao ipao baa kandao luma lakapala baa pisoo, “Mana Lenge Akali Epe, namba lete etete katatopa lao aipa pyuape?” lea-pyaa.
41010018	Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Aipuma embame namba kandao epena leepe? Endakali mendaipi mende epe daa. Gote baa iki epe.
41010019	Mana setapae dupanya, ‘Embame endakali pyao kumasala nayape. Embame kepo kolala nayape. Embame pake nala nayape. Embame endakali mende minakasalanya sambo laa nayape. Embame endakali mendenya opale mende sambo lao pyalya lao nyakamaiya nayape. Embanya endangi takangepa dolapo andanda semaiyoo katapena,’ lapae silyamo dutupa embame masilinona,” lea-pyaa.
41010020	Akali dokome baa lamaiyoo, “Mana Lenge Akali, wamba namba wane kolesa pituu mana setapae dutupa pitaka watao minio doko minawaka kalyona,” lea-pyaa.
41010021	Dopa leamopa Jisasame akali doko kandokondape petala auu kaya-pyaa. Dopa petala baa lamaiyoo, “Emba mendai iki mende daa jilyamona, emba pupala embanya oapi dupame muni nyepala endakali tipya dupa maipi. Dopa pitinopa embanya epe dupa kaitinya sakatana, embame namba watao ipupi,” lea-pyaa.
41010022	Dopa leamopa baanya oapi etete longo singi dokonyana, mona etete kenda kayapala lengelyaapi kumao kayapala pea-pyaa.
41010023	Dopa piamopa Jisasame kandayoko lao baanya disaipele dupa kandatala lamaiyoo, “Kamongo dupa Goteme isina lao kalyanya etete lekeleke tatamina,” lea-pyaa.
41010024	Dopa leamo doko baanya disaipele dupame sepala mona andeami-pyaa. Dokopa Jisasame deaka dokaita lamaiyoo, “Wane paluma, endakali dupa Goteme isina lao kalyanya eteteaka lekeleke tengema.
41010025	Mena kamele mendeme kepo tii mendenya kolandalanya lekeleke tapyaliaka doko, kamongo mendeme Goteme isina lao kalyanya etete lekeleke tapyalina,” lea-pyaa.
41010026	Dokopa disaipele dupame pii dutupa soo etete walu latala, nyakamalapo mende lamai lamai pyoo, “Dopa tamo kandao doko, api kapa pao pyoo nyepae katatape?” leami-pyaa.
41010027	Dopa leaminopa Jisasame dokaita kandatae soo yanu pyao, “Endakalimi kapa daaka doko Gote kapa. Goteme dupa pitaka kapa pao pingina,” lea-pyaa.
41010028	Pitame baa lamaiyoo, “Kandeleno, naimame dupa pitaka yakinatala emba watao payatelyamanona,” lea-pyaa.
41010029	-
41010030	Jisasame lao pituu, “Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, nambapa dee Wai Pii Epe dokopa lao masetala endakali dupame nyakamanya anda tamopi, kaiminingi tamopi, pimalenge tamopi, endangi tamopi, takange tamopi, wane tamopi, ee tamopi dupa yakineamino dupame indupa gii dakepa andapi, kaiminingipi, pimalengepi, endangipi, wanepi, eepi dupa andate mende lao nyoo kalyamino. Dee endakali mendapuame dupa watao pilyaminoaka. Dopa petala yuu enenge setamo dokonya lete etete katatami.
41010031	Dopaka doko, endakali enomba nyoo katenge longo dupa maita-kaita katatami. Maita-kaita katenge longo dupa enomba nyoo katatamina,” Jisasame dopa lea-pyaa.
41010032	Yuu mende Jisasapi baanya disaipele dupapi Jetusaleme pao pituu Jisasa baa wambea-pyaa. Dokopa disaipele dupame mona andeaminopa, dee endakali waka baa watao peamino dupa paka kayamiaka-pyaa. Dopa piaminopa baame akali kingi ita-kisa dee lapoma dutupa dee lanyepala baa-kisa pitamo dupa dokaita lamaiya-pyaa.
41010033	“Kandeleno! Naima indupa Jetusaleme pelyamano. Akali mendeme Endakalinya Ikiningi doko enge nyepala pitisa mupapi mana setapae masingi akalipi dupa laitaka pyaapomo. Dokopa dupame baa kosa lao pyao kumasemana latala endakali tata waka dupanya kingilyaka maitami.
41010034	Dopa pitaminopa dupame baa kandao lamba lao sopakalimi pyao konjame pyao petala angi pyao kumasetami. Dopa petataminopa koto tepo patatamopa dee sakatatana,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
41010035	Akali Sepete ikiningi Jemesapa Jonepame ipupala Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Mana Lenge Akali, nalimbame emba-kisa mendita mende tee lambana embame latambanoliaka pyoo pipi laka lao masilyambanona,” leambi-pyaa.
41010036	Baame dolapo lamaiyoo, “Nambame nyilyambo aipa pipi laka lao masilyambipi?” lea-pyaa.
41010037	Dokopa dolapome baa lamaiyoo, “Emba embanya tii pipae dokonya ipatenopa nalimbanya mende embanya kingi tolae-kaita kalyepa mende koya-kaita kalyepa lapena,” leambi-pyaa.
41010038	Dopa leambinopa Jisasame dolapo lamaiyoo, “Nyilyambome lelyambino doko masokondape napilyambino. Nambame kapo penge nelyo dokonya nyilyambome kapa pao natambipi? Nambame kaimbu nyilyo dokonya nyilyambome kapa pao nyetambipi?” lea-pyaa.
41010039	Dolapome baa lamaiyoo, “Nalimba kapana,” leambi-pyaa. Jisasame dolapo lamaiyoo, “Kini, nambame kapo penge nelyo dokonya nyilyambome natambiaka.
41010040	Nambame kaimbu nyilyo dokonya nyilyambome nyetambiaka. Dopaka doko, nambanya kingi tolae-kaita katena lengepi koya-kaita katena lengepi doko nambanya kalai daa. Goteme katatamina lao yapao nyiamo endakali dupa katatamina,” lea-pyaa.
41010041	Dopa pilyambino lapae doko disaipele kingi ita dutupame sepala Jemesa Jonepa dolapo imbu kayami-pyaa.
41010042	Dopa piaminopa Jisasame dokaita epena latala lamaiyoo, “Endakali tata dupanya yuu isingi akali kenge singi kalyamino dupame nyakamanya endakali dupanya alyasale joo katengema doko nyakamame masilyamino. Dee dupanya akali andake dupame nyakamanya pii watao minakena lao kyoto jingima doko nyakamame masilyaminoaka.
41010043	Dopaka doko, nyakamame dopa napinya nyakamanya mende akali andake joo katapuli lao masetamo kandao doko, nyakamanya kalai akali joo katapenge.
41010044	Dee nyakamanya mende enomba nyoo katapuli lao masetamo dokome endakali pitakanya kendemane joo katapenge.
41010045	Doko, Endakalinya Ikiningi dokome baanya kalai pyekena lao naepenya, baame endakali dupa nisalanya epea. Baame endakali dupa kii tamao nyalanya baa tangeme kumala epeana,” lea-pyaa.
41010046	Dokopa dokaita yuu taono Jeteko dokonya epeami-pyaa. Jisasapi baanya disaipele dupapi, dee endakali kambu andake mendepimi Jeteko yuu doko yakinatala peaminopa, Timiasa ikiningi Batimiasa lenge akali lenge monda muni akipi tee lao petenge doko kaitinisa petea-pyaa.
41010047	Baame Nasatete tange Jisasa doko ipao kalyamo lapae sepala baame puu lao ae lao, “Dapiti Yumbange Jisasa, embame namba kondo kaya,” lea-pyaa.
41010048	Dopa leamopa endakali longo dupame baa pii kaena lao pyalanya leami-pyaa. Dopaka doko, baame etete puu lao ae lao, “Dapiti Yumbange, embame namba kondo kaya,” lea-pyaa.
41010049	Dopa leamopa Jisasa baa ipao katapala, “Baa epena laapa,” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa endakali dupame akali lenge monda doko epena latala lamaiyoo, “Baame emba ipu lelyamona mona yaepatala sakata!” leami-pyaa.
41010050	Dokopa baanya yonge pee ketae pingi doko lyokanya pyale latala pupae sakatao Jisasa kateamo dokonya pea-pyaa.
41010051	Dokopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Nambame embanya aipa pyakapili lao masilipi?” lea-pyaa. Akali lenge monda dokome baa lamaiyoo, “Mana Lenge Akali, namba lenge dee tapuli lao masilyona,” lea-pyaa.
41010052	Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Embame masoo minapino dokome embanya lenge dee auu pisilyamona, puu!” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamo dokopaka akali dokonya lenge auu pyoo talu pia-pyaa. Dopa peteamopa baame Jisasa peamo ongonya watao pea-pyaa.
41011001	Dupa Jetusaleme tengesale pao pituu, Olipimanda yuu dokonya taono Betepasipa Betanipa singi dolaponya peami-pyaa. Dopa petala Jisasame baanya disaipele dupanya lapoma wambao pena lea-pyaa.
41011002	Pena latala baame dolapo lamaiyoo, “Yuu taono yakane nyilyambonya enomba-kaita omo silyamo ongonya pupala mena dongi yakane wamba endakali mende napetea mende anjetae katatamopa pupae kanjambinona, doko liangao minao ipupape.
41011003	Endakali mendeme nyilyambo langyoo, ‘Aipuma dopa pilyambipi?’ lea kandeno doko, ‘Kamongo dokome kalai mende dongi dakeme pipenge jilyamona, petala dee yapa pealapomona,’ laapape,” lea-pyaa.
41011004	Dolapome pupala dongi yakane doko kaitini lemba dokonya anda kambu mendenya anjetae kateamo kandatala liangeambi-pyaa.
41011005	Dosa akali kateami mendapuame dolapo pisoo, “Mena dongi yakane doko aipa pyaanya liangekelyambipi?” leami-pyaa.
41011006	Dolapome Jisasame leamoli pyoo dokaita lamaiyambi-pyaa. Dokopa dokaitame yakana latala nyoo pena kayami-pyaa.
41011007	Akali dolapome mena dongi doko Jisasa kateamo dokonya minao ipupala nyalambonya yonge pee ketae pingi dupa dongi maita dokonya lyokanya setapeambinopa Jisasa baa dokonya ketae petea-pyaa.
41011008	Endakali longo dupame nyakamanya yonge pee ketae pingi dupa kaitini dokonya kuiyoo seteami-pyaa. Yangi dupame itai dupanya yoko dupa yandao kaitini dokonya kuiyoo seteami-pyaa.
41011009	Dee endakali dupa wambata maita pyata pyoo pao pituu puu lao dapa lao wee leami-pyaa. “Embame pyoo nyoo katape! Akali epelyamo dake auu pisetaena, Kamongo Goteme epena lapumopa epelyamo!
41011010	Wamba Dapitimi naimanya yumbange dupa isoo kateamoli pyoo, indupa Kataisame naima isoo kalyanya epelyamo doko Goteme auu pisetae! Etete Ketae Kaitinya Katenge, embame pyoo nyoo katapena,” leami-pyaa.
41011011	Dopa leaminopa Jisasame pao Jetusaleme ongonya pyakamatala losuu anda andake kame dokonya kolandatala dokonya siamo dupa pitaka kandayoko lao kateamopa niki lenge landa pyalanya pia-pyaa. Dokopa baanya akali kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapoma dutupa-pipa Betani yuu dokonya peami-pyaa.
41011012	Taita dopa pyoo Betani yuu ongonya katao epeaminopa Jisasa baa lopo kaya-pyaa.
41011013	Dopa petala piki ita mende yoko pyoo tependale kateamo kandatala dii lilyape lao kanja pea-pyaa. Pao kandeamopa dii nalyoo yoko iki pyoo katea-pyaa. Doko, gii dokopa piki dii nalyingi.
41011014	Jisasame piki ita doko lamaiyoo, “Tenda tendapi endakali mendaipi mendeme embanya dii doko dee nala nayapengena,” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamo doko baanya disaipele dupame siami-pyaa.
41011015	Dokaita Jetusaleme pupala Jisasa baa losuu anda andake kame dokonya pea-pyaa. Dopa petala baame topo setao peteamino endakali dupapi sambao kateamino endakali dupapi dupa watao pyapala, muni aloo pingi akali dupanya tepolo tokopi yaka maeleome topo nyingi akali dupanya petenge tokopi dupa lokalyinya nepea-pyaa.
41011016	Baame losuu anda andake kame dokonya endakali mendeme pinju akipi soo napena lao daa lea-pyaa.
41011017	Dopa latala baame dokaita mana lamaiyoo, “Pii pepa pyapae singi dokonya, ‘Nambanya anda doko endakali tata dupa pitakanya loma singi anda latamina,’ lapae nasilyape? Dopaka doko, nyakamame anda dake pake nao makongao paenge endakali dupa yalo pingi kananda injisetelyaminona,” lea-pyaa.
41011018	Dopa leamo doko pitisa mupapi mana setapae masingi akali dupapimi sepala, “Jisasa aipa pyoo pyao kumasemape,” leami-pyaa. Endakali kambu kateamino dupa pitakame baame mana leamo doko sepala mona andeaminosa baa paka kayami-pyaa.
41011019	Yuu alemanjiamopa Jisasapi baanya disaipele dupapimi yuu taono doko yakinatala peami-pyaa.
41011020	Taita dopa pyoo yongama wamba kaita dokonya pao pituu kandeaminopa piki ita doko tengenya pituu sapuoo pao mangenya tuu latae katea-pyaa.
41011021	Pitame doko kandao masetala Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Mana Lenge Akali, kuaka embame piki ita doko-kisa pii kenda pipae lanya setapino doko sapupya lamo kanda,” lea-pyaa.
41011022	Dopa leamopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame Gote lao masoo minalapape.
41011023	Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, endakali mendeme yuu manda dake kandao, sakatatala solowata pete andake ongonya mangala pena latala, mona lapo palyala naenya, kini dopa pyaapomona lao masoo minao katatamo kandao doko, kini angi jakamaita.
41011024	Tenge dokonya minao nambame nyakama langilyona, nyakamame opale nyemana lao loma soo tee latamino dupa pitaka nyetamana lao masoo minao kalyepape. Dopa pitaminopa kini angi jakata.
41011025	Nyakamame toya katao loma soo pituu, nyakamanya Takange kaitinya katenge dokome nyakamanya koo dupa kunanya nepekena lao endakali mendeme nyakama-kisa koo pitamo dokonya yanu dupa kayalapape.
41011026	[Nyakamame endakali mendenya koo pingi yanu dupa kayala nayatamino kandao doko, nyakamanya Takange kaitinya katenge dokome nyakamanya koo dupa kunanya nepakala nayatakana,”] Jisasame lea-pyaa.
41011027	-
41011028	Dokaita Jetusaleme dokonya deaka ipupala Jisasa baa losuu anda andake kame dokonya paya-pyaa. Dopa piamopa pitisa mupapi, mana setapae masingi akalipi, isingi akalipi dupame baa kateasa ipupala lao pituu, “Embame apinya pii minao kalai datupa pilipi? Apimi kalai datupa emba-kisa seteape?” leami-pyaa.
41011029	Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nambame nyakama pii mende pisilyoakana, nyakamame yanu pyakatamino kandao doko, nambame kalai datupa dokonya pii minao pilyona lao nyakama langitoaka.
41011030	Joneme kaimbu pyakamaiyamo doko apimi pina leape? Goteme pina leape, pande endakalimi pina leamipi? Namba yanu pyao langyepana,” lea-pyaa.
41011031	Dopa leamopa dokaitame pii doko sepala nyakamalapo lao pituu, “Naimame, ‘Goteme pina leana,’ latamano kandao doko, ‘Aipuma nyakamame Jonenya pii doko masoo minala nayamipi?’ lata.
41011032	Dopaka doko, ‘Endakalimi pina leamina,’ lamape?” leami-pyaa. Doko, endakali dupa pitakame Jone doko potopesa kiningina lao masoo kateaminosa dokaitame endakali kambu dupa paka kayami-pyaa.
41011033	Dopa petala dupame Jisasanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Naimame masala naelyamanona,” leami-pyaa. Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Doko tamo doko, nambame kalai pilyo datupa dokonya pii minao pilyo lao nyakama langya nayatoakana,” lea-pyaa.
41012001	Jisasame kongali lao pii mende dokaita dapa lamaiya-pyaa: “Akali mendeme getepe ee mende kakopatala pokea-pyaa. Dopa petala baame getepe dii lyao indyalanya yuli mende lakea-pyaa. Dee isoo pititamo anda ketae mende piaka-pyaa. Dopa petala baame akali mendapuame ee doko isakao katena latala, baa yuu londati mendakaita pao katea-pyaa.
41012002	Dopa petala getepe wambu pingi gii doko ipateamopa, baame baanya kendemane mendeme ee isakamaingi akali dupa kateamisa pupala getepe dii mendapua lyao peekena lao nyakala pena lea-pyaa.
41012003	Peamopa dupame baa minatala pyao indyepala mee pilyina leami-pyaa.
41012004	Dopa peteaminopa akali ee tange dokome dee kendemane mende pena lea-pyaa. Dopa piamopa ee isakamaingi akali dupame kendemane doko aiyomba pyao lombapala baa-kisa mana koo elya pipae mendapua miniami-pyaa.
41012005	Dokopa baame dee kendemane mende pena lea-pyaa. Doko dupame kumi pyao kumasiami-pyaa. Dee baame kendemane longo pena lateamopa yangi dupa dokaitame pyao indyepala yangi kumi pyao kumasiami-pyaa.
41012006	Dopa peteaminopa akali dokonya ikiningi mendai baanya mona setenge doko iki katea-pyaa. Dopa piamopa akali dokome, “Nambanya ikiningi doko andanda semaitamina,” lao masetala, dokome ete pyoo dupa kateamisa pena lea-pyaa.
41012007	Pena leamoaka doko, ee isakamaingi akali dupame nyakamalapo lao pituu, ‘Wane dakeme takangenya moya nyepengena, yapa pyao kumasema! Pyao kumasetala baanya ee moya nyepenge dake naima nyetamana,’ leami-pyaa.
41012008	Dopa latala dupame baa minatala pyao kumasiami-pyaa. Pyao kumasetala soo kamalyatena pyale leami-pyaa.
41012009	“Dopana, akali getepe ee tange dokome aipa pitape? Baame ipupala ee isakamaingi dokaita pyao kumasetala, getepe ee doko akali waka mendapuame isoo katekena lata.
41012010	Dopana, nyakamame pii pepa pyapae singi dake itaki pyala nayamipi? ‘Anda pingi akali dupame anda pingina daa latala nepeamino doko pingina mupa jetea.
41012011	Kamongome dopa pipumu doko naimame kandamanopa auu etete pilyamona,’ lapae silyamona,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
41012012	Dopa lamaiyamopa dokaitame, “Pii kongali doko naima kandao lalumuna,” lao masetala, baa anjemana lao kaita kutiaminoaka doko, endakali kambu kateamino dupa paka kayapala baa yakinatala peami-pyaa.
41012013	Jisasame pii mende latamo dokonya baa mangenya minamanalena latala akali Patasi mendapuapi Kiŋi Etote tata mendapuapi baa kateamo dokonya pena leami-pyaa.
41012014	Akali dupame ipupala baa lamaiyoo, “Mana Lenge Akali, emba pii kiningi lenge akalina, embame endakali dupa paka nakayapala itange kandao mokosala naenge. Daa, embame kiningi pii lao Goteme endakali dupame pipimili lao masingili pyoo mana lamailino lao masilyamano. Dopana, naimanya mana setapae dupanya aipa lapae silyape? Kapomane Isingi Mupa dokonya takisa dupa naimame pyakamaipengepe, pande kayapengepe?” leami-pyaa.
41012015	Dopa lao baa minakasalanya piamino kandatala baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Aipuma nyakamame namba minao makande pilyamipi? Muni konde mende kandatoo nyoo peyalapa,” lea-pyaa.
41012016	Dopa leamopa dokaitame muni konde mende maitiaminopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Muni dakenya endakali lengelyaapi wasetae kalyamopi kenge pyatae kalyamopi doko apinyape?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa dokaitame baa lamaiyoo, “Kapomane Isingi Mupa dokonya kalyamona,” leami-pyaa.
41012017	Dopa leaminopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Opale Kapomane Isingi Mupa dokonya dupa tange maiyakamaiyepape. Dee opale Gotenya dupa Gote tangeaka maiyakamaiyepape,” lea-pyaa. Jisasame dopa leamopa dokaitame baa kandao mona andeami-pyaa.
41012018	-
41012019	Dokopa akali Satyusi mendapuame Jisasa kateamo dokonya epeami-pyaa. Akali dupame endakali kumapala dee sakatala naengena lengema-pyaa. Akali dupame ipupala Jisasa pisoo, “Mana Lenge Akali, wamba Moseseme naimanya mana mende dapa lao pepa pyanya setekea-pyaa: ‘Akali mende wane manja nayao mee kumatamo kandao doko, baanya kaiminingi dokome enda walyakae doko pisetala wane manditamo dupa kaiminingi kumapae dokonya manjakamaitana,’ lapae silyamo.
41012020	Gii mendepa akali mendenya ikiningi kalange kateami-pyaa. Dutupanya mupa dokome enda nyepala wane manja nayao mee kumia-pyaa.
41012021	Dopa piamopa kaiminingi laponge dokome enda doko pisia-pyaa. Dopa petala baame wane mende manja nayao mee kumia-pyaa. Kaiminingi teponge dokome mendai dopaka pia-pyaa.
41012022	Dopaka pyoo kaiminingi kalange dutupa pitakame enda dokoaka nyepala wane mende manja nayawaka mee kumiami-pyaa. Dokaita kumao ete dokonya enda doko kumia-pyaa.
41012023	Dopana, endakali kumapae sakatapenge gii dokonya sakatatamino dokopa enda doko akali apinya etanenge joo pititape? Doko, akali kaiminingi kalange dutupa pitakame enda mendai dokoaka nyiami-pyaana,” akali Satyusi dupame dopa leami-pyaa.
41012024	Dopa leaminopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame pii pepa pyapae singi doko masala nayao Gotenya pupu lapae doko masala nayawaka pingima tenge dokonya nyakamame etete kopeta lelyamino.
41012025	Endakali kumapae dupa dee sakatatamino gii dokopa akali enda nyala nayao enda akali napao kaitinya enjele dupa katengemali pyoo katatami.
41012026	Nyakamame ikililyambu maunya ita teana lao Moseseme pii pepa piamo doko itaki pyala nayamipi? Endakali kumapae sakatatami dokonya Goteme Mosese lamaiyoo dapa lea-pyaa: ‘Namba Apotakamepi, Aisakepi, Jekopepi dupanya Gote dokona,’ lea-pyaa.
41012027	Nyakamame etete kopeta lelyamino. Gote baa endakali lete katenge dupanya Gotena, kumapae dupanya daana,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
41012028	Mana setapae masingi akali dupanya mende dosa kateamo dokome Satyusi dupame Jisasa pii yanda pimaiyamino doko sepa dee Jisasame dokaitanya pii auu pyoo yanu piamo doko kandata pia-pyaa. Dopa petala baame Jisasa pisoo, “Mana setapae dupa pitakanya anduku mupa joo silyape?” lea-pyaa.
41012029	Jisasame yanu pyao pituu, “Mana setapae mupa doko dake: ‘Nyakama Isataele endakali dupame salapape! Naimanya Kamongo Gote baa Kamongo mendai iki doko kalyamo.
41012030	Embame embanya Kamongo Gote auu kayao katao embanya monapi, imambupi, masingipi, pupu lapaepi dutupa pitaka baa maitae katape.’
41012031	Mana setapae laponge doko dake: ‘Embame emba tange auu kaengeli pyoo embanya endakali yango doko auu kayao katape.’ Dolapo ita minao mana setapae dupanya waka mende alyasale joo nasilyamona,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
41012032	Dopa leamopa mana setapae masingi akali dokome baa lamaiyoo, “Mana Lenge Akali, yaka leeno. Baa mendai iki kalyamona, waka mende nakalyamona, kiningi leeno.
41012033	Kamongo Gote auu kayao katao monapi, masingipi, pupu lapaepi dutupa baa maitae katenge dokopa dee tange auu kaengeli pyoo endakali yango doko auu kaenge dokopa dolapo etete alyasale. Dolapome opale mende Gote lao kundi maiyoo tao molyina lao pyao yangenge dokopa opale mende mee kundi maingi dokopa dolapo etete ita miningina,” lea-pyaa.
41012034	Akali dokome masokondape petala yanu piamo kandatala Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Emba Goteme isina lao kalyanya petelenona,” lea-pyaa. Dopa lateamo dokopa endakali dupa pitakame baa pii mende dee pisalanya paka kayami-pyaa.
41012035	Jisasame losuu anda andake kame dokonya mana lamaiyoo katao endakali dupa pisoo, “Mana setapae masingi akali dupame Kataisa doko kandao aipa petala Dapiti Yumbangena lelyamipi?
41012036	Oli Sipitisame lungu piamopa Dapiti tangeme dapa lea ‘Kamongo Gote dokome nambanya Kamongo doko lamaiyoo, “Emba nambanya kingi tolae-kaita katape. Katatenopa nambame embanya yandapipili dupa embanya moko pundipundi ongonya katena lato,” leana,’ lea-pyaa.
41012037	Dapiti tangeme baa kandao, ‘Kamongona,’ lea-pyaana, aipa petala baa Dapiti yumbange jilyape?” Jisasame lea-pyaa. Endakali kambu andake mende kateamino dupame Jisasanya pii leamo doko auu kayao siami-pyaa.
41012038	Jisasame dokaita mana lamaiyoo dapa lea-pyaa. “Nyakama aopyoo latala mana setapae masingi akali dopale jetamane lao kandao wandyuu kalyepape. Dupame yonge pee londe dupa auu kayao pyoo payao kamapi dupanya nyakama lasa lapimi laka lao masingima.
41012039	Dupame losuu anda dupanya enomba nyoo pilyanya etete auu kaengema. Nee andake nelyami dupanya petenge toko enomba nyoo dupanya pilyanya auu kaengema.
41012040	Dupame enda walyakae dupanya anda yuupi dupa minamao nyepakamaitala, endakali dupame nyakama epepe lao masina latala loma londe pyoo singima. Goteme dupa-kisa kenda pipae etete andake mende setatana,” lea-pyaa.
41012041	Dopa latala Jisasa baa losuu anda andake dokonya muni pyasingi penge singi dokonya yangitena-kaita pao pitipala, endakali kambu dokome aipa pyoo muni pyasingi penge ongonya pyasilyamipi lao kandatae petea-pyaa. Endakali kamongo longo dupame muni longo lao pyasiami-pyaa.
41012042	Dopa piaminopa enda walyakae tipya mendeme ipupala muni etete yakane lapoma pyasia-pyaa. Dolapo pyasetala muni toya mendai iki joo.
41012043	Dokopa Jisasame baanya disaipele dupa epena latala lamaiyoo, “Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, enda walyakae tipya dokome muni pyasingi penge dokonya muni longo lao pyasoo endakali waka muni pyasalamino doko pitaka ita minao pyasalamo.
41012044	Endakali dokaita pitakame nyakamanya muni sipumu dupanya kakana nyoo pyasalamino. Dopaka doko, enda dokome baa daa jipumopa baa-kisa sipumu doko pitaka pyasalamo. Baa tange nao pitipenge doko pitaka pyasalamona,” Jisasame dopa lea-pyaa.
41013001	Jisasame losuu anda andake kame doko yakinatala peamopa baanya disaipele dupanya mendeme baa lamaiyoo, “Mana Lenge Akali, kana yale domopapi anda yale petae kalyamo domopapi kanda!” lea-pyaa.
41013002	Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Anda yale dupa embame kandelepe? Ae kaname petae kalyamo datupanya mendaipi mende kalyamoli petae katena lao kayala nayao, pitaka kalunya nepatamina,” lea-pyaa.
41013003	Jisasa baa Olipimanda yuu dokonya losuu anda andake doko katenge dokaita-kaita kandatae petea-pyaa. Dopa piamopa Pitapi, Jemesapi, Jonepi, Endutupi dutupame elyakao baa dapa lao pisiami-pyaa:
41013004	Embame laleno dutupa andukupa pitana lao lalepe? Kongali aki mende pitamopa naimame kandatala dutupa pitaka angi jalanya tengesa petelyamona lao masetama laape? Embame naima langi,” leami-pyaa.
41013005	Dopa leaminopa Jisasame yanu pyao dokaita lamaiyoo, “Endakali mendeme nyakama minao kyakasetana kandao kalyepape.
41013006	Endakali longome namba epele lao ipupala, ‘Namba akali dokona,’ lao endakali longo minao kyakasetami.
41013007	Yanda andake dupa pitaminopa kiikau latapi, yanda andake dupa pilyamino lapaepi dupa nyakamame setami. Sepala nyakama paka nakayalapape. Dopale dupa ipupengeaka doko, yuu etenge gii doko dokopa ipatala nayata.
41013008	Akali tata mendeme tata mende yanda pimaita, kiŋi mendenya isingi tata mendeme kiŋi mendenya isingi tata mende yanda pimaita pitami. Dee yuu wakale wakale dupanya titiwali dupa minata lopo andake dupa sepa pita. Dutupa pitamo doko enda wane maita pyalanya tee pingi dopale joo pita.
41013009	Dopaka doko, nyakamame nyakama tange kandao kalyepape. Endakali dupame nyakama anjoo soo kanjole dupa-kisa kosimi laa patami. Dee nyakama losuu anda dupanya pyatamiaka. Nyakamame namba watao payataminosa endakali dupame nyakama kapomane isingi akali andakepi kiŋipi dupanya enombasa laminao pupala katasetaminopa nyakamame dupa nambanya lao pii lamaitami.
41013010	Wambao Wai Pii Epe doko endakali tata dupa pitaka lamaipenge.
41013011	Endakali dupame nyakama anjetala laminao kosa anda ongonya pataminopa nyakamame aipa lamanape lao wambao nea nakayalapape. Kosa lapenge gii ongopa Goteme nyakama pii ditali pyoo laapape. Nyakamame latamino doko nyakama tangeme laa nayatamina, Oli Sipitisame lata.
41013012	Akali mendapuame nyakamanya kaiminingi etete dupa enge nyepala pyao kumasina lao maitami. Akali mendapuame nyakamanya wane dupa dopaka pitami. Wane mendapuame kandapilyetala nyakamanya endangi takangepi dupa pyao kumasina lao maitamiaka.
41013013	Nyakamame namba watao payataminosa endakali dupa pitakame nyakama kandao etete imbu kaengitami. Dopaka doko, endakali mendeme kyoto joaka katao baa etatamo doko pyoo nyepae katata.
41013014	“Koyasingi aii pyapae doko baa nakatapenge panda dokonya katatamo nyakamame kandatami. (Pii dake itaki pyatamo endakali dokome tenge doko masepenge.) Kandatala dokopa Jutia yuu dokonya katatamino endakali dupa yuu manda dupanya paka pyakao pupenge jeta.
41013015	Endakali mende baanya anda patakisa katatamo dokome baanya oapi andakote setamo dupa kolandao nyalanya napupenge jeta.
41013016	Dee endakali mende eesa katatamo dokome baanya yonge pee ketae pingi doko nyalanya pilyala nayapenge jeta.
41013017	Enda wane tongatapi enda wane andu nengepi dupa gii dokopa etete kondo pita!
41013018	Kenda pipae dutupa koo kana palitamo dokopa naepena lao loma soo kalyepape.
41013019	Gii dokopa kenda pipae ipatamo dokome yuupi kaitipi tee piamo dokopa pituu indupa tuu lao kenda pipae epea dupa pitaka ita minata. Dee kenda pipae dopale mende tenda tendapi etete naipataka.
41013020	Kamongome yuu gii dupa kaketala nayali kandao doko, endakali mendaipi mende nakatatama jipyali. Dopaka doko, baame baanya yapao nyepae endakali dupa lao masetala yuu gii dupa kaketatea-pyaa.
41013021	“Gii dokopa endakali mendeme nyakama langyoo, ‘Kataisa doko asa kalyamo kanjepa! Amasa kalyamo kanjepa!’ lea kandeno doko, baame kiningi lelyamona lao nyakamame masala nayalapape.
41013022	Doko, sambo mesayapi sambo potopesapi dupa ipupala kongalipi kalai paka pipaepi dupa pitami. Dupame Gotenya yapao nyepae endakali dupa kapa pao minao kyakasepenge jipyali kandao doko kyakasimili.
41013023	Dopaka doko, nyakama kandao kalyepape. Nambame nyakama pitaka ene pimopa langitilyo.
41013024	-
41013025	“Kenda pipae ipatamo dupa etapatamopa niki doko iminjoo, kana doko tii napyoo, kaiti-kisa bui katenge dupa kondao isa ipao, kaitinya kuingi dupa ema-ema pyoo pita.
41013026	Dutupa petatamopa Endakalinya Ikiningi doko etete pupu lao tii pyoo kopa tambetambe ipatamo endakali dupame kandatami.
41013027	Dokopa baame enjele dupame baanya yapao nyepae endakali yuunya lita yangi yangipi dupanya katenge dupa nyoo elyambu pyaa pena lata. Dokopa dupame yuu lita ongonya pituu yuu lita yangi-kaita tuu lao nyoo elyambu pitami.
41013028	“Nyakamame piki ita dupanya makande doko masalapape. Mange dupa kanga latala yoko ŋaŋa pyakalyilyamo doko kandatala nyakamame aiyuu kana palyanya pilyamona lao masingima.
41013029	Dokotekee joo pitamo dutupa pitaka nyakamame kandatala yuu etalanya tengesa petelyamona lao masalapape.
41013030	Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyo, endakali indupa palelyamino dupa kumao etapala nayataminopa dutupa pitaka pita.
41013031	Yuupi kaitipi dupa kapa pao alu pitamoaka doko, nambanya pii dupa kapa pao alu napita.
41013032	“Endakali mendaipi mendeme yuu etenge gii doko andukupa ipatape kiloko gii andukunya ipatape lao masala naengema. Enjele kaiti-kisa katenge dupame masala naengema. Ikiningi dokome apata masala naengeaka. Takange dokome iki masingi.
41013033	Nyakama kandao isoo kalyepape. Doko, gii doko andukupa ipatape lao nyakamame nakandengema.
41013034	Doko, akali mendeme baanya anda doko yakinatala yuu waka mendenya pao katenge dopale. Baame baanya kendemane dupame anda doko isoo katekena latala dutupa kalai wakale wakale mokosoo maingi. Dopa petala akali lome kambu isoo katenge dokome lome kambu doko isokondape pyoo katekena latala baa penge.
41013035	-
41013036	Nyakamame anda tange doko alemandi kone yuu pumbuti yuu pitamopa ipatape, kuka andatombe ipatape, yuu yongalanya mona sakatamopa ipatape, yongama ipatape lao masala naelyamino. Baa yapa ipupala nyakama luu paliuu katatamino kandatana nyakama kandao isoo kalyepape.
41013037	Nambame nyakama langilyo doko, endakali pitaka kandao lelyona, kandao kalyepapena,” lea-pyaa.
41014001	Napinya Kayamo Gii dokopa Isataelemanya betesanya iisa napalyoo nenge gii dokopa dolapo ene ipanya koto lapoma siamopa pitisa mupa dupapi mana setapae masingi akali dupapimi aipa petala Jisasa waa katao anjoo nyepala pyao kumasemape lao kaita kutiami-pyaa.
41014002	Dopa piaminoaka doko, dee dupame lao pituu, “Aopyoo latala endakali dupame pyao pilya pyana pitamina, gii epe dokonya dopa napimanalena,” leami-pyaa.
41014003	Jisasa baa yuu taono Betani ongonya akali kopetali Saimone lenge dokonya andaka nee nao petea-pyaa. Dokopa enda mendeme wele penge yakane mendenya wele kenge nalata lenge muni longome sambenge tunduma pipae etete angi mende tumbatae doko minao Jisasa peteasa epea-pyaa. Dopa petala baame penge doko tambatala wele doko Jisasanya aiyombanya kai lao kai pyakamaiya-pyaa.
41014004	Dopa piamopa anda ongonya peteami mendapuame enda doko imbu kayapala mende lamai lamai pyoo, “Baame aipuma dopa pyoo wele dake mee maa yangelya kanjemape?
41014005	Wele dake endakalimi kapa pao sambapiminopa muni kina andate tepoma-kisa dee mendatupa apata nyepala endakali tipya dupa maipenge jipyalina,” leami-pyaa. Dopa latala enda doko pyalanya leami-pyaa.
41014006	Dopaka doko, Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Enda dakeme pilyamo doko pina kayalapape. Aipuma kenda pisilyamipi? Baame namba-kisa kalai epe wakane mende pyekelyamo.
41014007	Endakali tipya dupa koteaka lao nyakama-pipa awapa katengemana, nyakamame masetaminoli pyoo dokaita kapa pao nisetami. Dopaka doko, namba nyakama-pipa koteaka lao nakatatama.
41014008	Baa-kisa sipumoli pyoo baame pyekelyamo. Baame namba malu pina lao wambao baame nambanya yonge doko wele kai lao kai pyekelyamo.
41014009	Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, Wai Pii Epe doko yuu dupa pitakanya lamaitaminoli pyoo, endakali dupame enda dake masina lao baame pilyamo dake lao tayatamiakana,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
41014010	Disaipele kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapoma dutupanya mende Jutasa Isaketiote dokome Jisasa baa pitisa mupa dupa laitaka pyaanya dokaita kateamisa enge nyala pea-pyaa.
41014011	Dupame baanya pii doko sepala mona auu kayami-pyaa. Auu kayapala muni mendapua baa maitamana leami-pyaa. Dokopa baame Jisasa dupa laitaka pitoo latala kaitini mende kutao katea-pyaa.
41014012	Betesanya iisa napalyoo nenge gii mupa Napinya Kayamo dokonya mena sipisipi yakane dupa pingima. Dopa pingima gii doko epeamopa disaipele dupame Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Napinya Kayamo Nee doko emba natale naimame andusa pao depa lakamili lao masilipi?” leami-pyaa.
41014013	Dopa leaminopa baame baanya disaipele dupanya lapoma pena lao pituu, “Nyilyambo yuu taono Jetusaleme dokonya pupa. Patambinopa akali mendeme penge mendenya endaki kambuoo soo ipao nyilyambo kandanyalapomona, baa patamo ongonya watao pupape.
41014014	Pao baa anda kolandatamo dokonya nyalambo apata kolandalapape. Kolandatala anda tange doko lamaiyoo, ‘Mana Lenge Akali dokome, “Nambanya disaipele dupa-pipa Napinya Kayamo Nee doko natoo nambanya nee napenge anda palo doko anja kalyape?” lelyamo,’ lamaiyepape.
41014015	Dokopa baame anda namba pyoo petae ketae mendenya tokopi opale depa latae singi palo andake mende nyilyambo laitaka pyaapomona, naima Napinya Kayamo Nee natamano doko dokonya depa laapapena,” lea-pyaa.
41014016	Dopa leamopa disaipele dolapo yuu taono Jetusaleme dokonya pao pyakalyetala Jisasame leamoli pyoo kandatala Napinya Kayamo Nee doko depa leambi-pyaa.
41014017	Maitakao yuu kualanya piamopa Jisasa baa disaipele kingi ita-kisa dee lapoma dupa-pipa epeami-pyaa.
41014018	Ipupala nee nao pituu Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Kiningi nambame nyakama langilyona, nyakamanya mendeme namba enge nyepala yandapipi dupa laitaka pyaamino. Namba-pipa awapa nee nelyambano dokome dopa pyaapomona,” lea-pyaa.
41014019	Dopa leamopa dokaitame mona kenda kayapala mendai mendai lawame baa lamaiyoo, “Namba kandao leepe?” laa laa peami-pyaa.
41014020	Baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakama kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapoma dutupanya mende nambapa disanya nee poyao nyilyambano akali dokome dopa pyaapomo.
41014021	Kini, Endakalinya Ikiningi dokonya lao Gotenya pii pepa pyapae singi dokonya lapae silyamoli pyoo baa kumalapomo. Dopaka doko, Endakalinya Ikiningi doko enge nyilyamo akali doko koyata iki lamo! Akali doko endangimi manja nayali kandao, baa yaka jipyalina,” lea-pyaa.
41014022	Dupa-pipa nee nao pituu Jisasame betesa mende nyepala Gote lao yaka pilino latala konjia-pyaa. Konjepala dokaita maiyoo pituu, “Dake nambanya yonge dokona nyalapa,” lea-pyaa.
41014023	Dopa petala baame kapo penge mende nyepala yaka pilino latala dokaita maiya-pyaa. Maiyamopa dokaita pitakame dokonya neami-pyaa.
41014024	Baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Dake nambanya taiyoko dokona endakali dupa pitaka nisoo kai lekelyona, dokome Goteme pii lao seteamo doko angi injisilyamo.
41014025	Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, getepa ipange dake dee nala nayawaka katao tenda Gotenya isingi panda dokonya getepe ipange enenge doko nato gii dokonya tuu latona,” lea-pyaa.
41014026	Dopa lateamopa dokaitame wee mende latao pituu kamanda pyakalyetala Olipimanda dokonya peami-pyaa.
41014027	Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakama pitakame namba yakinatala lombapae salamino. Doko, Gotenya pii pepa pyapae singi dokonya, ‘Sipisipi setao katenge doko nambame pyatopa, sipisipi dupa polao wakale puu puu pyoo paka patamina,’ lapae silyamo.
41014028	Dopaka doko, Goteme namba dee sakatasetatamopa nyakama nyoo maita pyatala Galili yuu dokonya wambatona,” lea-pyaa.
41014029	Dokopa Pitame Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Yangi dupa pitakame emba yakinatala lombapae setamino kandao, nambame dopa napyapo daana,” lea-pyaa.
41014030	Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Nambame emba kiningi langilyona, indupa kuka gii dakenya yaka pauli pii lapo pyoo ene laanya pitamopa, paa tepomasa embame namba nakandengena laapenona,” lea-pyaa.
41014031	Dokopa Pitame etete kyoto joo baa lamaiyoo, “Namba embapa awapa kumatambano doko kapakana, nambame emba nakandengena laa nayalapo etete daana,” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa disaipele dupa pitakame dopaka leami-pyaa.
41014032	Dokopa dokaita yuu Gesemani peami-pyaa. Pupala Jisasame baanya disaipele dupa lamaiyoo, “Nambame loma sotoo nyakama asa pilyepa,” lea-pyaa.
41014033	-
41014034	Dopa latala baame Pitapi, Jemesapi, Jonepi dutupa laminao pea-pyaa. Pupala baa mona etete kenda kayapala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nambanya mona doko etete kenda petala kumapenge julumuna, nyakama asa kandao katamana kalyepape,” lea-pyaa.
41014035	Dopa latala baa kuki umbisale pao yuunya tombauli sepala loma soo pituu, “Emba kapa pea kandeno doko, indupa gii dakepa namba-kisa pitamo doko napina lape,” lea-pyaa.
41014036	Baame loma soo pituu, “Apane, Apane, embame kapa pao dupa pitaka pingi. Embame namba-kisa kenda pipae silyamo dake nyoo nepakape. Dopaka doko, nambame masilyoli napinya, embame masetenoli pipina,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
41014037	Dopa lao loma setala ipao kandeamopa disaipele dutupa luu palyasiamisa baame Pita lamaiyoo, “Saimone, emba luu palelepe? Embame gii kuki mende kapa pao kandao isoo nakatalepe?
41014038	Makande pingi dupanya nyakama pao koyatamane lao kandao isoo loma soo kalyepape. Moname pyuani kaelyamoaka doko, yongeme papa tambuingina,” lea-pyaa.
41014039	Dopa latala baa deaka pao loma sia-pyaa. Wambao loma soo leamo pii dutupaka lao loma sia-pyaa.
41014040	Dopa latala dee ipao disaipele dupa kandeamopa lemongoti kayapala luu paliuu kateami-pyaa. Dopa petala aipa lamape lao masala nayami-pyaa.
41014041	-
41014042	Baame dee paa tepo pyoo ipupala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakama mee luaka paliuu koto nyilyamipi? Doko kapa lamo! Kandeleno! Gii doko ipatelyamo. Akali mendeme Endakalinya Ikiningi doko koo pingi endakali dupa laitaka pyaapomona, mona nyakama sakatalapa! Namba enge nyipumu akali doko ipatelyamona, kanjepa!” lea-pyaa.
41014043	Jisasame dopa lao kateamopa baanya disaipele kingi ita-kisa dee lapoma dutupanya mende Jutasa lenge doko epea-pyaa. Baa-pipa awapa endakali kambu mendeme konjuapi kolyepepi dupa minao akali pitisa mupapi, mana setapae masingi akalipi, Jutamanya isingi akalipi dupame pena leaminopa epeami-pyaa.
41014044	Jisasa enge nyiamo akali dokome endakali kambu doko wambao lamaiyoo, “Nambame akali mende nunu pio kandeno doko, baana, nyakamame baa minatala anjetala kandao isoo laminao pupape,” lea-pyaa.
41014045	Dopa lamaitala ipao baa Jisasa kateamo ongonya tolao pupala, “Mana Lenge Akali,” lea-pyaa. Dopa latala baa nunu pia-pyaa.
41014046	Dopa piamopa dokaitame Jisasa minatala anjiami-pyaa.
41014047	Dopa piaminopa akali mende baapa maki katea mendeme baanya konjua doko kolanyetala pitisa mupa dokonya kendemane mendenya kale doko taka lanya nepea-pyaa.
41014048	Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame akali pake nao makongao paenge mende anjala epele lao konjuapi kolyepepi dupa minao namba anjala epelyamipi?
41014049	Koteaka lao namba losuu anda andake dokonya nyakamanya kaina ongonya katao nyakama mana langio dokopa nyakamame namba anjala nayami. Dopaka doko, pii pepa pyapae singi doko angi jilyamona,” lea-pyaa.
41014050	Dokopa disaipele dupa pitakame baa yakinatala paka pyoo peami-pyaa.
41014051	Dopa piaminopa akali mendeme Jisasa watao pea-pyaa. Baa lapalapa mende iki petae pea-pyaa. Dopa piamopa dupame baa minatala anjalanya piami-pyaa.
41014052	Dopa piaminopa baame lapalapa doko kakonya yakinatala papata paka pea-pyaa.
41014053	Dokopa dupame Jisasa laminao pitisa mupa doko kateasa peami-pyaa. Dopa piaminopa pitisa mupapi, Jutamanya isingi akalipi, mana setapae masingi akalipi dupa ipao kambu piami-pyaa.
41014054	Dokopa Pitame Jisasa watao tependale joo pea-pyaa. Pupala pitisa mupa dokonya anda kamapisa kolamatala lome kambu isoo katenge dupa-pipa ita mende teamo dokonya endo soo petea-pyaa.
41014055	Akali pitisa mupapi kanjole dupa pitakapimi Jisasa pyao kumasemana latala baa-kisa tenge mende setame lao kutiami-pyaa. Dopa piaminoaka doko, tenge mende kandao nanyiami-pyaa.
41014056	Endakali longo mendapuame baa-kisa sambo pii setao kosimi leaminoaka doko, nyakamanya pii doko wakale jetala kapa napea-pyaa.
41014057	Endakali mendapuame sakatatala baa-kisa sambo pii setao dapa leami-pyaa:
41014058	“Akali dakeme lao pituu, ‘Nambame losuu anda andake kingimi petae dake lakyepala yuu gii tepomanya waka mende pito doko endakalimi napipenge mende pitona,’ leamopa naimame siamana,” leami-pyaa.
41014059	Dopa leaminoaka doko, nyakamanya pii doko wakale jetala kapa napeaka-pyaa.
41014060	Dokopa pitisa mupa dokome dokaitanya kaina dokonya toya katapala Jisasa tipa pyoo, “Pii emba kandao lelyamino dake embame yanu napilino doko, aipa pyoo lelyamipi?” lea-pyaa.
41014061	Dopa leamoaka doko, Jisasame yanu pyao pii mende laa naenya ema napia-pyaa. Dokopa pitisa mupa dokome baa dee pisoo, “Emba Gote tama pingima dokonya Ikiningi Kataisa dokope?” lea-pyaa.
41014062	Jisasame lao pituu, “Doko namba. Endakalinya Ikiningi doko Gote etete pupu lapae dokonya kingi tolae dokonya katao kaitinya kopa tambetambe dokonya ipatamopa nyakamame kandatamina,” lea-pyaa.
41014063	Dopa leamopa pitisa mupa dokome baa tangenya yonge pee dupa minao lapyepala lao pituu, “Aipuma naimame endakali mendapuanya pii deaka nyetamape?
41014064	Baame Gote kilya kandao pii lelyamo doko nyakamame sepelyamino. Sepala nyakamame aipa pima lao masilyamipi?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa dokaita pitakame, “Baa-kisa koo silyamona, baa pyao kumasepenge julumuna,” leami-pyaa.
41014065	Dopa latala akali mendapuame baa sopokalimi piami-pyaa. Baanya lengelyaapi yaki petala kii momangame piami-pyaa. Dopa petala, “Emba pilyamo doko dokome pilyamo lao naima langipi,” leami-pyaa. Yanda singi kateamino dupame baa kingi kapeme toka lao nyiamiaka-pyaa.
41014066	Pita baa anda kamapisa peteamopa pitisa mupa dokonya kalai pyakamaiyoo petenge enda dupanya mende epea-pyaa.
41014067	Ipupala Pita endo soo peteamo doko kandokondape pyoo kandatala baa lamaiyoo, “Emba apata Nasatete tange Jisasa dokopa awapa katengembana,” lea-pyaa.
41014068	Dopaka doko, Pitame tanga lao lao pituu, “Embame leeno doko namba nakandenge. Namba masala naelyona,” lea-pyaa. Dopa latala baa lome kambusa pea-pyaa. [Dopa piamopa yaka pauli pii mende lea-pyaa.]
41014069	Dopa piamopa kalai enda dokome baa dee kandatala akali kateamino dupa lamaiyoo, “Baa akali dutupanya mendena,” lea-pyaa.
41014070	Dopa leamopa Pitame deaka tanga lea-pyaa. Dokopa kuki maitakawale akali kateamino dupame Pita deaka lamaiyoo, “Kini, emba akali dutupanya mende lamo. Emba apata Galili tange lamona,” leami-pyaa.
41014071	Dokopa Pitame lao pituu, “Nyakamame akali lelyamino doko namba nakandenge mauwana sambo lato kandao doko, Goteme namba pinana,” lea-pyaa.
41014072	Dopa piamopa yaka pauli mendeme dee lapo pyoo pii lea-pyaa. Dokopa Pitame baa Jisasame pii lamaiyamo dake masia-pyaa: “Yaka pii lapo pyoo ene laanya pitamopa, paa tepomasa embame namba nakandengena laapeno,” leamo doko masetala baa auwa pao ee lea-pyaa.
41015001	Dokopa Pitisa mupa dupapi, Jutamanya isingi akali dupapi, mana setapae masingi akali dupapi, kanjole dupa pitakapi dutupa yongama wamba kambuiyami-pyaa. Lao kambutala Jisasa anjetala laminao pao Pailate maiyami-pyaa.
41015002	Dopa piaminopa Pailateme baa pisoo, “Emba Jutamanya Kiŋi dokope?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa baame Pailatenya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Embame latelenona,” lea-pyaa.
41015003	Pitisa mupa dupame baa-kisa tenge longo seteami-pyaa.
41015004	Dokopa Pailateme baa dee pisoo, “Kandeleno, dakaitame emba-kisa tenge longo lao setelyamino doko, embame piipi mende yanu pyao nalelepe?” lea-pyaa.
41015005	Dopa leamopa Jisasame dee pii mende yanu pyao nalea-pyaa. Dopa piamopa Pailate baa etete mona andea-pyaa.
41015006	Ee kana dii lao Napinya Kayamo Gii epe doko epelyali pyoo, Pailateme endakali anjetae palelyami dupanya mendai mende endakali dupame mokekena lelyamili pyoo mokata pyakamaingi-pyaa.
41015007	Gii dokopa akali Batapasa lenge mendepi endakali mendapua-pipame kapomane yanda pimaiyoo endakali mendapua pyao kumasetala anjetae paleami-pyaa.
41015008	Endakali kambu dupame ipupala Pailateme pandi pyekengeli pyekena lao tee leami-pyaa.
41015009	Dopa leaminopa Pailateme dokaita pisoo, “Nambame nyakamanya Kiŋi doko mokakapili lao masilyamipi?” lea-pyaa.
41015010	Pitisa mupa dupame Jisasa tilya maitala baa maiyamino doko masetala dopa lea-pyaa.
41015011	Dopa leamoaka doko, pitisa mupa dupame akali Batapasa doko mokekena lamana lao endakali kambu dupanya mona mende pali-pali pyakamaiyami-pyaa.
41015012	Dopa piaminopa Pailateme dokaita deaka pisoo, “Nyakama Jutamanya Kiŋi lengema dake nambame aipa pyakawape?” lea-pyaa.
41015013	Dopa leamopa dupame deaka puu lao lao, “Ita pokonya pyao yuka!” leami-pyaa.
41015014	Dopa leaminoaka doko, Pailateme dokaita lamaiyoo, “Baame koo aki mende piape?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa dokaitame eteteaka puu lao lao, “Baa pyao yuka!” leami-pyaa.
41015015	Pailateme endakali kambu dupanya mona epe palisakamaitoo lao masetala Batapasa doko mokakamaiya-pyaa. Dopa petala yanda singi dupame Jisasa konjame pyapala pyao yukuina lao dokaita maiya-pyaa.
41015016	Dokopa yanda singi dupame Jisasa laminao kapomane isingi akali andake petenge anda dokonya kolandatala yanda singi tata doko pitaka ipao kambu pina leami-pyaa.
41015017	Dupame yonge pee wene pyapaele mende baanya petakamaitala ikililyambu kende mendapua nyoo langapu petala Jisasanya aiyombanya pyakamaiyami-pyaa.
41015018	Dupame baa minakasoo lalyoo, “Jutamanya Kiŋi, emba auu pyoo katape!” leami-pyaa.
41015019	Dupame kyoo konjame aiyombanya pyapa sopakalimi pyapa petala baa minakasoo luma lakao baa tama piami-pyaa.
41015020	Dupame baa minakasoo etapala dokopa yonge pee wene pyapaele wamba pyakamaiyamino doko lyokao nyepala baanya dupa tange pyakamaiyami-pyaa. Dopa petala baa pyao yukualanya laminao peami-pyaa.
41015021	Dokopa akali Saimone lenge doko kamalyatena katao yuu taono dokonya paanya epeamopa yanda singi dupame kaitinisa kandanyetala Jisasanya ita poko doko sakamaina leami-pyaa. Akali doko yuu taono Saitini tange Alekesandapa Lupasapanya takange-pyaa.
41015022	Dokopa dupame Jisasa laminao yuu kenge Golokota lenge dokonya pao pyakameami-pyaa. Kenge Golokota doko kapilyoo Matenakulimanda lengema.
41015023	Yuu dokonya pupala dupame baa tanda kayatame lao waene mende matasini-pipa pyasilya pyasena petala Jisasa nena lao maiyami-pyaa. Dopa piaminoaka doko, nanenya kaya-pyaa.
41015024	Dokopa dupame Jisasa ita pokonya pyao yukuiyami-pyaa. Yanda singi dupanya apimi Jisasanya yonge pee dupanya mende nyetape lao kana yakane dupa pyasoo male pyoo ita miniamino akali dupame mokosoo nyiami-pyaa.
41015025	Yongama niki popo pyaa gii ongonya Jisasa pyao yukuiyami-pyaa.
41015026	Jisasa-kisa tenge seteami pii doko, “Jutamanya Kiŋi dokona,” lao pepa pyatae katea-pyaa.
41015027	Baa-pipa awapa dee akali pake nao makongao paenge lapoma apata pyao yukuiyami-pyaa. Mende doko baanya kingi tolae-kaita, mende doko koya-kaita yukuiyami-pyaa.
41015028	[Dopa piamino dokome pii pepa pyapae singi dokonya, “Mana setapae nepenge endakali dupa-pipa baa pyasoo itaki pyatamina,” lapae singi doko angi jia-pyaa.]
41015029	Jisasa pyao yukuotae kateamo dokonya-kaita endakali payamino dupame Jisasa kilya kandao aiyomba ema-ema pyoo dapa leami-pyaa: “‘Losuu anda andake doko lakyepala yuu gii tepoma pitona,’ leeno akali dake!
41015030	Embame emba tangeme pupu latala ita poko doko yakinatala isa ipu!” lao kaa kaa leami-pyaa.
41015031	Mendai dopaka pyoo, akali pitisa mupapi mana setapae masingi akalipi dupame baa lamba lao nyakamalapo lao pituu, “Baame endakali waka dupa nisiamoaka doko, baa tange kapa pao nisala naelyamo.
41015032	Kataisa doko, naima Isataele dupanya Kiŋi doko, epapu ita poko doko yakinatala isa epena. Dopa pitamopa naimame kandatala baa lao masoo minamanalena,” leami-pyaa. Akali lapoma baa-pipa awapa yukuotae kateambino dolapome apata baa kandao pii koo leambiaka-pyaa.
41015033	Kotaka andawai pungupungu dokonya pituu, yuu doko pitaka kuiyatala kuiyatayaka katao pao alemande kiloko tepo lea-pyaa.
41015034	Kiloko tepo dokonya Jisasame etete puu lao lao, “Eli, Eli, lema sapakatani?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamo doko kapilyoo, “Nambanya Gote, nambanya Gote, embame namba aipuma yakinelepe?” lea-pyaa.
41015035	Dopa leamo doko endakali dosa kateamino dupanya mendapuame sepala lao pituu, “Ilainja lao wii lelyamona salapape,” leami-pyaa.
41015036	Dopa latala akali mendeme alo pyao pao koma jepae mende waene kaa pipae mendenya poyatala itakali mendenya tuku petala Jisasa nena lao makapusakamaiya-pyaa. Dopa petala baame lao pituu, “Ilainjame baa kondao nyala epelyape lao kandamana malisetalapa,” lea-pyaa.
41015037	Dokopa Jisasame eteteaka puu lao ae latala baa kumia-pyaa.
41015038	Dokopa losuu anda andake dokonya lapalapa pyatu doko ketae ulusa pituu kanguoo yuunya tuu latala lapo pyoloo pia-pyaa.
41015039	Yanda singi amii isingi akali Jisasanya enomba-kaita kateamo dokome Jisasa dopa pyoo kumiamo doko kandatala, “Kiningi etete, akali dake Gote Ikiningi lamona,” lea-pyaa.
41015040	Enda mendapuame kuki tependale pituu kandatae peteami-pyaa. Dutupanya mende doko Matia Makatala tange dokopi, dee Jemesa muu dokopa Josisapanya endangi Matia dokopi, dee Salomipi dutupame kandatae peteami-pyaa.
41015041	Wamba Jisasa Galili yuu dokonya kateamo dokopa enda dutupame baa watao pupala baa nisiami-pyaa. Dee enda longo mendapua Jisasa-pipa awapa Jetusaleme lalyoo peamino dupa dosa kateamiaka-pyaa.
41015042	Yuu doko kualanya pia-pyaa. Yuu gii doko Sambasanya opale depa lenge kalai gii yuungi mende-pyaa.
41015043	Dopa pingi dokonyana Josepe Atimatia tange kanjole kenge epe singi mende epea-pyaa. Baame Gotenya isingi doko malisoo katengeaka-pyaa. Baame paka nakayao Pailate peteamo dokonya pupala Jisasa dina lao tee lea-pyaa.
41015044	Dopa leamopa Pailate dokome baa yapa kumalame lumu lao mona andea-pyaa. Dopa petala yanda singi amii isingi doko epena latala, “Baa kumatalape?” lao pisia-pyaa.
41015045	Yanda singi isingi dokome Jisasa kini kumatalamona lao lamaitiamo dokopa Josepeme kondao nyina lea-pyaa.
41015046	Dokopa Josepeme lapalapa epe kyoto mende sambapala pao Jisasa kondao isa nyepala lapalapa dokome ambo pia-pyaa. Dopa petala malu pipenge kananda mende tumbinya seteami dokonya setapala kana mende kapilya mina-mina pyoo minao pao malu kambu doko piti pia-pyaa.
41015047	Enda Matia Makatala tange dokopa Matia Josisa endangi dokopame Josepeme Jisasa seteamo panda doko kandeambi-pyaa.
41016001	Sambasa gii doko pateamopa Matia Makatala tange dokopi, Matia Jemesa endangi dokopi, enda Salomipi dutupame Jisasa kai pyala mona latala welepi opale tunduma pingi mendapua sambeami-pyaa.
41016002	Sandeenya yongama wamba niki pyakaya-kaita malu dokonya peami-pyaa.
41016003	Dupame pao pituu, “Malu kambu dokonya kana piti petae doko apimi kapilya mina-mina pyoo nyakata laape?” lao mende lamai lamai pyoo peami-pyaa.
41016004	Pupala kandeaminopa kana doko nyoo kapya latae sia-pyaa. Kana doko etete andake mende-pyaa.
41016005	Enda dupame malu dokonya kolandatala akali yonge pee londe kyoo lapae pingi mende kingi tolae-kaita pilya siasa kandatala mona andao walu leami-pyaa.
41016006	Dopa piaminopa baame enda dutupa lamaiyoo, “Nyakama mona andao walu nalalapape. Jisasa Nasatete tange ita pokonya pyao yukuiyamino doko nyakamame kutilyamino. Baa sakatatalame lamo. Angenya nasilyamo. Baa seteamino panda dake kanjepa.
41016007	Nyakamame pupala baanya disaipele dupapi Pitapi lamaiyoo, ‘Baa wambao Galili yuu dokonya pelyamo. Wamba baame nyakama langiamoli pyoo nyakamame baa Galili yuu dokonya kandatamina,’ lamaiyepape,” lea-pyaa.
41016008	Enda dupame kamanda pyakalyetala malu doko yakinatala mona andao walu lao paka peami-pyaa. Dupame paka kayamino dokome endakali mende lamaiya nayami-pyaa.
41016009	[Sandee gii dokonya yongama wamba Jisasa sakatatala Matia Makatala tange dokome wambao kandena lao panea-pyaa. Wamba enda doko-kisa enjele koo kalange paleamopa Jisasame watao pyakamaiya-pyaa.
41016010	-
41016011	Jisasa-pipa awapa kateamino endakali dupa ee lao yamataka lao peteaminopa, enda dokome pupala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Jisasa lenge tao katamupa nambame kanjona,” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa dokaitame sepala pii doko kiningina lao masala nayami-pyaa.
41016012	Maitakao disaipele dupanya lapoma yuu taono doko yakinatala peambinopa dolapome kandena lao Jisasa waka joo peambino dokonya pea-pyaa.
41016013	Dolapome pupala disaipele yangi dupa lamaiyambinopa dolapome kiningi lelyambinona lao dupame masala nayamiaka-pyaa.
41016014	Maitakao akali kingi ita mende-kisa dee mendai dutupa nee nao peteaminopa Jisasa baa dokaitame kandena lao ipao panea-pyaa. Dopa petala baa sakatatala paneamopa kandeamino endakali dupame kiningi lelyaminona lao masala nayamino dokonya dokaita pyalanya lao, “Nyakamame kiningina lao masala naenya, tuu pyoo mona pyakilyoo kalyaminona,” lea-pyaa.
41016015	Dopa latala baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame yuu dupa pitakanya pupala Wai Pii Epe doko endakali dupa pitaka lamaiyepape.
41016016	Masoo minao kaimbu nyetamo endakali doko Goteme pyoo nyeta. Masoo minala nayatamo endakali doko daa latala watao pyata.
41016017	Masoo minatamino endakali dupame kongali datupa pitami. Dupame nambanya kenge doko lao enjele koo dupa watao pyatami. Dee pii tata waka dupa latamiaka.
41016018	Kanopato salenda dupa kingimi minatala koyala nayatami. Tomakai dupa napala kumala nayatami. Endakali yaina pyapae dupa kingimi minataminopa yaina dupa mee jetamina,” lea-pyaa.
41016019	Kamongo Jisasame pii dutupa lamaitiamopa Goteme baa kaiti-kisa lanyia-pyaa. Dopa piamopa baa Gotenya kingi tolae-kaita kalyamo.
41016020	Disaipele dupame yuu dupa pitakanya pupala pii doko lamaiyami-pyaa. Dopa piaminopa Kamongo dokome nyakama-pipa kalai awapa pyoo kongali piamino dupanya baame pii doko angi injisia-pyaa.]
42001001	-
42001002	Tiopilasa, emba akali etete epe! Wamba naimanya kainanya kalai tata sakateamo dupa Gotenya pii lamaingi akali mendapuame lengeme kandatala dupanya lao leaminopa naimame siama. Dee akali longo dupame dokaitanya pii sepala tolao setalanya pepa dupa pyao makande piami-pyaa.
42001003	-
42001004	Pii wamba pepa pyanya seteamino dupanya kiningi pii dupa embame masokondape pipi lao nambame kandeamino endakali dutupa deaka pisoo sepa sepa petala pii mendenya pali pali pitame latala tolasakatoo lao embanya pepa dake pyakondape pyoo pyekelyo.
42001005	Jutia yuu dokonya akali Etote lenge mende katea-pyaa. Baa akali andake kiŋi joo kateamo gii dokopa, pitisa Sakataya lenge mende katea-pyaa. Baa pitisa tata Apaisa lenge dokonya mende-pyaa. Baanya etanenge Ilisapeta lenge dokonya yumbange takangepi dupa pitisaka katengema-pyaa.
42001006	Dolapome Gotenya mana setapae dupa tolao minao pitipala mana tolatae dupa pitaka watao minao pii mendaipi mende yalala nayao payambinopa Kamongo dokome kapana lao masia-pyaa.
42001007	Enda Ilisapeta doko ingi pyakilyiamosa dolapome wane mende namandyuu pituu wambake jiambi-pyaa.
42001008	Yuu mende Sakatayanya kalai pingi gii doko epeamopa, Gote lao tama pyoo pitisa kalai doko pyaanya katea-pyaa.
42001009	Kateamopa pitisa dupame makande pingili pyoo petala baa yapao nyepeaminopa Sakatayame Gote tama pyoo ita dii tunduma pipae mendapua tunduma pina lao Kamongo dokonya losuu anda andake dokonya yangala pea-pyaa.
42001010	Sakatayame ita dii dupa tunduma pina lao Gote lao yangengeli pyoo yangeamo gii dokopa endakali kamanda kambu pyao kateamino dupa pitakame loma soo kateami-pyaa.
42001011	Sakatayame kandeamopa Kamongonya enjele mende ipupala tunduma pingi yangenge olata toko kingi tolae-kaita singi dokonya ipao katea-pyaa.
42001012	Kateamopa Sakatayame baa kandatala walu lao etete paka kaya-pyaa.
42001013	Dokopa enjele dokome baa lamaiyoo, “Sakataya, emba paka nakayape! Embame mende Gote-kisa tee lao loma sipino doko baame sepelyamona, embanya enda Ilisapeta dokome wane ane mende manjakatana, embame wane doko kenge Jone lape.
42001014	Emba mona yaepao eteke kayao katate. Wane doko mandipatamopa, endakali longo dupame mona yaepatamiaka.
42001015	Baa Kamongonya enomba dokonya andake joo katata. Baa bia akipi waenepi dupa etete nanao katata. Baa endanginya ingiandaka pititamopa Oli Sipitisa doko tee pyao baa-kisa tumbasalanya ipata.
42001016	Dopa pitamopa baame Isataele endakali longo dupanya mona sakatasakamaitamopa dupame nyakamanya Kamongo Gote doko lao masetami.
42001017	Oli Sipitisa dokome Ilainja-kisa pupu lao epeamoli pyoo baa-kisa ipatamopa baame Kamongo doko ipatana lao baa wambata. Wambatala baame wanepi takangepi waka joo katenge dupa nyoo pyaseta. Baame Gotenya pii watao minala naenge dupame mana tolao minao paenge endakali dupame masingimali pyoo masina lao minao kapilyeta. Baame endakali dupa depa lakamaitamopa dokaitame Kamongo dokonya depa latae endakali joo katatamina,” enjele dokome dopa lea-pyaa.
42001018	Dopa leamopa Sakatayame enjele doko lamaiyoo, “Embanya pii leeno doko aipa petala nambame kiningina lao masotope? Namba akali wambake. Nambanya enda dokonya ee kana longo dupa patayakana,” lea-pyaa.
42001019	Dokopa enjele dokome baa lamaiyoo, “Namba Gepetiele lenge! Namba Gotepa awapa katenge! Gote tangeme embanya pii wai epe dake nambame minakao langya puu lapumosa epelyo.
42001020	Dopana, embame nambanya pii doko kiningi lamo lao masala nayaleno dokonya emba pii laa nayao nengekaita lyokatae katao pii lalo dutupa kiningi jetamo gii doko kandao nyete. Pii dutupanya gii doko ipatamopa angi jetana,” enjele dokome dopa lea-pyaa.
42001021	Endakali kateamino dupame Sakataya malisoo kateami-pyaa. Sakataya baa losuu anda andake dokonya aki mendeme minanjipumosa yapa naepelyape lao longo lao masiami-pyaa.
42001022	Maitakao Sakataya kamanda epeamopa baanya nengekaita lyokeamosa endakali dupame baa losuu anda andake dokonya mendita mende kandalame lamo lao masiami-pyaa. Dokopa baame pii mende nalenya nengekaita lyokatae katao kingimiaka makande pia-pyaa.
42001023	Dokopa losuu anda andake dokonya Sakatayanya kalai pingi gii doko etapeamopa baa andaka pilyia-pyaa.
42001024	Pilyeteamopa maitakao baanya enda Ilisapeta dokonya inginya wane tee piamopa kana yuungi dupanya andaka yalo petae pitipala pii dapa lea-pyaa:
42001025	“Namba wane namandipala endakali dupanya enombanya elya nyingi doko Goteme koe pyekeana,” Ilisapetame lea-pyaa.
42001026	Ilisapeta doko wane tongata pituu kana tokange pateamopa Goteme enjele Gepetiele doko Galili yuu dokonya yuu taono Nasatete lenge dokonya pena lea-pyaa.
42001027	Yuu dokonya enda mapuakae mende akali Josepe lenge dokonya nyetana latae doko pii lamaiya pena lea-pyaa. Josepe doko Kiŋi Dapiti lenge dokonya tatanya mandipae-pyaa. Enda mapuakae doko kenge Matia lenge-pyaa.
42001028	Enjele Gepetiele dokome Matia peteamo andaka dokonya kolandatala baa lamaiyoo, “Emba mona yaepao pitipi! Kamongo dokome emba kandao mona epe palyetelyamo. Baa embapa awapa kalyambinona,” lea-pyaa.
42001029	Enjele dokome Matianya mona epe palisoo pii dutupa leamopa, Matiame mona andao etete walu lao pii doko aipale mende langilyape lao masia-pyaa.
42001030	Dokopa enjele dokome baa lamaiyoo, “Matia, emba paka nakayape! Goteme emba kandao mona epe palyetelyamo.
42001031	Kandeleno, embanya inginya wane ane mende palitamopa mandipala embame baa kenge Jisasa late.
42001032	Baa kenge soo katata. Baanya kenge doko Etete Ketae Katenge dokonya Ikiningina latami. Kamongo Goteme wane dokonya yumbange Dapitinya isingi kalai doko wane doko maita.
42001033	Baame kiŋi joo Jekope tata doko koteaka lao tanga tangapi isoo katata. Isoaka katao kayala nayatana,” enjele dokome dopa lea-pyaa.
42001034	Dopa leamopa Matiame enjele doko lamaiyoo, “Namba akali mendepa tole napilyo doko embame pii leeno doko aipa petala kiningi jetape?” lea-pyaa.
42001035	Dokopa enjele dokome Matia lamaiyoo, “Oli Sipitisa doko emba-ketae ipata. Etete Ketae Katenge pupu lapae dokome emba isoo katata. Goteme wane epe etete doko embanya inginya palyetakatamopa, embame manditino doko kandao kenge Gote Ikiningi latami.
42001036	Embanya kaiingi Ilisapeta lenge enda wambake kandapino dokonya inginya wane ane mende pilyamo. Wamba ingi pyakilyetae wane namandipengena lengema kandapino doko indupa wane tongata pitipumopa kana tokange patelyamo.
42001037	Goteme kalai mendaipi mende pyanya kokala naenge daape!” enjele dokome dopa lea-pyaa.
42001038	Dopa leamopa Matiame baa lamaiyoo, “Namba Kamongo dokonya kendemane endana, embame pii leeno doko namba-kisa epekena kapa lumuna,” lea-pyaa. Dopa lateamopa enjele dokome Matia yakinatala baa pea-pyaa.
42001039	Maitakao Matia sakatatala Jutia yuu dokonya yuu manda singi dupanya taono mendenya yapa pea-pyaa.
42001040	Pao pyakamatala baa Sakatayanya andaka kolandatala baanya kaiingi Ilisapeta kandao, “Auu pyoo petelepe?” lao pisia-pyaa.
42001041	Matiame baa pisiamo doko Ilisapetame siamo gii dokopaka Ilisapetanya ingi dokonya wane peteamo doko ema pia-pyaa. Dokopa Oli Sipitisa dokome ipao Ilisapetanya mona sakatasoo tumbalu pia-pyaa.
42001042	Dokopa Ilisapetame pii mende puu lao dapa lea-pyaa: “Goteme emba auu pisipumosa embame enda dupa pitaka ita minilino. Embanya inginya wane tee pilyamo doko Gotenya auu pipae.
42001043	Namba enda epe api kaita nambanya Kamongo dokonya endangi dokome namba kanja epepe?
42001044	Embame namba kandao pii lapino doko kaleme sipupa nambanya wane inginya pitipumu dokome mona etete yaepao ema pyuu petelyamo.
42001045	Kamongonya pii emba-kisa epeamo dupa tenda kiningi jetana lao masoo minapino dokonya emba mona yaepao pilyenona,” Ilisapetame dopa lea-pyaa.
42001046	-
42001047	Dokop Matiame lao pituu, “Nambanya moname Kamongo doko lao tama pilyo. Goteme namba pyoo nyilyamo doko lao masetala mona etete yaepelyo.
42001048	Namba baanya kendemane enda kenge nasingi doko kondo kaya. Indupapi tangapi endakalinya mandipaenya mandipae dupa pitakame namba Goteme mona yaepasiana latami.
42001049	Gote etete pupu lapae dokome namba-kisa kalai andake doko piana baa eteteaka epe.
42001050	Endakalinya mandipaenya mandipae baa andanda semaiyoo paliuu pelyami dupa baame kondo kayao katenge.
42001051	Baa pupu lapae dokome kalai andake mende pia. Nyakama tangeme alyasale joo kalyamano lao masingi endakali dupa baame watao nepa nepa pia-pyaa.
