42019035	Dopa latala dongi yakane doko laminao Jisasa kateamo dokonya epeambi-pyaa. Ipupala dolapome dongi maita dokonya nyilyambonya yonge pee ketae pingi dupa kuiyatala Jisasa nyoo pisiambi-pyaa.
42019036	Baa dongi maita dokonya pituu peamopa, endakali dupame wambatala nyakamanya yonge pee dupa nyoo kaitini dokonya kuiyoo seteami-pyaa.
42019037	-
42019038	Yuu Olipimanda dokonya lanao ipao Jetusaleme tengesale pateamopa, baanya disaipele dupanya kambu longo mendeme wamba baame kalai pupu lapae piamo kandeamino dupa pitaka lao masoo mona yaepatala puu lao Gote lalyoo dapa lao wee leami-pyaa: “Kiŋi epelyamo dake auu pisetaena, Kamongo Goteme epena lapumopa epelyamo! Goteme naima kandao mona lyuu lelyamo. Etete Ketae Kaitinya Katenge doko lao tama pyoo katamanalena,” leami-pyaa.
42019039	Dokopa Patasi mendapua endakali longo dupa-pipa awapa payamino dupame Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Mana Lenge Akali! Embame embanya disaipele datupame pii lelyamino doko auu napilyamona, kaena lao pyalanya laa!” leami-pyaa.
42019040	Dopa leaminopa baame dupanya pii yanu pyao, “Dokaitame pii nalamili kandao doko, kana dupame kapa pao pii puu lao lamilina lao nambame nyakama langilyona,” lea-pyaa.
42019041	-
42019042	Dokopa Jisasame yuu taono Jetusaleme dokonya tengesa ipao pituu baame yuu doko kandamatala yako lao dapa lao ee lea-pyaa: “Indupa gii dakepa yuu dakenya tange endakali dupame apata mona lyuu lasingi tenge dupa masipimili kandao doko, auu pipyali. Dopaka doko, indupa gii dakepa tenge doko yalo petae sipumopa nakandelyamino.
42019043	-
42019044	Goteme nisala epelyamo gii dake nyakamame nakandelyamino tenge dokonya tanga gii mende ipatamopa nyakamanya yandapipi dupame nyakama kame pimbatala yangi yangipi katao kakopataminopa kame pimbatae palitami. Dee endakali yuu mandanya katenge dupa yuu dama-pipa etete koyatami. Yuu damanya andapi kamepi kaname petae kalyamo datupanya mendaipi mende kalyamoli petae katena lao yandapipi dupame kayala nayatamina,” lea-pyaa.
42019045	-
42019046	Dokopa Jisasa losuu anda andake kame dokonya pupala topo setao petamino endakali dupa watao pyao pituu, “Pii pepa pyapae singi dokonya, ‘Nambanya anda doko endakalimi loma singi anda joo katatana,’ lapae silyamo. Dokapa doko, nyakamame anda dake pake nao makongao paenge endakali dupa yalo pingi kananda injisiamina,” lea-pyaa.
42019047	Dokopa baame koteaka lao losuu anda andake dokonya katao endakali dupa mana lamaiyoaka kateamopa pitisa mupapi, mana setapae masingi akalipi, endakali dupanya isingi akalipi dupame, “Baa aipa pyoo pyao kumasemape?” leami-pyaa.
42019048	Dopaka doko, endakali pitakame baanya pii sipuma laka lao masetala salakao siaminosa, dokaitame baa pyao kumasepenge kaita mende kandao nanyiami-pyaa.
42020001	Koto mendepa Jisasame losuu anda andake dokonya katao endakali dupa mana lamaita Wai Pii Epe doko panao lamaita pia-pyaa. Dokopa akali pitisa mupapi, mana setapae masingi akalipi, isingi akalipi dupa baa kateamo dokonya epeami-pyaa.
42020002	Ipupala lao pituu, “Embame apinya pii minao kalai datupa pilipi? Apimi kalai datupa emba-kisa seteape naima langina!” leami-pyaa.
42020003	Dokopa baame dokaitanya pii yanu pyao, “Nambame nyakama pii mende pisilyoakana, nyakamame yanu pyao langyepape.
42020004	Joneme kaimbu pyakamaiyamo doko Goteme pina leape, pande endakalimi pina leamipi?” lea-pyaa.
42020005	Dokopa dokaitame nyakamalapo lao pituu, “Naimame, ‘Goteme pina leana,’ latamano kandao doko, baame naima kandao, ‘Doko aipuma nyakamame Jonenya pii doko masoo minala nayamipi?’ lata.
42020006	Dee naimame, ‘Endakalimi pina leamina,’ latamano kandao doko, Jone doko potopesana lao masoo miningima dokonya endakali datupa pitakame naima kaname pyao takyetamina,” leami-pyaa.
42020007	Dopa latala dokaitame Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Apimi pina leape lao masala naelyamanona,” leami-pyaa.
42020008	Dopa leaminopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Dopa tamo doko, nambame kalai pilyo datupa dokonya pii minao pilyo lao nyakama langya nayatoakana,” lea-pyaa.
42020009	Dopa latala baame kongali pii mende endakali dupa dapa lao lamaiya-pyaa: “Akali mendeme getepe ee mende pokea-pyaa. Dopa petala akali mendapuame ee doko isakao katena latala baa koto longo nepao yuu londati mendakaita pao katea-pyaa.
42020010	Maitakao getepe wambu pingi gii doko ipateamopa akali ee tange dokome baanya kendemane mendeme ee isakamaingi akali dupa kateamisa pupala getepe dii mendapua lyao peekena lao nyakala pena lea-pyaa. Kendemane doko pateamopa ee isakamaingi akali dutupame baa pyapala getepe dii lyao maiyakamaiya nayao mee pena leami-pyaa.
42020011	Maitakao ee tange dokome baanya kendemane waka mende pena lea-pyaa. Pena leamoaka doko, dokaitame akali doko apata pyao indyepala mana koo elya pipae mendapua baa-kisa minatala getepe dii lyao maiya naenya mee pena leami-pyaa.
42020012	Dee paa tepo pyoo ee tange dokome kendemane mendeaka pena leamopa, dokaitame baa pyao indyepala kamalyatena pyale leami-pyaa.
42020013	Dokopa ee tange dokome lao pituu, ‘Dee nambame aipa pitoo laape? Dokaitame nambanya ikiningi mona setenge doko andanda semaitamino nakandenyana nambame baa pena latoana,’ lao masetala pena lea-pyaa.
42020014	Pena leamoaka doko, akali ee isakamaingi dutupame akali dokonya ikiningi doko epeamo kandatala nyakamalapo lao pituu, ‘Akali dakeme takangenya moya nyepengena, moya dake naimanya jina lao baa pyao kumasemana!’ leami-pyaa.
42020015	Dopa latala dokaitame getepe ee dokonya baa kamalyatena soo pyale latala pyao kumasiami-pyaa. “Dopana, akali ee tange dokome dokaita aipa pitape?
42020016	Baame ipupala ee isakamaingi dokaita pyao kumasetala, getepe ee doko akali waka mendapuame isakao katena latana,” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa dokaitame sepala lao pituu, “Anematupa! Baame dopa napinako!” leami-pyaa.
42020017	Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lengeme kandatae katao lao pituu, “‘Anda pingi akali dupame anda pingina daa latala nepeamino doko pingina mupa jeteana,’ lao pepa pyapae silyamo dokonya tenge aki palelyape?
42020018	Endakali mende kana doko-ketae lombapae sepala baa indyuu tale pita. Dee kana dokome endakali mende pyao takyembatamo kandao doko, endakali doko etete kunguma jetana,” lea-pyaa.
42020019	Dokopa mana setapae masingi akalipi pitisa mupapi dupame, “Kongali pii doko naima kandao lalumuna,” lao masiami-pyaa. Dopa lao masetala gii dokopaka baa puu lao minalanya piami-pyaa. Dopaka doko, endakali kateamino dupa paka kayapala kayami-pyaa.
42020020	Dopa petala baa minapenge gii mende malisoo katao Jisasa doko kapomane andake doko-kisa yakinatamanopa dokome baa anjinalena lao masiami-pyaa. Dopa lao masetala akali mendapuame sambo mee paele lao payao baa kosimi lapenge pii mendapua Jisasa-kisa sala pena leami-pyaa.
42020021	Akali dutupame pupala Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Mana Lenge Akali, embame piipi manapi dupa tolao lao endakali dupa mana lamaingina lao masilyamano. Dee embame endakali itange kandao mokosala nayao, embame kiningi pii lao Goteme endakali dupame pipimili lao masingili pyoo mana lamailino lao masilyamano.
42020022	Dopana, naimanya mana setapae dokonya aipa latae silyape? Kapomane Isingi Mupa dokonya takisa dupa naimame pyakamaimape, pande kayamape?” lao pisiami-pyaa.
42020023	-
42020024	Dopa lao waa katao pisiamino doko Jisasame kandatala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Muni mende namba laitaka pyepa. Muninya endakali lengelyaapi wasetae kalyamopi kenge pyatae kalyamopi doko apinyape?” lea-pyaa. Dopa lateamopa dokaitame lao pituu, “Doko Kapomane Isingi Mupa dokonya pyatae kalyamona,” leami-pyaa.
42020025	Dokopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Dopa tamo doko, opale Kapomane Isingi Mupa dokonya dupa tange maiyakamaiyepape. Dee opale Gotenya dupa Gote tangeaka maiyakamaiyepape,” lea-pyaa.
42020026	Dopa leamopa dokaitame endakali enomba dupanya baa kosimi lapenge pii mende kutao kayami-pyaa. Baame dokaitanya pii yanu pyakamaiyamo doko sepala dupame mona andapala dee pii mende naleami-pyaa.
42020027	-
42020028	Yuu mende akali Satyusi mendapua Jisasa kateamo dokonya epeami-pyaa. Dupame endakali kumapala dee sakatala naengena lengema-pyaa. Dokonya dokaitame baa pisoo, “Mana Lenge Akali, wamba Moseseme naimanya mana mende dapa lao pepa pyanya setekea-pyaa: ‘Akali mendeme enda mende nyepala wane manja nayao baa mee kumatamo kandao doko, baanya kaiminingi dokome enda walyakae doko pisetala wane manditamo dupa kaiminingi kumapae dokonya manjakamaitana,’ lapae silyamo.
42020029	Dopana, gii mendepa akali mendenya ikiningi kalange kateami-pyaa. Dutupanya mupa dokome enda mende nyepala wane manja nayao baa mee kumia-pyaa.
42020030	Dokopa kaiminingi laponge dokome enda walyakae doko pisia-pyaa.
42020031	Pisetala dopaka pyoo baa wane manja nayao kumateamopa maitakao kaiminingi teponge dokome enda dokoaka pisia-pyaa. Kaiminingi kalange dutupa pitakame enda dokoaka nyiamino doko wane mende manja nayawaka kumiami-pyaa.
42020032	Maitakao enda doko kumiaka-pyaa.
42020033	Kaiminingi kalange dutupa pitakame enda mendai dokoaka nyepala kumiami-pyaana, tenda endakali kumapae dupa malunya sakatataminopa enda doko akali dutupanya apinya etanenge joo pitita laape?” leami-pyaa.
42020034	Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Indupa gii dakepa akalimi enda nyoo endame akali pao pingi.
42020035	Dopaka doko, Goteme endakali mendapua kandao kapana lao masetala tanga gii dokonya lete etete katena lao endakali kumapae dupa malunya sakatasetamopa, endakalipa nyala nayatami.
42020036	Dokaita dee kapa pao kumala nayao enjele joo pituu katawapi pitami. Goteme dokaita sakatasetamo dokonya dupa baanya ikiningi wanengepiaka jetami.
42020037	Moseseme endakali kumapala dee malunya sakatatamina lao panasetea-pyaa. Ikililyambu maunya ita teamo dokonya-kaita Moseseme pii nyiamo dokome Kamongo doko kandao, ‘Baa Apotakamepi, Aisakepi, Jekopepi dutupanya Gote kalyamona,’ lao Mosesenya pepa pyapae dokonya silyamo.
42020038	Dopana, Gote baa endakali kumapae dupanya Gote daana, baa endakali lete katenge dupanya Gote. Baame endakali dupa pitaka leteaka kalyaminona lao masingina,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
42020039	-
42020040	Dopa lateamopa dupame baa-kisa pii mendapua dee pisalanya paka kayapala mana setapae masingi akali mendapuame baa lamaiyoo, “Mana Lenge Akali, embame pii auu pyoo yanu pilinona,” leami-pyaa.
42020041	Dokopa Jisasame dokaita pisoo pituu, “Kataisa doko Dapiti Yumbangena lengema doko, aipuma dopa lengemape?
42020042	Losuu Wee dupanya Dapiti tangeme dapa lea lapae silyamo: ‘Kamongo Gote dokome nambanya Kamongo doko lamaiyoo, “Emba nambanya kingi tolae-kaita katape!
42020043	Katatenopa nambame embanya yandapipili dupa embanya moko pundipundi ongonya katena latona,” ’ lapae silyamo.
42020044	Doko, Dapitimi akali doko kandao, ‘Kamongona,’ lea-pyaana, aipa petala baa Dapiti yumbange jilyape?” lea-pyaa.
42020045	-
42020046	Endakali kambu piamino dupa pitakame Jisasanya pii dutupa soo kateaminopa baame baanya disaipele dupa lamaiyoo, “Nyakama aopyoo latala mana setapae masingi akali dopale jetamane lao kandao wandyuu kalyepape! Dupame yonge pee londe dupa pyoo payawani kaengema. Dupame kamapi dupanya nyakama lasa lapimi laka lao masingima. Dupame losuu anda dupanya enomba nyoo pilyanya etete auu kaengema. Nee andake nelyami dupanya petenge toko enomba nyoo dupanya pilyanya auu kaengema.
42020047	Dupame enda walyakae dupanya anda yuupi dupa minambao nyepakamaitala endakali dupame nyakama epepe lao masina latala loma londe pyoo singima. Goteme dupa-kisa kenda pipae etete andake mende setatana,” lea-pyaa.
42021001	Jisasame kandeamopa endakali kamongo dupame losuu anda andake dokonya muni pyasingi penge dokonya pyasiami-pyaa.
42021002	Dokopa enda walyakae etete tipya mendeme muni etete yakane lapoma pyasiamo kandea-pyaa.
42021003	Kandatala baame lao pituu, “Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, enda walyakae tipya dokome endakali waka dupame muni pyasalamino dupa pitaka etete ita minao pyasalamo.
42021004	Endakali dokaita pitakame nyakamanya muni sipumu dupanya kakana nyoo pyasalamino. Dopaka doko, enda dokome baa daa jipumupa baa-kisa sipumu doko pitaka pyasalamo. Baa tange nao pitipenge doko pitaka pyasalamona,” lea-pyaa.
42021005	Endakali dutupanya mendapuame losuu anda andake doko kana auu pipae dupame yati pyoo petae kateapi dee endakalimi Gote lao tama pyoo losuu anda andake doko yati pyoo oapi seteamino dupapi dupa kandatala auu pipaena leami-pyaa. Dopa leaminopa Jisasame kandatala dapa lea-pyaa.
42021006	“Nyakamame indupa kandelyamino datupa tenda gii mende ipatamopa, ae kaname petae kalyamo datupanya mendaipi mende kalyamoli petae katena lao kayala nayao, pitaka kalunya nepatamina,” lea-pyaa.
42021007	Dopa leamopa dokaitame baa pisoo pituu, “Mana Lenge Akali, embame leeno dupa gii andukupa pitana lao leepe? Naimame kongali aki mende kandatala dutupa pipenge gii doko tengesa petelyamona lao masetama laape?” leami-pyaa.
42021008	Dokopa Jisasame lao pituu, “Endakali longome nyakama minao kyakasetamina kandao kalyepape. Dupame namba epele lao ipupala, ‘Namba akali dokona,’ latami. Dee dupame, ‘Yuu etenge gii doko ipatelyamona,’ latamiaka. Dopa latamiaka doko, nyakamame dupanya pii doko watao minala nayalapape.
42021009	Tenda nyakamame yanda andake mendapua pilyamona lawapi endakali dupame nyakamanya kapomane doko yanda pimailyaminona lawapi pii dopale dupa sepala walu laa nayalapape. Dopale dupa wambao kapa pao pitamoaka doko, yuu etenge gii doko dokopaka naipatana,” lea-pyaa.
42021010	Dopa latala baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Akali tata mendeme tata mende yanda pimaita kiŋi mendenya isingi tata mendeme kiŋi mendenya isingi tata mende yanda pimaita pitami.
42021011	Dee yuu yangi dupanya titiwali andake dupa minao lopo andake dupa soo, yainame endakali longo dupa-kisa andinyoo pita. Dee endakali dupa paka pisepenge makandepi kongali andakepi dupa kaiti-kisa kaita ipantana,” lea-pyaa.
42021012	“Dopaka doko, mana dopale dupa pitaka ene ipanya pitamopa, wambao endakali mendapuame nyakama anjoo kenda pisetami. Dupame dupanya losuu anda dupanya nyakama kosimi latala anjingi anda dupanya anjinya palyetami. Dee nyakamame namba watao payataminosa dupame kapomane isingi akali andakepi kiŋipi dupa-kisa laminao patami.
42021013	Laminao patamino dokonya-kaita nyakamame nambanya lao pii lamaitami.
42021014	-
42021015	Namba tangeme nyakama pii epepi masingi epepi ditopa nyakamanya yandapipi dupa pitakame kapa pao nyakama ita minao pii tanga lao yanu pyala nayatami. Dopana, nyakamame walu laa nayao dupanya pii yanu pyakamaipenge pii mende wambao depa laa nayalapape.
42021016	Nyakamanya endangi takangepi, kaiminingipi, kaita miningipi, palupi dupame nyakama nyakamanya yandapipi dupanya kingilyaka maitami. Dopa petala nyakamanya mendapua pyao kumasetamiaka.
42021017	Nyakamame namba watao payataminosa endakali dupa pitakame nyakama kandao etete imbu kaengitami.
42021018	Dopaka doko, nyakamanya aiyomba iti mendaipi mende alu napita.
42021019	Nyakama kyoto joo katatamino dokome auu pyoo lete katatamina,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
42021020	“Tenda yanda singi amii dupame yuu Jetusaleme dokonya ipao katao kakopataminopa nyakamame kandatala taono dokonya koyapenge gii doko tengesa ipatelyamona lao masetami.
42021021	Gii dokopa Jutia yuu dokonya katatamino endakali dupa yuu manda dupanya paka pyakao pupenge jeta. Yuu taono dokonya katatamino endakali dupame taono doko yakinatala waka mendakaita pupenge jetaka. Dee yuu londatili katatamino endakali dupa taono dokonya etete napupenge jeta.
42021022	Goteme yanu nyetana latae baanya pepanya pyapae silyamo dupa pitaka gii dokopa etete kiningi jeta.
42021023	Dee kenda pipae etete andake doko yuu dakenya ipatamopa Goteme endakali datupa kandao imbu kayao yanu nyeta. Gii dokopa enda wane tongatapi enda wane andu nengepi dupa etete kondo pita!
42021024	Yandapipi dupame endakali yangi dupa uaa pepome kepatami. Dee yangi dupa anjetala laminao yuu wakale wakale dupanya puu puu pitami. Gii dokopa endakali tata waka waka dupame mende alo peta peta pyoo yuu Jetusaleme doko moko katao waima lyoo koyasoaka katao etapenge gii doko ipatali pyoo kayatamina,” lea-pyaa.
42021025	“Tenda nikipi, kanapi, buipi dupa makande mende peta peta pita. Dee solowata pete andake dupa oo lao buu minao ipatamopa isa yuu dakenya endakali tata dupa pitakame mona etete koyao pakame kumatami.
42021026	Kaitinya kuingi dupa ema-ema pitamosa kandatala makande dopale dupa yuu pitakanya ipapome lamo lao masoo yamataka lao pakame kumao lenge kolatami.
42021027	Dutupa petatamopa Endakalinya Ikiningi doko etete pupu lao tii pyoo kopa tambetambe ipatamo kandatami.
42021028	Tenda makande dutupa tee pyao pitamo gii dokopa Goteme naima lanyetamo gii doko tengesa ipatelyamona lao masoo nyakama toya katao kandalyetae kalyepape,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
42021029	Dokopa baame kongali pii dake dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame piki itapi ita wakapi dupa masalapape.
42021030	Nyakama tangeme ita dupanya mende yoko ŋaŋa pyakalyilyamo doko kandatala aiyuu kana palyanya petelyamona lao masingima.
42021031	Dopaka pyoo pitamo dupa nyakamame kandatala Goteme isingi doko tengesa ipatelyamona lao masetami.
42021032	Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, endakali indupa palelyamino dupa kumao etapala nayataminopa, dutupa pitaka pita.
42021033	Yuupi kaitipi dupa kapa pao alu pitamoaka doko, nambanya pii dupa kapa pao alu napitana,” lea-pyaa.
42021034	“Nyakamame oapi dupa pyuaniaka kayao pingipi, bia akipi longo lao nao kyakao katengepi, yuunya auu pingi dupa nea kaengepi mana dutupanya nyakamanya masingi patamopa aopyoo latala Goteme isala epenge gii doko nyakama-kisa etete alo pyao walu lasala ipatame lao tangeme tange isoo kalyepape.
42021035	Gii doko yui pandu lokalyingili pyoo yuu pitakanya endakali dupa-kisa ipata.
42021036	Nyakama kandao isoaka kalyepape! Opale pitamo dupanya wandinya nepatamana lao, dee Endakalinya Ikiningi dokonya enombanya elya nakayao toya katatamana, Gote embame naima pupu lasepe lao loma soaka kalyepape,” lea-pyaa.
42021037	Jisasame losuu anda andake dokonya kotaka dii lao endakali dupa mana lamaitala yuu kuala epeamopa baame yuu taono doko yakinatala Olipimanda dokonya palya pata pia-pyaa.
42021038	Dopa piamopa endakali dupa pitakame yongama wamba sakatatapu baanya pii salanya losuu anda andake dokonya ipata piami-pyaa.
42022001	Isataelemanya betesanya iisa napalyoo nenge Napinya Kayamo Gii epe doko ipanya tengesa pia-pyaa.
42022002	Dokopa pitisa mupapi mana setapae masingi akalipi dupame endakali dupa paka kayapala, naimame Jisasa aipa pyoo pyao kumasemape lao kaita kutao kateami-pyaa.
42022003	Gii dokopaka Satane dokome disaipele kingi ita-kisa dee lapoma dutupanya mende Jutasa kenge mende Isaketiote lenge doko-kisa ipao palea-pyaa.
42022004	Palipiamopa baame pao pitisa mupapi losuu anda andake isingi akalipi dupa-pipa pitipala nambame Jisasa doko dopa pyoo nyakama laitaka pitona lea-pyaa.
42022005	Dopa leamopa dokaitame auu kayapala, “Naimame muni mendapua emba ditamana,” leami-pyaa.
42022006	Dopa leaminopa Jutasame pii doko kapana latala Jisasa endakali dupa-pipa nakatenya, baa iki katata mendasa dokaita laitaka pitoana lao masetala malisoo katea-pyaa.
42022007	Betesanya iisa napalyoo nenge gii dokopa Napinya Kayamo Gii dokonya mena sipisipi dupa pingi gii doko epea-pyaa.
42022008	Dokopa Jisasame Pitapa Jonepa lamaiyoo, “Napinya Kayamo Gii dakenya nee doko nengeli pyoo namanalena, depa laa pupa,” lea-pyaa.
42022009	Dopa lateamopa dolapome baa lamaiyoo, “Nalimbame andusa pupala depa laapale lao embame masilipi?” leambi-pyaa.
42022010	Dopa leambinopa baame dolapo lamaiyoo, “Kandeleno! Nyilyambome yuu taono Jetusaleme dokonya patambinopa akali mendeme penge mendenya endaki kambuoo soo ipao nyilyambo kaitinisa kandanyalapomona doko watao pupala baa andaka kolandatamo dokonya awapa kolandalapape.
42022011	Kolandatala nyilyambome akali anda tange doko lamaiyoo, ‘Mana Lenge Akali dokome emba kandao, “Nambanya disaipele dupa-pipa Napinya Kayamo Nee doko palo andukunya namape?” lelyamona,’ lamaiyepape.
42022012	Dokopa baame anda namba pyoo petae ketae mendenya toko akipi dupa singi palo andake mende laitaka pyaapomona, dokonya depa laapape,” lea-pyaa.
42022013	Dopa lateamopa dolapome pao Jisasame leamoli pyoo kandatala Napinya Kayamo Nee doko depa leambi-pyaa.
42022014	Napinya Kayamo Nee napenge gii doko ipateamopa, Jisasapi baanya aposele dupa-pipa awapa nee nalanya tokonya peteami-pyaa.
42022015	Peteaminopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Namba tanda andake nalanya pituu wambao nyakama-pipa Napinya Kayamo Gii dakenya nee dake etete napuma laka lao masoo katapu.
42022016	Tenda nambame nee dake mee etete nala naenya Goteme isala ipao pituu Napinya Kayamo Nee dokonya tenge angi doko panasetatamopa nambame Napinya Kayamo Nee dakenya etete napengena lao nyakama langilyona,” lea-pyaa.
42022017	Dopa latala baame kapo penge mende nyepala Gote lao yaka pilino latala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Dake nyakamame nyepala kapa kapa lao mokosoo nalapa.
42022018	Nambame getepe ipange dake indupa nanawaka katao Goteme isala ipatamo gii dokopa natona lao nyakama langilyona,” lea-pyaa.
42022019	Dopa latala baame betesa mende nyepala Gote lao yaka pilino latala konjia-pyaa. Konjepala dokaita maiyoo pituu, “Dake nambanya yonge doko [nyakama lao masetala Gote kundi mailyona, nyakamame namba masoo dopa pyoo kalyepapena,” lea-pyaa.
42022020	Napinya Kayamo Nee doko napeaminopa baame kapo penge doko nyepala dopaka pyoo nyakama maiyoo pituu, “Nambanya taiyoko kapo penge dakenya nyakamanya kai lekelyo dokome Goteme pii enenge lao setekelyamona,” lea-pyaa.]
42022021	“Anematupa! Namba kandao yandapipi jingima akali dupa namba laitaka pitamo akali doko nambapa awapa nee nao toko dakenya pilyamo.
42022022	Kini, Endakalinya Ikiningi dokome Gotenya makande seteamo kaita dokonyaka watao minilyamo. Dopaka doko, enge nyilyamo akali doko baa koyata iki lamo!” lea-pyaa.
42022023	Dopa lateamopa dokaitame nyakamalapo lao pituu, “Naimanya akali apimi mana doko minalanya pilyape?” leami-pyaa.
42022024	Dokopa disaipele dupame naimanya mende api alyasale joo kalyamape lao pii yanda pyoloo piami-pyaa.
42022025	Dopa piaminopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Endakali tata dupanya kiŋi kalyamino dupame endakali dupanya alyasale joo katengema. Dee endakali dupame tangenya isingi akali dupa kandao akali epena lao lalyingima.
42022026	Dopaka doko, nyakamame dopa napinya, nyakamanya akali andake joo katenge doko anasale joo katapenge. Dee nyakamanya isingi akali dokome nisingi akali joo katapengeaka.
42022027	Api alyasale joo kalyape?’ Nee nao petenge akali doko alyasalepe, pande baanya nee yangao setakamaiyoo nisingi akali doko alyasalepe? Nee nao petenge akali doko alyasale joo katenge daape! Dopaka doko, namba nyakama-pipa katao nisingi akali joo kalyo.
42022028	“Namba-kisa makande pingi koo dupa ipata pilyamopa nyakamame namba mona setao awapa katengema.
42022029	Dopana, nambanya takange dokome namba kiŋi joo isoo katape leamoli pyoo, nambame nyakama kiŋi joo kalyepape langilyo.
42022030	Nyakamame nambanya isingi panda dokonyaka katao nambanya nee nao petenge toko dokonya pitipala neepi endakipi nao pititami. Dee nyakamame kiŋi dupanya petenge toko dupanya pitipala Isataele tata kingi ita-kisa dee lapoma dupanya pii tolasakamaitamina,” lea-pyaa.
42022031	Jisasame Saimone kandao, “Saimone! Saimone! Kandeleno! Ee pokenge endakali dupame wiisa angi imbupi yapengemali pyoo Satane dokome nyakama pitaka makande pyaanya anali latelyamo.
42022032	Dopaka doko, nambame embanya masoo miningi doko etete koyala naena lao loma sepekelyo. Tenda emba mona kapilyeteno gii dokopa embanya kaiminingi dupa kyoto injisepe,” lea-pyaa.
42022033	Dopa leamopa Pitame Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Kamongo, namba embapa awapa anjetae palitambanopi dee awapa pao kumatambanopi dupa kapakana lao masetelyona,” lea-pyaa.
42022034	Dopa lateamopa Jisasame Pita lamaiyoo, “Indupa kuka gii dakenya yaka pauli pii laa nayatamopa embame paa tepomasa, ‘Nambame baa nakandengena,’ laapeno lao nambame emba langilyona,” lea-pyaa.
42022035	Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Wamba nambame nyakama pupa lao pituu, ‘Munipi, nokainapi, moko peepi mende namandyuu mee pupape,’ leo dokopa, nyakama pupala opale mende daa joo kateamipi?” lao pisia-pyaa. Dokopa dokaitame baa lamaiyoo, “Naima mende daa nanjoo kateamana,” leami-pyaa.
42022036	Dokopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Mende daa nanjoo kateaminoaka doko, indupa nyakamanya akali mendeme muni pausapi mandipi mende setamo doko tange nyoo pupenge jilyamo. Dee akali mende konjua daa jetamo kandao doko, baanya yonge pee saketa dokome muni nyepala konjua mende sambapenge jilyamoaka.
42022037	Nambame nyakama langilyona, nambanya lao pii pepa pyapae singi dupa angi jina! Pii pepa pyapae singi dokonya dapa lapae silyamo: ‘Mana setapae nepenge akali dupa-pipa baa pyasoo itaki pyatamina,’ lapae silyamo pii doko indupa namba-kisa angi jalanya petelyamona,” lea-pyaa.
42022038	Dokopa dokaitame lao pituu, “Kamongo, konjua lapoma silyamo kanda!” leami-pyaa. Dokopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Kapa lumuna kayalapa!” lea-pyaa.
42022039	Dopa latala Jisasame yuu taono doko yakinatala Olipimanda dokonya pengeliaka pyoo peamopa baanya disaipele dupa awapa peami-pyaa.
42022040	Baame yuu dokonya lai petala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Makande pingi dupanya nyakama pao koyatamane lao loma soo kalyepape,” lea-pyaa.
42022041	Dopa latala baa kuki umbisale yandate pee mendai pyapengeli joo pupala luma lakao dapa lao loma sia-pyaa:
42022042	“Apane, embame namba-kisa kenda pipae silyamo dake nyoo nepakape! Dopaka doko, nambame masilyoli napinya, embame masetenoli pipina,” lea-pyaa.
42022043	[Dokopa kaitinya enjele mendeme ipupala baa kyoto injisia-pyaa.
42022044	Dopa piamoaka doko, Jisasa baa mona kendame kumapala etete puu lao loma soo kateamopa baa-kisa enaputi piamo doko taiyokome endaki lee kuili pyoo yuunya dopa lea-pyaa.]
42022045	Dopa piamopa baame loma soo etapala sakatao ipao disaipele dupa kandeamopa, dokaitame baa kandao mona kenda kayapala luu paliuu kateami-pyaa.
42022046	Dokopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakama aipuma luu paliuu kalyamipi? Makande pingi dupanya pao koyatamane lao sakatatala loma soo kalyepape,” lea-pyaa.
42022047	Jisasame dopa lao dutupa lamaiyoo kateamopa, baanya disaipele kingi ita-kisa dee lapoma dutupanya mende Jutasa lenge dokome akali kambu mende laminao baa wambao epea-pyaa. Baame Jisasa kateamo dosa tengesa ipupala Jisasa nunu pyaanya pia-pyaa.
42022048	Dokopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Jutasa, embame Endakalinya Ikiningi doko yandapipi dupa laitaka pyoo nunu pyaa epelepe?” lea-pyaa.
42022049	Dopa lateamopa akali epeamino dokaitame Jisasa-kisa pitamino dupa baanya disaipele awapa kateamino dupame kandatala, “Kamongo, naimame dokaita uaa pepome pokamape?” leami-pyaa.
42022050	Dopa latala disaipele mendeme pitisa mupa dokonya kendemane mendenya kale tolae-kaita taka lanya nepea-pyaa.
42022051	Dopa piamosa Jisasame kandatala, “Kayalapa!” lea-pyaa. Dopa latala akali dokonya kale doko watandateamopa katengeli pyakamaiya-pyaa.
42022052	Dokopa Jisasame pitisa mupapi, losuu anda andake isingi akalipi, Jutamanya isingi akalipi baa anjala epeamino dupa lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame akali pake nao makongao paenge mende anjala epele lao konjuapi kolyepepi dupa minao epelyamipi?
42022053	Koteaka lao namba nyakama-pipa losuu anda andake dokonya katengeaka doko, nyakamame namba anjala nayami. Indupa iminjingi dokome kalai isoo pipenge gii doko ipatelyamona, nyakamame dokonya kalai pyakamaiyepalena,” lea-pyaa.
42022054	Jisasame dopa lateamopa dokaitame baa puu lao minatala laminao pitisa mupa dokonya andaka peami-pyaa. Peaminopa Pitame dokaita watao tependale joo pea-pyaa.
42022055	Anda kamapisa ita yangatala endakali peteamino dokonya Pita pao konda pia-pyaa.
42022056	Dopa petala ita petesa peteamopa kalai pyakamaiyoo petenge enda mendeme baa kandokondape petala lao pituu, “Akali dake Jisasapa awapa katengembana,” lea-pyaa.
42022057	Dopa leamopa Pitame tanga lao, “Wanaku! Nambame baa nakandengena,” lea-pyaa.
42022058	Dopa lateamopa kuki tendale akali mendeme baa kandatala, “Emba akali dupanya mendeaka lamona,” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa Pitame lao pituu, “Akali yaa! Namba dupanya mende daana,” lea-pyaa.
42022059	Dee kiloko gii mendai jowapi mende pateamopa, akali mendeme, “Kini etete, baa akali dokopa awapa kateambina, baa Galili tangeakana!” lao kyoto joo lea-pyaa.
42022060	Dopa leamopa Pitame baa lamaiyoo, “Akali yaa! Embame pii leleno akali doko namba nakandengena,” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamo awapa yaka pauli pii mende lalu pia-pyaa.
42022061	Dopa lateamopa Kamongo dokome kapilyetala Pita kandokondape pia-pyaa. Dopa piamopa Kamongome baa kandao, “Indupa kuka gii dakenya yaka pauli pii nalatamopa paa tepomasa embame namba nakandengena laapenona,” leamo pii doko Pitame masia-pyaa.
42022062	Masetala kamaka pupala etete yamataka lao ee lea-pyaa.
42022063	Dokopa Jisasa minatae kateamino akali dupame baa minoko pyoo minakaseta pyapa pyoo kateami-pyaa.
42022064	Dokaitame baanya lengelyaapi yaki petala pyao pituu, “Emba pilyamo doko dokome pilyamo lao naima langipi!” leami-pyaa.
42022065	Dee dupame baa kandao lamba lao pii koo longo waipa soo leami-pyaa.
42022066	-
42022067	Yuu yongemaopa Jutamanya isingi akalipi, pitisa mupapi, mana setapae masingi akalipi dupa pyasoo kambuiyami-pyaa. Dokopa akali yangimi Jisasa laminao nyakamanya kanjole dupa kambuiyamino dokonya epeami-pyaa. Ipateaminopa dokaitame baa pisoo, “Emba Kataisa doko tamo kandao doko, naima langi!” leami-pyaa. Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nambame pii doko yanu pyato kandao doko, nyakamame kiningina lao masala nayatami.
42022068	Dee nambame nyakama pii mende pisoto kandao doko, yanu pyakala nayatamiaka.
42022069	Dopaka doko, indupa pituu tanga tangapi Endakalinya Ikiningi dokome Gote etete pupu lapae dokonya kingi tolae-kaita katatana,” lea-pyaa.
42022070	Dopa leamopa dokaita pitakame lao pituu, “Dopa tamo doko, emba Gote Ikiningi taa aipape?” leami-pyaa. Dokopa baame dupa lamaiyoo, “Nyakama tangeme namba kandao latelyamino dokokana,” lea-pyaa.
42022071	Dopa lateamopa dokaitame nyakamalapo lao pituu, “Aipuma naimame endakali mendapuanya pii deaka nyetamape? Baame pii lapumu dutupa naimame sepelyamanona!” leami-pyaa.
42023001	Dopa lateaminopa kambuoo kateamino akali dupa pitakame sakatatala Jisasa laminao Pailate kateasa peami-pyaa.
42023002	Pupala dokaitame baa tee pyao kosimi lao pituu, “Naima tata dupame kapomane minakasalapale lao akali dakeme dapa lenge: ‘Kapomane Isingi Mupa doko muni takisa namaiyepape!’ lenge. Dee baame baa tange kandao, ‘Namba Kataisa. Namba kiŋi kalyona,’ leamopa naimame siamana,” leami-pyaa.
42023003	Dokopa Pailateme baa pisoo, “Emba Jutamanya Kiŋi dokope?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa Jisasame Pailatenya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Embame latelenona,” lea-pyaa.
42023004	Dokopa Pailateme pitisa mupapi endakali limbao kateamino dupapi dupa lamaiyoo, “Nambame akali dake kosimi lapenge tenge mende panala naelyamona,” lea-pyaa.
42023005	Dopa leamoaka doko, dokaitame kyoto joo lao, “Akali dakeme mana lamaipya dokome endakali dupa mona mende pali-pali petakamaiya. Baame Galili yuu dokonya pituu sakatatala lamaiyoo Jutia yuu pitakanya awali lao endakali pitaka mona sakatasetakamaitala indupa ae ipatelyamona,” leami-pyaa.
42023006	Pailateme pii dutupa sepala dokaita pisoo, “Akali dake Galili tange mendepe?” lea-pyaa.
42023007	Dopa leamopa dokaitame, “Jisasa baa akali Etoteme yuu isingi Galili dotena tangena,” lao lamaiyami-pyaa. Dokopa Pailateme akali Galili dotena tange Jisasa doko Etoteme kosimi lapengena lao masetala, Etote doko Jetusaleme dokonya kateamopaka dokonyana, yanda singi amii mendapuame Jisasa laminao Etote kateasa pena lea-pyaa.
42023008	Wamba Etoteme Jisasanya lao pii mendapua sepala kongali mende pitamo kandapu laka lao masoo gii longo malisoo katea-pyaa. Malisoo kateamopa Jisasa epeamo doko kandatala mona etete yaepea-pyaa.
42023009	Dokopa baame pii longo lao Jisasa pisia-pyaa. Pisiamoaka doko, Jisasame pii mendaipi mende yanu napia-pyaa.
42023010	Dokopa pitisa mupapi mana setapae masingi akalipi dupame tengesa ipao katapala kyoto joo Jisasa kosimi leami-pyaa.
42023011	Dopa piaminopa Etote mauwapi baanya yanda singi amii dupapimi Jisasa kilya kandao baa-kisa makande koo longo minao baa minakasoo yonge pee epe etete mendeme baa yati pyakamaiyami-pyaa. Dopa petakamaiyaminopa Etoteme yanda singi mendapuame baa laminao Pailate kateamo dokonya pilyina lea-pyaa.
42023012	Wamba Etote Pailatepa yandapipi joo kateambinoaka doko, gii dokopa kaita miningi jiambi-pyaa.
42023013	Dokopa Pailateme pitisa mupapi, isingi akalipi, dee endakali meepi dupa epena lao nyoo limbia-pyaa.
42023014	Ipao limbateaminopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Akali dakeme ‘Nyakamame kapomane minakasalapa!’ lengena lao kosimi lalamino dokonya nambame baa nyakamanya enombasa makande pyoo pisipupa kosimi lapenge tenge dopale mendaipi mende baa-kisa panala naelyamo.
42023015	-
42023016	Dee Etoteme apata tenge kutao kayapala baa pilyoo naima-kisa epena lameaka lamona salapape. Akali dake pyao kumasepenge mana koopi mende baame naminia lamo dokonya nambame baa konjame pyapala yakinatoana,” Pailateme dopa lea-pyaa.
42023017	-
42023019	Gii dokopa akali Batapasa lenge mende anjetae palea-pyaa. Akali dokome yuu taono Jetusaleme dokonya kapomane yanda pimaita endakali mendapua pyao kumaseta petala anjetae palea-pyaa. [Ee kana dii lao Isataelemanya Napinya Kayamo Gii epe doko epelyali pyoo Pailateme dokaitanya endakali anjetae dupanya mendai mende mokata pyakamaingi-pyaa.] Dokonya endakali kambu pyao kateamino dupa pitakame puu lao, “Akali dake pyao kumasetala Batapasa doko mokakape!” leami-pyaa.
42023020	Dopa lateaminopa Pailateme Jisasa mokapuli lao masetala pii wamba lateamo dokoaka puu lao dokaita dee lamaiya-pyaa.
42023021	Lamaitiamoaka doko, dokaitame puu lao lao, “Baa ita pokonya pyao yuka! Pyao yuka!” lao deaka leami-pyaa.
42023022	Dokopa Pailateme paa tepo pyoo dokaita lamaiyoo, “Akali dakeme koo aki mende piape? Nambame baa pyao kumasepenge tenge mende panala naelyamona baa konjame pyapala yakinatoana,” lea-pyaa.
42023023	Dopaka doko, dokaitame kongapu pyao ae lao, “Baa ita pokonya pyao yuka!” leamino dokome Pailatenya pii leamo doko pyaanya isa palyiami-pyaa.
42023024	Dopa piamino kandatala Pailateme dokaitanya pii watao minatala leaminoli pina kayatowana lao masia-pyaa.
42023025	Dopa lao masetala dokaitame akali Batapasa lenge kapomane yanda pimaita endakali pyao kumaseta petala anjetae paleamo doko mokekena leaminosa baame mokakamaiya-pyaa. Dopa petala baame dokaitanya leaminoli pyakamaina lao Jisasa baa yanda singi dupa maiya-pyaa.
42023026	Dokopa yanda singi dupame Jisasa ita pokonya pyao yukualanya laminao peaminopa akali Saimone lenge yuu taono Saitini tange mende Jetusaleme ipanya epeamopa kaitinisa kandanyiami-pyaa. Kandanyetala Jisasanya ita poko doko sakamaina lao baanya lataiyanya nyoo sakamaiyaminopa baame soo Jisasa watao pea-pyaa.
42023027	Dokopa endakali kambu andake mendeme Jisasa watao peami-pyaa. Enda longo dupame baa lao masetala ee lao yamataka lao peami-pyaa.
42023028	-
42023030	Dopa lao peaminopa Jisasame kapilyetala dupa lamaiyoo, “Tenda gii doko ipatamopa endakali dupame, ‘Enda ingi pyakilyetae, wane namandenge, wane andu nanenge enda dupa iki mona yaepatae pilyaminona,’ latami. Tenda endakali dupame ‘Yuu manda dupa longapala naima pyaa!’ latami. Dee yuu manda yakane dupame, ‘Naima pyao sanga pyaa!’ lao katatami. Dopana, nyakama Jetusaleme tange enda dupame namba kandao ee laa nayalapape. Nyakama tangepi nayakamanya wanepi dupa lao masoo ee laapape.
42023031	Indupa makande dapale dupa ita saka doko-kisa setelyamino doko tenda ita sapu dupa-kisa makande aipale mende kapa pao ipatape?” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
42023032	Yanda singi dupame Jisasa pyao kumasalanya laminao pao pituu akali mana koo miningi waka lapoma baa-pipa awapa pyao kumasalanya laminao peamiaka-pyaa.
42023033	Dokaitame yuu kenge Matenakulimanda lenge dokonya pao lai petala, Jisasa baa ita poko mendenya pyao yukuiyami-pyaa. Mana koo miningi akali dolaponya mende Jisasanya kingi tolae-kaita pyao yukuotala, mende doko koya-kaita pyao yukuiyami-pyaa.
42023034	[Yukuoteaminopa Jisasame lao pituu, “Dokaitame masala nayao pilyaminona, Apane, embame dupanya koo dokonya yanu dupa nyala naenya kayape!” lea-pyaa.] Yanda singi dupame kana yakane dupa pyasoo male pyoo ita miniamino akali dupame Jisasanya yonge pee dupa mokosoo nyiami-pyaa.
42023035	Gii dokopa endakali dupame kandatae kateaminopa Jutamanya isingi akali dupame Jisasa kandao lamba lao pituu, “Baame endakali waka dupa nisiana baa akali Goteme yapao nyepae kiningi Kataisa tamo kandao doko, baame baa tange nisinana!” leami-pyaa.
42023036	-
42023037	Dopa lateaminopa yanda singi dupame tengesa ipupala baa minakasoo waene kaa pipae mende nena lao maiyoo pituu, “Emba Jutamanya Kiŋi tamo kandao doko, embame emba tange nisa!” leami-pyaa.
42023038	Jisasa yukuotae kateamo ita poko dokonya ketae dosa pepa mende dapa lao pyatae katea-pyaa: ‘Dake Jutamanya Kiŋi dokona,’ lao pyatae katea-pyaa.
42023039	Dee akali kalai koo pingi lapoma pyao yukuiyamino dolaponya mendeme Jisasa kandao lamba lao pituu, “Emba Kataisa doko tamo kandao, embame emba tange nisetala, nalimba apata nisa!” lea-pyaa.
42023040	Dopa leamoaka doko, koo pingi akali mende dokome baa pyalanya lao, “Embame kenda pipae baame nyilyamo dopaleaka nyoo pituu Gote paka nakaelepe?
42023041	Nalimbame koo piambano dokonya yanu nyilyambano doko kapa pelyamo. Dopaka doko, akali dakeme koo mende napiana,” lea-pyaa.
42023042	Dopa latala baame Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Jisasa, embame kiŋi jetala ipateno gii dokopa namba kame sala nayape!” lea-pyaa.
42023043	Dokopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Nambame emba kiningi langilyo! Indupaka Patandisa yuu dokonya pao kalyambanona,” lea-pyaa.
42023044	-
42023045	Kotaka andawai pungupungu dokonya pituu yuu doko pitaka kuiyatala, kuiyatae katao pao alemandi kiloko tepo lea-pyaa. Dee losuu anda andake dokonya lapalapa andake yukuotae katenge doko kainanya lapyepala lapoma pia-pyaa.
42023046	Dokopa Jisasame etete puu lao ae lao, “Apane! Nambanya imambu doko emba dilyona, embame isoo katakape!” latala kumalu pia-pyaa.
42023047	Yanda singi amii isingi akali dokome piamo doko kandatala Gote lalyoo, “Kiningi etete, akali dake tolatae lamona,” lea-pyaa.
42023048	Dokopa endakali longo kambu pyao kanja epeamino dupame piamo dupa kandatala mona kenda kayao kingi tukyoo andaka pilyiami-pyaa.
42023049	Gii undinaka Jisasapa awapa kateamino akali dupa pitakapi, dee yuu Galili pituu Jisasapa awapa peamino enda dupapi dupame yuu dokonya kuki tependale katao piamo dupa kandatae kateami-pyaa.
42023050	-
42023051	Wamba akali Josepe lenge mende Jutamanya yuu taono Atimatia lenge dokonya katao Jetusaleme ipao katea-pyaa. Baame mana epe tolao minao katao Goteme isala ipatana lao masetala malisoo katea-pyaa. Dee baa Jutamanya kanjole joo kateamoaka doko, kanjole waka dupame Jisasa pyao kumasemana lao pii wasiamino gii dokopa baame ŋee laa naya-pyaa. Dee angi piamino dokopa baame ŋee naleaka-pyaa.
42023052	Josepe dokome akali Pailate peteasa pupala Jisasa doko dina lao tee lea-pyaa.
42023053	Dopa lao tee lateamopa Pailateme kapana lea-pyaa. Dokopa baame Jisasa kondao nyepala lapalapa epe kyoto mendeme ambo pyapala nyoo soo ipao malu pipenge kananda tumbyepae wamba endakali kumapae mende setala nayami mendenya setea-pyaa.
42023054	Doko kalai yuungi mendenya dopa pia-pyaa. Gii doko alemanjetala Sambasa gii doko ipanya tengesa petea-pyaa.
42023055	Dopa piamopa enda wamba Galili yuu dokonya pituu Jisasa watao payamino dupame akali Josepe doko watao pao malu pingi panda dokonya baame Jisasa aipa pyoo setelyape lao kanja peami-pyaa.
42023056	Kandatala andaka pilyetala welepi opale tunduma pipae mendapuame Jisasanya yonge doko kai pyatamana lao depa latala Sambasa gii dokonya mana singili pyoo mee andaka peteami-pyaa.
42024001	Sandee gii dokonya enda dutupa yongama wamba sakatatala welepi opale tunduma pipaepi mendapua wamba depa lanya seteamino dupa mandyuu malu dokonya peami-pyaa.
42024002	Pupala kandeaminopa kana doko nyoo kapya latae sia-pyaa.
42024003	Dokopa enda dokaitame malu dokonya kolandatala Kamongo Jisasa kutiaminopa nasia-pyaa.
42024004	Dopa piamosa enda dupame mona etete longo lao masoo kateaminopa akali lapoma yonge pee kyoo lao polepole pipae pingi mendalapo nyakama kateami dosa ipao kalyuu piambi-pyaa.
42024005	Dokopa enda dupame paka kayapala yuu kandanatae siaminopa, akali dolapome dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakame aipuma akali saka katenge doko endakali kumapae setenge panda dakenya kutilyamipi?
42024006	-
42024007	[Baa sakatalamo. Dakenya nasilyamo.] Wamba baa Galili kateamo gii dokopa baame nyakama langyoo, ‘Akali mendeme Endakalinya Ikiningi doko endakali koo pingi dupa laitaka pitamopa dupame baa ita pokonya pyao yukuotami. Dopa petataminopa, baa kumapala koto teponya sakatatana,’ leamo doko masalapa,” leambi-pyaa.
42024008	Dopa lateambinopa enda dokaitame pii wamba Jisasame leamo dupa masiami-pyaa.
42024009	-
42024011	Masetala Makatala tange enda Matia dokopi, enda Joana lenge dokopi, Jemesa endangi Matia dokopi, dee enda waka mendatupa nyakama-pipa kateamino dupapi dupame malu doko yakinatala pilyoo ipupala kandeamino dupapi siamino dupapi dutupa pitaka akali kingi ita mende-kisa dee mendai dutupapi endakali wakapi dupa lamaiyami-pyaa. Enda dutupame aposele dutupa pii lamaitiaminoaka doko, dokaitame sepala mee pii kyakao lelyaminona latala kiningina lao masala nayami-pyaa.
42024012	[Dopaka doko, Pitame sakatala alo pyao pupala malu dokonya pongatala elyo pyao kandeamopa wamba Jisasanya yonge doko lapalapame ambo pyatae doko iki mee kakopae siamo kandea-pyaa. Kandatala andaka pilyoo pao pituu piamo doko lao moname longo lao masoo pea-pyaa.]
42024013	Gii dokopaka akali dupanya lapoma yuu taono yakane Emeasa lenge dokonya paanya peambi-pyaa. Yuu taono Emeasa doko Jetusaleme tengesale kilomita kingi ita-kisa dee lapoma joo singi-pyaa.
42024014	Akali dolapome kaitinisa pao pituu piamo dupanya lao laloo pyoo peambi-pyaa.
42024015	Dokopa Jisasame akali dolapo watanyetala awapa peami-pyaa.
42024016	Peaminopa mendita mendeme akali dolaponya lenge nyiamosa doko Jisasa lamona lao nakandeambi-pyaa.
42024017	Dokopa baame dolapo pisoo, “Nyilyambome aki pii mende laloo pyoo pelyambipi?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa akali dolapome katapala mona kenda kayao enomba kumiambi-pyaa.
42024018	Dopa petala akali dolaponya mende kenge Kiliopasa lenge dokome baanya pii yanu pyao, “Endakali Jetusaleme katenge dupa pitakame kuaka alembopi gii dupanya pipumu dupa kandao soo katapumana emba iki nasipipi?” lea-pyaa.
42024019	Dopa lateamopa baame akali dolapo pisoo, “Dupa aki mendapuape?” lea-pyaa. Dokopa akali dolapome pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Akali Nasatete tange Jisasa lenge doko-kisa pipumu dupa lao lelyambano. Baame kalai pupu lapaepi pii pupu lapaepi dupa endakali pitakanya lengelyaapipi Gotenya lengelyaapipi dupanya panao pyoo katea. Baa akali potopesa mende lamo.
42024020	-
42024021	Kini, wambao naima Isataele dupa baame pyoo nyala epeana lao masoo kateama. Dopaka doko, naimanya isingi akalipi pitisa mupapi dupame kapomaneme baa kosimi latala pyao kumasina lao maiyami. Maitiaminopa dupame baa ita pokonya pyao yukuoteaminopa, indupa koto tepo jilyamo.
42024022	-
42024023	Indupa naima tata dokonya enda mendatupame yongama wamba Jisasa malu dokonya kanja pupala Jisasa kutao kayapala pilyoo ipao pii dapa lao naima mona sakatasalamino: ‘Goteme enjele mendalapo panasimosa naima kanjemano. Enjele dolapome, “Baa saka kalyamona,” lambino,’ lao enda dupame naima mona sakatasalamino.
42024024	Dokopa naimanya akali mendatupame malu dokonya kanja pupimino doko enda dutupame pii wamba lamino mendai dokoaka kandatala baa kanja nayalamini lamona,” leambi-pyaa.
42024025	Dokopa Jisasame akali dolapo lamaiyoo, “Nyilyambo akali mona napalenge joo kalyambino. Wamba potopesa dupame pii leamino dupa pitaka yapa kiningina lao masala naenge nyilyambo mona kandanatae lamo.
42024026	Kataisa dokome tanda nyiamo dutupa etete nanyina kayapenge jiape? Dee baanya kenge andake etete nanyina kayapengeakape?” lea-pyaa.
42024027	Dopa latala baame baa tange kandao Mosese mauwapi potopesa dupa pitakapimi pii pepa pyanya seteamino dupa pitakanya tenge dupa akali dolapo lamaiya-pyaa.
42024028	Kaitini pao akali dolapo paanya peambino yuu Emeasa lenge dokonya tengesa pyakameaminopa Jisasa baa waka mendasa paanya pele lao pea-pyaa.
42024029	Dopa piamopa akali dolapome Jisasa minanjoo, “Yuu kualanya niki landa pyatelyamona, emba nalimba-pipa palimana kaya,” leambi-pyaa. Dopa leambinopa baa akali dolapo-pipa palimana lao andaka kolandea-pyaa.
42024030	Kolandatala dolapo-pipa nee nalanya petenge toko dokonya pituu, Jisasame betesa mende nyepala Gote embame yaka pilino lao loma setala konjia-pyaa. Konjepala akali dolapo maiya-pyaa.
42024031	Dokopa akali dolaponya lenge tii peteamopa baa Jisasa lamo lao kandeambi-pyaa. Dokopa baa dolaponya enombasa alu pia-pyaa.
42024032	Alu peteamopa nyilyambolapo lao pituu, “Naima kaita ipumanopa baame pii mendapua pepa pyapae singi dokonya lao tenge dupa nalimba langyomo dokopa nalimbanya mona etete yangalyalamona,” leambi-pyaa.
42024033	Dopa latala nyalambo yapa sakatao Jetusaleme pilyetala, akali kingi ita-kisa dee mendai dutupapi dee disaipele mendatupa awapa kambu pyao peteamino dupapi dutupa kandeambi-pyaa.
42024034	Dokopa dokaitame akali dolapo lamaiyoo, “Kamongo doko kiningi etete sakatalame lamo. Saimoneme baa kandatalame lamona,” leami-pyaa.
42024035	Dopa leaminopa dolapo kaitinisa peambinopa opale piamo dupapi dee baame betesa mende konjiamopa nyilyambome Jisasa lamo lao masiambino dokopi dupa dokaita lamaiyambi-pyaa.
42024036	Akali dolapome pii dokonya lao lamaiyoo peteambinopa Jisasa nyakamanya kainanya ipao katapala, “Nyakama mona lyuu lao pilyepapena!” lamaiya-pyaa.
42024037	Dokopa dokaitame baa kandatala timango mende lamo lao masetala pakame kumiami-pyaa.
42024038	Dopa piaminoaka doko, baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakama aipuma pakame kumao namba kiningi Jisasana lao masala naelyamipi?
42024039	Nyakamame nambanya kingi mokopi dupa kandalapa! Nambaka kalyo! Nyakamame namba kingimi minasoo kandalapa! Namba timango pili kandao doko, yongepi kulipi nambanya palipumopa kandelyamino dopale napalipyalina,” lea-pyaa.
42024040	Dopa latala baame baanya kingi mokopi dupa dokaitame minasoo kandena lao laitaka pia-pyaa.
42024041	Dokaitame kandatala mona etete yaepao tama piamino dokome baa kiningina lao masala nayaminosa baame dokaita pisoo, “Nee mendapua silyape?” lea-pyaa.
42024042	-
42024043	Dopa leamopa dokaitame wapaka yangapae mende baa maiyaminopa, baame nyoo neamo kandeami-pyaa.
42024044	Dee baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Wamba namba nyakama-pipa awapa katao langioli pyoo Mosesenya piipi, potopesa dupanya piipi, Losuu Wee dupanyapi dupanya nambanya lao pii pepa pyao setamino dupa pitaka kiningi etete jiana,” lea-pyaa.
42024045	Dopa latala pii wambatae pepanya pyapae singi tenge dupa masina lao baame dokaita masingi sakatasakamaiya-pyaa.
42024046	Dopa petala baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Pepa pyapae dokome Kataisa kandao: ‘Baa tanda nao kumapala koto tepo dokonya malunya sakatata.
42024047	Dee endakalimi Jetusaleme dakenya katao kalai doko tee pyao petala Kataisa dokonya kenge doko minao endakali tata waka dupa pitaka kandao, “Goteme nyakamanya koo dupa kunanya nepakenalena mona kapilyalapa,” lao pii lamaitami.’
42024048	Nyakamame dutupa kandatala panao lamaipenge akali joo kalyamino.
42024049	Dopana, nambanya Takangeme epe mende nyakama ditona leamo doko nambame nyakama dina lelyo. Ketae kaitinya katenge dokome nyakama pupu lasetamo gii doko nyakamame yuu taono dakenya malisoo kalyepape,” lea-pyaa.
42024050	Maitakao Jisasame Jetusaleme yuu doko yakinatala dokaita laminao pao yuu taono Betani dokonya tuu latala dokaita-kisa baanya kingi pee latae katao Goteme dokaita nisina lao loma sia-pyaa.
42024051	Dopa lao katao dokaita yakinatala kuki umbisale pateamopa Goteme baa kaiti-kisa lanyia-pyaa.
42024052	Dokopa dokaitame baa lao tama petala pilyoo Jetusaleme pao pituu mona etete yaepao peami-pyaa.
42024053	Pupala Jetusaleme losuu anda andake dokonyaka katao Gote lalyoo kateami-pyaa.
43001001	Tee pyala nayamo dokopa Pii doko katea-pyaa. Pii doko Gote-pipa awapa katea-pyaa. Pii doko baa Gote.
43001002	Tee pyala nayamo dokopa Pii dokopa Gote-pipa katea-pyaa.
43001003	Baame dupa pitaka pyoo injia-pyaa. Dupanya mende waka mendenya-kaita pyakalyala nayamopa baame pyoo injia-pyaa.
43001004	Baa ketae lete katenge doko sia-pyaa. Lete katenge dokome endakali dupa tii pisia-pyaa.
43001005	Tii pipae dokome iminjetae doko tii pisilyamopa iminjetae dokome tii pipae doko ita naminingi.
43001006	Akali mende Goteme epena leamopa ipao katea. Baa kenge Jone lenge.
43001007	Baame pii lamaiyanya ipao katea. Endakali dupa pitakame baanya pii sepala masoo minina lao baame tii pipae dokonya lao pii lamaiyanya ipao katea.
43001008	Jone baa tii pipae doko daa. Dopaka doko, baame tii pipae dokonya lao pii lamaiyanya ipao katea.
43001009	Endakali dupa pitaka tii pisoo katenge tii pipae angi doko isa yuunya epea.
43001010	Baame yuu dake pyoo injetala kateamopa yuunya endakali dupame baa masala nayami.
43001011	Baa baanya yuu tenge dokonya epeamopa baanya endakali dupame baa lanyala nayami.
43001012	Dopaka doko, endakali baa lanyoo baa lao masoo miniami dupa baame kapana latala Gotenya wane injisia.
43001013	Dupa Gotenya wane jiamino doko, endangi takangepinya ipangepi, yonge itangepi, endakalimi mandenge mana dokonyapi dupanya mendenya daa. Gote tangeme dupa baanya wanena lao mandea.
43001014	Pii doko endakali jetala naimanya kainanya katea. Naimame baanya tii pipae doko kandeama. Tii pipae dopale doko Ikiningi mendai iki dokome Takange-kisa nyia. Baa mona epe palyakao paliuu kiningi mana minalakao minao katenge.
43001015	Joneme baanya lao pii puu lao dapa lea: “Akali doko kandao nambame nyakama langyoo, ‘Namba watao maitapyao epelyamo akali doko nambanya alyasale. Doko, namba namandengesa baa wamba katea-pyaana,’” lea.
43001016	Baa mona epe palyakao palipala naima pitaka kandao epawaka mona epe palea.
43001017	Doko, Goteme mana setapae dupa Mosese-kisa maiya-pyaa. Dopaka doko, mona epe palengepa kiningi manapa dolapo Jisasa Kataisa-kisa epea.
43001018	Endakalimi Gote paa mendaipi mende etete nakandeami. Gotenya Ikiningi Gote mendai iki Takangenya mona itangenya katenge dokome Gote doko dopalena lao panao naima langia.
43001019	-
43001020	Jetusaleme tange Juta dupame Jone doko aipa pipaepe lao akali pitisapi Lipaipi mendapuame pisoo sala pena leaminopa Jone baa tangeme yapae napyoo tolao lao panao pituu, “Namba Kataisa doko daana,” lea.
43001021	Dopa leamopa dokaitame baa pisoo, “Dopa tamo kandao doko, emba apipi? Emba Ilainjape?” leami. Dopa leaminopa baame, “Namba doko daana,” lea. Dokopa dokaitame, “Emba akali Potopesa dokope?” leami. Baame yanu pyao, “Daana,” lea.
43001022	Dopa leamopa dokaitame baa pisoo, “Embame emba dopa pipaena lao naima langi. Naimame pao naima pupa lalamino akali dupa lamaimana, embame emba tange kandao apina leepe?” leami.
43001023	Dopa leaminopa baame yanu pyao “Akali potopesa Aisayame lao pituu, ‘Akali mendeme endakali napalenge yuu dokonya katapala Kamongonya kaitini doko tolasakamaiyepape lao wii lao katatana,’ lea-pyomo doko nambana,” lea.
43001024	Patasi dupame akali dokaita pena leami.
43001025	Dokaitame baa pisoo, “Emba Kataisa doko mauwapi, Ilainja mauwapi, Potopesa doko mauwapi dupanya mende daa tamo kandao doko, aipuma endakali dupa kaimbu pilipi?” leami.
43001026	Dokopa Joneme yanu pyao, “Nambame endakali dupa endakimi kaimbu pilyona, nyakamanya kainanya akali mende kalyamona doko nyakamame nakandelyamino.
43001027	Baa namba watao maitapyao ipanya pilyamo. Nambame baanya moko pee pingi kende doko tata lakamaipenge namba epe daana,” lea.
43001028	Dutupa endaki Jotane omotena Joneme kaimbu pyakamaiyoo kateamo yuu Betani dokonya yaka lea.
43001029	Taita dopa pyoo Joneme baa kateasa Jisasa epeamo kandatala lao pituu, “Gotenya Sipisipi Yakane dokome yuunya endakali dupa pitakanya koo dupa kunanya nepenge dokona kanjepa!
43001030	Nambame akali doko kandao lao pituu, ‘Namba watao maitapyao epelyamo akali doko namabanya alyasale. Doko, namba namandengesa baa wamba katea-pyaana,’ leo.
43001031	Nambame baa apipi lao kanja nayawaka doko, baa Isataele endakali dupa laitaka pyaanya nambame endakimi dupanya ipao kaimbu pyakamaiyona,” lea.
43001032	Joneme pii lamaiyoo lao pituu, “Sipitisa doko yaka maileo joo kaiti-kisa katao isa ipao baa-kisa peteamo kandeo.
43001033	Nambame baa kanja nayao katewaka doko, endakimi kaimbu pyakamaiya puu leamo Gote dokome namba langyoo, ‘Sipitisa doko ipao akali mende-kisa pititamo kandate. Akali dokome Oli Sipitisa dokome kaimbu pyakamaitana,’ lea.
43001034	Nambame akali doko kandatala baa Gotenya Ikiningi dokona lapuna,” Joneme lea.
43001035	Oo yongama Jone baa dee baanya akali disaipele dupanya lapoma-pipa dokonya awapa katea.
43001036	Baame Jisasa ipao peamo kandatala, “Gotenya Sipisipi Yakane doko kanjepa,” lea.
43001037	Baame dopa leamo doko disaipele dolapome sepala Jisasa watao peambi.
43001038	Watao peambinopa Jisasame maitakaita kandapilyetala dolapo pisoo, “Nyilyambo aki kutao epelyambipi?” lea. Dopa leamopa dolapome baa pisoo, “Lapae, emba andusa palengepe?” leambi. (Kenge Lapae doko kapilyoo, Mana Lenge Akali lenge.)
43001039	Baame dolapo lamaiyoo, “Kanjepale ipupa,” lea. Dokopa dolapome pao baa palenge anda doko kandatala koto doko baa-pipa kateami. Dokopa yuu alemanjetala kiloko gii kitomende laa epea.
43001040	Joneme leamo doko sepala Jisasa watao peambino akali dolaponya mende doko Saimone Pitanya kaiminingi Endutu.
43001041	Akali dokome pupae lao pao baanya kaiminingi Saimone lenge doko kandatala lamaiyoo, “Nalimbame Mesaya doko kandatalambanona,” lea-pyaa. (Kenge Mesaya doko kapilyoo Kataisa lenge.)
43001042	Dopa latala baame Saimone laminao Jisasa kateasa epea. Dokopa Jisasame baa kandatala lao pituu, “Emba Saimone, Jone ikiningi dokona, emba kandao kenge Sipasa lelyona,” lea. (Kenge Sipasa doko kapilyoo Pita lenge. Kenge dolaponya tenge doko kana.)
43001043	Oo yongama Jisasa baa Galili yuu dokonya patoo lao masetala, pao baame Pilipa kandatala lamaiyoo, “Emba namba watao ipu,” lea.
43001044	Pilipa baa Endutupa Pitapa-pipa yuu taono mendai Betesaita tangeaka.
43001045	Pilipame Nataniele kutao kandatala lamaiyoo, “Mana setapae buku dupanya Moseseme akali mendenya lao pepa piapi dee potopesa dupame apata akali dokonya lao pepa piamipi akali doko kandatalamano. Baa Jisasa. Baa Josepe ikiningi Nasatete tangena,” lea-pyaa.
43001046	Dopa leamopa Natanieleme baa lamaiyoo, “Opale epe mende Nasatete yuu dokonya kapa pao pyakalyetape?” lea-pyaa. Pilipame baa lamaiyoo, “Kanjale ipu,” lea-pyaa.
43001047	Jisasame baa kateasa Nataniele epeamo kandatala baa kandao, “Endakali minakasala naenge Isataele angi dake kanjepa,” lea.
43001048	Natanieleme baa pisoo, “Aipa petala embame namba kandelepe?” lea. Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Pilipame emba ipu latala nayapumopa, emba piki ita tenge dokonya kataleno dokopa kanjona,” lea.
43001049	Natanieleme yanu pyao, “Mana Lenge Akali, emba Gote Ikiningi, Isataelemanya Kiŋi dokona,” lea.
43001050	Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Nambame emba piki ita tenge dokonya katapinopa kanjona lelyo dokonya masoo minate aipape? Tanga embame dake ita minao etete andake dupa kandatena,” lea.
43001051	Dopa latala dee baa lamaiyoo, “Nambame nyakama etete kiningi langilyona, kaiti doko wakale petae setamopa Endakalinya Ikiningi doko-kisa Gotenya enjele dupa lalyoo lanawapi pyoo katatamino kandatamina,” lea.
43002001	Duma dopa pyoo Galili yuu taono Kena dokonya akali mendenya enda watapae pia. Enda watapae piamo dokonya Jisasa endangi doko petea.
43002002	Dee Jisasapi baanya disaiple dupapi apata dokonya epena leamiaka-pyaa.
43002003	Maitakao endaki waene nao etapeaminopa Jisasa endangi dokome Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Waene nasilyamo,” lea.
43002004	Dopa leamopa Jisasame endangi lamaiyoo, “Enda, nambanya gii doko ipatala naelyamona nambame pipenge dupa embame namba langya nayape,” lea.
43002005	Dokopa baanya endangi dokome kalai akali dupa lamaiyoo, “Baame nyakama mende langitamo doko nyakamame watao pyepapena,” lea.
43002006	Dosa endaki penge kaname wasepae tokange sia. Penge dopale dupanya Juta dupame endaki kamuoo kaimbu pingima. Endaki penge dutupanya mendai mendai lawanya lenge kingi ita tukulapopi andate mende-kisa dee kingi ita lapopi dopa pyoo mende petenge.
43002007	Jisasame kalai akali dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame penge datupanya endaki kamualapa,” lea. Dopa leamopa dokaitame kamuoo etete tumbasiami.
43002008	Dopa peteaminopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Dokonya mendatupa epapu kamuoo nyepala nee isilyamo akali doko maiya pupa,” lea. Dopa leamopa dokaitame maiya peami.
43002009	-
43002010	Dokopa nee isiamo akali dokome endaki doko nao siamopa waene jia. Dopa piamopa baame anjatae nyalamipi lao masala naya. Masala nayamoaka doko, kalai akali endaki kamuoo nyiamino dupame masiami. Akali nee isiamo dokome akali enda watapae piamo doko epena latala lamaiyoo, “Endakali pitakame waene epe doko wambao nyoo mokosoo maingima. Waene epe doko napelyamino dokopa koole dupa nyoo mokosoo maingima. Dopa pingimaka doko, embame waene epe dake mee sina kayapala epapu nyoo epelenona,” lea.
43002011	Jisasame kandasoo kongali doko Galili yuu taono Kena dokonya pia. Dopa pyoo baame baanya tii pipae doko panasiamopa baanya disaipele dupame baa lao masoo miniami.
43002012	Doko etapeamo dokopa Jisasa baa baanya endangipi, kaiminingipi, baanya disaipelepi dupa-pipa Kapaneame yuu dokonya lanao pupala dokonya koto mendalapo kateami.
43002013	Jutamanya Napinya Kayamo Gii doko ipanya piamopa Jisasa Jetusaleme pea.
43002014	Pupala losuu anda andake kame dokonya mena pulumakawapi, sipisipipi, yaka maileopi dupa sambena lao kateamino kandata, dee muni aloo pingi akali dupa peteamino kandata pia.
43002015	Kandatala baame kende mendapua nyoo elyambu pyoo yaki petala, endakali dupa-pipa mena pulumakawapi sipisipipi dupa pyao watao kamaka pyalyia. Muni aloo pyoo peteamino dupa kanjinya nepatala toko dupa kulimbanya nepea.
43002016	Dopa petala baame yaka maileo sambena lao kateamino dupa lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame dupa nyoo pupa! Nyakamame nambanya Takangenya anda dake sambenge anda injisakala nayalapape,” lea.
43002017	Pii pepa pyapae singi dokonya, “Nambame embanya anda doko etete auumi kumilyona,” lapae singi doko baanya disaipele dupame masiami.
43002018	Dokopa Juta dupame yanu pyao baa lamaiyoo, “Embame aki kongali mende naima laitaka pitinopa naimame kandatala dake pipenge pilinona lao masetamape?” leami.
43002019	Dopa leaminopa Jisasame yanu pyao, “Nyakamame losuu anda andake dake lakyepataminopa nambame yuu gii tepoma pitona,” lea.
43002020	Dopa leamopa Juta dupame yanu pyao, “Losuu anda andake dake pyoaka kateaminopa ee kana kingi ita kitomende-kisa dee tokange peana, embame koto tepo pipilipi?” leami.
43002021	Dopaka doko, Jisasame losuu anda leamo doko baa tange kandao lea.
43002022	Maitakao Jisasa baa Takangeme malunya sakatasiamo dokopa baanya disaipele dupame wamba baame pii leamo doko masiami. Dopa petala dupame pii pepa pyapae singi dokopi Jisasame pii leamo dupapi dupa masoo miniami.
43002023	Napinya Kayamo Gii epe dokonya Jisasame Jetusaleme katapala kongali piamo dupa endakali longome kandatala baa lao masoo miniami.
43002024	Dopaka doko, Jisasame dupa kandatala baame dupa-pipa kopala naya. Doko, baame endakali dupa pitaka kandenge.
43002025	Endakali mendeme baa endakalinya mana dupa lamaipenge daa. Doko, baame endakalinya mona doko kanjakao kandenge.
43003001	Akali Nikotimasa lenge Jutamanya isingi akali Patasi mende katea.
43003002	Akali dokome kuka gii mendepa Jisasa peteasa ipupala lao pituu, “Mana Lenge Akali, naimame emba Goteme mana lenge akali doko ipu leana lao masilyamano. Gote endakali mendepa nakatatamo kandao doko, endakali dokome kapa pao embame kongali pilino dopale mende napitana,” lea-pyaa.
43003003	Dopa leamopa Jisasame baanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo lao pituu, “Nambame emba etete kiningi langilyona, endakali mende dee ŋaŋa joo manja nayatamo kandao doko, Gotenya isingi doko kapa pao nakandatana,” lea-pyaa.
43003004	Dokopa Nikotimasame baa pisoo, “Endakali lyanga jepae mende aipa petala dee ŋaŋa joo mandipengepe? Dee endangimi ŋaŋa joo lapo pyoo mandena lao ingi andaka kapa pao pilyetape?” lea-pyaa.
43003005	Dopa leamopa Jisasame yanu pyao, “Nambame emba etete kiningi langilyona, endakali mende endakipa Oli Sipitisa dokopame dee ŋaŋa joo manja nayatamo kandao doko, Gotenya isingi dokonya kapa pao napata.
43003006	Endakalimi endakaliaka mandenge. Oli Sipitisame sipitisaka mandenge.
43003007	Nyakama dee ŋaŋa joo mandipenge langilyo pii dutupa sepala emba mona andala nayape.
43003008	Poo dokome poo lao patoo lao masilyali pyoo lao pelyamopa embame poo lelyamo doko singi. Dopaka doko, angi anja pituu lelyape, anja lao pelyape lao nakandenge. Dokotekee joo, Oli Sipitisame mandelyamo endakali dupa pitaka mendai dopaka pingina,” lea-pyaa.
43003009	Dopa leamopa Nikotimasame yanu pyao, “Leleno dupa aipa petala kapa pao pitape?” lea-pyaa.
43003010	Jisasame yanu pyao baa lamaiyoo, “Emba Isataelemanya mana lenge akali doko embame pii dutupa masala naelepe?
43003011	Nambame emba etete kiningi langilyona, naimame masingipi kandengepi dupaka nyakama langipumanopa, pii langipumano doko nyakamame nyala naelyamino.
43003012	Nambame nyakama yuunya mana dupa langipupa masoo minala naelyamino doko kaitinya mana dupa langito kandao doko, aipa petala masoo minatamipi?
43003013	Endakali mendaipi mende kaiti-kisa napea. Napeamoaka doko, Endakalinya Ikiningi kaiti-kisa katao isa epeamo doko iki pea.
43003014	“Wamba Moseseme endakali napalenge yuu dokonya kanopato doko minalyia-pyomo mendai dopaka pyoo Endakalinya Ikiningi doko minalyepenge.
43003015	Baa lao masoo minata endakali doko pitaka lete etete katena lao dopa pipenge.
43003016	Dopana, Goteme yuunya endakali dupa etete auu kayamo dokome kapa lao baanya Ikiningi mendai iki doko maiya. Doko lao masoo minatamino endakali doko pitaka alu napyoo lete katawaka katataminopa lao maiya.
43003017	Goteme baanya Ikiningi dokome yuunya endakali dupa-kisa tenge setena lao yuunya pena laa naya. Daa, yuunya endakali dupa pyoo nyina lao pena lea.
43003018	Baa lao masoo minilyamo endakali doko-kisa baame tenge setala naenge. Baa lao masoo minala naelyamo endakali doko-kisa baame tenge setapae katenge. Doko, baame Gotenya Ikiningi mendai iki doko lao masoo minala naelyamosa dopa pingi.
43003019	Tii pipae doko yuunya ipateamoaka doko, endakalimi mana koo miningima dokome tii pipae doko auu nakaenya, iminjetae doko auu kayamino dokonya dupa-kisa tenge setapae kalyamo.
43003020	Mana koo miningi endakali doko pitakame tii pipae doko yanda pimaiyoo tii pipae dokonya napenge. Doko, aopyoo latala baanya mana miningi dupa tii pipae dokome panasakatame lao napenge.
43003021	Dopaka doko, kiningi mana miningi endakali dokome Gote-pipa pakatae katao mana minilyamo dupa endakalimi kandena lao tii pipae dokonya pengena,” lea-pyaa.
43003022	Maitakao Jisasa baa baanya disaipele dupa-pipa Jutia yuu dokonya pea. Pupala yuu dokonya yuu gii mendatupa dupa-pipa katapala endakali dupanya kaimbu pyakamaiya.
43003023	Joneme apata Selima tengesa Ainone yuu dokonya endakali dupanya kaimbu pyakamaiyaka. Yuu dokonya endaki longo epeamosa Jone baa dokonya kateamopa endakali dupa baa kateasa epeaminopa dupanya kaimbu pyakamaiya.
43003024	(Jone anjetala nayaminopa dopa pia.)
43003025	Yonge kaimbu pingi dokonya lao Jonenya disaipele dupa-pipa Juta mendepinya kainanya pii mende yaka lea.
43003026	Dokopa dupame Jone kateasa pupala baa lamaiyoo, “Mana Lenge Akali, wamba akali mende embapa awapa endaki Jotane omotena kateambinopa, embame baanya lao pii lao paneeno akali dokome endakali dupanya kaimbu pyakamaipumopa, endakali pitaka baa-kisa pelyaminona,” leami-pyaa.
43003027	Dokopa Joneme yanu pyao, “Gote dokome opale mende endakali mende maiya nayatamo kandao doko, tangeme kapa pao nanyeta.
43003028	‘Namba Kataisa doko daana akali doko ipatana lao namba wambao Goteme puu leana,’ leo doko nyakama tangeme masilyamino.
43003029	Akali mendeme enda mende kelyapelyamo dokopa enda doko baanya etanengena lao petenge. Dopaka doko, akali dokonya kaita miningi dokome tengesa dosa katao enda lanyetamo akali dokonya pii sepala, baa mona yaepenge dokotekee doko namba etete mona yaepelyo.
43003030	Baa etete alyasale joo katatamopa namba etete anasale joo katapengena,” lea-pyaa.
43003031	Ketae katao epeamo akali doko dupa pitakanya alyasale. Yuunya akali doko baa yuunya endakali dokomena yuunya dupanyaka lenge. Kaitinya katao epeamo akali doko dupa pitakanya alyasale.
43003032	Baame kandeapi siapi dupa lamaipumopa pii lamaipumo doko endakali mendeme nyoo minala naelyamo.
43003033	Baanya pii doko nyoo miningi endakali dokome Gote kiningina lao laitaka pingi.
43003034	Goteme pena leamopa epeamo akali dokome Gotenya pii doko lamaingi. Doko, Goteme baanya Sipitisa doko kuki kuki lao maiya nayao pitaka maingi.
43003035	Takange dokome Ikiningi doko auu kayapala dupa pitaka baanya kingilyaka setea-pyaa.
43003036	Ikiningi doko lao masoo minilyamo endakali doko lete etete kalyamo. Ikiningi dokonya pii watao naminilyamo endakali doko lete nakatata. Endakali dopale doko-kisa Gotenya imbutongo mandenge doko sulu soo singi.
43004001	Gii dokopa Jisasame Jone ita minao endakali longo kaimbu pyakamaiyoo disaipele injisilyamo lapae doko akali Patasi dupame silyaminona lao Jisasame masia.
43004002	(Kini, Jisasa tangeme kaimbu pyakamaiya naya. Dopaka doko, baanya disaipele dupame kaimbu pyakamaiyami.)
43004003	Dopa lapae sepala baame Jutia yuu doko yakinatala Galili yuu dokonya pilyoo pea.
43004004	Baa kaitini Samatia-kaita pupenge jianya pea.
43004005	Pupala Samatia yuu dokonya yuu taono Saika lenge dokonya pao pyakamea. Yuu taono doko Jekopeme baanya ikiningi Josepe yuu maiyamo dosa tengesa singi.
43004006	Yuu dokonya Jekopenya endaki pete tombapae doko singi. Jisasa baa kaitini pao maka kayapala, kotaka andawai pungupungu jiamopa endaki pete tombapae dosa petea.
43004007	-
43004008	Jisasanya disaipele dupa nee sambala taononya pateaminopa Samatia enda mende endaki pete tombapae dokonya kamuala epea-pyaa. Epeamopa Jisasame enda doko lamaiyoo, “Endaki mendatupa natoo kamuoo dii,” lea-pyaa.
43004009	Dopa leamopa Samaita enda dokome yanu pyao, “Emba Juta dokome aipuma namba Samatia enda dake-kisa endaki tee leepe?” lea-pyaa. (Doko, Juta dupame Samatia dupa wandyuu katengema.)
43004010	Dopa leamopa Jisasame yanu pyao, “Goteme epe dingi doko masowapi dee endaki tee lelyamo akali doko dokome lelyamo lao masowapi pipili kandao doko, embame baa-kisa tee lapinopa baame emba lete katenge endaki doko dipyalina,” lea-pyaa.
43004011	Dopa leamopa enda dokome yanu pyao, “Akali Andake, embanya endaki penge nasilyamo. Dee endaki pete tombapae doko koko wakakana, embame endaki lete katenge doko anjatae nyetepe?
43004012	Naimanya yumbange Jekopeme endaki pete dake naimanya tombekea-pyaa. Baa tangepi baanya ikiningipi dee baanya mena sipisipi akipi dupa endaki dakenya neamiaka-pyaana, embame baa nyoo ana pyandao kalyepe?” lea-pyaa.
43004013	Dokopa Jisasame yanu pyao enda doko lamaiyoo, “Endaki dakenya natamo endakali doko pitaka dee endaki nanu kayatami.
43004014	Dopaka doko, endaki nambame maitopa natamo endakali doko tangapi dee nanu nakayata. Doko, nambame endaki maito endakali doko-kisa endaki doko lee kuoo ipao katao baa lete etete katasetana,” lea-pyaa.
43004015	Dopa leamopa enda dokome baa lamaiyoo, “Akali Andake, namba dee endaki nanu nakayao endaki dee kamuala naipao pitopa embame endaki doko namba dii,” lea-pyaa.
43004016	Dopa leamopa baame enda doko lamaiyoo, “Embame embanya akalingi doko epena latala ipale puu,” lea-pyaa.
43004017	Dokopa enda dokome Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Nambanya akali mende nakatengena,” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “‘Nambanya akali mende nakatengena,’ leeno doko kini auu pyoo leeno.
43004018	Wamba emba akali yuungi nyala peena, indupa akali pilyambino doko embanya akalingi daana, embame namba kiningi langilino,” lea-pyaa.
43004019	Dokopa enda dokome lao pituu, “Akali Andake, nambame emba potopesa mende lamo lao kandelyo.
43004020	Naima Samatia dupanya yumbange dupame yuu manda dakenya katao Gote lalyoo kateami-pyaa. Dopaka doko, nyakama Juta dupame Jetusaleme dokonya katao lalyepengena lengemana,” lea-pyaa.
43004021	Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Enda, embame nambanya pii lelyo dake kiningina masepe: yuu gii mende ipatamo dokopa yuu manda dakenyapi Jetusaleme dokonyapi dolaponya katao Takange Gote lalyala nayatami.
43004022	Nyakama Samatia dupame masala naelyamino doko lao lalyingima. Naima Juta dupame masilyamano doko lao lalyingi. Doko, pyoo nyingi doko naima Juta dupa-kisa epelyamo.
43004023	Dopaka doko, yuu gii ipatamo doko indupa epelyamona, kiningi lalyingi endakali dupame Takange lao moname angi lalyetami. Takangeme endakali dopale dupame baa lao lalyipimi laka lao masingi.
43004024	Gote baa Sipitisana, baa lao lalyetamino dupame moname angi lalyepengena,” lea-pyaa.
43004025	Dokopa enda dokome baa lamaiyoo, “Kataisa lengema Mesaya doko ipatana lao masilyo. Baa ipatamo dokopa baame dupa pitaka naima langitana,” lea-pyaa.
43004026	Jisasame enda doko lamaiyoo, “Doko nambana, namba dokopa embapa pii lelyambanona,” lea-pyaa.
43004027	Dopa lao peteambino dokopaka Jisasanya disaipele dupa ipu piami. Dopa petala baa enda dokopa pii lao pitalambini lamo lao longo pyoo masiami. Dopa lao masiaminoaka doko, dupanya mendaipi mendeme enda doko kandao, “Emba aki setao pitalepe?” lawapi Jisasa kandao, “Aipuma enda dokopa pii lao pitalambipi?” lawapi mende laa nayami.
43004028	-
43004029	Dokopa enda dokome endaki penge doko sina latala yuu taono dokonya pilyoo pupala endakali dokonya kateamino dupa lamaiyoo, “Akali mendeme wamba nambame pio dupa pitaka langyomona, Kataisa tamo nakandenya kanja ipupa,” lea-pyaa.
43004030	Dopa leamopa dupame yuu taono doko yakinatala Jisasa peteamo dokonya epeami.
43004031	Dokaita ipatala nayaminopa, disaipele dupame Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Mana Lenge Akali, nee napoko,” leami.
43004032	Dopa leaminoaka doko, baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nambanya nee napenge silyamo dupa nyakamame masala naelyaminona,” lea.
43004033	Dopa leamopa disaipele dupame nyakamalapo lao pituu, “Mendeme baanya nee manjakamaiyoo ipape?” leami.
43004034	Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nambanya nee doko namba puu leamo dokonya masingili pipengepa baanya kalai doko pyoo etasakamaipengepa dolapo.
43004035	“Nyakamame lao pituu, ‘Kana kitomende patatamo dokopa nee dupa wambu pitana,’ nalengemape? Dopa lengema doko nambame nyakama langilyona, nyakamame ee dupa wambu petelyamona kandayoko lao kanjepape.
43004036	Nee wambu petae mandyuu mau pingi akali dokome nee dupa tanga tangapi koyala nayatana lao mandyuu mau pyatala baa yole nyilyamo. Dopa petala nee mandyuu mau pingi akali dokopa wai pokenge akali dokopa lapota mona yaepelyambino.
43004037	Doko, ‘Mendeme nee wai pokenge doko mendeme mandengena,’ lapae singi pii doko kiningi.
43004038	Nambame nyakamame ee pokala nayamino dupanya nee manja pupa leo. Endakali waka dupame lekeleke tao pokeamino ee dupanya nyakamame pupala nee mandipelyaminona,” lea.
43004039	Enda dokome Samaita endakali yuu taono dokonya tange dupa lamaiyoo, “Nambame pio dupa pitaka baame langyomona,” leamo dokonya endakali longome Jisasa lao masoo miniami.
43004040	Dopa petala Samatia endakali dupame Jisasa kateasa ipupala baa nyakama-pipa awapa katamana lao tee leaminosa koto lapoma yuu dokonya katea.
43004041	Dokopa endakali longomeaka baanya pii doko sepala masoo miniami.
43004042	Dopa petala dupame enda doko lamaiyoo, “Wamba naimame embanya pii doko sepala baa lao masoo minapumanoaka doko, indupa naima tangeme baanya pii doko sepala kiningi baa yuunya endakali dupanya Pyoo Nyingi Akali doko lamo lao kandelyamanona,” leami.
43004043	Jisasa koto lapoma yuu dokonya katapala, Galili yuu dokonya pea.
43004044	Jisasa baa tangeme lao pituu, “Potopesa mende baanya yuu tenge dokonya lalyala naengemana,” lea.
43004045	Baa pao Galili yuu dokonya pyakameamo dokopa Galili endakali dupame baa taeme ipame lamo lao lanyiami. Doko, Napinya Kayamo Gii epe dokonya dupa Jetusaleme peaminopa, baame kongali piamo dupa pitaka wamba kandeamino dokonya dopa piami.
43004046	Dopa piaminopa Jisasame Galili yuu dokonya endaki waene jina leamo yuu Kena dokonya dee pea. Yuu dokonya kapomanenya isingi akali mende kateamo dokonya ikiningi doko Kapaneame yuu dokonya yaina sia.
43004047	Akali dokome Jisasa Jutia yuu doko yakinatala Galili ipupya lapae sepala, baa kateasa ipupala baanya ikiningi kumalanya pyoo siamo doko mee injisakatale, Kapaneame lanamba lao tee lea.
43004048	Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame kongalipi kalai paka pipaepi mende nakandelyamino kandao doko, masoo minala naengemana,” lea.
43004049	Dopa leamopa isingi akali dokome Jisasa kandao, “Akali Andake, nambanya wane doko kumatakatana yapa lanape,” lea.
43004050	Dokopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Embanya ikiningi doko saka pelyamona emba puu,” lea. Dopa leamopa akali dokome Jisasanya pii doko sepala, dopa pyumuna lao masetala pea.
43004051	Baa lanao kaitinisa ene peamopa baanya kendemane dupame baa kutao pao kandanyetala lamaiyoo, “Embanya wane doko saka pupyana,” leami-pyaa.
43004052	Dopa leaminopa baame dokaita pisoo, “Kiloko gii andukunya saka pupyape?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa dokaitame, “Kuaka kotaka kiloko gii mendai dokonya itaita yatu lapyana,” leami-pyaa.
43004053	Takange dokome Jisasame wane doko saka pelyamona lao lamaiyamo gii doko masiamopa lamaiyamo kiloko gii etete dokonyaka jia-pyaa. Dokopa akali dokopi baanya palu dupa pitakapimi Jisasa lao masoo miniami-pyaa.
43004054	Jisasame Jutia yuu dokonya katao Galili pupala kongali dokome lapo pyoo pia.
43005001	Maitakao Jutamanya yuu gii epe etete mende epeamopa Jisasa baa Jetusaleme pea.
43005002	Jetusaleme dokonya lome kambu sipisipi lenge dosa endaki pete mende silyamo doko, Iputu pii lao kenge doko Beteseta lengema. Dokonya anda yuungi petae katenge.
43005003	Anda dutupanya endakali lenge koopi, moko koopi, papa tambotaepi, yaina pyapae longo dupa singima. [Dupame endaki buli pyatamo doko malisoo singima.
43005004	Endaki pete dokonya paa mendepa Kamongo Gotenya enjele mende pyakatala endaki pete doko minao buli pingi. Dopa peta pilyamopa endakali yaina pyapae silyami dupanya mende wambao endaki pete dokonya pyakanelyamopa yaina tata tata pilya dupa pitaka mee jakamaingi.]
43005005	Akali mende yainaka silyamopa ee kana kingi ita tepo-kisa dee tukulapo patae mende ongonya sia.
43005006	Jisasame akali doko yuu wamba waka yaina sia lamo lao kandatala baa pisoo, “Emba mee jipu laka lao masilipi?” lea.
43005007	Dopa leamopa akali yaina dokome yanu pyao, “Akali Andake, endaki doko buli pilyamo dokopa namba nyoo pyandata mende nakatenge. Namba tangeme paanya pilyo dokopa mendeme namba nyoo maita pyatala baa wambao pyakengena,” lea.
43005008	Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Emba sakata! Sakatatala embanya lapa toko doko nyoo soo puu,” lea.
43005009	Dokopa lee mendai akali dokonya yaina doko mee julu peteamopa, baanya lapa toko doko nyoo soo pea. Dopa piamo doko, Sambasa gii mendenya pia.
43005010	Tenge dokonya Juta dupame akali yaina mende mee jiamo doko lamaiyoo, “Indupa Sambasa dakenya embame embanya lapa toko doko soo napayapengena,” leami-pyaa.
43005011	Dopa leaminopa baame yanu pyao, “Namba mee injisipumu akali dokome namba langyoo, ‘Embanya lapa toko doko nyoo soo puu,’ laamona,” lea-pyaa.
43005012	Dokaitame baa pisoo, “Apimi nyoo soo puu laape?” leami-pyaa.
43005013	Akali dokome baa mee jakamaiyamo doko apimi kanjope lao masala naya-pyaa. Doko, endakali longo kambu pyao yuu dokonya kateaminosa, Jisasa baa elyakao kolala pea.
43005014	Maitakao Jisasame losuu anda andake kame dokonya akali doko kandatala lamaiyoo, “Kandeleno, indupa emba mee jetelenona, emba-kisa kenda pipae andake mende ipatana dee koo mende napipi,” lea.
43005015	Dokopa akali dokome pupala baa mee injisiamo doko Jisasana lao Juta dupa lamaiya-pyaa.
43005016	Dopa piamo doko Jisasame Sambasa mendenya dopa piamosa Juta dupame Jisasa watao pyao kateami.
43005017	Dopa piaminoaka doko, Jisasame dupa lamaiyoo, “Nambanya Takangeme indupa apata kalai pyoaka kalyamo dokopa nambame apata kalai pingiakana,” lea.
43005018	Dopa leamopa dupame Jisasa pyao kumasemana lao etete masiami. Doko, baame Sambasa gii doko iki yalala naenya, baame Gote baanya Takange etetena lapumu dokome baa Gote yale jilyamona latala dopa lao masiami.
43005019	Dokopa Jisasame yanu pyao dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nambame nyakama etete kiningi langilyona, Ikiningi dokome iki moname masoo mendita mende kapa pao pyaa naenge. Daa, baame kandelyamopa Takangeme mende pilyamo dokoaka pingi. Takangeme pingi dupa Ikiningi dokome apata pingiaka.
43005020	Doko, Takangeme Ikiningi doko auu kayapala baa tangeme pilyamo dupa pitaka Ikiningi doko laitaka pingi. Nyakamame kandatala mona andalapale lao baame kalai dutupa ita minao kalai etete andake mendapua baa laitaka pita.
43005021	Takangeme endakali kumapae dupa sakatasetala lete katasingi dopaka pyoo Ikiningi dokome apata masilyali pyoo endakali dupa lete katasingi.
43005022	Dee Takange dokome endakali mende yapala naenge. Endakali yapenge kalai doko pitaka Ikiningi doko-kisa baame setea.
43005023	Baame dopa piamo doko, Takange doko lalyingili pyoo endakali dupa pitakame Ikiningi doko lalyalapale lao pia. Ikiningi doko lalyala naenge endakali dokome baa epena leamo Takange doko lalyala naenge.
43005024	“Nambame nyakama etete kiningi langilyona, nambanya pii doko sepala namba puu leamo doko lao masoo minilyamo endakali doko lete etete katenge. Baa Goteme pii setala nayata. Daa, baa kumingi doko yakinatala lete katenge doko nyepelyamo.
43005025	Nambame nyakama etete kiningi langilyona, yuu gii ipanya pingi doko, indupa ipatelyamona, endakali kumapae dupame Gote Ikiningi dokonya pii doko sepala lete katatami.
43005026	Lete katenge doko Takange tange-kisa singiliaka pyoo Ikiningi doko-kisa apata sina lao lete katenge tenge doko Takangeme Ikiningi maiya.
43005027	Baa Endakalinya Ikiningi dokonyana, endakali dupa yapenge pupu lapae doko apata baa maiyaka.
43005028	-
43005029	Nyakamame dokonya mona andala nayalapape. Doko, yuu gii doko ipatamo dokopa endakali kumapae malu petae katatamino dupa pitakame baanya pii sepala sakatatami. Mana epe miniami dupa lete etete kalyanya sakatatami. Mana koo miniami dupa kosimi lena lao sakatatami.
43005030	“Namba tangeme masoo kapa pao mende pyaa naenge. Nambanya Takangeme langilyamopa singi pii doko watao nambame endakali dupa yapenge doko tolatae. Doko, namba tangeme pyuani kaelyoli pyoo pyaa naenge. Namba puu leamo dokome pipili lao masilyamoli pyoo pingi.
43005031	“Nambame namba tangenya lao pii lamaipuli kandao doko, nambanya pii lamaipu doko sambo jipyali.
43005032	Mendeme nambanya lao pii lamaiyoo kalyamo. Dokome nambanya lao pii lamailyamo doko nambame kiningina lao masilyo.
43005033	Nyakamame endakali mendapua Jone kateasa pena leaminopa, baame pii kiningi lamaiya.
43005034	Dopaka doko, nambame endakali mende-kisa pii nyala naenge. Nambame pii langilyo dokome nyakama pyoo nyepae kalyepale lao langilyo.
43005035	Jone baa kia kaiyepaele dokome endakali dupa tii pisia. Dopa piamopa nyakama baanya tii pipae dokome gii kuki mende mona yaepao katawani kayami.
43005036	Dopaka doko, mendeme Jone ita minao namba panasilyamo. Nambanya Takange dokome kalai mendapua pyoo setao pipi lao namba dia. Kalai pilyo dutupame Takange dokome namba puu leamo doko panelyamo.
43005037	Dee namba puu leamo Takange dokome nambanya lao lao panea. Nyakamame baanya pii doko kukipi mende nasoo baanya enomba nakandeami.
43005038	Doko, baame epena leamo dokonya pii doko nyakamame masoo minala naelyamino dokonya baanya pii doko nyakama-kisa nasilyamo.
43005039	Nyakamame Gotenya pii pepa pyapae singi dokome lete etete katasingina lao masetala yapokondape pilyamino. Pii lapae silyamo dupame nambanya lao lapae silyamo!
43005040	Dopaka doko, nyakamame namba-kisa lete katenge doko nyala naipumana lao masilyamino.
43005041	“Namba endakalimi lalyina lao nakalyo.
43005042	Dopaka doko, nambame nyakama kandatelyona, nyakamanya moname Gote auu nakaelyamino.
