43016025	“Pii dutupa nambame nyakama kongali lao langitilyo. Tenda gii mende ipatamo dokopa nambame dee kongali lao langya nayato. Daa, nambame Takangenya lao lao panao nyakama pii langito.
43016026	Gii dokopa nyakamame namba lao masetala Takange-kisa tee latami. Nyakama Takangeme nisina lao nambame tee latona nalelyo.
43016027	Doko, nyakamame namba auu kayawapi dee namba Gotepa tole katao epeena lao masoo minawapi pingima dokonya Takange tangeme nyakama auu kaenge.
43016028	Namba Takangepa awapa katao baa yakinatala isa yuunya epeo. Dee nambame isa yuu dake yakinatala Takange katatasa patona,” lea.
43016029	Dokopa baanya disaipele dupame baa lamaiyoo, “Kini, indupa embame kongali lao nalelenona panao leleno.
43016030	Embame dupa pitaka kandenge dokona mendeme emba pisina lao kalya naenge lamo lao indupa naimame kandelyamano. Tenge dokonya emba Takangepa awapa katao epee lamo lao masoo minilyamanona,” leami.
43016031	Jisasame dokaitanya pii yanu pyao, “Indupa nyakama masoo minilyamipi?
43016032	Kandeleno! Yuu gii ipatamo doko indupa ipatelyamona, nyakama nyakamanya yuu tenge dupanya wakale wakale pupale lao pyao watatami. Nyakamame namba yakinatala pataminopa namba iki katato. Dopaka doko, namba iki kalya naelyo. Takangepa awapa kalyambano.
43016033	Nambame nyakama pii dutupa langilyo doko, nyakamanya mona doko namba-kisa lyuu lao setamopa lao langitilyo. Isa yuunya nyakama-kisa kenda pipae setaka doko, nambame isa yuu dake ita minatelyona, nyakama mona yaepao kalyepape,” lea.
43017001	Jisasame pii dutupa lao etapala kaiti-kisa kandalyetae katao lao pituu, “Apane, gii doko ipatelyamona embanya Ikiningi dokome emba lalyinalena embame baa lalyepe.
43017002	Doko, embame endakali baa maiino dupa pitaka baame lete etete katasina lao endakali dupa pitaka isingi pupu lapae doko embame baa maii.
43017003	Endakali dupame emba kiningi Gote mendai iki doko lamo lao kandawapi dee Jisasa Kataisa doko embame epena lee lamo lao kandawapi petala lete etete katatami.
43017004	Embame namba kalai pyaale lao diino doko pyoo etapeo dokome nambame isa yuu dakenya emba lao lalyio.
43017005	Apane, wamba yuu dake nasingisa namba embapa tole kateambanopa embame namba lalyinoli pyoo indupa embame namba embanya enomba dokonya lalyepe.
43017006	“Embame namba isa yuu dakenya endakali diino dupa-kisa nambame embanya kenge doko panasekeo. Endakali embanya kateami dupa embame namba ditii. Endakali dupame embanya pii doko watao miningima.
43017007	Embame opale namba diino dupa pitaka embame dii lamo lao indupa kandelyamino.
43017008	Doko, embame namba pii langiino dupa pitaka dokaita lamaitio. Dupame sepala namba embapa awapa katao epee lamo lao masalakao masilyamino. Dee embame namba puu lee lamo lao masoo minilyamino.
43017009	“Nambame dupanya loma sakamailyona, yuunya endakali dupanya loma sakamaiya naelyo. Daa, embame endakali namba diino dupanya loma sakamailyo. Doko, endakali dupa embanya.
43017010	Nambanya endakali dupa pitaka embanya. Embanya dupa pitaka nambanya. Dee dupame namba lalyilyamino.
43017011	Dee namba yuunya katawaka nakatato. Dupa yuunya katatami. Namba emba kalyenosa ipato. Apane etete epe, nalimba mendai joo kalyambanoli pyoo dupa mendai joaka katena lao embame embanya pupu lapae namba diino dokome dupa auu pyoo isepe.
43017012	Namba dupa-pipa tole katapu dokopa nambame dupa embanya pupu lapae namba diino dokome auu pyoo isoo katapu. Nambame dupa isoo kandao katapupa dupanya mendaipi mende alu napipya. Dopaka doko, pii pepa pyapae singi doko angi jina lao, akali alu pitana latae doko iki alu pilyamo.
43017013	Indupa namba emba katatesa ipatoo. Nambame pii dutupa isa yuu dakenya lamailyo doko, nambanya mona yaepenge doko dupa-kisa salakao sina lao lamailyo.
43017014	Nambame embanya pii doko dupa lamaitilyo. Dee namba yuunya endakali daa dokaita doko, dupa yuunya endakali daa dokonyana, yuunya endakali dupame dakaita yandapipi jilyamino.
43017015	Embame dupa yuu dakenya nakatena lao nyoo nepatale lao emba tee lao nalelyo. Daa, Satane dokome dokaita koyasala naenalena embame dupa auu pyoo isatale lao tee lelyo.
43017016	Namba yuunya endakali daa dokaita doko, dupa yuunya endakali daaka.
43017017	Kiningi pii dokome dupa etete epe injisepe. Embanya pii doko kiningi pii.
43017018	Embame namba yuunya endakali dupanya kainanya puu leeno dopaka pyoo, nambame dokaita yuunya endakali dupanya kainanya pena leo.
43017019	Dee kiningi pii dokome dupa apata etete epe injisina lao dupa nisoo nambame namba tangenya lete katenge doko embanya kingilyaka yakinelyo.
43017020	“Nambame dakaita iki nisoo loma sala naelyo. Daa, dakaitanya pii sepala namba lao masoo minilyamino endakali dupa apata nisoo loma silyo.
43017021	Apane, emba namba-pipa pakatae kalyenopa namba emba-pipa pakatae katenge dokaita doko, endakali dupa pitaka mendai joo katapimi laka lao masilyo. Dopaka pyoo dokaita apata nalimba-pipa pakatae katataminopa yuunya endakali dupame namba embame puu lee lamo lao masoo minina.
43017022	Nalimba mendai joo kalyambano dokaita doko, dupa mendai joo katena lao embame namba tii pipae diino doko dupa maitio.
43017023	Masoo miningi endakali dupa-pipa namba pakatae katapupa emba namba-pipa pakatae kalyeno doko, dokaita etete mendai joo katawapi, yuunya endakali dupame embame namba puu lee lamo lao masoo pituu embame namba auu kaengeli pyoo dupa auu kaeleno lao masowapi pina lao kalyeno.
43017024	“Apane, embame namba endakali diino dupame embame namba tii pipae diino doko kandena, dupa apata namba katato yuu dokonya katapuma laka lao masilyo. Doko, yuupi kaitipi nasingisa embame namba auu kaee.
43017025	Apane emba tolataena, yuunya endakali dupame emba masala naengema. Dopaka doko, nambame emba masilyo. Dee endakali datupame embame namba puu lee lamo lao masilyamino.
43017026	Embame namba auu kayenoli pyoo dokaita auu kayatale lawapi namba dupa-pipa pakatae katato lawapi nambame embanya kenge doko dokaita-kisa panasiona tendapi panasoaka katatona,” Jisasame lea.
43018001	Jisasame pii dutupa latala baanya disaipele dupa-pipa pao endaki Kitone doko yaleami. Dopa petala omotena ee mende siamo ongonya baapi baanya disaipele dupapi pao pyakameami.
43018002	Jisasa enge nyiamo akali Jutasa dokome apata ee doko kandengeaka. Doko, Jisasame paa longosa baanya disaipele dupa-pipa dosa limbata pingi.
43018003	Dopa pingi dokonyana, Jutasame pitisa mupapi, Patasipi dupanya yanda singipi, yanda singi amii dupa lanyepala lamapi, kiapi, yanda yandatepi dupa minao dosa laminao epea.
43018004	Jisasame baa-kisa pitamo dupa masoo etapala pao dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakama api kutilyamipi?” lea.
43018005	Dokaitame yanu pyao, “Nasatete tange Jisasa dokona,” leami. Dokopa baame, “Doko nambana,” lea. Baa enge nyiamo akali Jutasa doko apata dupa-pipa kateami.
43018006	Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Doko nambana,” lea. Dokopa dokaita maita konakona pilyetala isa yuunya lombapae soo peami.
43018007	Baame deaka dokaita pisoo, “Nyakama api kutilyamipi?” lea. Dokaitame lao pituu, “Jisasa Nasatete tange dokona,” leami.
43018008	Jisasame yanu pyao, “Doko nambana lalo doko daape! Nyakamame namba kutatamino kandao doko, akali datupa pena kayalapape,” lea.
43018009	Baame dopa leamo dokome, wamba baame lao pituu, “Embame namba akali diino datupanya mendaipi mende yakinala nayona,” leamo pii doko angi jia.
43018010	Dokopa Saimone Pitame konjua mende mandeamo doko kolanyetala pitisa mupa dokonya kendemane mendenya kale tolae-kaita pyao taka lanya nepea. Kendemane dokonya kenge doko Malakasa lenge.
43018011	Dokopa Jisasame Pita lamaiyoo, “Embanya konjua doko andandanya mandi. Takangeme kapo penge namba natale lao diamo dokonya nanenya kayapengepe?” lea.
43018012	Dokopa yanda singi amii dupapi, dupanya isingi mupa dokopi, Juta dupanya yanda singi dupapimi Jisasa minatala kendeme yaki piami.
43018013	Dopa petala wambao Anasa kateasa laminao peami. Doko Anasa doko Kayapasanya imange, Kayapasa doko ee kana dokonya pitisa mupa joo katea.
43018014	Wamba Kayapasa dokome Juta dupa lamaiyoo, “Endakali paliuu pelyamo dupa nisoo akali mendai kumatamo kandao doko, epena,” lea.
43018015	Dokopa Saimone Pitapa dee disaipele mendepame Jisasa watao peambi. Disaipele mende doko pitisa mupa dokome kandenge dokonyana, Jisasapa tole pitisa mupa dokonya anda kamapi dokonya kolameambi.
43018016	Dopaka doko, Pita baa kamanda lome kambu dokonya mee katea. Pitisa mupa dokome kandenge disaipele mende dokome kamanda pyakalyetala enda lome kambu isoo petenge doko lamaitala Pita laminao andaka epea.
43018017	Dokopa enda lome kambu isoo petenge dokome Pita lamaiyoo, “Emba apata akali dokonya disaipele dupanya mende daape?” lea. Dokopa baame lao pituu, “Namba daana,” lea.
43018018	Kendemane dupapi yanda singi dupapimi kupa pianya ita yangatala endo soo kateami. Dokonya Pita apata dupa-pipa endo soo katea.
43018019	Pitisa mupa dokome Jisasa baanya disaipele dupanyapi dee baame pii manapi lamaiyamo dupanyapi pisia.
43018020	Jisasame yanu pyao, “Nambame yuunya endakali dupa pii panao lamaiyo. Nambame koteaka lao pii lamaiyo doko pitaka Jutamanya losuu andapi losuu anda andakepi dupanya nambame Juta dupa pitaka limbiaminopa lamaiyona, nambame pii mende yalo pyoo laa nayo.
43018021	Aipuma embame namba pisilipi? Nambame pii lamaiyopa siamino endakali dupa embame pisoo sepe. Dupame nambanya pii doko sepala kalyaminona,” lea.
43018022	Dopa lateamopa yanda singi dupanya mende dosa kateamo dokome, “Embame dopa lao pitisa mupa dokonya pii yanu pilipi?” latala kingi kapeme toka lao nyia.
43018023	Jisasame yanu pyao, “Nambame pii koo mende lato kandao doko, pii koo doko leeno lao embame naima langi. Nambame pii tolao lato kandao doko, aipuma embame namba pilipi?” lea.
43018024	Jisasa kendeme anjiaminoli pipita doko Anasame pitisa mupa Kayapasa doko kateasa pena lea.
43018025	Saimone Pita baa endo soo kateamopa dupame baa pisoo, “Emba apata baanya disaipele dupanya mende daape?” leami. Dopa leaminopa baame tanga lao, “Namba daana,” lea.
43018026	Pitame akali mendenya kale taka lanya nepeamo doko tata pitisa mupa dokonya kendemaneaka mendeme Pita kandao, “Nambame emba baapa ee dokonya tole katambinopa nakanjo kanjemape?” lea.
43018027	Pitame deaka, “Namba daana,” lea. Dopa lalu piamo dokopaka yaka pauli pii lalu pia.
43018028	Dupame Kayapasa yakinatala Jisasa nyoo laminao kapomane andake dokonya andaka yongama utu kolao peami. Dupame nyakama kaimala nyepala Napinya Kayamo Nee doko kapa pao nyoo nanatamana latala kapomane andake dokonya andaka kolandala nayami wandiami.
43018029	Dopa piaminopa Pailateme kamanda pyakalyetala dokaita kateamino dokonya pupala lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame tenge akinya akali dake kosimi latamipi?” lea.
43018030	Dokaitame yanu pyao baa lamaiyoo, “Akali dakeme mana koo naminingi pili kandao doko, baa emba katapisa laminao naipumualina,” leami.
43018031	Pailateme dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame baa nyepala nyakama tangenya mana singili pyoo kosimi laapa!” lea. Juta dupame baa lamaiyoo, “Naimame endakali mende pyao kumasalapape lapae nasingina,” leami.
43018032	Dopa piamino dokome wamba Jisasame baa dopa pyoo kumatona lao makande pyoo pii leamo doko angi jalanya pia.
43018033	Pailate baa dee baanya andaka kolandatala, Jisasa tengesa epena latala pisoo, “Emba Jutamanya Kiŋipi?” lea-pyaa.
43018034	Jisasame yanu pyao, “Emba tangeme masoo dopa leepe, pande mendeme nambanya lao emba langiminopa leepe?” lea-pyaa.
43018035	Pailateme yanu pyao, “Namba Juta jolo kanjemape? Emba tatapi pitisa mupapi dupame emba namba-kisa laminao ipamino. Embame aipa piipi?” lea-pyaa.
43018036	Jisasame yanu pyao, “Nambanya isingi doko isa yuu dakenya daa. Nambanya isingi doko isa yuu dakenya pili kandao doko, namba anjoo Juta dupa namaina lao nambanya kalai akali dupame namba nisoo yanda pipimili. Dopaka doko, nambanya isingi doko isa yuu dakenya daana,” lea-pyaa.
43018037	Pailateme baa pisoo, “Dopa tamo doko, emba kiŋipi?” lea-pyaa. Jisasame yanu pyao, “Embame lateleno. Kini, namba kiŋi. Tenge dokonya namba endangimi mandeamopa isa yuu dakenya epeo. Dee kiningi pii doko lamaiyanya epeo. Kiningi pii doko watao minilyamo endakali doko pitakame nambanya pii doko singimana,” lea-pyaa.
43018038	Pailateme baa pisoo, “Kiningi pii doko akipi?” lea-pyaa. Baame dopa latala deaka kamanda pyakalyetala Juta dupa lamaiyoo, “Nambame baa-kisa tenge mende sipumu nakandelyo.
43018039	Dopaka doko, nyakamanya mana singili pyoo Napinya Kayamo Gii dokonya nambame nyakamanya endakali anjetae mende mokokenge. Dopana, nambame nyakama Jutamanya Kiŋi doko mokakapili lao sekelyamipi?” lea.
43018040	Dokopa dupame puu lao, “Akali doko daana, Batapasa mokaka,” leami. Batapasa doko pake nao makongao paenge akali mende.
43019001	Dokopa Pailateme Jisas konjame pina leamopa piami-pyaa.
43019002	Yanda singi dupame kende nengenenge katapae mendapua langapu petala Jisasanya aiyombanya pee pyakamaiyami-pyaa. Dopa petala yonge pee wene pyapaele mende pyakamaiyami-pyaa.
43019003	Dopa petala dupame baanya enombasa katapala, “Emba Jutamanya Kiŋi emba auu pyoo katape!” latala kingi kapeme toka lao nyiami-pyaa.
43019004	Pailateme deaka kamanda pyakalyetala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nambame baa nyakama katamisa kamanda laminao epelyo doko, baa-kisa tenge mende sipumu nakanjene lamo lao kanjepale lao laminao epelyona,” lea.
43019005	Kende nengenenge katapae mendapua langapu petala aiyombanya pee pyakamaiyamino doko pyoo dee yonge pee wene pyapaele mende pyakamaiyamino doko pyoo Jisasa kamanda epea. Dokopa Pailateme dokaita lamaiyoo, “Akali dake kanjepa!” lea.
43019006	Dokopa pitisa mupapi yanda singipi dupame Jisasa kandatala puu lao, “Baa pyao yuka! Baa pyao yuka!” leami. Dopa leaminopa Pailateme dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakama tangeme nyepala pyao yukalapa. Doko, nambame baa-kisa tenge mende sipumu nakandelyona,” lea.
43019007	Juta dupame baa kandao yanu pyao, “Naimanya mana setapae mende singina dokome akali dake kumasepenge jilyamo. Doko, baame baa Gotenya ikiningi jingina,” leami.
43019008	Pii dopa leamino doko, Pailateme sepala etete paka kaya.
43019009	Dopa petala baa baanya andaka dee kolandea. Kolandatala Jisasa pisoo, “Emba anja tangepe?” lea-pyaa. Dokopa Jisasame yanu pyao mende lamaiya naya-pyaa.
43019010	Dokopa Pailateme baa lamaiyoo, “Embame namba langya naelepe? Emba mokapenge pupu lapae doko namba-kisa soo dee emba pyao yukuopenge pupu lapae doko namba-kisa soaka pilyamo doko embame masala naelepe?” lea-pyaa.
43019011	Jisasame yanu pyao, “Ketae katenge dokome emba pupu lapae nandipyali kandao doko, embanya pupu lapae mendeme kapa pao namba ita minala nayapili. Dopana, namba emba dyomo akali dokonya koo doko etete waipa sowana,” lea-pyaa.
43019012	Pailateme pii doko sepala baa mokalanya kaitini kutia. Dopa piamoaka doko, Juta dupame puu lao, “Embame akali dake mokateno kandao doko, emba Kapomane Isingi Mupa dokonya mona setenge daa! Tangeme kiŋi kalyona lenge endakali doko pitaka Kapomane Isingi Mupa dokonya yandapipina,” leami.
43019013	Pailateme pii dutupa sepala Jisasa laminao kamanda pyakalyia. Pyakalyetala kosa lao petenge Kana Toko lengema dokonya petea. (Doko Iputu pii lao Gapata lengema.)
43019014	Napinya Kayamo Nee doko nalanya depa lapenge gii dokopa kotaka andawai pungupungu jia. Dokopa baame Juta dupa lamaiyoo, “Nyakamanya Kiŋi dake kanjepa,” lea.
43019015	Dopa leamopa dupame puu lao lao pituu, “Nyoo nepa! Nyoo nepa! Baa pyao yuka!” leami. Pailateme dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nambame nyakamanya kiŋi doko pyao yukuakawape?” lea. Dopa leamopa pitisa mupa dupame yanu pyao, “Naimanya kiŋi mende nakatengena, Kapomane Isingi Mupa doko ikina,” leami.
43019016	Dokopa Jisasa pyao yukuina lao Pailateme dokaitanya kingilyaka maitiamopa dupame Jisasa nyoo peami.
43019017	Baa tangeme baanya ita poko doko soo yuu kenge Matenakulimanda lenge dokonya pea. (Iputu pii lao kenge doko Golokota lengema.)
43019018	Yuu dokonya baa pyao yukuiyami. Dee akali mendalapo baa-pipa awapa yukuiyamiaka. Jisasa kainanya yukuotala mendalapo dolapo lemba dolaponya yukuiyami.
43019019	Pailateme pii mende pepa pyanya ita poko dokonya ketae katea. Pepa pyao kateamo doko dapa latae katea: JISASA DOKO NASATETE TANGE. BAA JUTA DUPANYA KINI DOKO.
43019020	Jisasa pyao yukuiyamino yuu doko taono Jetusaleme tengesa dokonyana, Juta longome pepa pyatae kateamo doko itaki pyao kandeami. Baame pepa doko Iputu pii lawapi, Loma pii lawapi, Gitiki pii lawapi pyanya katea.
43019021	Dopa latae kateamopa, Juta dupanya pitisa mupa dupame Pailate kandao, “Embame, ‘Baa Juta dupanya kiŋina,’ lao pepa pyala naenya, ‘Akali dakeme, “Namba Juta dupanya Kiŋina,” leana,’ lao pepa pyaa,” leami-pyaa.
43019022	Dokopa Pailateme yanu pyao, “Pepa nambame pyalo doko pyapalona,” lea-pyaa.
43019023	Yanda singi amii dupame Jisasa pyao yukuotala dokopa baanya yonge pee akipi dupa nyepala mokosoo malu kitomende palyiami. Dopa petala yanda singi amii dupa malu mendai mendai lao nyiami. Dee baanya yonge pee isa pingi doko apata nyiamiaka. Baanya yonge pee isa pingi doko mendasa kii napingi mee wasoyoko latae.
43019024	Dokopa yanda singi amii dupame nyakamalapo lao pituu, “Naimame kanguala naenya, api-kisa palelyape lao kandamana kana yakane pyasingi dupa pyasema,” leami. Yanda singi dupame dopa piamino doko pii pepa pyapae singi dokonya, “Nambanya yonge pee akipi dupa dokaitame mokosoo nyiami. Nambanya yonge pee doko api-kisa palelyape lao kanjanya kana yakane pyasingi dupa pyasiamina,” lapae singi doko angi jia.
43019025	Jisasa yukuotae kateamo dosa baanya endangi dokopi, endanginya kakingi dokopi, enda Matia lenge Kolopasa etanenge dokopi, dee enda Makatala tange Matia dokopi dutupa kateami.
43019026	Jisasame baanya endangi dokopa dee baanya disaipele auu kaenge dokopa tengesa kateambino kandatala endangi doko lamaiyoo, “Enda, dolo embanya ikiningi dokona,” lea.
43019027	Dopa latala disaipele doko lamaiyoo, “Dolo embanya endangi dokona,” lea. Dokopaka disaipele dokome enda doko laminao baanya andaka pea.
43019028	Dutupa etapeamopa Jisasame dutupa pitaka etapelyamo lao kandatala pii pepa pyapae singi doko angi jina lao baame, “Namba endaki nanu pyumu,” lea.
43019029	Dosa penge mendenya waene kaa pipae tumbatae sia dokonya dupame koma jepae mendeme poyanyetala waeneme tumbatae doko itakali mendenya tuku petala Jisasa nena lao makapusiami.
43019030	Dopa piaminopa Jisasame waene kaa pipae doko napala, “Etalamo,” lea. Dopa latala baanya mange doko tukyenatala baanya imambu doko pena kaya.
43019031	Taita dopa pyoo Sambasa gii doko etete andake mende. Gii dokonya akali dutupa mee yukuotae nakatataminopa latala indupa opale depa lenge gii dokonya Juta dupame akali dutupanya moko dupa pyao lakapala kondao nyina lao Pailate lamaiyami.
43019032	Dokopa yanda singi amii dupame ipupala Jisasa-pipa awapa pyao yukuiyamino akali dolaponya wambao dokonya moko dolapo pyao lakapala mende dokonya pyao lakeami.
43019033	Dopa petala Jisasa yukuotae kateasa ipupala kandeaminopa baa wamba kumatala siasa baanya moko dolapo pyao lakala nayami.
43019034	Dopaka doko, yanda singi mendeme baanya patali dokonya yandateme kapua katao nyia. Dokopa awapa taiyoko ipangepa epea.
43019035	Dopa piamopa kandeamo akali dokome piamo dokonya lao pii lea. Baanya pii leamo doko kiningi. Dee baa tangeme baame pii leamo doko kiningina lao masilyamona nyakamame apata pii doko masoo minapenge.
43019036	Dopa piamo dupame pii pepa pyapae singi dokonya, “Dupame baanya kuli mendaipi mende lakala nayatamina,” lapae singi doko angi jina lao pia.
43019037	Pii pepa pyapae singi dokonya dee pii mende, “Baa kapua katao nyiamino doko endakali dupame kandatamina,” lapae singi.
43019038	Dutupa peteamo dokopa akali Josepe lenge Atimatia tange dokome Jisasa nyoo malu pitoo lao Pailate-kisa tee lea-pyaa. Josepe doko Jisasanya disaipele mendeaka doko, baame Juta dupa paka kayapala baanya masoo miningi doko yalo pia-pyaa. Pailateme kapana nyina lateamopa Josepeme pao Jisasa nyia.
43019039	Dee akali Nikotimasa lenge mende wamba Jisasa peteasa kuka epeamo doko apata epa. Baame ita tunduma epe pingi molo ipangepi alusa ipangepi pyasilya pyasena petae mende soo epea. Dokonya kenda pipae doko kingi ita tepoma-kisa wakao tepoma.
43019040	Dolapome Jisasa nyepala Juta dupame endakali malu pyaanya pingimali pyaoo opale tunduma pingi dupa palyeta pyoo lapalapame Jisasa yaki piambi.
43019041	Jisasa pyao yukuiyamino tengesa dosa ee mende sia. Ee dokonya endakali malu pipenge yuli tumbyepae enenge mende sia. Dokonya endakali mende malu petala nayami.
43019042	Yuu gii dokonya Juta dupanya Sambasa gii doko kandatama lao depa lengema dokonyana kananda tumbyepae tengesa siamo dokonya Jisasa malu piambi.
43020001	Sandeenya yongama yuu yongao tayala nayamopa utu kolao Matia Makatala tange doko Jisasa malu piamino dokonya pea-pyaa. Pupala malu kambu dokonya kaname piti piamino doko nyoo kapya latae siamo kandea-pyaa.
43020002	Dopa petala alo pyao pao Saimone Pitapa dee disaipele mende Jisasame auu kaenge dokopa dolapo lamaiyoo, “Kamongo doko malunya lopao nyalamini lamo doko nyoo anja setalamipi naimame masala naelyamanona,” lea.
43020003	Dokopa Pitapa disaipele mende dokopa sakatao malunya peambi.
43020004	Dolapo tole alo piambino doko, disaipele dolome Pita nyoo maita pyatala baa wambakao pao malunya pyakamea.
43020005	Baame pongatala malunya kandeamopa lapalapa dupa kakopae mee sia. Dopaka doko, baa angi kolandala naya.
43020006	Saimone Pitame maitakao watao ipupala baa malunya kolandatala kandeamopa lapalapa dupa kakopae mee sia.
43020007	Dee lapalapa yakane mendeme Jisasanya aiyombanya yaki piamino doko siamo kandeaka. Lapalapa doko yangi dupa-pipa pyasoo nasinya lakapae waka sia.
43020008	Dokopa disaipele mende malunya wambao peamo dokome apata malunya kolandao kandatala kini lamo lao masoo minia.
43020009	Jisasa baa kumapala dee sakatapengena lao pii pepa pyapae singi doko dolapome masetala nayambi.
43020010	Dopa petala disaipele dolapo nyilyambonya andaka pilyiambi.
43020011	Dopaka doko, enda Maita dokome malu dosa kamanda katao ee lao katea-pyaa. Ee lao katao malunya pongatala elyo pia-pyaa.
43020012	Elyo pyao kandeamopa enjele lapoma yonge pee kyoo lapae pingi mendalapo peteambino kandea-pyaa. Mende doko Jisasanya aiyomba seteamino dokaita peteamopa mende doko moko seteamino dokaita petea-pyaa.
43020013	Enjele dolapome enda doko lamaiyoo, “Enda, aipuma emba ee leepe?” leambi-pyaa. Enda dokome dolapo lamaiyoo, “Nambanya Kamongo doko nyalamini lamo doko nyoo anja setalamipi namba masala naelyona,” lea-pyaa.
43020014	Baame pii dutupa latala kandapilyetala Jisasa kateamo kandea-pyaa. Baame doko Jisasa lamo lao nakandea-pyaa.
43020015	Jisasame enda doko lamaiyoo, “Enda, aipuma emba ee leepe? Emba api kutilipi?” lea-pyaa. Baame doko ee isingi akali doko lamo lao masetala baa lamaiyoo, “Akali Andake, embame baa nyoo pateno kandao doko, nambame nyoo patoo dosa setapu lao langi,” lea-pyaa.
43020016	Jisasame enda doko kandao, “Matia!” lea-pyaa. Dokopa enda dokome kandapilyetala Iputu pii lao, “Laponai!” lea-pyaa. (Pii Laponai doko kapilyoo, Mana Lenge Akali lapenge.)
43020017	Jisasame enda doko lamaiyoo, “Embame namba minatae nasa. Doko, namba Takange katapyasa ketae patala naelyo. Dopaka doko, embame pupala nambanya kaiminingi dupa lamaiyakao, namba nyakamapi nambapinya Takange doko katapyasa ketae pelyona, dee namba nyakamapi nambapinya Gote doko katapyasa ketae pelyona, lelyamo lamaiyakape,” lea-pyaa.
43020018	Matia Makatala tange dokome pupala disaipele dupa lamaiyoo, “Nambame Kamongo doko kanjona,” lea. Jisasame baa pii lamaiyamo dupa dokaita lamaiya.
43020019	Sandee dokonya alemandi disaipele dupame Juta dupa paka kayapala nyakama peteamino anda doko kaitini pai lanyetala peteami. Dopa piaminopa Jisasa dokaitanya kainanya ipao katapala lao pituu, “Nyakama mona yaepalapa,” lea.
43020020	Baame dopa latala dee baanya kingipi patalipi dupa kanjepa lao laitaka pia. Dopa piamopa disaipele dupame Kamongo doko kandatala eteke piami.
43020021	Dokopa Jisasame dokaita deaka lamaiyoo, “Nyakama mona yaepalapa. Takangeme namba puu leamo dokaita doko nambame nyakama pupa lelyona,” lea.
43020022	Dopa latala baame dokaita-kisa poo lanya pisetala lao pituu, “Nyakama Oli Sipitisa doko nyalapa.
43020023	Nyakamame endakali dupanya koo dupa kunanya nepakamaitamino kandao doko, dupanya koo dupa kunata. Nyakamame endakali dupanya koo dupa pyakilyina kayatamino kandao doko, pyakilyetana,” lea.
43020024	Jisasa epeamo dokopa akali kingi ita-kisa dee lapoma dutupanya mende Tomasa lenge Pakao Mandenge lengema Tomasa doko dupa-pipa awapa napeteami.
43020025	Tenge dokonya disaipele yangi dupame baa lamaiyoo, “Naima Kamongo doko kanjemanona,” leami. Dopaka doko, baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nambame baanya kinginya ŋili pyatae kombe dolapo nakandao, dee baanya ŋili pyatae kombe dupanya nambanya kingi kondenge pyandala nayao, dee baanya patali kombe dokonya kingi konde pyandala nayato kandao doko, nambame masoo minala nayalapona,” lea.
43020026	Sandee gii ongo etapeamopa Sandee gii mende ongonya baanya disaipele dupame kaitini dupa deaka pai lanyetala andokote peteami. Gii dokopa Tomasa awapa peteami. Dopa piaminopa Jisasa ipao dupanya kainanya katapala, “Nyakama mona yaepalapa,” lea.
43020027	Dopa latala baame Tomasa lamaiyoo, “Embanya kingi kondenge doko ae peyatala nambanya kingi dolapo kanda. Dee embanya kingi doko ae peyatala nambanya patali dokonya pyanda. Dopa petala embame kiningi daana lao masala naenya kiningina lao masoo minape,” lea.
43020028	Tomasame yanu pyao, “Nambanya Kamongo dokona, nambanya Gote dokona,” lea.
43020029	Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Embame masoo minilino tenge doko namba kandatala masoo minilino. Namba kanja nayao masoo minao kalyamino dupa mona yaepasetae kalyaminona,” lea.
43020030	Jisasame kongali waka longo disaipele dupanya enombasa piamo dupa buku dakenya pepa pyapae nasilyamo.
43020031	Pii pepa pyapae silyamo datupame Jisasa doko Kataisana, Gote Ikiningi dokona lao masoo minalapale lao pyapae silyamo. Nyakamame masoo minatamino dokome baa lao masetala lete etete katataminopa lao pyapae silyamo.
43021001	-
43021002	Dutupa etapeamopa maitakao Jisasa baa disaipele dupame kandena lao endaki Taipitiasa pete singi dosa deaka panea. Baa dapa pyoo panea: Saimone Pitapi, Tomasa lenge Pakao Mandenge lengema dokopi, Galili yuu dokonya yuu taono Kena tange Natanielepi, Sepete ikiningi dolapopi, dee baanya disaipele dupanya mendalapopi dutupa tole kateami.
43021003	Saimone Pitame disaipele yangi dokaita lamaiyoo, “Namba wapaka nyala pelyona,” lea. Dopa leamopa disaipele yangi dokaitame baa lamaiyoo, “Naima apata emba-pipa muaa,” leami. Dopa latala dupame pao sipi dokonya pyakalyetala peami. Dopa piaminoaka doko, kuka gii dokonya dupame wapaka mende nyala nayami.
43021004	Yuu yongeamopa Jisasa baa endaki pete lemba dokonya katea. Dopaka doko, disaipele dupame doko Jisasa kalyamo lao masala nayami.
43021005	Dokopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Wane paluma, nyakamanya wapaka mendatupa silyape?” lea. Dokaitame yanu pyao, “Daana,” leami.
43021006	Baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame wapaka nyingi mandi doko sipi dokonya kingi tolae-kaita pyandataminopa wapaka nyalaminona pyandalapa,” lea. Leamo dosa pyandateaminopa wapaka longo paleamo dokome mandi doko pyalya lao nyepenge nanjia.
43021007	Jisasame auu kaenge disaipele dokome Pita lamaiyoo, “Doko Kamongo lamona,” lea. “Doko Kamongo lamona,” leamo pii doko Pitame sepala baanya yonge pee lyokanya setapala kateamo dokonya dee yonge pee nyoo peta matapu peta petala baa endaki pete dokonya mangau lea.
43021008	Disaipele yangi dupa sipi dokonya pituu wapaka paleta mandi doko pyalya lao nyoo soo peami. Dupa endaki pete dokonya netesa joo kateami. Yandate paa lapomasapi mende pyale lapenge joo kateami.
43021009	Dokaita netesa pyakayatala kandeaminopa itate mende teamo dokonya wapaka mende yangatae kateamopa betesa mende sia.
43021010	Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Wapaka epapu nyalamino dokonya mendapua nyoo ipupa,” lea.
43021011	Saimone Pitame sipi dokonya pyakalyetala wapaka paleta mandi doko pyalya lao nyoo soo netesa epea. Mandi dokonya wapaka andake andate mendai-kisa dee kingi ita yuungi palipala wakao tepoma palea. Wapaka dokaita longo paleamoaka doko, mandi doko lapyala naya.
43021012	Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nee nala ipupa,” lea. Dopa leamopa disaipele dupame paka kayapala dupanya mendaipi mendeme emba apipi lao pisala nayami. Doko dupame Kamongo doko lamo lao kandeami.
43021013	Jisasame ipupala betesa doko nyoo dokaita maiya. Baame wapaka doko dopaka pyoo dokaita maiya.
43021014	Jisasa baa malunya sakatatala indupa paa tepo pyoo baanya disaipele dupa-kisa panea.
43021015	Nee napao pituu Jisasame Saimone Pita lamaiyoo, “Jone ikiningi Saimone, embame dakaita ita minao namba auu kaelepe?” lea. Pitame baa lamaiyoo, “Kamongo, kini nambame emba auu kayapupa embame kandeleno doko,” lea. Dokopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Embame nambanya sipisipi yakane dupa nee maiyakape,” lea.
43021016	Paa lapo pyoo Pita pisoo, “Jone ikiningi Saimone, embame namba auu kaelepe?” lea. Baame yanu pyao, “Kamongo, kini nambame emba auu kayapupa embame kandeleno doko,” lea. Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Embame nambanya sipisipi dupa setao katakape,” lea.
43021017	Paa tepo pyoo Pita pisoo, “Jone ikiningi Saimone, embame namba auu kaelepe?” lea. “Embame namba auu kaelepe?” lao paa tepo pyoo pisiamosa Pitame mona kenda kayapala yanu pyao, “Kamongo, embame dupa pitaka kandenge dokome nambame emba auu kayapupa kandeleno doko,” lea. Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Embame nambanya sipisipi dupa nee maiyakape.
43021018	Nambame emba etete kiningi langilyona, wamba emba akali sakasa matapu akipi tange nyoo pyoo patoo lao masino kaita ongonya pee. Dopa pinoaka doko, tenda lyanga jeteno gii dokopa embanya kingi dolapo minalyetatenopa mendeme embanya matapu nyoo petakala napatoo lao masete kaita mendenya laminao patana,” lea.
43021019	Baame pii dopa leamo doko, Pita kumatamo dokome Gote lalyetana lao makande pyoo lea. Baame pii dutupa latala Pita lamaiyoo, “Embame namba watao ipu,” lea.
43021020	Pitame kandapilyetala kandeamo dokopa disaipele mende Jisasame auu kaenge dokome nyilyambo watao epea. Wamba nee nao paleaminopa kandapilyetala Jisasa pisoo, “Kamongo, apimi emba enge nyalanya pilyape?” leamo dokome watao epea.
43021021	Pitame baa kandatala Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Kamongo, akali dake aipa pitape?” lea.
43021022	Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Baa lenge tao katawaka namba ipato gii doko kandao nyeta lao sakatopi doko embanya kalaipi? Embame namba watao ipu,” lea.
43021023	Dopa leanya disaipele doko kumala nayata lamona lao pii doko kaiminingi dupanya kaina dokonya lao tayami. Dopaka doko, disaipele doko kumala nayatana lao Jisasame laa naya. “Baa lenge tao katawaka namba ipato gii doko kandao nyeta lao sakatopi doko embanya kalaipi?” lao lea.
43021024	Disaipele dokome pii dutupa lao panatala dee pepa pilyamo. Baame pii lao paneamo doko kiningina lao naimame masilyamano.
43021025	Dee Jisasame waka mendapua apata longo pia. Naimame dokaita mendai mendai lao pitaka pepa pyapae setamo kandao doko, yuu dake pitakanya buku dupa setalanya kokata lao masilyo.
44001001	-
44001002	Kaimia Tiopilasa, nambame pepa wambao pio dokonya Jisasame tee pyao kalai pyoo mana lamaiyoo kateamo ongo pitakanya lao lao pao Goteme baa kaiti-kisa lanyiamo dokonya lao tuu leo. Jisasame baanya aposele yapao nyiamo dutupame kalai pina lao Oli Sipitisa doko-kisa pii lamaitiamopa Goteme baa kaiti-kisa lanyia-pyaa.
44001003	Baa tanda nao kumapala dee maitakao baanya aposele dupa kateamino dokonya ipupala, kiningi lete kalyona lao paa longo lao laitaka pyokondape pia-pyaa. Kote kingi ita kitomende dutupanya aposele dupame baa kandata piaminopa Goteme endakali isingi dokonya lao baame mana lamaita pia-pyaa.
44001004	Baa dupa-pipa katawaka pituu dupa lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame Jetusaleme yakinala nayalapape. Takangeme mende ditu leana lao wamba nambame langio doko nyakamame malisoo kalyepape.
44001005	Joneme endakimi endakali dupanya kaimbu pyakamaiya. Dopaka doko, gii kuki patatamopa Takange dokome Oli Sipitisa dokome nyakamanya kaimbu pyakatana,” lea-pyaa.
44001006	Dokopa dokaitame ipao limbatala baa pisoo, “Kamongo, embame indupa Isataele dupame kapomane joo yuu dake dee tange isoo katena latepe?” leami-pyaa.
44001007	Baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Yuu giipi koto giipi Takange baa tangeme isoo seteamo dupa nyakamame kandao lapenge daa.
44001008	Dopaka doko, Oli Sipitisa doko nyakama-kisa ipatamopa nyakamame pupu lapae nyepala Jetusaleme yuu dokonyapi, Jutia yuu pitaka dupanyapi, Samatia yuu dokonyapi, dee yuu dupa pitakanya nambanya lao pii lamaiyoo kapa pitamina,” lea-pyaa.
44001009	Dopa lateamopa dokaitame baa kandatae kateaminopa Goteme baa ketae lanyia-pyaa. Ketae lanyiamopa kopa mendeme baa nyoo sanga pia-pyaa. Dopa piamopa dokaitame baa dee nakandeami-pyaa.
44001010	Dokaitame baa kaitinya peamo doko kandalyetae kateaminopa akali yonge pee kyoo lapae pingi mendalapo ipao dupa-pipa kalyu piambi-pyaa.
44001011	Dolapome dokaita lamaiyoo, “Galili tange akali nyakama, aipuma kaitinya kandalyoo kalyamipi? Jisasa nyakama-pipa kataminopa epapu Goteme kaiti-kisa lanyalamo kanjimino, Jisasa mendai dokoaka pamoli pyoo dee ipatana,” leambi-pyaa.
44001012	Dokopa dokaita Olipimanda katao Jetusaleme pilyiami-pyaa. Olipimanda doko Jetusaleme tengesa Isataele dupame Sambasa giinya kaitini tengesa paengema opale.
44001013	Jetusaleme pyakamatala anda namba pyoo petae palo kisa mendenya paleamino ongonya kolalyiami-pyaa. Pitapi, Jonepi, Jemesapi, Endutupi, Pilipapi, Tomasapi, Batolomyupi, Matyupi, Aopiasa ikiningi Jemesa dokopi, Saimone Selote dokopi, Jemesa ikiningi Jutasapi dutupa dokonya kateami-pyaa.
44001014	Dokaita pitakapi, enda mendapuapi, Jisasa endangi Matiapi, baanya kaiminingi dupa-pipa koteaka lao mona mendai paliuu awapa loma soo kateami-pyaa.
44001015	Gii mendepa masoo miningi kaiminingi andate mendai-kisa dee kingi ita lapoma jowapi mende kambu pyao kateaminopa Pitame dupanya kaina dokonya toya katapala dapa lea-pyaa:
44001016	“Kaimia paluma, wamba Oli Sipitisa dokome akali Dapitinya kambunya lungu piamo doko pepa pyapae silyamo. Sipitisa dokome Jisasa anjala epeamino akali dupa kaitini laitaka piamo akali Jutasa kandao lea-pyaa. Pepa pyapae doko kiningi jepengena, indupa kiningi jetelyamo.
44001017	Jutasa doko wamba naimanya mende naima-pipa awapa kalai lautao piamana,” lea-pyaa.
44001018	Akali dokome koo kalai piamo dokonya muni nyiamo dokome yuu mende sambea-pyaa. Sambapala baa aiyombame pyakatala kainanya tungutala baanya ingi dupa pitaka kolao epea-pyaa.
44001019	Jetusaleme kateamino endakali dupa pitakame dopa piamo doko sepala nyakamanya pii lengeli pyoo yuu doko kenge Akeletama leami. Tenge doko Taiyokopausa lenge.
44001020	Pitame lao pituu, “Gotenya pii lapae doko Losuu Wee dupanya dapa lapae silyamo: ‘Baanya ee anda yuupi dupa mee sina. Akali mende dokonya nao nakatenana,’ lapae silyamo. Dee pii mende silyamoaka: ‘Baanya kalai isoo pingi doko akali waka mendeme nyinana,’ lapae silyamo.
44001021	-
44001022	“Dopa lapae silyamo dokonya akali mendeme Jisasa malunya sakateana lao naima aposele dupa-pipa tole pyao pii doko panao lao katapenge jilyamo. Kamongo Jisasa naima-pipa awapa payamanoli pyoo payamano akali dupanya mende katapenge jilyamo. Joneme Jisasanya kaimbu pyakamaiyamo gii ongopa kandasoo, Jisasa naima-pipa kateamanopa Goteme baa ketae lanyiamo ongonya e tete tuu lao naima-pipa awapa payamano akali dupanya mende katena lamana,” Pitame dopa lea-pyaa.
44001023	Dopa lateamopa dokaitame akali mende nyemana lao lapoma makande miniami-pyaa. Akali mende Josepe Basapasa lenge-pyaa. Baanya kenge mende Jasatasa lenge-pyaa. Akali mende doko kenge Matayasa lenge-pyaa.
44001024	-
44001025	Dokaitame akali olapo makande minatala mendai mende katena lamana lao loma soo pituu, “Kamongo, embame endakali pitakanya mona kandenge. Jutasa baame aposele kalai doko yakinatala baa tangenya yuu pupenge dokonya patea. Embame akali alaponya mende Jutasanya panda nyoo aposele kalai doko nyoo pina lao yapao nyepate doko embame naima-kisa panasepe,” dopa lao loma siami-pyaa.
44001026	Loma sepala dokaitame kana yakane dupa pyasoo makande piaminopa aposele kalai doko Matayasa-kisa epea-pyaa. Epeamopa baa aposele kingi ita mende-kisa dee mendai dupanya konda pia-pyaa.
44002001	Pendekosa gii doko epeamo dokopa masoo miningi endakali dupa pitaka anda mendenya limbao peteami-pyaa.
44002002	Peteaminopa poo andake pupu lapae mendeme uu lengeli pyoo lee mendai uu mende kaiti-kisa katao lea-pyaa. Uu lao ipupala anda peteamino doko tumbia-pyaa.
44002003	Ipao tumbiamopa ita yuli jepae mendapua ipao langa pyao tayatala masoo miningi endakali dupa-kisa wakale wakale lao siamo doko dupame kandeami-pyaa.
44002004	Oli Sipitisa doko dupa pitaka-kisa tumbia-pyaa. Dokopa dutupame Sipitisa dokome pii lena lao maiyali pyoo pii tata waka waka dupa lao sakateami-pyaa.
44002005	Juta endakali Gote tama pyoo yuu dupa pitakanya katenge dupame nyakamanya yuu dupa yakinatala Jetusaleme ipao kateami-pyaa.
44002006	Uu leamo doko sepala endakali longo dupame ipao kambu piami-pyaa. Kambu pyateaminopa masoo miningi endakali dupame akali kateamino dupanya pii wakale lengeli pyoo leaminosa sepala mona andeami-pyaa.
44002007	Endakali kateamino dutupame walu lao mona andapala lao pituu, “Pii lelyamino endakali dupa pitaka Galili tange taa aipape?
44002008	Naimanya pii wakale wakale lengeli pyoo silyamano dupa aipa petala silyama kanjemape?
44002009	Naima Patia tangepi, Mitia tangepi, Ilama tangepi, Mesopotemia tangepi, Jutia tangepi, Kapatosia tangepi, Pondasa tangepi, Esia tangepi dupa kalyamano.
44002010	Dee mendatupa Pitisia tangepi, Pambilia tangepi, Isipe tangepi, Lipia tange Saitini makisa dosa tangepi dupa kalyamanoaka.
44002011	Naima Jutapi Juta joo katenge dupapi dupa pitaka kalyamano. Loma tange dakenya ipao tisa nao katenge dupapi, Kitita tangepi, Atepia tangepi dupa kalyamanoaka. Endakali atupame naima pitakanya pii wakale wakale lelyamanoli pyoo Goteme kalai andake piamo dupanya lapiminopa naimame silyamano,” leami-pyaa.
44002012	Dopa latala mona andao dupa pitakame mende lamai lamai pyoo, “Ongo aipa pilyape?” leami-pyaa.
44002013	Dopa leaminopa akali yangimi aiyomba wangatoto petala lamba lao lao pituu, “Endakali atupame waene longo lao nalamini lamona,” leami-pyaa.
44002014	Dopa leaminopa akali kingi ita mende-kisa dee mendai dupa-pipa awapa katao Pitame toya katapala puu lao endakali dupa lamaiyoo, “Nyakama Jutia tangepi Jetusaleme dakenya kalyamino dupapi nyakama pitakame pilyamo dake moname auu pyoo masetala nambame pii langilyo doko salapape.
44002015	Nyakamame naima waene napala kyekelyaminona lao masilyaminoaka doko, naima nanalamano. Indupa yongama daape.
44002016	-
44002017	Pilyamo dake wamba potopesa Joelenya kambu dokonya Goteme pii leamo dokoaka pilyamo. ‘Goteme lao pituu, “Yuu etalanya pitamo gii dokopa nambame nambanya Sipitisa doko endakali dupa pitaka-kisa kai lato. Gii dokopa nyakamanya ikiningipi wanengepi dupame potopesa joo pii lao panatami. Nyakamanya wane patange dupame lee manimanimi kandena lawapi nyakamanya akali wambake dupame kombea pina lawapi nambame maito.
44002018	Yuu gii dokonya nambame nambanya kendemane enda akalipi dupa-kisa nambanya Sipitisa doko kai latona dupame potopesa joo pii lao panatami.
44002019	Nambame ketae kaitinya kongali paka pipae dupa pyoo isa yuunya kalai yale dupa pyoo pito. Taiyoko dokopi, itatepi, kena andake dokopi ipata.
44002020	Niki doko iminjetala kana doko taiyoko pyoo alutamopa, Kamongonya gii andake doko panao ipata.
44002021	Kamongo doko lao kee latamino endakali dupa pitaka baame pyoo nyetana,” ’ dopa lao Joeleme pepa pyanya setea-pyaa.
44002022	“Nyakama Isataele dupame pii dake salapape. Goteme Nasatete tange Jisasa doko yapao nyepala nyakamame kandalapale lao panasetea. Baame Jisasanya kingi ongome nyakamanya kaina dokonya kalai pupu lapaepi, kongalipi, kalai paka pipaepi dupa piamo nyakamame kandateami.
44002023	Wambao Goteme masokondape pyoo masetala dopa pituna lao pii lao wasepala nyakamanya kingilyaka baa dia. Diamo doko nyakamame mana setapae nepenge akali dupame baa pyao yukuina lao maitala kumasiami.
44002024	Dopa piaminopa Jisasa kumiamoaka doko, Goteme tanda nao kumingi doko nepatala baa sakatasia-pyaa. Kumingi dokome baa etete minapenge nanjia-pyaa.
44002025	Dokonyaka Dapitimi baa kandao dapa lea-pyaa: ‘Kamongo doko koteaka lao nambanya enomba dokonya katenge doko nambame kandeo. Baa nambanya kingi tolae dokonya kalyamona, opale mendeme namba lombasala nayata.
44002026	Tenge ongonya namba mona yaepatala eteke kayao pii leo. Dopana, namba kumingi dokome lete katenge epe ipata doko masoo malisilyamo.
44002027	Embame nambanya imambu doko malu dokonya palena lao kayala nayate. Namba embanya akali epe etete doko tamuatale lao embame kayala nayate.
44002028	Embame namba eteteaka lete katato kaita doko laitaka petee. Emba nambapa awapa katao nambanya mona doko etete yaepasakatena,’ Dapitimi dopa lea-pyaa.
44002029	“Kaimia paluma, naimanya yumbange Dapiti dokonya lao nambame pii yapae napyoo nyakama langilyo. Baa kumiamopa malu piami-pyaa. Baanya malu piamino panda doko kandao kalyamano.
44002030	Baa potopesa dokomena, Goteme baa kandao kiningi etete embanya mandipaenya mandipae mende embanya kiŋi toko dokonya petena latona leamo pii doko masia-pyaa.
44002031	Goteme pitamo dupa Dapitimi wambao kandatala baame Kataisa sakatatamo dokonya dapa lea-pyaa: ‘Baa Goteme malu dokonya satale lao yakinala nayatamopa baa tamuala nayatana,’ lea-pyaa.
44002032	Goteme Jisasa dokoaka sakatasiamopa naima kandeamano dupa pitakame endakali dupa-kisa lao panao kalyamano.
44002033	Goteme baa kaiti-kisa lanyiamopa Gotenya kingi tolae dokonya kalyamo. Wamba Takangeme maitona leamoli pyoo Oli Sipitisa doko Takange-kisa nyepelyamo. Dopa petala indupa nyakamame soo kandelyamino dupa Goteme pilyamo.
44002034	Dapiti baa kaiti-kisa paa nayawaka pituu pii dake lea-pyaa:
44002035	‘Kamongo Gote dokome nambanya Kamongo doko lamaiyoo, “Emba nambanya kingi tolae-kaita katape. Katatenopa nambame embanya yandapipili dupa embanya moko pundipundi ongonya katena latona,” lea-pyaa.’
44002036	Nyakama Isataele endakali dupa pitakame etete masokondape pyoo masalapape. Nyakamame pyao yukuiyamino akali Jisasa doko Goteme Kamongo Kataisa katena lateana,” Pitame lea-pyaa.
44002037	Pitame pii leamo dokome endakali dupanya mona dokonya yandateme pili piamosa dupame Pitapi aposele dupapi dutupa pisoo pituu, “Kaimia paluma, naima aipa pimape?” leami-pyaa.
44002038	Dopa leaminopa Pitame dutupanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Nyakama mona kapilyetala nyakama mendai mendai lawanya Goteme koo dupa kunanya nepekena lao Jisasa Kataisanya kenge doko lao kaimbu nyalapape. Dokopa Goteme Oli Sipitisa doko nyakama mee ditona leamo doko dita.
44002039	Goteme ditona lao pii lanya seteamo doko nyakamanyapi, nyakamanya wane dupapi, yuu etete tependa tange dupa pitakapinya lao lanya setea-pyaa. Naimanya Kamongo Gote dokome epena latae endakali dupanya pii lanya setakamaiyana,” Pitame dopa lea-pyaa.
44002040	Dopa latala baame pii waipa soo longo leamo dupame endakalinya mona sakatasoo masina lao dapa lamaiya-pyaa: “Nyakama uanga pyoo paenge endakali dupa-pipa koyala nayalapale, Goteme nyakama pyoo nyina lao kalyepapena,” Pitame lea-pyaa.
44002041	Gii dokopa Pitame pii leamo doko auu kayao siamino endakali dupanya kaimbu pyakamaiyami-pyaa. Kaimbu pyatakamaitala kambuanya nyoo konda piamino endakali dupa taosene tepoma jia-pyaa.
44002042	Dupame aposele dupanya pii sepala mende nisa nisa pyoo katao, betesa konjoo awapa nao, loma soo kyoto joo kateami-pyaa.
44002043	Aposele dupa-kisa Goteme kongalipi kalai paka pipaepi longo dupa piamosa kandatala endakali pitakame paka kayao kateami-pyaa.
44002044	Dopa piaminopa Gote lao masoo minao kateamino endakali dupa pitaka awapa katao nyakama tangenya opale apalepi siamo dupa pitaka nyakama pitakanya joo seteami-pyaa.
44002045	Dopa pyoo katao, nyakamame nyakamanya yuupi opale apalepi dupame muni nyepala mende daa joo kateamino dupa mokosoo maiyoo kateami-pyaa.
44002046	Dutupame mona mendai paliuu losuu anda andake dokonya kyoto joo pao kateami-pyaa. Dee tangenya andaka dupanya katao betesa konjoo, nee mokosoo, mende yalo napyoo, mona yaepawaka kateami-pyaa.
44002047	Dupame Gote lao tama pyoo kateaminopa endakali dupa pitakame dokaita kandao auu kayao kateami-pyaa. Kamongome endakali mendatupa pyoo nyepa piamoli pyoo koteaka lao kambuanya konda peta pia-pyaa.
44003001	Yuu mende Pita Jonepa dolapome alemandi kiloko tepoma lelyamopa loma singi gii ongopa losuu anda andake dokonya peambi-pyaa.
44003002	Dokopa akali mende dokonya petamo kandeambi-pyaa. Akali doko endangimi mandeamo gii dokopa moko koo mandea-pyaa. Akali mendatupame koteaka lao akali moko koo doko soo ipao losuu anda andake kame kambu Auu Pipae lenge dokonya yakinengema-pyaa. Baame akali loma sala ipatamino dupa-kisa opale apalepi tee lena lao pisingima-pyaa.
44003003	Dopa piaminopa akali dokome Pita Jonepa kame dokonya kolandalanya piambino kandatala, “Nyakambame namba mende dyepa,” lao tee lea-pyaa.
44003004	Dolapome akali doko kandokondape petala Pitame, “Embame nalimba kanda,” lea-pyaa.
44003005	Akali dokome dolapome baa mende dyaambinona lao masetala kandokondape pyoo kandea-pyaa.
44003006	Dopa piamopa Pitame baa lamaiyoo, “Muni toeapi kinapi dupanya mende namba-kisa nasilyamoaka doko, mende silyamo doko nambame emba dilyona, Jisasa Kataisa Nasatete tange dokonya kenge doko lao emba sakatatala moko katao kaita puu lelyona,” lea-pyaa.
44003007	Pitame dopa latala akali dokonya kingi tolae-kaita minatala baa minalyiamopa etete pupae lao baanya moko lenge dupa kyoto jakamaiya-pyaa.
44003008	Dopa piamopa baa yapa lao sakatao toya katapala kaita paya-pyaa. Akali dokome losuu anda andake dokonya dolapo-pipa awapa pao pituu, baame Gote lao tama pima-pima pyoo liyoo pea-pyaa.
44003009	Akali dokome Gote lao tama pyoo peamopa endakali pitakame kandeami-pyaa.
44003010	Baa kaita payamo doko kandatala endakali dokaitame akali dake losuu anda andake kame kambu Auu Pipae lenge dokonya pitipala oapi tee lao petengena lao masiami-pyaa. Baa auu pisetae epeamo doko kandatala dupame walu lao mona andeami-pyaa.
44003011	Akali dokome losuu anda andake kame Solomone lenge dokaita Pita Jonepa minatae kateamopa endakali dupa pitakame etete mona andapala dokonya alo pyao ipao kambu piami-pyaa.
44003012	Dopa piamino doko kandatala Pitame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakama Isataele dupame aipuma dake kandatala mona andelyamipi? Nyakama aipuma nalimba kandatae silyamipi? Nalimba tangenya pupu lapaepa mana epe miningipa dolapome akali dake auu pisetala kaita paena lelyambinona lao masilyamipi?
44003013	Apotakamepi, Aisakepi, Jekopepi naimanya takange dupanya Gote dokome baanya kalai akali Jisasa doko tii pisia. Tii pisiamo dokoaka nyakamame anjoo soo Pailate maitala maita maiyami. Pailateme Jisasa mokatala pena latoo lao masiamo dokopa nyakamame daa leami.
44003014	Dopa piamino dokome akali epe etete tolatae doko kandao daa leami. Dopa petala akali yango pyao kumasingi mende Pailateme mokekena lao tee leami.
44003015	Dopa petala nyakamame akali lete katengenya tenge doko pyao kumasiami. Pyao kumasiaminoaka doko, Goteme baa malunya sakatasia. Sakatasiamo doko nalimbame lengeme kandatala doko lao panasoo kalyambano.
44003016	Nyakamame akali kandengema kandapino dakeme Jisasa lao masoo minao pitipumu dokonya Jisasanya kenge dokome baa kyoto injisalamo. Masoo miningi Jisasame maingi dokome nyakama pitakanya enombanya akali dake etete mee jakamaiyome lamo.
44003017	“Kini, kaimia paluma, nyakamame masala nayao piamina lao masilyo. Nyakamanya isingi dupame dopaka pyoo masala nayawaka piami.
44003018	Nyakamame dopa piamino dokome wamba Goteme potopesa dupa pitakanya kambu dupanya baanya Kataisa doko tanda nyetana leamo doko angi jia.
44003019	Dopa piamo dokonya Goteme nyakamanya koo dupa kunanya nepekena lao nyakama mona kapilyetala baa kalyamo dokonya pilyalapape.
44003020	Nyakama-kisa Kamongome pupu lapae enenge sakatasetala baame nyakamanya Jisasa Kataisana lao yapao nyekeamo doko nyakama-kisa epena lakatana lao dopa pipenge.
44003021	Goteme dupa pitaka dee enenge joo eteteaka auu pisetamo gii doko malisoo Jisasa kaitinya katapenge. Wamba waka Goteme baanya potopesa epe dupanya kambunya dopa pitana lao lea-pyaa.
44003022	Moseseme lao pituu, ‘Namba pyakalya leamoli pyoo Kamongo Goteme nyakamanya potopesa mende nyakamanya kaiminingi dupanya kainanya pyakalyina lakata. Akali dokome pii langitamo dupa pitaka nyakamame sakamaiyepape.
44003023	Endakali mendeme potopesa dokonya pii doko sakamaiya nayatamo kandao doko, nyakamanya kainanya nakatena lao Goteme nyokonyetana,’ lea-pyaa.
44003024	Potopesa Samuele dokopi dee enakao potopesa kateamino dupapi dupa pitakame gii dake ipatana lao pii dokoaka leami-pyaa.
44003025	Potopesa dupame pii leamino dupapi Goteme nyakamanya yumbange dupa-kisa pii lao setamo dupapi dupa nyakamame angi jimu kandao kalyamino. Baame Apotakame lamaiyoo, ‘Tenda embanya tatanya mandipae mendeme yuunya endakali tata pitaka auu piseta,’ lea-pyaa.
44003026	Nyakama mendai mendai lao dupame nyakamanya koo pingi dupa maita maitala nyakama kapilyetamino dokome Goteme nyakama auu pisotopa lao baame baanya kalai akali doko wambao nyakamanya kainanya epekena leana,” Pitame lea-pyaa.
44004001	Pita Jonepa dolapome endakali dupa pii lamaiyoo kateambino dokopa pitisa dupapi, losuu anda andake isingi akali dokopi, Satyusi dupapi dupa epeami-pyaa.
44004002	Ipupala pituu mana piipi Jisasa malunya sakateamo tenge dokonya endakali kumapae dupa sakatatamipi pii dupa aipuma endakali dupa lamailyambipi lao masetala mona koo palyiami-pyaa.
44004003	Dopa petala akali dolapo anjetala yuu alemanjoo kuiyamosa taita kosa latama lao dolapo anjingi andaka palena lao anjiami-pyaa.
44004004	Dopa piaminoaka doko, pii siamino endakali longo dupame pii doko lao masoo miniami-pyaa. Masoo miniamino endakali dupa pyasoo tausene yuungipi mende jia-pyaa.
44004005	Nyakamanya akali andake dupapi, isingi akali dupapi, mana setapae masingi akali dupapi dupa yongama ipao Jetusaleme yuu dokonya limbiami-pyaa.
44004006	Pitisa mupa Anasa lenge dokopi, Kayapasa mauwapi, Jonepi, Alekesandapi, pitisa mupa doko palu dupa pitakapi dutupa apata limbiami-pyaa.
44004007	Dokaitame akali dolapo kainanya nyoo katasetala pisoo pituu, “Pupu lapae aki mendepa apinya kenge mendepame kalai dake pimbipi?” lao pisiami-pyaa.
44004008	-
44004009	Dokopa Oli Sipitisa dokome Pita-kisa tumbateamopa baame dupa lamaiyoo, “Akali andakepi, isingi akalipi, nyakamame indupa gii dakenya nalimba kosimi lao akali yaina pyapae dake aipa petala auu pyoo kalyape lao pisilyamino.
44004010	Dopa pilyamino dokonya nyakamapi dee Isataele dupa pitaka-pipame masalapale lao pii dakeme yanu pyekelyambano: nyakamame Jisasa Kataisa Nasatete tange ita pokonya pyao yukuiyamino doko Goteme baa malunya sakatasiamo dokonya kenge dokomeaka akali dake moko epe jetala nyakamanya enombanya kalyamo.
44004011	“Nyakama anda pingi akali dupame anda pingina daa latala nepeamino Jisasa doko pingina mupa jetelyamo.
44004012	Baame iki endakali dupa pyoo nyingi. Yuu dake pitakanya waka mendeme endakali pyoo nyinana lao dokonya kenge doko Goteme laa naengena,” Pitame lea-pyaa.
44004013	Dokopa dokaitame Pita Jonepa dolapo sukulu nalenge mee mendalapona lao masiamino doko, dolaponya paka nakayao pii lenge mana doko kandatala mona andeami-pyaa. Mona andao pituu nyakamame akali dolapo Jisasapa awapa kateamino doko masiami-pyaa.
44004014	Akali moko epe jakamaiyamo doko dolapo-pipa awapa kateamino kandatala dokaitame piipi mende yanu pyao lapenge nanjia-pyaa.
44004015	-
44004016	Akali dolapo limbingi anda doko yakinatala kamaka pyakalyina latala nyakama tange pii lao wasoo pituu, “Akali dolapo kandao aipa pimape? Dolapome kongali doko pimbinopa Jetusaleme kalyamino endakali dupa pitakame kandatapimino dokonya naimame napimbina lapenge nanjilyamo.
44004017	Dopaka doko, pii doko endakali waka dupanya etete lao tayatamopa kapa napitana, akali dolapome Jisasanya kenge doko lao endakali mendaipi mende dee pii lamaiya naena lao pyalanya lamana,” leami-pyaa.
44004018	Dopa lao pii wasoo etapala akali dolapo epena latala, “Nyalambome Jisasanya kenge doko lao pii manapi etete kukipi mende lamaiya nayalapape,” leami-pyaa.
44004019	Dopa leaminoaka doko, Pita Jonepame dokaitanya pii yanu pyao dapa leambi-pyaa: “Nalimbame nyakamanya pii sakao kalyanya Gotenya pii doko kayatambanopa Goteme kapana latape? Nyakama tangeme masalapa.
44004020	Nalimbame kandeambano dupapi siambano dupapi dutupa kapa pao kayala nayatambana,” leambi-pyaa.
44004021	Dokopa dokaitame akali dolapo piimi kyoto joo pyalanya latala pena lao yakineami-pyaa. Doko, Goteme piamo doko endakali pitakame kandatala tama piaminosa endakali dupa paka kayami-pyaa. Dopa petala dokaitame akali dolapo tanda maipenge kaitini mende kandao nanyiami-pyaa.
44004022	Akali dolapome kongali pyoo moko koo dee auu pisiambino akali doko ee kana kingi ita kitomendenya ulutena joo nepatae-pyaa.
44004023	Dokopa dupame dolapo yakinateaminopa dolapome nyalambonya awapa katenge dupanya andaka pupala pitisa mupa dupapi isingi akali dupapi dupame pii leamino dupa pitaka panao lamaiyambi-pyaa.
44004024	Dupame sepala pituu, pitakame mona mendai paliuu Gote lao puu lao dapa lao loma siami-pyaa: “Kamongo, embame yuupi, kaitipi, endakipi dee dupanya singi dupapi dupa pitaka wasii-pyaa.
44004025	Oli Sipitisa dokome embanya kalai akali naimanya yumbange Dapiti doko lungu pisetala baa-kisa embame dapa lea-pyaa: ‘Aipuma endakali tata waka dupame kandanya paliuu imbu kayami-pyaape? Aipuma naimanya tata dupame angi nanjepenge kalai dupa pimana lao kaita kutiami-pyaape?
44004026	Yuunya kiŋi dupame isoo kateaminopa akali andake dupame limbatala Kamongo Gotepa baanya Kataisa dokopa dolapo koyasalanya piami-pyaana,’ dopa lea-pyaa.
44004027	Doko, kiningi etete yuu dakenya Etotepi, Pondiasa Pailatepi, Isataele tata dupapi, tata wakapi dupa pitakame embanya kalai akali etete epe embame yapao nyiino Jisasa doko koyasalanya yuu taono dakenya limbiami.
44004028	Embanya pupu lapaepa masingipa dolapome dopa pina latona lao masiino dokoaka piami.
44004029	Dopana, indupa dokaitame naima pyalanya lao pii lelyamino dupa Kamongo Gote embame sepe. Sepala naima embanya kendemane dupame paka nakayao, embanya pii doko etete pupu lao lamaiyepale lao embame naima nisepe.
44004030	Dopa pyoo katao embanya kingi lyaa latala embanya kalai akali etete epe Jisasanya kenge doko lao yaina pyapae mee injisoo, kongalipi kalai paka pipaepi dupa pyoo katape,” lao loma siami-pyaa.
44004031	Dopa lao loma sepeaminopa limbao peteamino anda doko ema-ema pia-pyaa. Dokopa Oli Sipitisa dokome dokaita pitaka-kisa tumbateamopa paka nakayao Gotenya pii doko pupu lao lamaiyami-pyaa.
44004032	Gii dokopa endakali masoo miningi dupa pitakame mona mendai joo masingi mendaiyaka paliuu kateami-pyaa. Endakali mendaipi mendeme baanya oapi siamo dupa nambanya ikina nalenya, oapi siamo dupa naima pitakanyana lao isoo kateami-pyaa.
44004033	Dopa pyoo kateaminopa aposele dupame Kamongo Jisasa sakateamo kandeamino pii doko etete kyoto joo lamaiyoo kateami-pyaa. Dokopa Goteme mona epe palenge andake doko dokaita pitaka-kisa sia-pyaa.
44004034	-
44004035	Endakali mendaipi mende dopale mende daa jala naya-pyaa. Endakali mendenya andapi yuupi siamo dupame muni nyepala minao ipao aposele dupanya kingilyaka setapa piami-pyaa. Aposele dupame nyepala mende daa jiamoli pyoo endakali dupa mokosoo maiyoo kateami-pyaa.
44004036	Gii dokopa akali Josepe lenge mende Lipai tata dokonya endangimi Saipotasa yuu dokonya mandea mende katea-pyaa. Aposele dupame Josepenya kenge enenge mende Banapasa leami-pyaa. Kenge leamino dokonya tenge doko mona yaepasakamaingi akalina leami-pyaa.
44004037	Josepeme baanya yuu mende siamo dokome muni nyepala minao ipao aposele dupanya kingilyaka setea-pyaa.
44005001	Dee akali mende Ananayasa lenge dokopa baanya enda Sapaita lenge dokopa dolaponya yuu mendeme muni nyiambi-pyaa.
44005002	Muni nyepala akali dokome muni dokonya mendatupa baa tangenya setea-pyaa. Dopa piamo doko etanengeme apata kandeaka-pyaa. Muni yangi mendatupa minao ipupala aposele dupanya kingilyaka setea-pyaa.
44005003	Dopa piamopa Pitame baa pisoo, “Ananayasa, embame aipuma Satane doko embanya ingi monapinya ipao tumbina kayalepe? Embame aipuma Oli Sipitisa doko sambo pii lamaitala, yuu dokonya muni mendatupa tange nyoo setalepe?
44005004	Akali mendeme embanya yuu doko sambao nyepala nayamopa emba tange-kisa sala nayape? Enakao yuu dokome muni nyepala muni dutupa pitaka emba tangemeaka isala nayapipi? Aipuma emba tangeme mana koo dake masipipi? Embame endakali mende sambo lamaiya naenya, Gote kandao sambo lamailinona,” lea-pyaa.
44005005	Pii dutupa soo Ananayasa baa lombapae sepala kumia-pyaa. Ananayasa doko kumalamo lapae siamino endakali dupa pitakame pakame kumiami-pyaa.
44005006	Akali mendapuame sakatatala baa yaki pyoo soo kamaka pupala malu piami-pyaa.
44005007	Maitakao baanya etanenge dokome Ananayasa kumalamo lapae doko nasoo ipupala andaka kolandea-pyaa.
44005008	Kolandateamopa Pitame baa pisoo pituu, “Nyalambonya yuu dokome muni datupaka nyiambipi, namba langi,” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa enda dokome, “Kini, dutupaka nyiambana,” lea-pyaa.
44005009	Ongopa Pitame baa lamaiyoo, “Nyalambome aipuma mona mendai paliuu Kamongonya Sipitisa doko minao makande pilyambipi? Embanya akalingi malu pyaa pamino dupa kyuku lao kambusa ipatalumino dupame emba kamaka soo paaminoakana,” lea-pyaa.
44005010	Pitame dopa lalu piamopa enda doko Pita kateamo dosa lombao sepala kumalu pia-pyaa. Dokopa akali dupame andokote ipupala kumapae siamo doko kandatala soo kamaka pupala akalingi malu petae kateamo dosaka malu piami-pyaa.
44005011	Tenge dokonya sosanya endakali dupapi pii siamino endakali dupapi dupa pitakame pakame kumiami-pyaa.
44005012	Dee Goteme endakali dupanya kaina dokonya kongalipi kalai paka pipaepi longo dupa aposele dupa-kisa pyoo katea-pyaa. Masoo miniamino dupa pitakame losuu anda andake kame Solomone lenge dokaita mona mendai paliuu ipao limbao katengema-pyaa.
44005013	Endakali waka dupame paka kayapala dupanya mendeme masoo miningi endakali dupa-pipa awapa limbamana lao masala nayami-pyaa. Dopaka doko, endakali dupame masoo miningi endakali dupa epe etetena lao lalyoo kateami-pyaa.
44005014	Dokopa endakalipi longo paka pyoo dupame Kamongo lao masoo minatala baa tata dokonya ipao konda piami-pyaa.
44005015	Dokopa dupame yaina pyapae dupa soo kaitini andake dupanya ipupala tulipi lapalapapi dupanya seteami-pyaa. Pita ipao patamopa nita dokome baa-kisa tapyatamopa baanya waiyange dokome dokaita yalena lao seteami-pyaa.
44005016	Yuu taono yakane Jetusaleme kaina pyoo palenge endakali dupame dopaka pyoo nyakamanya yaina pyapaepi enjele koome kenda pisetaepi dupa soo epelyaminopa dupa pitaka auu pisakamaingi-pyaa.
44005017	Dopa piamo doko kandatala pitisa mupa dokopi baanya awapa katenge Satyusi tata dupapi dupame tilya maiyoo imbu kayamaiyami-pyaa.
44005018	Dopa petala dupame aposele dupa anjetala kapomanenya anjingi anda ongonya pyasiami-pyaa.
44005019	-
44005020	Dopa piaminoaka doko, kuka dokonya Kamongonya enjele mende ipupala anjingi anda kaita dupa lumbapala dokaita kamaka laminao epea-pyaa. Laminao ipupao pituu baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakama losuu anda andake dokonya pao katapala endakali dupa lete katenge dokonya pii dupa pitaka lamaiyokondape pyoo kalyepapena,” lea-pyaa.
44005021	Dopa leamo sepala dokaitame yongama wamba losuu anda andake dokonya pupala pii manapi dupa lamaiyoo kateami-pyaa. Gii ongopa pitisa mupa dokopi baanya awapa katenge dupapi dupa ipao limbatala kanjole dupapi Isataelemanya isingi akali dupa pitakapi dupa epena lao wii lao elyambu piami-pyaa. Dopa petala anjingi anda isingi akali mendapuame aposele dupa laminao epena leami-pyaa.
44005022	-
44005023	Yanda singi dupame lanyala epeaminopa aposele dupa anjingi andaka napaleaminosa kutao kayapala dokaitame limbao kateamino dokonya pilyetala dapa leami-pyaa: “Naima anjingi andaka kandapumanopa kaita dupa pai lakondape petae katalamo. Yanda singi kambu isoo katenge dupa kataminopa kaita lumbapala andaka kolandao kanjemanoaka doko, mendaipi mende napalyomona,” leami-pyaa.
44005024	Pii doko sepala losuu anda andake isingi akali dokopi pitisa mupa dupapi dupame mona kendao aipa pyeme lusilyamape lao longo lao masiami-pyaa.
44005025	Dokopa akali mende ipupala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame salapape. Kuaka nyakamame akali mendatupa anjingi andake pyandamino dupame losuu anda andake dokonya pao katapala pii manapi dupa endakali dupa lamaiyoo kalyaminona,” lea-pyaa.
44005026	Gii dokopaka losuu anda andake isingi akali dokopi yanda singi dupapi dupame akali dokaita pao lanyepala endakali dupame nyakama kaname pyatamini lao masetala wana-wana lao laminao epeami-pyaa.
44005027	-
44005028	Dupame dokaita laminao ipupala kanjole limbiamino dupanya enombasa katasiami-pyaa. Kateaminopa pitisa mupa dokome dokaita-kisa tenge setao, “Naimame kyoto joo nyakama akali dokonya kenge doko lao mana lamaiya nayalapape leamano doko nyakamame nyakamanya mana pii doko Jetusaleme yuu dake pitakanya lamaiyoo lao tayatelyamino. Dee nyakamame akali dokonya taiyoko doko naima-kisa sina lao masilyaminoakana,” lea-pyaa.
44005029	Dopa leamopa sepala Pitapi aposele waka dupapimi pii doko yanu pyao pituu, “Gotenya pii silyamo doko kayapala endakalinya pii watao minatamanopa etete kapa napata.
44005030	Nyakamame Jisasa ita pokonya pyao yukuoo kumasiami. Dopa piaminoaka doko, naimanya yumbangenya Gote dokome baa sakatasia.
44005031	Goteme baa ketae nyoo pupala baanya kingi tolae dokonya katena lea-pyaa. Dokopa naima Isataele dupa mona kapilyalapale lawapi koo kunanya nepakatoo lawapi Isingi Akalipi Pyoo Nyingi Akalipi joo kalyamo.
44005032	Naimapi dee Oli Sipitisa Goteme baanya pii sakamaingi endakali diamo dokopimi piamo dupa lao panelyamanona,” leami-pyaa.
44005033	Pii dutupame nyakamanya mona kenda pipita siamosa dupame etete imbu kayapala aposele dupa pyao kumasemana lao masoo kateami-pyaa.
44005034	Dopa lao masiaminopa Patasi Gamaliele lenge mende limbiamino dokonya toya katea-pyaa. Baa Gotenya mana setapae dupanya mana lenge akali joo katelyamopa endakali pitakame baa lalyingima-pyaa. Baame dupa lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame akali datupa kuki mende kamanda kalya pena laapa,” lea-pyaa.
44005035	Dee baame dupa lamaiyoo, “Anematupa, nyakamame akali dutupa kandao mende pyaanya pilyamino doko wambao masokondape pyoo masalapape.
44005036	Kuki wambale akali Tiutasa lenge mende sakatatala namba akali andake joo kalyona lao kateamopa akali andate kitomende mendatupame baa konda pyoo kateami-pyaa. Dopa piamoaka doko, kapomaneme baa pyao kumaseteamopa baa watao payamino dupa wakale puu puu pyoo pao alu piami-pyaa.
44005037	Dee maitakao kapomaneme endakali kenge nyiamo gii dokopa Galili tange akali Jutasa lenge mende sakatao katapala, baame kapomane watao pyalanya endakali dupame baa watena lao nyoo limbia-pyaa. Kapomaneme baa pyao kumasetala baa watao payamino endakali dupa pitaka tale pisia-pyaa.
44005038	Dopa piamo dokonya indupa nambame nyakama langilyo. Nyakamame akali dutupa kandao mende napinya mee katena kayalapape. Endakalimi iki dake masoo pyoo katatamino kandao doko, pilyamino dake koyata.
44005039	Goteme pina latamopa pitamino kandao doko, nyakamame kapa pao koyasala nayatami. Aopyoo latala nyakamame Gote yanda pimaiyoo katatamina kandao kalyepape,” lea-pyaa. Baame pii leamo doko dupame sakamaiyami-pyaa.
44005040	Dopa petala aposele dupa andaka epena latala konjame piami-pyaa. Pyapala pituu, “Nyakamame Jisasanya kenge doko lao pii etete panala nayalapape,” latala pena kayami-pyaa.
44005041	Aposele dupame akali limbao kateamino doko kayapala mona yaepao kamaka peami-pyaa. Doko, Goteme naima Jisasanya kenge dokonya kapa pao elya nyepenge jilyamona lao masiamo doko lao masetala mona yaepao peami-pyaa.
44005042	Dupame koteaka lao losuu anda andakepi endakali dupanya andakapi dupanya pupala endakali dupa mana lamaiyoaka kateami-pyaa. Jisasa baa Gotenya Kataisa doko kalyamona lao Wai Pii Epe doko lamaiyoaka kateami-pyaa.
44006001	Yuu mende masoo miningi endakali dupa longo jeta jeta piamopa dupanya Gitiki pii lenge dupame Iputu pii lenge dupa kandao mumu leami-pyaa. Iputu pii lenge dupame Gitiki dupanya enda walyakae dupa nee akipi koteaka lao mokosingi dokonya auu pyoo namaiyaminosa mumu leami-pyaa.
44006002	Dopa lao kateaminopa aposele kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapoma dutupame masoo miningi endakali dupa pitaka epena lao nyoo elyambu petala dapa leami-pyaa: “Naimame Gotenya pii lamaingi doko yakinatala nee akipi mokosoo katatamano kandao doko, auu napita.
44006003	Dopana, kaimia paluma, nyakamame nyakamanya akali kalange kenge epe singi masingi epe palenge Oli Sipitisame tumbatae mendatupa kutalapape. Kutao nyepataminopa naimame akali dutupame kalai dake isoo kandao katena latama.
44006004	Dopa petala naimame loma singi dokopa Gotenya pii lamaingi dokopa dolapo yakinala nayao pyoaka katatamana,” leami-pyaa.
44006005	Dopa leamino doko masoo miningi dupa pitakame sepala auu kayami-pyaa. Auu kayapala akali Sitipena lenge doko yapao nyiami-pyaa. Baa masoo miningipi Oli Sipitisapimi tumbatae katenge-pyaa. Dee dupame Pilipa lenge dokopi, Potokotasa lenge dokopi, Naikena lenge dokopi, Taimone lenge dokopi, Pamenasa lenge dokopi, Nikolasa lenge yuu taono Andioko tange Juta joo kateamo dokopi akali dutupa yapao nyiamiaka-pyaa.
44006006	Yapao nyiamino akali dutupa aposele dupanya enomba dokonya laminao epeaminopa aposele dupame loma setala aiyomba minani piami-pyaa.
44006007	Dokopa Gotenya pii doko tayama-tayama pyoo taya-pyaa. Jetusaleme dokonya masoo miningi endakali dupa etete longo jema-jema pia-pyaa. Pitisa longo mendapuame Kataisa lao masoo miniamiaka-pyaa.
44006008	Gotenya kalai pingi pupu lapae doko Sitipena-kisa tumbatae katao baame endakali kaina dupanya kongali andakepi kalai paka pipaepi dupa pyoo katea-pyaa.
44006009	Dokopa Jutamanya losuu anda kenge Mokao Nyepae Akali Limbingina lengema dokonya Saitini tangepi, Alekesandia tangepi, dee akali waka Silisia tangepi, Esia tangepi mendapuame sakatao Sitipena-pipa pii yanda pyoloo piami-pyaa.
44006010	Dopa piaminoaka doko, Sipitisa Goteme Sitipena baa masingi epe maiyamoli pyoo pii leamopa dupame kapa pao ita minapenge nanjia-pyaa.
44006011	Dopa piamosa akali dupame waa katao akali mendatupame sambo pii lena leami-pyaa. Dopa piaminopa akali dupame ipao dapa leami-pyaa: “Naimame sipumanopa akali dakeme Mosesepa Gotepa lapota kilya kandao pii lapyana,” leami-pyaa.
44006012	Dopa leaminopa dupame endakali dupapi, isingi akali dupapi, mana setapae masingi akali dupapi dupanya mona minao sakatasakamaiyami-pyaa. Dopa petakamaiyaminopa dupame ipao Sitipena doko anjetala pyalya lao minao kanjole dupa-kisa peami-pyaa.
44006013	Pupala mokao nyepae limbingi dupame akali mendatupame sambo pii lena lao katena leami-pyaa. Akali dupame Sitipena kandao dapa leami-pyaa: “Akali dakeme losuu anda andake dakepi naimanya mana setapae dupapi dupa kandao koteaka lao kilya kandenge.
44006014	Naimame sipumanopa baame lao pituu, ‘Nasatete tange Jisasa dokome anda dake lakyoo nepao Moseseme naimanya mana setekeamo dupa alo pita,’ lapyana,” leami-pyaa.
44006015	Dopa leaminopa akali kanjole peteamino dupa pitakame Sitipena kandokondape pyoo kandeaminopa baanya lengelyaapi doko enjele mendenya lengelyaapi jiamo kandeami-pyaa.
44007001	Dokopa pitisa mupa dokome pii dutupa kiningipi lao pisia-pyaa.
44007002	Sitipename pii doko yanu pyao pituu, “Kaimia palupi, apane palupi, nyakamame salapape. Wamba naimanya yumbange Apotakame Etane yuu taono dokonya ene paanya Mesopotemia yuu dokonya kateamo gii dokopa tii pipae Gote doko baa-kisa epea-pyaa.
44007003	Ipupala Apotakame lamaiyoo, ‘Embanya yuupi tatapi dupa yakinatala, yuu mende nambame emba laitaka pito dokonya paale,’ lea-pyaa.
44007004	Dopa leamopa baanya yuu Kalatia doko yakinatala Apotakame pao Etane yuu dokonya katea-pyaa. Baanya takange doko kumateamopa Goteme baa laminao nyakama kalyamino yuu dakenya epea-pyaa.
44007005	Goteme Apotakame baa yuu kuki moko tee mendaipi mende baanya jina lao maiya nayamoaka doko, baapi baanya mandipae tanga katatamino dupapi dupa yuu dakenya katataminopa lao maituna lea-pyaa. Gii dokopa Apotakame baa wane namandenya mee katea-pyaa.
44007006	Goteme pii dapa lea-pyaa: ‘Apotakamenya mandipae dupa endakali waka dupanya yuu dokonya tisa nao katatami. Yuu dokonya tange dupame Apotakamenya mandipae dupa kendemane joo katena latala ee kana andate kitomende koyasoo katatami.
44007007	Dopa pitaminoaka doko, nambame dokaita kenda pipae maitu. Dopa pitopa Apotakamenya mandipae dupame yuu doko yakinatala yuu dakenya ipao katao namba lao tama tama pyoo katatamina,’ lea-pyaa.
44007008	Dee Goteme Apotakame-kisa pii mende lao pituu, wanenya elya pingi kambu kepenge pii doko lao yaki pia-pyaa. Apotakameme Aisake mandipala kote kalange pateamopa baame wane dokonya elya pingi kambu kepakamaiya-pyaa. Maitapyao Aisakeme Jekope mandipala elya pingi kambu kepakamaiya-pyaa. Jekopeme naimanya yumbange kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapoma dupa mandipala dopaka pia-pyaa.
44007009	-
44007010	“Naimanya yumbange dupame Josepe tilya maitala munimi sambao Isipe yuu dokonya nyoo pena lao maiyami-pyaa. Dopaka doko, Goteme baa-pipa awapa katao kenda pipae dupa pitakanya Josepe pyoo nyia-pyaa. Josepeme Isipe yuu dokonya kiŋi Peto kateasa pupala mona auu pisingipi mana kandengepi Goteme baa maiyamo dupa panasiamopa Petome kandea-pyaa. Kandatala baame Isipe yuu dokopi baanya anda dupapi dupa Josepeme isoo katena lea-pyaa.
44007011	Gii dokopa Isipe yuu dokopa Kenane yuu dokopa dolaponya lopo andake mende siamopa etete kenda kayami-pyaa. Ongopa naimanya yumbange dupame neepi mende kandao nyoo naneami-pyaa.
44007012	Dopaka doko, Jekopeme Isipe yuu dokonya nee silyamo leamino doko sepala naimanya yumbange dupame wambao kanja pena lea-pyaa.
44007013	Dee lapo pyoo peaminopa Josepeme baanya kaiminingi dupa lamaiyoo, ‘Namba Josepe kalyona,’ lamaiya-pyaa. Dokopa Petome Josepenya tata lamo lao kandea-pyaa.
44007014	Josepeme baanya takange Jekopepi takangenya palu dupa pitaka-pipa awapa epena lea-pyaa. Jekope palu dupa pyasoo kingi ita kalange-kisa dee yuungi-pyaa.
44007015	Jekope Isipe yuu dokonya epea-pyaa. Ipupala yuu dokonya katao Jekopepi naimanya yumbange dupapi dupa kumiami-pyaa.
44007016	Kumata pilyaminopa Sikeme yuu dokonya soo pao kananda mendenya setapa pingima-pyaa. Wamba Apotakamame akali Emonya wane dupa-kisa kananda mende sambao nyiamo yuu Sikeme lenge dokonyaka soo setengema-pyaa.
44007017	“Wamba Goteme Apotakame lamaiyoo tanga dopa pituna lao pii leamo doko angi jalanya tengesa piamopa Isataele tata Isipe kateamino dupa longo joo pee lea-pyaa.
44007018	Maitakao Josepenya kalai piamo dupa masala naenge kiŋi waka mendeme Isipe yuu doko isoo katea-pyaa.
44007019	Baame naima tata dupa minakasoo yumbange dupa minao koyasia-pyaa. Baame nyakamanya wane ŋaŋa dupa lenge tao nakatatamina lao masetala mandyuu nepalapape lea-pyaa.
44007020	Gii dokopa enda mendeme wane Mosese doko mandea-pyaa. Wane doko Gotenya lengelyaapi dokonya epe mende-pyaa. Mosese andaka endangimi setao peteamopa kana tepoma pea-pyaa.
44007021	Maitakao wane doko kamaka seteamopa Peto wanenge dokome kandao nyepala baanya ikiningi joo mondo pia-pyaa.
44007022	Isipe tangenya mana dupa pitaka lamaiyaminopa Moseseme nyoo etapala pii kyoto joo lao kalai pupu lao pyoo katea-pyaa.
44007023	“Moseseme ee kana kingi ita kitomende katapala baa tata Isataele dupa kanja patoo lao masetala kanja pea-pyaa.
44007024	Peamopa Isipe tange mendeme Isataele mende-kisa makongeamo doko kandatala baame Isataele doko nisoo Isipe tange makongeamo doko pyao kumasia-pyaa.
44007025	Moseseme baa tata dupame namba-kisa Goteme nyakama nisetana lao masilyamino lao masiamoaka doko, dupame dopa lao masala nayami-pyaa.
44007026	Taita dopa pyoo Moseseme Isataele mendalapo pyao piambino kandatala, baame akali dolaponya mona auu pisakamaiyanya pii epe lamaiyoo, ‘Nyalambo kaiminingi dolapo, aipuma mende koyasa koyasa pilyambipi?’ lea-pyaa.
44007027	Dopa leamopa akali baanya kaiminingi pimaiyamo dokome Mosese soo nepatala lao pituu, ‘Apimi emba naimanya isingi akalipi pii tolasingi akalipi joo kata lapyape?
44007028	Kuaka embame akali Isipe tange mende pyao kumasipinoli pyoo namba pyao kumasipuli lao masilipi?’ lea-pyaa.
44007029	Moseseme pii doko sepala baa paka pea-pyaa. Pupala yuu Mitiane dokonya tisa nao katao wane ane lapoma mandea-pyaa.
44007030	“Ee kana kingi ita kitomende pateamopa Moseseme Sainai manda endakali napalenge yuu dokonya katao itate mende ikililyambu mauu mendenya teamo dokonya enjele mende ita yuli kainanya kateamo kandea-pyaa.
44007031	-
44007032	Moseseme doko kandatala mona andea-pyaa. Mona andao pituu tengesa kanja peamopa, Kamongome baa lamaiyoo, ‘Namba embanya yumbange dupanya Gote doko kalyo. Apotakamepi, Aisakepi, Jekopepi dutupanya Gote doko kalyona,’ lea-pyaa. Moseseme pii doko soo walu lao paka kayapala angi doko kandapenge nanjia-pyaa.
44007033	Dopa piamopa Kamongome baa lamaiyoo, ‘Yuu emba kalyeno dutupa etete epe. Tenge dokonya embanya moko pee pingi dolapo lyoka.
44007034	Isipe tange dupame nambanya endakali Isipe kalyamino dupa minao koyasilyamino doko kandatelyo. Dupame tanda nao ee lelyamino doko sepelyo. Sepala namba tangeme mokao nyala ipatelyo. Indupa emba Isipe paalena ipu,’ Kamongo dokome dopa lea-pyaa.
44007035	“Dupame Mosese daa latala, ‘Apimi emba naimanya isingi akalipi pii tolasingi akalipi joo kata lapyape?’ leami-pyaa. Dopaka doko, akali doko isingi akalipi pyoo nyingi akalipi lapota joo Goteme katena lea-pyaa. Goteme baanya enjele ikililyambu mauunya kateamo doko-kisa Mosese Isipe pena lea-pyaa.
44007036	Baa Isipe kateamo gii dokopapi, solowata pete Kate Pyapae singi dokonya epeamino dokopapi, dee endakali napalenge yuu dokonya ee kana kingi ita kitomende dupa payawaka kateamino gii dokopapi dupanya baame kongalipi kalai paka pipaepi dupa pyoo Isipe yuu doko yakinatala dokaita laminao pea-pyaa.
44007037	Akali Mosese dokomeaka Isataele dupa kandao, ‘Namba pyakalya leamoli pyoo Goteme nyakamanya potopesa mende nyakama tata dupanya kaina dokonya pyakalyina lakatana,’ lea-pyaa.
44007038	Isataele dupa kambu pyao endakali napalenge yuu dokonya kateamino dokopa Mosese awapaka katea-pyaa. Baa enjele Sainai manda ongonya wamba pii lamaiyamo doko-pipa awapa katao dee naimanya yumbange dupa-pipa awapa kateaka-pyaa. Baame pii lapae lete katenge doko dupa maiyanya nyia-pyaa.
44007039	“Dopa piamoaka doko, naimanya yumbange dupame Moseseme pii leamo dupa nasemana lao masiami-pyaa. Dopa lao masetala Mosese yakinatala moname Isipe yuu dokonya pilyiami-pyaa.
44007040	Dupame Etone lamaiyoo, ‘Naimanya kaita laitaka pyoo wambata gote mendapua embame wasaka. Naima Isipe yakinatala kamanda laminao epeamo akali Mosese doko aipa piape lao naimame masala naelyamanona,’ leami-pyaa.
44007041	Gii dokopa dokaitame pulumakao ŋaŋa jepae mende wasepala nyakamanya sambo gote wasepae doko tama pyoo oapi dupa kundi maiyami-pyaa. Nyakamame nyakama tangenya kingimi wasepae doko lao masoo mona yaepao kateami-pyaa.
44007042	Dopa piaminopa Goteme dupa maita maitala niki kanapi buipi dopale kaiti-kisa katenge dupa tama pima pena kaya-pyaa. Ongonya potopesa dupanya pii pepa pyapae dokonya dapa lao pyapae silyamo: ‘Nyakama Isataele dupame endakali napalenge yuu dokonya ee kana kingi ita kitomende dupanya payao kateamino dokopa nyakama pulumakao sipisipipi dupa namba lao kundi dyoo tama piamipi?
44007043	Nyakamame sambo gote Moloko lao tama pingi sele anda dokopa sambo gote Lepane makande pyoo bui wasepae dokopa dolapo tama pitamana lao wasepala soo payami daape. Dokonya nambame nyakama yuu Bapilone omotena-kaita waka kalyepale lao watao nepatona,’ lapae silyamo.
44007044	“Naimanya yumbange dupame endakali napalenge yuu dokonya katao Gote kalyamona lao panasingi sele anda doko dupanya katakamaiya-pyaa. Goteme Mosese kandao sele anda dopa pyoo pina lao makande maitiamopa Moseseme makande kandeamo dopaka pyoo piami-pyaa.
44007045	Maitapyao naimanya yumbange dupame sele anda doko nyakamanya takange dupa-kisa nyepala nyoo minao Jasua-pipa tata waka dupanya yuusa epeami-pyaa. Goteme yuu dupanya tange dupa watao nepata-nepata piamopa yuu doko nyoaka peami-pyaa. Dopa pyoo sele anda doko soo peamino doko pao Dapiti kateamo gii doko kandao nyiami-pyaa.
44007046	Goteme Dapiti auu kayamopa baame Jekopenya Gote doko katenge panda mende wasakamaitoo lao masetala Gote-kisa tee lea-pyaa.
44007047	Dopaka doko, Solomoneme Gotenya anda mende pyakamaiya-pyaa.
44007048	Pyakamaiyamoaka doko, Gote etete ketae waka katenge doko endakali kingimi anda petae dupanya nakatenge. Potopesa mendenya pii dokome Kamongome dapa leana lapae silyamo:
44007049	‘Kaiti doko nambanya isoo petenge toko dokona, isa yuu doko nambanya moko pundipundi singina nyakamame anda aipale mende nambanya pyakatamipi? Namba panda andusa imambu nyotoope?
44007050	Nambanya kingimi dupa pitaka wasala nayope?’ lea-pyaa.
44007051	“Nyakama mona pyakilyetae paliuu katao monapi kalepimi netesa endakali joo kalyamino. Koteaka lao nyakamame Oli Sipitisa doko kandao tanga lao nyakamanya yumbange dupame piaminoliaka pyoo kalyamino.
44007052	Wamba nyakamanya yumbange dupame potopesa dupanya mendaipi mende api watao pyala nayami-pyaape? Potopesa kateamino dupame akali etete tolatae mende ipatana lao panasiaminopa yumbange dupame dokaita pyao kumasiami daape. Indupa nyakamame akali doko enge nyepala pyao kumasiami.
44007053	Wamba Goteme baanya enjele dupame mana setapae dupa nyakama-kisa panasiamoaka doko, nyakamame watao minala nayamina,” Sitipename dopa lea-pyaa.
44007054	Pii dokome akali kanjole dupanya mona kenda pipita siamosa dupame Sitipena kandao etete imbu kayapala nenge kitikato lao neami-pyaa.
44007055	Dopa piaminoaka doko, Oli Sipitisa dokome Sitipena-kisa tumbatae katao kaiti-kisa kandalyetala pituu Gotenya tii pipae dokopa Jisasa Gotenya kingi tolae dokonya kateamo dokopa dolapo kandea-pyaa.
44007056	Baame kandatao pituu, “Nyakama kandalapa!” lea-pyaa. “Kaiti doko saa papa laloo pipumopa Endakalinya Ikiningi doko Gotenya kingi tolae dokonya kalyamo doko nambame kandelyona,” lea-pyaa.
44007057	Dokopa nyakama tomba nao ala lao pii nasoo pitakame mona mendai paliuu mangayatala ipao Sitipena miniami-pyaa.
44007058	Minatala baa yuu taono dokonya netesa watao pyasetala kaname piami-pyaa. Sitipena kosimi leamino akali dokaitame nyakamanya yonge pee pingi dupa lyokapala akali patange Solo lenge mendenya moko kateamo dosa seteami-pyaa.
44007059	Dupame kaname pyao kateaminopa Sitipename loma soo pituu, “Kamongo Jisasa, embame nambanya imambu doko nyepe!” lea-pyaa.
44007060	Dopa latala luma lakapala puu lao lao pituu, “Kamongo, embame koo pilyamino dakenya yanu nyala nayape!” latala kumia-pyaa.
44008001	Dokaitame Sitipena pyao kumasiaminopa Solome yakana lao masia-pyaa. Gii dokopa minao koyasingi mana etete koo mendapua Jetusaleme tange sosa dupa-kisa epea-pyaa. Mana dupame sosanya endakali dupa pitaka Jutiapi Samatiapi yuu dolaponya wakale tale pisia-pyaa. Aposele dupa iki tale napyoo Jetusaleme kateami-pyaa.
44008002	Gote lao tama pyoo katenge akali mendapuame Sitipena soo pao malu petala baa lao masoo ee lawaka kateami-pyaa.
44008003	Gii dokopa akali Solo lenge dokome koteaka lao sosa doko koyasoo anda mendai mendai lao dupanya kolandatapu endakalipi dupa pyalya lao nyoo anjingi andaka pyandata pia-pyaa.
44008004	Endakali tale petae kateamino dupame yuu wakale wakale dupanya puu puu pyoo peaminoli pyoo Wai Pii Epe doko lamaiyoo kateami-pyaa.
44008005	Akali Pilipa lenge dokome Jetusaleme yakinatala Samatia yuu dokonya taono mendenya pupala endakali dupa Kataisanya lao pii lamaiya-pyaa.
44008006	Endakali longome Pilipanya pii leamo dupa soo pituu baame kongali piamo dupa kandatala mona mendai paliuu baanya pii doko salakao siami-pyaa.
44008007	Enjele koo endakali longo dupa-kisa paleamino dupame kamaka ipao pituu puu lao ae latala yakineami-pyaa. Endakali papa tambotaepi moko koopi longo dupanya yaina dupa eteaka-pyaa.
44008008	Dokopa taono dokonya tange endakali dupame mona etete yaepao kateami-pyaa.
