44008009	Yuu dokonya akali Saimone lenge mendeme ee kana longo lao baanya topoli mana miniamo dokome Samatia endakali dupanya mona mende pali pali pyoo walu lasia-pyaa. Dopa piamo dokome baa tangenya kenge minalyoo pyoo katea-pyaa.
44008010	Dokopa endakali tipyapi kenge singipi dupa pitakame koteaka lao baanya pii sokondape pyoo soo katao, “Gotenya pupu lapae kenge andake lenge doko akali dakena,” leami-pyaa.
44008011	Akali dokome ee kana longo nepao endakali dupanya mona mende pali pali pyoo walu lasiamopa dupame baanya pii salakao siami-pyaa.
44008012	Dopa piaminoaka doko, Pilipame Gotenya isingi dokopa Jisasa Kataisanya kenge dokopa dolaponya lao Wai Pii Epe doko lamaiyamopa dupame masoo miniami-pyaa. Masoo miniamino endakalipi dupanya kaimbu pyakamaiya-pyaa.
44008013	Saimoneme apata masoo miniamopa kaimbu pyakamaiyaka-pyaa. Dokopa baa Pilipapa awapa katao kongalipi kalai pupu lapaepi Pilipame piamo dupa kandatala mona andea-pyaa.
44008014	Samatia dupame Gotenya pii lapae doko sepala masetelyamino lapae doko aposele Jetusaleme kateamino dupame siami-pyaa. Sepala dokopa Pitapa Jonepa dolapo Samatia yuu dokonya pena leami-pyaa.
44008015	Pena leaminopa dolapome yuu dokonya pao pyakamatala Samatia tange dupa-kisa Oli Sipitisa doko epena lao loma sakamaiyambi-pyaa.
44008016	Pilipame Kamongo Jisasanya kenge doko lao dupa kaimbu pyakamaiyamoaka doko, Oli Sipitisa doko dupanya mende-kisa naepeamosa dolapome loma sakamaiyambi-pyaa.
44008017	Loma setala dupanya aiyomba minani pyakamaiyambinopa Oli Sipitisa doko dupa-kisa epea-pyaa.
44008018	-
44008019	Aposele dolapome dupanya aiyomba minani pyakamaiyambinopa Oli Sipitisa doko dupa-kisa epeamo Saimoneme kandatala muni minao ipupala dolapo kandao, “Nyalambome pilyambinoli pyoo nambame endakali mendenya aiyomba minani pyakamaitupa Oli Sipitisa doko baa-kisa ipatana pupu lapae doko namba dyepa,” lea-pyaa.
44008020	Pitame pii doko yanu pyao, “Goteme epe mende dingi doko munimi kapa pao sambapengena lao embame masilino dokonya embanya silipa muni-pipa tambetambe emba etete alu pii.
44008021	Gotenya enomba dokonya embanya mona tolatae palyala naeleno dokonya kalai dakenya punasapi mende embanya daa.
44008022	Dopana, embame mona kapilyetala embanya koo pingi dupa yakinape. Embanya moname koo pipu laka lao masilino doko Kamongome kunanya nepekena lao tee lape.
44008023	Embame etete putiti kayapino dokome embanya mona andaka yamame tumbatae katapumopa koo dokonya anjetae kalyeno kandelyona,” lamaiya-pyaa.
44008024	Saimoneme pii doko yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Nyalambome lelyambino dupanya mende namba-kisa ipatana namba nisoo Kamongo doko lao loma sakalapape,” lea-pyaa.
44008025	Dolapome kandeambino dupapi Kamongonya pii dupapi dupa lamaitala Jetusaleme pilyoo pao pituu Samatia yuu taono yakane longo dupanya awali lao Wai Pii Epe doko lamaiyoaka peambi-pyaa.
44008026	Dokopa Kamongonya enjele mendeme Pilipa lamaiyoo, “Emba sakatatala Jetusaleme kaita Gesaa pyakanenge ongonya-kaita paale puu,” lea-pyaa. Kaitini doko endakali napalenge yuu dokonya-kaita singi-pyaa.
44008027	-
44008028	Pilipa sakatatala kaitini ongonya pao pituu Itiopia tange akali andake lakapo nyepae mende kandea-pyaa. Akali dokome Itiopia tange enda Kuini Kandesi lenge dokonya muni akipi dupa isakamaiyoo katenge-pyaa. Baame Jetusaleme pao loma setala baanya yuusa pilyoo pituu baanya pituu paenge katesa dokonya pitipala potopesa Aisayame pepa piamo doko itaki pyao pea-pyaa.
44008029	Sipitisa dokome Pilipa lamaiyoo, “Emba baanya pituu paenge pelyamo dokonya tengesa puu,” lea-pyaa.
44008030	Pilipame alo pyao watao pao pituu akali dokome potopesa Aisayame pepa piamo doko itaki piamo sepala, “Embame pii itaki pilino dokonya tenge doko masilipi?” lao pisia-pyaa.
44008031	Pisiamopa Itiopia tange akali dokome baa lamaiyoo, “Akali mendeme namba tenge doko laitaka napitamopa nambame aipa petala masotope?” lea-pyaa. Dopa latala Pilipa awapa pitimbana epena lea-pyaa.
44008032	Baame pii konjepae itaki piamo doko dapa lao pyapae sia-pyaa: “Baa pyalanya laminao peamino dokopa baa ema napyoo sipisipi mende peele lao pea. Sipisipi ŋaŋa mendenya iti tokengesa kyaa nalenge dopaka pyoo baa nengekaita lumbala naya.
44008033	Dupame baa etete pyanya palyetala baanya kosa doko tolao lakamaiya nayami. Apimi baanya mandipaenya mandipae dupanya lao atome latape? Dupame baa etasetaminopa baa dee yuu dokonya nakatatana,” lao pepa pyapae sia-pyaa.
44008034	Itiopia tange akali dokome Pilipa pisoo pituu, “Potopesa dokome pii dake api kandao leape? Baa tange kandao leape, pande endakali waka mende kandao leape? Embame namba langipoko,” lea-pyaa.
44008035	Dopa leamopa Pilipame Jisasanya lao pii dokonyaka dii tambao Wai Pii Epe doko lamaiya-pyaa.
44008036	Dolapo kaitini dokonya pao endaki mate mendenya pyakameambi-pyaa. Pyakamatala Itiopia tange akali dokome lao pituu, “Endaki epelyamo kanda. Aki mendeme nambanya kaimbu pyakapenge kaitini doko lyokelyape?” lea-pyaa.
44008037	[Pilipame baanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Embame embanya moname etete kinina lao masoo minateno kandao doko, embanya kaimbu pyakapenge jalapomona,” lea-pyaa. Akali dokome yanu pyao pituu, “Nambame Jisasa Kataisa doko Gotenya Ikiningina lao masoo minilyona,” lea-pyaa.]
44008038	Akali dokome pituu paenge katesa doko sina latala Pilipapa endakinya pyakaneambi-pyaa. Pyakanatala Pilipame baanya kaimbu pyakamaiya-pyaa.
44008039	Dokopa dolapome endaki doko yakinatala pyakalyeteambinopa Kamongonya Sipitisa dokome Pilipa yapa nyokonyia-pyaa. Nyokonyeteamopa akali Itiopia tange dokome baa dee nakandao kaita pao pituu mona yaepao pea-pyaa.
44008040	Pilipame Asatote yuu dokonya kalyu katao walu latala baame yuu taono dupa pitakanya awali lao Wai Pii Epe doko lamaiyoo paya-pyaa. Dopa pyoo payapala taono Sisatia dokonya pyakamea-pyaa.
44009001	-
44009002	Dokopa Kamongo lao masoo miniamino endakali dupa Solome pyao kumasotona lao tomba nao katea-pyaa. Dopa petala baame pitisa mupa doko kateamo dokonya pupala baa lamaiyoo, “Embame Jutamanya limbingi taono Damasakosa kalyamino dupame kandena pepa mende pyao dii,” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa pepa pyao maiyamo dokonya dapa latae katea-pyaa: Jisasanya pii manapi dupa watao payatami enda tamopi akali tamopi mende Solome kutao kandatamo kandao doko, baame anjoo soo Jetusaleme epena lao pyatae katea-pyaa.
44009003	Baa pao Damasakosa tengesa joo pyakameamopa kaitinya tii pipae mendeme yapa ipao baa-kisa tii piyoko lea-pyaa.
44009004	Dopa piamopa baa lombapae sia-pyaa. Soo pituu siamopa pii mende leamo dokome, “Solo, Solo, embame aipuma namba watao pilipi?” lea-pyaa.
44009005	-
44009006	Dopa leamopa Solome, “Kamongo, emba apipi?” lao pisia-pyaa. Dokopa baame lao pituu, “Namba Jisasa embame watao pyao kalyeno dokona, emba sakatatala yuu taono dokonya puu. Dokonya patenopa akali mendeme embame kalai pipenge doko langitana,” Jisasame dopa lea-pyaa.
44009007	Awapa peamino akali dupa mee katapala pii mende naleami-pyaa. Dupame pii leamo doko siaminoaka doko, angi doko nakandeami-pyaa.
44009008	Solo lombapae siamo doko sakatatala lenge tao mende kandapenge nanjiamosa dokaitame baa kii minao Damasakosa peami-pyaa.
44009009	Baa kote tepo lenge iminjetae kateamopa neepi endakipi mende nanea-pyaa.
44009010	Jisasa masoo miningi akali Ananayasa lenge mende Damasakosa yuu dokonya katea-pyaa. Akali dokome lee manimanimi joo siamopa Kamongome, “Ananayasa,” lea-pyaa. Ananayasame, “Kamongo, namba kalyona kanda,” lea-pyaa.
44009011	Kamongo dokome baa dee lamaiyoo, “Emba sakatatala kaitini kenge Tolatae lenge dokonya pupala pituu Jutasanya andaka kolandatala taono Tasasa tange akali Solo lenge doko baa loma soo pilyamona kutao kandape.
44009012	Dee baame lee manimanimi kandapumopa baanya lenge dolapo auu pina lao akali Ananayasa lenge mendeme pupala kingi setapyana,” Kamongo dokome dopa lea-pyaa.
44009013	Ananayasame pii doko yanu pyao, “Kamongo, akali dokome embanya endakali Jetusaleme katenge dupa-kisa mana koo longo miniana lao endakali longome leamino nambame sio.
44009014	Indupa akali dokome pitisa mupa dupa-kisa pepa nyepala emba lao loma singi endakali dupa pitaka anjalanya epelyamona,” lea-pyaa.
44009015	-
44009016	Kamongo dokome baa lamaiyoo, “Akali doko nambanya yapao nyepae nambanya kalai pyakata. Baame endakali tata waka dupanyapi, kiŋi dupanyapi, Isataele tata dupanyapi nambanya kenge doko soo pakata. Baame nambanya kenge doko panasalanya tanda andake nyetamo dupa nambame baa laitaka pituna, embame lamaiya puu,” Kamongo dokome dopa lea-pyaa.
44009017	Dopa leamopa Ananayasa baa pao anda dokonya kolandatala baanya kingi Solo-kisa setea-pyaa. Setapala lao pituu, “Kaimia Solo, emba kaita epeeno ongonya Kamongo Jisasa emba-kisa epeamo kandeeno dokome embanya lenge dee auu pisetakala Oli Sipitisa doko tumbasakalanya namba angenya ipu lalamona,” lea-pyaa.
44009018	Dopa leamopa baanya lenge dolaponya kanopato kombangele mendapua siamo dupa lee mendai taka lala peamopa baa dee lenge tea-pyaa. Lenge tapala sakatao katapeamopa baanya kaimbu pyakamaiya-pyaa.
44009019	Baa nee nao pupu latala Damasakosa yuu dokonya masoo miningi endakali dupa-pipa awapa kote mendatupa kateami-pyaa.
44009020	Dokopa baame Jutamanya losuu anda dupanya yapa pupala Jisasa baa Gote Ikiningi doko lamona lao pii lamaiya-pyaa.
44009021	Endakali pitakame pii lamaiyamo dupa soo mona andapala lao pituu, “Wamba Jetusaleme katao Jisasa lao loma singi endakali dupa minao koyasiamo akali doko doko taa aipape? Indupa endakali dupa anjetala pitisa mupa dupa-kisa laminao patona lao lao angenya epeamo akali dokoaka taa aipape?” leami-pyaa.
44009022	Solome pupu lapae tumbi lao nyepala Jisasa baa Kataisa dokona lao lamaiyokondape piamo dokome Juta endakali Damasakosa kateamino dupanya pii doko angi nanjia-pyaa.
44009023	Kote longo pateamopa Juta dupame baa pyao kumasemana lao pii wasiami-pyaa.
44009024	Pii wasiamino doko Solome sia-pyaa. Dokaitame baa pyamana lao yuu taono dokonya lome kambu dupanya mendenya epelyape lao kuka kotakapi isoo kateami-pyaa.
44009025	Isoo kateaminoaka doko, kuka mendenya Solonya pii singi endakali dupame tatali mandi mendenya baa mandipala mandyuu kana kame dokonya kamalyatena pyandemi-pyaa.
44009026	Solo baa Jetusaleme dokonya pupala, masoo miningi endakali dupa-pipa awapa katamana lao masiamopa dokaita pitakame baame masoo minala naengena lao masetala paka kayami-pyaa.
44009027	Dokopa Banapasame Solo lanyepala laminao aposele dupa kateamino dokonya pea-pyaa. Pupala Solome Kamongo doko kaitinisa kandeamo dokopi, Kamongome baa pii lamaiyamo dokopi, Damasakosa katao Solome Jisasanya kenge doko lao pii pupu lao leamo dokopi dutupa baame dokaita lamaiya-pyaa.
44009028	Lamaitiamopa aposele dupa-pipa Solo awapa Jetusaleme yuu dokonya pata ipata pyoo kateami-pyaa. Kamongonya kenge doko lao baame paka nakayao pii panao lamaiyoo katea-pyaa.
44009029	Baame Juta endakali Gitiki pii lenge dupa pii lamaiyoo dupa-pipa pii yanda pyoloo pyoo kateamopa dupame baa pyamana lao makande pyoo kateami-pyaa.
44009030	Pyalanya piamino doko kandatala masoo miningi kaiminingi dupame baa Sisatia yuu taono dokonya laminao lanatala Tasasa yuu taono ongonya pena leami-pyaa.
44009031	Dokopa sosa Jutiapi, Galiliapi, Samatiapi yuu dupanya kenda pipaepi mende naipao epe yuu yongea-pyaa. Ongopa sosanya endakali dupame pupu lapae epe nyoo katao Kamongo lao paka kayao payami-pyaa. Oli Sipitisa dokome endakali mendapua nisetala sosa dokonya nyoo konda peta peta pia-pyaa.
44009032	Pita baame Jutamanya yuu doko pitakanya kandama-kandama pao Lita yuu taono dokonya pyakanatala Gotenya endakali kateamino dupa kandea-pyaa.
44009033	Yuu dokonya baame akali Ainiasa lenge mende kandea-pyaa. Akali doko papa tambotae ee kana tukulapo tokonyaka paliuu singi-pyaa.
44009034	Pitame baa lamaiyoo, “Ainiasa, emba Jisasa Kataisame auu pisilyamo. Emba sakatatala embanya palenge toko doko lakao yaki pii,” lea-pyaa. Dopa lalu piamopa baa sakatea-pyaa.
44009035	Lita tangepi Setone tangepi dupa pitakame akali doko kandeami-pyaa. Kandatala Kamongo lao mona kapilyetala masoo miniami-pyaa.
44009036	Jopa yuu taono dokonya masoo miningi enda Tapita lenge mende petea-pyaa. Gitiki pii lengeli pyoo baa kenge Dokasa lengema-pyaa. Baa-kisa mana epeme tumbilyamopa baame endakali daa jingi dupa oapi maiyoo petenge-pyaa.
44009037	Yuu mende baa yaina nyepala kumia-pyaa. Endakali dupame baa wasawasa pyapala anda namba pyoo petae palo kisa mendenya seteami-pyaa.
44009038	Jopa yuu doko Lita yuu dokonya tengesale joo siamosa masoo miningi endakali dupame Pita baa Lita yuu dokonya kalyamo lapae sepala akali lapomame Pita pii kyoto joo lamaiya pena lao lao pituu, “‘Embame malisala nayao naimanya yuu dakenya yapa ipupi,’ lena,” leami-pyaa.
44009039	Pita sakatatala dolapo-pipa awapa peami-pyaa. Pao yuu dokonya pyakaneaminopa dupame baa nyakamanya anda namba pyoo petae palo kisa dokonya laminao kolandeami-pyaa. Dokopa enda walyakae pitakame ee lao pituu lapalapapi kolosapi dupa enda Dokasa lenge dokome nyakama-pipa pituu wasakamaiyamo dupa Pita kandena lao minao malandao kakopeami-pyaa.
44009040	Kakopeaminopa Pitame dupa pitaka kamaka pena latala lumame pitipala loma sia-pyaa. Loma setala kapilyetala enda kumapae siamo doko lamaiyoo, “Tapita, emba sakata,” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa enda doko lenge tea-pyaa. Baame Pita kandatala sakatao petea-pyaa.
44009041	Pitame kinginya minao toya katasetala Gotenya endakali dupapi enda walyakae dupapi dupa epena latala enda sakateamo doko dupame kandena lao laitaka pia-pyaa.
44009042	Pitame piamo doko Jopa tange endakali pitakame sepala dupanya longo dupame Kamongo lao masoo miniami-pyaa.
44009043	Pita Jopa yuu dokonya gii longo katao mena tata dupanya yanonge tapalyepae wasingi akali Saimone lenge doko-pipa awapa kateambi-pyaa.
44010001	Sisatia yuu ongonya akali Koniliasa lenge mende katea-pyaa. Baame yanda singi amii andate mende isoo katenge-pyaa. Baa amii tata Itali tange lenge dokonya isingi akali mende-pyaa.
44010002	Baame Gote minao katenge-pyaa. Baapi baanya andaka awapa palenge dupa pitakapimi Gote lao paka kaengema-pyaa. Baame Juta endakali daa jepae dupa oapi longo lao maiyoo Gote lao loma soaka katea-pyaa.
44010003	Gii mendepa yuu alemanjalanya piamopa Koniliasame lee manimanimi joo Gotenya enjele mende epeamo doko kanjakao kandea-pyaa. Enjele dokome Koniliasa peteamo anda ongonya ipupala, “Koniliasa,” lea-pyaa.
44010004	Dopa leamopa Koniliasame kanjakao kandatala paka kayao, “Akali Andake, embame aipa laanya leepe?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa enjele dokome baa lamaiyoo, “Embanya loma singipi daa jingi endakali dupa oapi maingipi dupa Goteme kandatala masetae kalyamo.
44010005	Embame akali mendatupa Jopa yuu dokonya pena latala akali Saimone baanya kenge mende Pita lenge doko epena lape.
44010006	Pita baa mena tata dupanya yanonge tapalyepae wasingi akali Saimoneaka lenge mendepa tole kalyambino. Baanya anda doko solowata lemba dokonya katengena,” lea-pyaa.
44010007	Enjele dokome dopa latala pateamopa Koniliasame baanya kalai akali lapoma-pipa dee baanya awapa katenge Gote minao katenge yanda singi amii mendepi akali tepoma dutupa epena lea-pyaa.
44010008	Ipateaminopa pii pitaka panao lamaitala baame akali dutupa Jopa yuu dokonya pena lea-pyaa.
44010009	Taita dopa pyoo akali tepoma dutupa yuu taono Jopa dokonya tengesa joo epeaminopa kotaka andawai pungupungu dokonya Pita baa loma sala anda-kisa pyakalyia-pyaa.
44010010	-
44010011	Dopa petala baa lopo kayapala nee napuli lao masia-pyaa. Nee depa leaminopa Goteme Pitanya mona minao aloo pisiamopa baame lee manimanimi joo kaiti doko saa papa laloo piamo kandea-pyaa. Kandeamopa mendita mende isa epea-pyaa. Epeamo doko lapalapa jepae andake mende denge kitomende dupanya mendeme minatae katao pyandama-pyandama pyoo pyandea-pyaa.
44010012	Dokonya moko kitomende katenge tata dupapi, kanopato tata dupapi, yaka tata dupapi tata tata dupa pitaka palepeta pyandeamo doko baame kandea-pyaa.
44010013	Dokopa pii mende epeamo dokome lao pituu, “Pita, embame sakatatala pyao naa!” lea-pyaa.
44010014	Pitame lao pituu, “Kamongo, namba etete daa! Paa mendaipi mende nambame nee kaimala pipae daa lao nee nyetae dupa nanengena,” lea-pyaa.
44010015	Dopa leamopa dee lapo pyoo pii mende epeamo dokome lao pituu, “Goteme auu pinya setatamo dupa kandao embame kaimala pipaena nalape,” lea-pyaa.
44010016	Dopaka pyoo paa tepomasa pyandatala dokopa lapalapa jepae doko yapa kaitinya nyokonyia-pyaa.
44010017	Pitame lee manimanimi joo kandeamo dokonya tenge doko aipalepe lao masoaka peteamopa Koniliasame pena leamo akali dutupame ipao Saimonenya anda doko kutao kandatala anda kambusa kateami-pyaa.
44010018	Katapala dupame pisoo pituu, “Anda dakenya akali opone Saimone Pita lenge doko pilyape?” leami-pyaa.
44010019	-
44010020	Pitame lee manimanimi kandeamo doko masoo mee peteamopa Sipitisa dokome Pita lamaiyoo, “Wane! Akali tepomame emba kutilyaminona, emba sakatatala isa pyakana. Akali dutupa nambame epena lapusa epelyaminona, embame mona lapo napaliuu, akali dutupa-pipa awapa pupale puu,” lea-pyaa.
44010021	Pita isa pyakanatala akali dutupa lamaiyoo, “Anematupa! Nyakamame kutilyamino akali doko nambana, tenge aipuma kutao ipamipi?” lea-pyaa.
44010022	Akali dutupame baa lamaiyoo, “Yanda singi amii isoo katenge akali Koniliasa dokome naima pupa lapya. Akali doko etete tolatae mende. Baame Gote lao paka kayao kalyamopa Juta dupa pitakame baa kandao akali epena lengema. Gotenya enjele mendeme baa lamaiyoo, ‘Koniliasame Pita emba baanya andaka ipupi latala pii lateno dupa setana,’ lapya-pyaana,” leami-pyaa.
44010023	Dopa lao lamaitiaminopa Pitame akali dutupa andaka epena latala kuka dokonya awapa paleami-pyaa. Yongama sakatatala Pita awapa peami-pyaa. Jopa tange masoo miningi kaiminingi mendapua-pipa awapa peamiaka-pyaa.
44010024	Pao kaitinisa palipala taita dopa pyoo Sisatia yuu dokonya pyakameami-pyaa. Dokopa Koniliasame baanya palu mendai dupapi kaita miningi dupapi dupa nyoo limbatala dupa-pipa malisoo kateami-pyaa.
44010025	Dopa pyoo kateamino dokonya Pita pao pyakamateamopa Koniliasame kandatala pao baanya moko kateamo dosa tombauli sepala baa tama pia-pyaa.
44010026	Dopaka doko, Pitame Koniliasa sakatasoo pituu, “Namba endakaliakana emba sakata,” lea-pyaa.
44010027	Dopa latala pii lama-lama pyoo andaka kolandeambi-pyaa. Kolandatala endakali longo limbao peteamino dupa Pitame kandea-pyaa.
44010028	Kandatala baame dupa lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame kandeami kandee. Juta mendeme tata waka dupa-pipa awapa limbala nayapenge. Tata waka kalyamino dupanya kanja napupengeakana daa latae silyamo. Dopaka doko, Goteme namba laitaka pyoo pituu nambame endakali mende kandao baa kaimala pipae lamo koo paleta lamo laa nayape lapya.
44010029	Goteme dopa lapumopa nambame tanga nalao nyakamame namba ipu laminoli pyoo epelyona, aipuma namba ipu lamipi?” lea-pyaa.
44010030	Dopa leamopa Koniliasame baa lamaiyoo, “Alembolya alemandi indupa naima pilyamano kiloko tepo gii dakepaleaka namba andaka loma soo peteopa akali yonge pee etete kyoo lapae pingi mende lee mendai ipao nambanya enombasa kateamo kandeo.
44010031	Dokome namba kandao, ‘Koniliasa, embanya loma singipi daa jingi endakali dupa oapi maingipi dupa Goteme kandatala masetae kalyamo.
44010032	Dopana, embame akali mendatupa Jopa yuu dokonya pena latala Saimone Pita lenge doko epena lape. Saimone Pita baa mena yanonge tapalyepae wasingi akali Saimoneaka lenge mendepa tole kalyambino. Baanya anda doko solowata lembanya katengena,’ enjele dokome dopa lea.
44010033	Dopa lalu piamopa nambame emba ipupi leona emba yaka epeleno. Indupa Goteme lape leamoli pyoo embame pii latenopa naima pitakame Gotenya enomba dokonya pitipala pii semanana,” Koniliasame dopa lea-pyaa.
44010034	Dokopa Pitame lao pituu, “Indupa nambame kini kandatelyo. Goteme endakalinya lengelyaapi kandao yapala naenge.
44010035	Akali tata dupa pitakanya endakali mendeme baa lao paka kayao mana epe minao paenge doko kandao Goteme kapana lenge.
44010036	-
44010038	Naima Isataele dupa-kisa Goteme pii epena leamo doko nyakamame masilyamino. Goteme Wai Pii Epe doko lao pituu, Jisasa Kataisame naima Gote baa tangepa mona mendai palisiana lao lao panea. Jisasa doko endakali pitakanya Kamongo. Joneme kaimbu pyalapa lao pii lao kateamo dokonya maitakao Galili yuu dokonya pituu kalai tee pyatala, Jutia yuu doko pitakanya pyoo tayamo dupa nyakamame masilyamino. Nasatete tange Jisasa doko Goteme yapao nyepala Oli Sipitisapa pupu lapaepa baa maiyamo doko nyakamame masilyamino. Gote baa-pipa kateamo tenge dokome baa paelya payana pyoo endakali dupa-kisa mana epe minao Sataneme kenda pisetae endakali dupa pitaka auu pisiamo doko masilyaminoaka.
44010039	Jetusalemepi Jutia yuu waka dupanyapi katao piamo dupa pitaka kandatala naimame lao panasoo kalyamano. Endakali dupame baa ita pokonya pyao yukotala kumasiami.
44010040	Pyao kumasiaminoaka doko, Goteme kote tepo dokonya baa dee sakatasetala panasia.
44010041	Panasiamo doko Juta endakali pitakanya enombanya panasala naya. Daa, naima baanya pii doko lao panatamina lao wamba Goteme yapao nyiamo endakali dupa-kisa panasia. Goteme baa malunya sakataseteamopa naima-pipa neepi endakipi awapa neama.
44010042	Jisasame naima langyoo, ‘Endakali dupa wai pii doko lamaiyepape,’ lea. Goteme baa iki endakali sakapi kumapaepi dupanya pii lao tolao mokosingi akali joo katena leamo doko lao panalapape leaka.
44010043	Jisasa lao masoo minatami dupa pitakanya koo yanu dupa baanya kenge dokome kunanya nepakamaitana lao potopesa dupa pitakame lao paneami-pyaana,” Pitame dopa lea-pyaa.
44010044	Pitame dopa leamo gii dokopaka pii siamino endakali dupa pitaka-kisa Oli Sipitisa doko epea-pyaa.
44010045	-
44010047	Dokopa Gote lao tama pyoo pii tata waka dupa lao kateamino doko sepala, Juta endakali masoo miningi Pita-pipa epeamino dupame Goteme endakali tata waka dupa Oli Sipitisa mailyamoakana lao masoo mona andeami-pyaa. Dopa piaminopa Pitame dupa lamaiyoo, “Naima Oli Sipitisa nyiamanoli pyoo endakali dokaitame nyilyamino endakali dupanya endakimi kaimbu pyakamaimana, apimi kapa pao daa latape?” lea-pyaa.
44010048	Dopa latala Pitame dupa kandao, “Nyakamame Jisasa Kataisanya kenge doko lao kaimbu nyalapa,” lea-pyaa. Dokopa dokaitame baa lamaiyoo, “Emba naima-pipa koto mendatupa awapa katamana,” leami-pyaa.
44011001	Aposele dupapi masoo miningi kaiminingi Jutia yuu dokonya kateamino dupapi dutupame endakali tata waka dupame apata Gotenya pii lapae doko sepelyamino lapae doko siami-pyaa.
44011002	Sepala Pita Jetusaleme peamopa elya pingi kambu kepapengena lao masingi dupame baa pyalanya leami-pyaa.
44011003	Dokaitame Pita lamaiyoo, “Embame elya pingi kambu kepala naenge akali peteamino anda dokonya kolandatala dupa-pipa awapa nee napapina,” leami-pyaa.
44011004	-
44011005	Dopa leaminopa Pitame dupa kandao baame piamoli pyoo lao panao lao pituu, “Wamba nambame taono Jopa dokonya anda mendenya loma soo kateopa Goteme nambanya mona aloo pisiamopa nambame lee manimanimi joo mendita mende isa epeamo doko kandeo. Doko lapalapa jepae andake mende denge kitomende dupanya mendeme minatae katao kaitinya pyandama-pyandama pyoo namba kateo dosa pyandea.
44011006	Lapalapa pyandeamo dokonya koko nambame aki palelyape lao kandokondape pyoo kandeopa isa yuunya moko kitomende katenge tata dupapi, mena kapua tata dupapi, kanopato tata dupapi, yaka tata dupapi dupa pitaka palea.
44011007	Dokopa pii mende namba-kisa dapa lao epeamo sio: ‘Pita, embame sakatatala pyao naa,’ lea.
44011008	Dopa leamoaka doko, nambame pii doko yanu pyao pituu, ‘Kamongo, namba etete daa! Yuu gii mendaipi mendenya nambame nee kaimala pipae daa lao nee nyetae dupa nambanya nengekaita paa naengena,’ leo.
44011009	Dopa leopa dee lapo pyoo kaiti-kisa katao pii mende yanu pyao epeamo dokome lao pituu, ‘Goteme auu pinya setatamo dupa kandao embame kaimala pipaena nalape!’ lea.
44011010	Dopaka pyoo paa tepomasa pyandatala dokopa dutupa pitaka kaiti-kisa dee nyokonyia.
44011011	Gii dokopaka akali tepoma namba andaka kateo dokonya ipao kalyu piami. Akali dutupa Sisatia tange mendeme namba kateo dokonya epena lea-pyaa.
44011012	Oli Sipitisa dokome namba langyoo, ‘Mona lapo palya nayao dupa-pipa awapa pupape,’ lea. Dokopa masoo miningi kaiminingi tokange datupa namba-pipa awapa pupala akali dokonya andaka kolandeama.
44011013	Kolandatala peteamano dokopa Koniliasame baa enjele mendeme baanya andaka ipao katapala pii mende dapa langiana lea: ‘ “Embame akali mendatupa Jopa yuu dokonya pena latala akali Saimone kenge mende Pita lenge doko lanyala pena lape.
44011014	Akali dokome emba pii mende langita. Pii dokome Goteme embapi embanya andaka tole katenge dupapi dupa pyoo nyetana,” leana,’ lao Koniliasame lea.
44011015	Nambame pii sakatao leo dokopa Oli Sipitisa doko wamba naima-kisa epeamoli pyoo dutupa-kisa epea.
44011016	Wamba Kamongo dokome lao pituu, ‘Joneme endakimi endakali dupanya kaimbu pyakamaiyamoaka doko, Takange dokome Oli Sipitisa dokome nyakamanya kaimbu pyakatana,’ leamo doko gii dokopa nambame dee masio.
44011017	Naimame Kamongo Jisasa Kataisa lao masoo miniamanopa Goteme epe mende naima mee diamo mendai dopaleaka mende dupa mee maiya. Maiyamopa namba api kaita Gotenya kaita doko lyokakamaitope lao masiona,” Pitame dopa lea-pyaa.
44011018	Jetusaleme tange Juta dupame Pitame pii leamo dutupa sepala nyakamanya pii doko kayami-pyaa. Dopa petala, “Endakali tata waka dupa lete etete katenaka lao Goteme mona kapilyakamaiyoaka kalyumuna,” lao tama piami-pyaa.
44011019	Sitipena pyao kumaseteaminopa masoo miningi endakali dupa-kisa kenda pipae mende epeamosa dupa tale piami-pyaa. Tale pyoo pao Pinisiapi, Saipotasapi, taono Andiokopi yuu dupanya pupala endakali tata waka dupa pii epe doko lamaiya naenya, Juta endakali dupa iki lamaiyoo kateami-pyaa.
44011020	Tale piamino dupanya Saipotasa tangepi Saitini tange akali mendapuapi kateamino dupame Andioko yuu dokonya pupala endakali tata waka dupa Kamongo Jisasanya lao Wai Pii Epe doko lamaiyamiaka-pyaa.
44011021	Kamongo dokome pii epe lamaiyamino dupa nisoo kingi maiyamopa endakali longome masoo minao katao Kamongo doko watao minao kateami-pyaa.
44011022	Dopa pilyamino lapae doko Jetusaleme tange sosa dokome sepala Banapasa Andioko yuu dokonya pena leami-pyaa.
44011023	Banapasame Andioko yuu dokonya pao pyakamatala Goteme mona epe palipala dupa-kisa piamo doko kandatala mona yaepea-pyaa. Endakali dupa pitakame moname Kamongo doko kyoto joo masoo minina lao baame pii lamaiyokondape pyoo lamaiyoo katea-pyaa.
44011024	Banapasa baa akali epe mende Oli Sipitisapa masoo miningipa dolapome tumbatae katenge-pyaa. Dokopa Kamongome endakali longo baanya jina lao nyoo konda pia-pyaa.
44011025	Maitakao Banapasame Tasasa yuu taono dokonya Solo kutala pea-pyaa.
44011026	Kutao kandatala baa laminao Andioko yuu dokonya pilyia-pyaa. Ee kana mende itata akali dolapome Andioko tange sosanya endakali dupa-pipa awapa katao Gotenya pii doko endakali longo dupa mana lamaiyoo kateambi-pyaa. Andioko tange dupame Kataisa lao masoo miniamino endakali dupa kandao kenge Kitisene doko kandasoo leami-pyaa.
44011027	Gii dokopa akali potopesa mendapua Jetusaleme katao Andioko yuu dokonya lanao epeami-pyaa.
44011028	Potopesa dupanya mende kenge Akapasa lenge dokome toya katapala Sipitisanya pupu lapae dokome pii mende panao lao pituu, “Lopo andake mende yuu dupa pitakanya setana,” lea-pyaa. Maitakao Kolotiasame yuu isoo kateamo gii dokopa Akapasanya pii leamo doko angi jia-pyaa.
44011029	Dokopa Andioko tange masoo miniamino dupame, “Naima mendai mendai lawame naima-kisa opale mende setamoli pyoo masoo miningi kaiminingi Jutia yuu dokonya kalyamino dupa nisoo pyasakamaimana,” lao pii wasiami-pyaa.
44011030	Pii lao wasiaminoliaka pyoo dupame Banapasapa Solopame Jetusaleme tange isingi akali dupa maiya pena leami-pyaa.
44012001	Gii dosa mendasa Kiŋi Etote lenge dokome sosa dokonya endakali mendapua tee pyao minao koyasia-pyaa.
44012002	Baame Jone kaiminingi Jemesa konjua mendeme kepao kumasia-pyaa.
44012003	Dopa piamo doko Juta dupame auu kayamino kandatala baame Pita anjiaka-pyaa. Betesanya iisa napalyoo nenge gii dokopa dopa pia-pyaa.
44012004	Baame Pita anjoo nyepala anjingi anda dokonya pyandea-pyaa. Pyandatala pituu baame kambu kitomende dupanya yanda singi kitomende kitomende lawame Pita kandao katena lea-pyaa. Napinya Kayamo Gii doko ipao patatamopa, endakali dupanya enombanya Pita laminao epena latona lao masia-pyaa.
44012005	Dokopa yanda singi dupame Pita anjingi anda dokonya isoo kateami-pyaa. Isoo kateaminoaka doko, Goteme Pita nisina lao sosa dokome loma sokondape pyoo siami-pyaa.
44012006	Etoteme Pita taita dopa pyoo kosa laa epena latona lao masiamopa kuka gii dokonya Pita yanda singi lapomanya kaina dokonya ŋili kende lapomame anjetae palea-pyaa. Yanda singi mendatupame anjingi anda kambu dokonya katao isoo kateamiaka-pyaa.
44012007	Dokopa pupae lao Kamongonya enjele mendeme Pita paleamo dokonya ipao kalyu pia-pyaa. Dopa piamopa Pita paleamo palo dokonya tii pia-pyaa. Enjele dokome Pitanya patali dokonya minao pyale tasoo, “Emba yapa sakata!” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa ŋili kende Pitanya kingi dolaponya anjetae kateamo dolapo mokala isa kopo lea-pyaa.
44012008	Dokopa enjele dokome Pita lamaiyoo, “Embanya matapu petala moko pee pii!” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa Pitame leamoli pia-pyaa. Dopa piamopa enjele dokome Pita lamaiyoo, “Embanya yonge pee ketae pingi londe doko petala namba pelyo angenya watao ipu,” lea-pyaa.
44012009	Pita baa paleamo anda palo doko yakinatala enjele doko watao pea-pyaa. Pao pituu enjele dokome piamo doko kiningina lao masala naenya, kombeame pelyona lao masia-pyaa.
44012010	Pitapa enjele dokopa peambino doko pao yanda singi enomba nyoo isoo kateamo doko nyoo nepatala lapo pyoo isoo kateamo doko nyoo nepeambiaka-pyaa. Dopa petala taono dokonya paanya penge lome kambu dokonya pyakameambinopa lome kambu aeneme pai latae doko tangeme mee lumbia-pyaa. Dopa piamopa enjele dokopa Pitapa ipao kamanda pyakalyetala kaitini kembo mende nyiambi-pyaa. Dokopa enjele dokome Pita yapa yakinatala pea-pyaa.
44012011	Pateamo dokopa Pitame masokondape pyoo masetala, “Kiningi lamona lao masilyo. Kamongome baanya enjele doko epena latala Etotenya kingilyaka dokonyapi Juta dupame Etoteme pitamo kanjanya malisiamino dupa pitakanyapi baame namba nyokonyalame lamona,” lao masia-pyaa.
44012012	Dopa lao masetala baa Matianya anda dokonya pea-pyaa. Matia doko Jone Make lenge dokonya endangi-pyaa. Endakali longo dupa anda dokonya limbatala loma soo peteami-pyaa.
44012013	Pitame ipao kamaka lome kambu doko watawata piamopa kalai enda Lota lenge dokome lumbala epea-pyaa.
44012014	Enda dokome Pita lumu lao sepala baa etete mona auu kayapala kaita doko lumbala naenya, andaka alo pyao kolandatala, “Pita ipao lome kambunya kalyamona!” lea-pyaa.
44012015	Dopa leamopa endakali peteamino dupame, “Emba kekeleno,” leami-pyaa. Dopa leaminopa enda dokome kyoto joo, “Etete kiningi baa kalyamona,” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa, “Doko baanya imambu doko kalyumuna!” leami-pyaa.
44012016	Pitame lome kambu dokonya watawata pyoaka katea-pyaa. Dopa piamopa kaitini lumbapeaminopa baa kateamo kandatala mona andeami-pyaa.
44012017	Dokopa Pitame pii kaena lao kingi pee latala, Kamongome baa anjingi andaka mokao nyepala kamanda laminao peamoli pyoo dupa lamaitala lao pituu, “Nyakamame pii dutupa Jemesapi masoo miningi kaiminingi dupapi dupa lamaiyepape,” lea-pyaa. Dopa latala baa kamanda pupala yuu mendakaita pea-pyaa.
44012018	Yuu yongateamopa yanda singi dupame Pita aipa pyape lao walu koo leami-pyaa.
44012019	Etoteme Pita doko kutao kayapala yanda singi Pita isoo kateamino dupa kosimi latala pyao kumasina lea-pyaa. Dopa latala Etoteme Jutia yuu doko yakinatala lanao pupala Sisatia yuu taono dokonya pao katea-pyaa.
44012020	Etote dokome Taya tangepi Saitone tangepi dupa kandao imbu andake mende kaya-pyaa. Dopa piamosa, dupame lao kambotala Etote kateamo dokonya epeami-pyaa. Ipao kiŋinya anda isoo kateamo akali Balasatasa lenge doko andiki andiki petala Etoteme imbu nakaena lao dupame akema pii epe mendapua leami-pyaa. Yuu dolaponya tange dupame Etotenya yuu dokonya-tae nee sambengema tenge ongonya minao Etoteme imbu nakaena lao dupame andiki pimaiyami-pyaa.
44012021	Gii setapae mendenya Etoteme kiŋinya yati pingi doko petala baanya petenge toko dokonya pituu endakali dupa kandao pii andake mende lamaiya-pyaa.
44012022	Dokopa endakali dupame puu lao lao pituu, “Akali mendeme nalelyamona, gote mendeme lelyamona,” leami-pyaa.
44012023	Etoteme Gote lalyala nayamosa Kamongome baanya enjele mende yapa epena lalu piamo dokome baa pipyame nena leamosa nao kumasia-pyaa.
44012024	Dopa piamopa Gotenya pii doko andao tayama-tayama pia-pyaa.
44012025	Banapasa Solopa dolapo Jetusaleme yuu dokonya muni akipi maiya pena leamino doko maitala akali Jone Make lenge doko lanyoo pilyiambi-pyaa.
44013001	Sosa Andioko kateamo dokonya potopesapi tisaapi mendatupa kateamino dutupanya kenge dupa Banapasa dokopi, Simione kenge mende Pumbuti lenge dokopi, Saitini tange Lusiasa lenge dokopi, Maneyene lenge yuu yakane isingi akali Etotepa nyilyambo wane kolesa anda mendai kateambino dokopi, Solo dokopi akali dutupa kateami-pyaa.
44013002	Sosa dupame Kamongo doko lao tama pyoo nee nanengeli pyoo nanao kateaminopa Oli Sipitisa dokome dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nambame Banapasa Solopa dolapome nambanya kalai doko pyekena latelyona, nyakamame dolapo yapao nyalapapena,” lea-pyaa.
44013003	Dopa leamopa nee nanengeli pyoo nanenya, loma setala dokaitame akali dolapo aiyomba minani petakamaitala kalai dokonya pina leami-pyaa.
44013004	Oli Sipitisa dokome Solopa Banapasapa pena leamopa Selusia yuu taono dokonya lanao peambi-pyaa. Yuu doko yakinatala sipi mendenya pituu endaki kainanya yuu singi Saipotasa lenge ongonya peambi-pyaa.
44013005	Yuu dokonya ipupala taono Salamisa lenge dokonya Jutamanya losuu anda dupanya Gotenya pii doko lamaiyoo kateambi-pyaa. Dokopa Joneme akali dolapo nisoo kalai awapa pia-pyaa.
44013006	Dupame Saipotasa yuu dokonya yangitena pupala yuu taono Peposa lenge dokonya pyakamameami-pyaa. Pyakamatala nemango tata dupa miningi akali sambo potopesa kenge Balanjisasa lenge Juta mende kandeami-pyaa.
44013007	Akali doko kapomane andake Sesiasa Polo lenge dokopa awapa katea-pyaa. Sesiasa Polo doko masingi akali mende-pyaa. Baame Gotenya pii doko sipuli lao masetala Banapasapa Solopa dolapo epena lea-pyaa.
44013008	Dolapo epeambinopa akali nemango miningi dokome dolaponya kaita lyokao katea-pyaa. Akali dokonya kenge mende Gitiki pii lengeli pyoo Elimasa lenge-pyaa. Baame kapomane andake dokome masoo naminina lao kaita lyokao katea-pyaa.
44013009	Dokopa akali Solo kenge mende Polo lenge doko, Oli Sipitisa dokome tumbatae katao baame Elimasa doko kandokondape petala dapa lamaiya-pyaa:
44013010	“Emba luingipi minakasingipi mana dupa pitakame tumbatae lamo! Emba Satanenya mandipae lamo! Emba mana epe dupa pitakanya yanda pimaingi akali lamo! Embame Kamongo dokonya kaita tolatae dupa uanga pisoaka katenge.
44013011	Kandeleno! Kamongo dokonya kingi pupu lapae doko emba-kisa ipupala embanya lenge dolapo iminjetamopa, niki doko gii mendatupa kapa pao nakanjapenona,” Polome dopa lea-pyaa. Gii ongopaka baanya lenge dolapo kopame sanga pili petala iminjia-pyaa. Lenge iminjeteamopa kaitini laitaka pina lao endakali mende mina kanda kanda soo payao kutia-pyaa.
44013012	Dopa piamo doko kapomane andake dokome kandatala Kamongonya pii leambino doko soo masetala kiningi lumu lao walu lao masoo minia-pyaa.
44013013	Dokopa Polo baa awapa paenge akali dupa-pipa Peposa yuu taono doko yakinatala sipi mendenya pituu Pambilia yuu dokonya pupala yuu taono Peka lenge dokonya pyakameami-pyaa. Gii dokopa Joneme akali dutupa yakinatala Jetusaleme pilyia-pyaa.
44013014	Dutupame Peka yuu doko yakinatala Pisitia yuu taono Andioko dokonya pyakameami-pyaa. Sambasa gii dokopa dupame Jutamanya losuu anda dokonya kolandatala peteami-pyaa.
44013015	Dokopa losuu anda isingi akali dupame potopesa dupanya pii mendapuapi mana setapae dupapi itaki pyao etapala dutupa kandao, “Kaimia paluma, nyakamame pii mende endakalipi dupa pupu lasoo lamaipenge jetamo kandao doko, lamaiyepa,” leami-pyaa.
44013016	Dopa leaminopa Polome toya katapala kingi pee latala pii dake lamaiya-pyaa. “Nyakama Isataele endakalipi Gote lao paka kayao katenge tata waka dupapi nyakamame salapape.
44013017	Isataele tata dakenya Gote dokome naimanya yumbange dupa yapao nyia-pyaa. Dokaitame Isipe yuu dokonya tisa nao kateaminopa baame dupa pee lasetala nyakamanya kenge minalyia-pyaa. Dopa petala baanya pupu lapae dokome dupa lanyepala laminao epea-pyaa.
44013018	Dopa petala ee kana kingi ita kitomende dupanya endakali napalenge yuu dokonya luiyaminoaka doko, baame dupa yapa yakinala naya-pyaa.
44013019	Enakao baame Kenane yuu dokonya tata kalange kateamino dupa pyao watapala yuu doko nyakamanya tenge jetana lao Isataele endakali dupa maiya-pyaa.
44013020	Maitiamopa Isataele dupame ee kana andate kitomende-kisa kingi ita yuungi dupanya yuu doko isoo kateami-pyaa. Maitakao baame dupanya isingi akali mendapua potopesa Samuele katatamo gii dokonya katao tuu lao katena lea-pyaa.
44013021	Maitakao dupame kiŋi mende dina lao tee leaminopa Goteme Benjamene tata dokonya akali Kisa ikiningi Solo lenge doko dupa maiya-pyaa. Maitiamopa Solome ee kana kingi ita kitomende kiŋi katea-pyaa.
44013022	Dee Solo kaena latala alo pyoo Goteme Dapiti dupanya kiŋi katena lea-pyaa. Goteme Dapitinya lao endakali dupa lamaiyoo lao pituu, ‘Nambame Jesi ikiningi Dapiti doko kutao kandatelyo. Nambame baa auu kaenge. Nambame pina latoli pyoo baame dupa pitaka pitana,’ lea-pyaa.
44013023	Wamba Goteme mende pitona leamoli pyoo akali dokonya mandipae mendenya Pyoo Nyingi Akali Jisasa doko Isataele dupa maitia-pyaa.
44013024	Joneme wambao Isataele dupa pitaka kandao mona kapilyetala kaimbu nyina lao pii lamaiyoo katea-pyaa.
44013025	Joneme kalai pyoo etalanya pituu baame dokaita pisoo, ‘Nyakamame namba kandao apina lao masilyamipi? Namba akali nyakamame malisilyamino doko daana, akali mende namba watao maita pyao epelyamo. Akali dokonya moko pee pingi dolapo namba koo pingi akali dokome lyokakamaipenge daana,’ lea-pyaa.
44013026	“Kaimia paluma, nyakama Apotakame tatanya mandipae dupapi dee Gote lao paka kayao katenge tata waka dupapi dupa kandao nambame pii dake langilyo. Goteme naima pyoo nyepeamo dokonya pii dake naima-kisa epena latelyamo.
44013027	Jetusaleme kateamino endakali dupapi dupanya isingi akali dupapi dupame Jisasa doko masalakao masala nayami-pyaa. Dee potopesa dupanya pii koto Sambasa dii lao itaki pingima dupa masalakao masala nayamiaka-pyaa. Dupame baa kosimi leamino dokome wamba akali potopesa dupame dopa pitamina leamili piami-pyaa.
44013028	Dokaitame baa pyao kumasepenge tenge mende napaleamosa kutao kayapala Pailate dokome Jisasa mee pyao kumasepoko leami-pyaa.
44013029	Wamba potopesa dupame baa kandao pii pepa pyanya seteamino dupa pitaka pyoo etapala dokopa dupame baa ita pokonya yukuotae kateamo doko kondao isa nyepala malu piami-pyaa.
44013030	Dopaka doko, Goteme Jisasa baa malunya sakatasia-pyaa.
44013031	Sakatasiamopa endakali baa-pipa Galili katao Jetusaleme peamino dupame kandena lao kote longo lao baa tange panata piamopa kandeami-pyaa. Kandeamino dupame indupa Isataele dupa kandao baa lao panasingi akali kalyamino.
44013032	-
44013033	Wamba Goteme naimanya yumbange dupa lamaiyoo pitona lea pyomo doko indupa Jisasa malunya sakatasiamo dokome naima wane dupa-kisa angi injisetelyamo. Dokonya naimame Wai Pii Epe dake nyakama langilyamano. Losuu Wee laponge dokome pii dokoaka lao pituu, ‘Indupa nambame emba mandipilyona, emba nambanya ikiningina,’ lapae silyamo.
44013034	Dee baame Jisasa malunya sakatasiamo doko baa dee kapa pao malunya pilyetala tamuala nayatana lao dapa lapae silyamo: ‘Nambame etete epe koyala naenge dupa Dapiti maitona leo dupa nyakama ditona,’ lapae silyamo.
44013035	Wee mende dapa lapae silyamoaka: ‘Embame embanya akali epe etete doko soo tamuina kayala nayatena,’ lapae silyamo.
44013036	Goteme masiamoli pyoo Dapitimi baanya tata doko nisoo kalai pyoo katao kumapala baanya yumbange dupa-pipa awapa malu petae katao tamuiya-pyaa.
44013037	Dapiti tamuiyamoaka doko, Goteme akali sakatasiamo doko tamuala naya.
44013038	-
44013039	Dopana, kaimia paluma, nyakamame pii dake auu pyoo masalapale lao naimame langilyamano: akali dokome nyakamanya koo dupa kunanya nepatekea. Naimame naimanya koo tata dupa pitakame anjetae kateamanopa Goteme mana setapae Mosese maiyamo dupame naima kapa pao mokao nyala naya. Dopaka doko, akali dokome baa lao masoo miningi endakali dupa pitaka mokao nyilyamo.
44013040	Dopana, aopyoo latala wamba potopesa dupame leaminoli pyoo apale mende nyakama-kisa ipatana, kandao kalyepape:
44013041	‘Anematupa! Nyakama namba kilya kandao maita dingi endakali dupa mona andapala koyao alu pyepa! Doko, nambame nyakama kalyamino gii dakepa kalai mende pilyo. Dopa pilyo tenge doko endakali mendeme nyakama langitamopapi, nyakamame kiningina lao masala nayatamina,’ dopa lao pyapae silyamona,” latala Polome pii lao etea-pyaa.
44013042	Polopa Banapasapa kamanda paanya peambinopa, dokaitame dolapo lamaiyoo, “Sambasa gii mende ongonya pii dake naima dee langya ipupape,” lao tee leami-pyaa.
44013043	Pii latala tale peteaminopa Jutapi Juta joo Gote lao tama pyoo kateamino dupapi longo dupame Polopa Banapasapa dolapo watao peami-pyaa. Dokopa dolapome dupanya mona minao sakatasakamaiyoo, Gotenya mona epe palenge doko masetae katena lao lamaiyoo kateambi-pyaa.
44013044	Sambasa gii mende doko ipateamopa taono dokonya tange endakali dupa pitaka jowame Gotenya pii doko salanya limbiami-pyaa.
44013045	Pitaka limbiamino kandatala Juta dupame etete tilya nyepala Polome pii leamo doko yanda pimaiyoo pii koo lao lamba leami-pyaa.
44013046	Dopa leaminopa Polo Banapasapame paka nakayao dokaita lamaiyoo, “Gotenya pii doko nyakama wamba lamaiyakalapape leamo dokonya langitapumba. Dopaka doko, nyakamame pii doko tanga lao nepelyamino dokome nyakama tangeme lete etete nakatapenge daana latelyamino. Dokonya nalimbame kapilyetala endakali tata waka dupa lamaiya pelyambano, kanjepa.
44013047	Dopaka pyepale lao Kamongo dokome naima langyoo, ‘Emba endakali tata waka dupanya tii pisakamaingi akali joo kataseteo. Yuu dupa pitakanya endakali dupa emba-kisa pyoo nyepae katatamina,’ lea-pyaana,” leambi-pyaa.
44013048	Endakali tata waka kateamino dupame pii doko sepala mona yaepao Kamongonya pii doko tama piami-pyaa. Wamba Goteme endakali lete etete katatamina lao yapao nyiamo dupame masoo miniami-pyaa.
44013049	Dokopa Kamongonya pii doko yuu doko pitakanya taya-pyaa.
44013050	Juta dupame Gote lao tama pyoo petenge enda kenge singi dupapi yuu taono dokonya kenge singi akali dupapi dupanya mona minao sakatasetakamaitala Polo Banapasapa dolapo minao koyasina leami-pyaa. Dopa lateaminopa dokaitame dolapo nyakamanya yuu ongonya nakatena lao watao piami-pyaa.
44013051	Dopa piaminopa dolapome yuu kuni kungumapi nyalambonya mokonya pateamo dupa tange-kisa lyanda lanya setapakamaitala Aikoniame yuu taono dokonya peambi-pyaa.
44013052	Dopa piambinopa Andioko tange masoo miningi dupa mona yaepengepa Oli Sipitisapa dolapome tumbatae kateami-pyaa.
44014001	Polo Banapasapa dolapome piambinoli pyoo Aikoniama yuu dokonya Jutamanya losuu anda dokonya kolandeambi-pyaa. Kolandatala dolapome endakali dupa pii auu pyoo lamaiyambinosa Jutapi tata wakapi longo dupame masoo miniami-pyaa.
44014002	Dopa piaminoaka doko, Juta masoo minala nayamino dupame endakali tata waka dupanya mona mende pali pali petakamaitala dupame masoo miningi kaiminingi dupa imbu kayamaina leami-pyaa.
44014003	Polo Banapasapa dolapo Aikoniame yuu dokonya yuu longo lao katapala Kamongonya kingilyaka katao paka nakayao pii lamaiyoo kateambi-pyaa. Kamongo dokome baanya mona epe palenge doko lao panenge wai pii lapae doko kyoto injisoo, akali dolapo-kisa kongalipi kalai paka pipaepi dupa pia-pyaa.
44014004	Dopa piamopa Aikoniame tange dupa wakale pyoloo petala, yangi dupame Juta dupa auu kayami-pyaa. Yangi dupame aposele dolapo auu kayami-pyaa.
44014005	Maitakao endakali tata waka dupapi, Juta dupapi, Juta dupanya isingi akali dupapi dupame Polo Banapasapa dolapo mana koo minao kaname pyamana leami-pyaa.
44014006	Dopa leamino doko akali olapome sepala Laikonia yuu dokonya paka peambi-pyaa. Laikonia yuu doko taono Lisata dokopa taono Depi dokopa dolaponya yuu tengesa joo siamo dupanyapi paka pao kateambi-pyaa.
44014007	Yuu dupanya katao Wai Pii Epe doko lao endakali dupa lamaiyoo kateambi-pyaa.
44014008	Lisata yuu dokonya akali moko koo mende petea-pyaa. Baanya endangimi mandeamo gii ongopa moko koyapae mandea-pyaa. Yuu mendaipi mende baa kaitini napaenge-pyaa.
44014009	Akali dokome Polome pii lao kateamo doko soo petea-pyaa. Polome akali doko kandokondape petala akali dokonya masoo miniamo dokome baanya moko auu pyaapomona lao masia-pyaa.
44014010	Dopa lao masetala Polome puu lao baa lamaiyoo, “Emba sakatatala embanya moko dolapome tolao toya kata!” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa akali dokome yapa sakatao katapala kaita paya-pyaa.
44014011	Endakali longo dupame Polome piamo doko kandatala Laikonia tangemanya pii lengeli pyoo puu lao lao, “Naimanya gote dupa endakali jetala naima-ketae epelyaminona,” leami-pyaa.
44014012	Dopa latala endakali dupame Banapasa kenge Susa leami-pyaa. Polome enomba nyoo pii lenge dokonya baa kenge Emesak leami-pyaa.
44014013	Taono dokonya pyakaenge kaita dosa sambo gote Susa lenge dokonya losuu anda mende katenge-pyaa. Susa dokonya pitisa dokome mena pulumakao ita diimi yati petae mendapua minao lome kambu dokonya ipupala endakali dupa-pipa Susa doko lao kundi maiyanya piami-pyaa.
44014014	-
44014015	Dupame dopa pyaanya pilyamino lapae sepala aposele Banapasapa Polopa dolapome nyilyambonya yonge pee pingi dupa kanguopala endakali kateamino dokonya alo pyao epeambi-pyaa. Ipupala puu lao lao pituu, “Anematupa, aipuma dopa pilyamipi? Nalimba nyakama endakali kalyamino dopaleaka. Angi nanjepenge sambo gote datupa kayapala Gote lete katenge doko lao masoo minalapale lao Wai Pii Epe doko nyakama langilyambano. Baame yuupi, kaitipi, endakipi dee dupanya silyamo dupa pitakapi dupa wapuiya-pyaa.
44014016	Wamba yuu gii dupa pitakanya baame endakali tata dupa pitakame masoo kaita payamino dupa paena kaya-pyaa.
44014017	Dopaka doko, Goteme baa tange panasoo kalai epe dupa pyoo katenge. Kaiti-kisa katao aiyuu epenge dupapi nee tata dupa epasekenge gii dupapi dupa baame nyakama-kisa epena lekenge. Baame nee epepa mona lyuu lengepa dolapome nyakama tiaka pisekelyamona,” leambi-pyaa.
44014018	Dopa leambinoaka doko, dupame nyilyambo lao kundi maiyanya piamino doko kaena lao etete lekeleke koo tao kaita lyokeambi-pyaa.
44014019	Andioko dokopa Aikoniame dokopa yuu dolaponya Juta mendapuame ipupala endakali dupanya masingi sakatasiami-pyaa. Dopa piaminopa dokaitame Polo kaname piami-pyaa. Kaname pyapala kumatelyamo lao masetala baa pyalya lao nyoo taono dokonya kamalyatena nepeami-pyaa.
44014020	Dokopa masoo miningi endakali dupame ipupala Polo siamo dosa katao kakopeami-pyaa. Dopa piaminopa Polome sakatatala taono dokonya dee pilyia-pyaa. Taita dopa pyoo baa Banapasapa Depi yuu dokonya peambi-pyaa.
44014021	-
44014022	Dolapome Wai Pii Epe doko taono Depi dokonya lamaitala nyalambome endakali longo dupa Jisasa lao masoo miningi jina leambi-pyaa. Dopa petala maitakao yuu taono Lisatapi Aikoniamepi Andiokopi dutupanya pilyetala, masoo miniamino endakali dupa pupu lasiambi-pyaa. Nyakamame Jisasa lao masoo minokondape pyoo minalapape lao kyoto joo lamaiyambi-pyaa. Goteme isilyamo dokonya naima patamaka doko, wambao naimame kenda pipae longo silyamo kaitini dokonya payapengena leambi-pyaa.
44014023	Dopa latala dolapome sosa dii lao dupanya isingi akali katena lakamaiyambi-pyaa. Dolapome nee nanengemali pyoo nanao katao Kamongo doko lao loma setala masoo minateamino endakali dupa Kamongo dokome isina lao yakineambi-pyaa.
44014024	Dopa petala dolapome Pisitia yuu dokonya-kaita Pambilia yuu dokonya peambi-pyaa.
44014025	Pambilia yuu dokonya taono Peka dokonya pupala pii lamaiyambi-pyaa. Lamaitala Atelia yuu dokonya pupala sipi mendenya pituu Andioko yuu dokonya peambi-pyaa.
44014026	Yuu dokonya tange sosa dokome akali dolapome kalai pina lao Gotenya mona epe palenge dokonya wamba katasiami-pyaa. Kalai doko pyoo etapala dolapo Andioko yuu dokonyaka pilyiambi-pyaa.
44014027	Dolapo ipao Andioko yuu dokonya pyakayatala sosanya endakali dupa nyoo limbiambi-pyaa. Dopa petala, Goteme nyilyambo-pipa awapa kalai piapi baame endakali tata waka dupame masoo minina lao kaita doko lumbatakamaiyapi dupa dopa piana lao lamaiyambi-pyaa.
44014028	Andioko yuu dokonya akali dolapo masoo miningi endakali dupa-pipa awapa kote longo lao kateami-pyaa.
44015001	Dopa pyoo kateaminopa Juta mendapuame ipupala masoo miningi kaiminingi dupa mana lamaiyoo pituu, “Nyakamame Moseseme mana seteamoli pyoo elya pingi kambu kepala nayatamino kandao doko, Goteme nyakama pyoo nyala nayatana,” lamaiyami-pyaa.
44015002	Dopa lao mana lamaiyoo kateaminosa Polo Banapasapame etete imbu kayapala dupa-pipa pii yanda pyoloo piami-pyaa. Dopa piaminopa masoo miniamino dupame Polo Banapasa-pipa dee nyakamanya akali mendatupapi yapao nyepala Jetusaleme yuu dokonya aposelepi isingi akalipi dupa-pipa pii lao tolasala pena leami-pyaa.
44015003	Sosa dokome akali dupa pena lateaminopa Pinisiapa Samatiapa yuu dolaponya-kaita peami-pyaa. Pao pituu Goteme endakali tata waka dupanya mona dopa pyoo kapilyakamaiyana lao pii doko lamaiyoaka peami-pyaa. Pii dokome masoo miningi kaiminingi dupanya mona etete yaepasakamaiyami-pyaa.
44015004	Dupa Jetusaleme yuu dokonya pao pyakamateaminopa Jetusaleme tange sosa dokopi, aposele dupapi, isingi akali dupapi dupame akali epeamino dupa taeme ipamini lamo lao lanyiami-pyaa. Dopa peteaminopa Polo Banapasapame Goteme nalimba-pipa awapa kalai dupa pitaka piana lao panao lamaiyambi-pyaa.
44015005	Dopa lao lamaiyambiaka doko, Patasi dupanya masoo miningi akali mendapuame sakatao lao pituu, “Nyakamame akali dupanya elya pingi kambu kepatakamaitala, Moseseme mana setapae nyiamo dupa watao minina lao lamaipengena,” leami-pyaa.
44015006	Dopa leaminosa aposele dupapi isingi akali dupapi dutupame pii dokonya lao wasalanya limbiami-pyaa.
44015007	Limbatala pii longo lao yanda pyoloo pyoo peteaminopa, Pitame toya katapala pii mende dupa kandao lao pituu, “Kaimia paluma, wamba Goteme naima-kisa kalai mokosoo pituu, endakali tata waka dupame Wai Pii Epe doko sepala masoo minina lao nambame lamaitinopa lao baame namba yapao nyiamo doko nyakamame masilyamino.
44015008	Mona kandenge Gote dokome endakali tata waka dupa lanyetona lao masiamo doko laitaka pyaanya Oli Sipitisa doko naima diamoliaka pyoo dupa maiya.
44015009	Goteme naima-kisa mana waka mende minatala, tata waka dupa-kisa mana waka mendeaka pyoo minala naya. Masoo miniamino ongonya baame dupanya koo dupa kunanya nepakamaiya.
44015010	Dopana, aipuma nyakamame indupa Gote minao makande pyaanya kenda pipae naimanya yumbange dupapi naimapimi kapa pao nasiamano doko masoo miningi endakali dupa-ketae setamana lao masilyamipi?
44015011	Dopaka doko, naimame dapa lao masoo minilyamano: Kamongo Jisasanya mona epe palenge dokome naima pyoo nyepea. Endakali tata waka dupa dopaka peteana,” lea-pyaa.
44015012	Pitame dopa lateamopa endakali longo limbiamino dupame pii mende naleami-pyaa. Banapasa Polopame nalimba-kisa endakali tata waka dupanya kainanya Goteme kongalipi kalai paka pipaepi dupa piana lao leambino doko dupame soo peteami-pyaa.
44015013	Dokopa Jemesame lao pituu, “Kaimia paluma, nambame pii mende lelyona salapape.
44015014	Goteme wambao endakali tata waka dupa-kisa ipupala dupa baanya joo katatamina lao lanyiamo doko Saimoneme panao nyakama langitalamo.
44015015	Potopesa dupame pii mendai dokoaka lao pepa piamino doko dapa lao pyapae mee silyamo:
44015016	‘ “Maitakao namba pilyetala Dapitinya anda lakembatae silyamo doko dee pito. Anda dokonya koyatamo dupa nambame dee wasoo pinya katato.
44015017	-
44015018	Dopana, nambanya latae endakali tata waka dupa pitakame namba kutatami.” Wamba waka pitona lao panasetala pilyamo Kamongo dokomeaka dopa lelyamona,’ lao pepa pyapae silyamo.
44015019	“Tenge dokonya minao tata waka dupame Gote lao mona kapilyilyamino endakali dupa kenda pisala nayamana lao nambame masilyo.
44015020	Dopa napinya, dupame sambo gote lao kundi maitae nee dupapi, mena yakapi mange minao kaimindokao kumasetae dupapi, taiyoko pyapae dupapi dupanya nala nayao kepo kolenge mana dupa watao napayalapape lao pepa pyasakamaimana.
44015021	Doko, wamba waka akali dupame yuu taono dupa pitakanya Sambasa dii lao Jutamanya losuu anda dupanya Mosesenya pii doko itaki pyao lamaiyamino doko lamaiyoaka kalyaminona,” Jemesame dopa lea-pyaa.
44015022	Dokopa aposelepi, isingi akalipi, sosanya endakali dupa pitakapimi nyakamanya akali mendapua yapao nyepala Polopa Banapasapa-pipa Andioko yuu taono dokonya pena leami-pyaa. Dupame Sailasapa Jutasa baa kenge mende Basapasa lenge dokopa dolapo pena leami-pyaa. Dolapo masoo miningi kaiminingi dupanya andake joo kateambi-pyaa.
44015023	Dolapo-kisa dupame dapa lao u pepa mende pyapala pyasiami-pyaa. “Naima aposelepi isingi akalipi masoo miningi kaiminingi dupame nyakama tata waka masoo miningi kaiminingi Andioko yuu dokopi, Sitia yuu dokopi, Silisia yuu dokopi yuu dutupanya kalyamino dupa nyakama auu pyoo kalyepape lelyamano.
44015024	Naimanya akali mendapuame nyakamanya masingi sakatasakao dupanya pii dokome nyakamanya mona koo palisekelyamino leamino pii doko sepeama. Dopaka doko, naimame dopa pina naleama.
44015025	Dopana, indupa naimame mona mendai paliuu akali mendalapo yapao nyepala, naimanya auu kaenge Polo Banapasa-pipa awapa nyakama kalyamino ongonya epekena lelyamano.
44015026	Polo Banapasapa dolapome naimanya Kamongo Jisasa Kataisanya kenge doko lao minalyoo katao kumingi doko paka nakaengemba.
44015027	Dopana, naimame Jutasa Sailasapa dolapo epekena latala dolapome pii datupaka nyakama langina lelyamano:
44015028	Naimapi Oli Sipitisa dokopimi nyakama-kisa kenda pipae mende setala nayamana lao masilyamano. Nyakamame mana datupa iki dapa pyoo minalapape:
44015029	sambo gote dupa kundi maitae dupapi, taiyoko pyapae dupapi, mena yakapi mange minao kaimindokao kumasetae dupapi dupa nala nayalapape. Kepo kolala nayalapapeaka. Mana koo dupa nepatala wakale katatamino kandao doko, nyakama auu pyoo katatami. Pii utupaka iki lelyamanona,” lao pepa pyasakamaiyami-pyaa.
44015030	Dopa lao pepa pyapala minao pena lateaminopa akali dolapome Andioko yuu dokonya pyakanatala sosanya endakali dupa limbina latala pepa doko dupa maiyambi-pyaa.
44015031	Maitiambinopa Andioko tange dupame pii auu pipae siamo dupa itaki pyao kandatala mona yaepeami-pyaa.
44015032	Jutasa Sailasapa dolapo potopesa joo kateambiaka-pyaa. Dolapome pii longo lao lamaiyoo masoo miningi kaiminingi dupanya mona minao sakatasetakamaitala pupu lasiambi-pyaa.
44015033	Dolapo kote mendatupa yuu dokonya katapeambinopa masoo miningi kaiminingi dupame dolapo auu pyoo lasa latala epena leamino endakali dupa kateamino yuu dokonya pilyina leami-pyaa.
44015034	[Dopaka doko, Sailasa dokome Andioko yuu dokonya mee katatoakana lao masetala katea-pyaa.]
44015035	Polo Banapasapa Andioko yuu dokonya kote mendatupa apata dee kateambiaka-pyaa. Dokopa akali mendapua-pipa awapa katao Kamongonya Wai Pii Epe doko endakali dupa lamaita mana lamaita pyoo kateambi-pyaa.
44015036	Kote mendatupa pateamopa Polome Banapasa lamaiyoo, “Nalimba dee pilyetala yuu taono dupa pitakanya Kamongonya pii doko lamaiyambano masoo miningi kaiminingi dupa aipa pyoo kalyamipi lao kanja bonalena,” lea-pyaa.
44015037	Dopa leamopa Banapasame Jone Make lenge doko apata mona lanyimbuali lao masia-pyaa.
44015038	Dopa lao masiamopa Polome akali dokome nalimba Pambilia yuu dokonya yakinatala kalai pyaanya awapa napeamano doko lanyoo patambanopa kapa napatana daa lao masia-pyaa.
44015039	Dokonya akali dolapome pii imbu kayao laloo petala tale piambi-pyaa. Tale petala Banapasame Make lanyepala sipi mendenya pituu Saipotasa yuu dokonya pea-pyaa.
44015040	Polome Sailasa yapao nyepeamopa masoo miningi kaiminingi dupame Kamongonya mona epe palenge doko emba-pipa awapa pupape lateaminopa pea-pyaa.
44015041	Pupala baame Sitiapa Silisiapa yuu dolaponya sosa dupa pupu lasoo paya-pyaa.
44016001	Polo baa yuu Depipa Lisatapa dolaponya peaka-pyaa. Lisata yuu dokonya Jisasa masoo miningi akali Timoti lenge mende katea-pyaa. Timoti endangi doko masoo minao petenge Juta enda mende-pyaa. Baanya takange doko Gitiki tange-pyaa.
44016002	Yuu Lisatapa Aikoniamepa dolaponya masoo miningi kaiminingi dupame Timoti doko auu pipaena lengema-pyaa.
44016003	Polome Timoti lanyoo tole patambana lao masetala baanya elya pingi kambu kepakamaiya-pyaa. Doko, yuu dokonya Juta endakali kateamino dupame Timotinya takange doko Gitiki tangena lao masiamino dokonya dopa pia-pyaa.
44016004	Polo, Timoti, Sailasapi dutupame yuu taono dupanya pupala aposelepi isingi akalipi dupame Jetusaleme pii wasoo lanya seteaminoli pyoo endakali dupame pina lao lamaiyami-pyaa.
44016005	Dopa piaminopa sosa dupanya masoo miningi doko kyoto jema jema piamopa koteaka lao endakali longo mendapuame sosa dupanya konda peta peta piami-pyaa.
44016006	Oli Sipitisa dokome Esia yuu dokonya pii lamaiya napena lao kaita lyokeamopa akali dutupame Pitisiapi Galasiapa yuu dolaponya-kaita peami-pyaa.
44016007	Pao Misia yuu dokonya pyakamatala Bitinia yuu dokonya paanya piaminopa Jisasanya Sipitisa dokome napena lao kaita lyokea-pyaa.
44016008	Dokopa akali dutupame Misia yuu dokonya-kaita Toasa yuu taono dokonya peami-pyaa.
44016009	Pao pyakanatala paleaminopa kuka Polome kombeame Masetonia tange akali mendeme toya katapala wii lao, “Embame aetena naima nisala ipu!” leamo kandea-pyaa.
44016010	Kombea piamo dokonya naimame Masetonia yuu dokonya yapa monalena latala kaitini mende kutiama. Doko, Goteme Masetonia tange dupa Wai Pii Epe doko lamaiya pupale lao wii latalame lumu lao masetala naimame dopa piama.
44016011	Dopa petala naimame Toasa yuu dokonya katao sipi mendenya pituu Samotesa yuu dokonya tolao peama. Taita dopa pyoo Niapolisa yuu dokonya peama.
44016012	Dopa petala naimame sipi doko Niapolisa yuu dokonya yakinatala Pilipae yuu dokonya peama. Taono Pilipae doko Masetonia yuu dokonya potopinja mupa dokonya sia. Loma tange dupame Pilipae yuu dokonya kapomane joo kateami. Naima kote mendatupa Pilipae dokonya kateama.
44016013	Sambasa gii dokopa naimame lome kaita dokonya kamalyatena pupala endaki mate mendenya peama. Endaki mate dosa loma singi panda mende singi joo pilyamo lao masiama. Endaki mate dosa pituu enda mendapua ipao limbiamino dupa-pipa pii leama.
44016014	Lao peteamanopa Gote lao tama pyoo petenge enda kenge Litia lenge mendeme naimanya pii sia. Baa taono Tayataita tange-pyaa. Baame lapalapa wene pyapae dupame topo nyoo petenge-pyaa. Kamongo dokome enda dokonya mona kapilyakamaiyamopa Polome pii leamo dupa baame sokondape pyoo sia.
44016015	Dokopa naimame enda dokopi baanya andaka awapa palenge dupapinya kaimbu pyakamaiyama. Dokopa baame naima langyoo, “Nambame Kamongo doko lao masoo minao pilyeno lao nyakamame masetamino kandao doko, nambanya andaka pitimana ipupa,” lao kongo lea.
44016016	Kote mende naimame loma singi panda dokonya paanya peamanopa kendemane wanaku mende kaitinisa kandanyiama. Wanaku enjele koo paleta dokome pyongo pyao tanga pitamo dupapi yalo petae dupapi dupa lao panelyamosa wanaku doko isingi akali dupame dokonya oapi longo nyingima-pyaa.
44016017	Wanaku dokome Polopi naimapi watao ipupala puu lao lao pituu, “Akali dutupame Etete Ketae Katenge Gote dokonya kendemane joo katao Gotenya pyoo nyingi kaitini mende nyakama langyoo kalyaminona,” lea.
44016018	Kote longo lao dopa lati siamosa maka kayapala Polome kapilyetala enjele koo wanaku doko-kisa paleamo doko kandao lao pituu, “Jisasa Kataisanya kenge doko lao embame wanaku dake yakinatala puu lelyona,” lea. Dopa leamo dokopaka enjele koo dokome wanaku doko yakinatala pea.
44016019	-
44016020	Dokopa wanaku doko isingi akali dupame naimanya oapi nyingi kaitini doko etalame lamo lao masetala, Polo Sailasapa dolapo puu lao minatala pyalya lao nyoo endakali limbingi kamapi dokonya peami-pyaa. Laminao pao nyakamanya Loma tange taono isingi akali dupa maitala lao pituu, “Akali Juta dalapome naimanya taono dakenya endakali dupanya mona mende pali pali pyakamaiyambi.
44016021	Akali dalapome mana langilyambino dupa naima Loma tange dupanya daa lapae singina, naimame kapa pao nyoo napitamana,” leami.
44016022	Endakali dupa pitakame akali dolapo-kisa pii watambao leami. Dopa leaminopa taono isingi dupame nyakamame akali dolaponya yonge pee pingi dupa puu lao lapinya nepatala kyoo konjame pina leami.
44016023	Dopa lateaminopa dupame akali dolapo paa longosa kyoo konjame pyapala anjoo anjingi andaka pyandeami. Pyandatala anjetae isingi akali doko lamaiyoo, “Embame akali dalapo isokondape pyoo isepena,” leami.
44016024	Anjingi anda isingi akali dokome pii dopa leamino doko sepala akali dolapo anjingi anda andakote etete palo mendenya anjoo pyandea. Pyandatala endakali moko nyoo anjingi palaŋa ita tumbyepae mendalaponya baame akali dolaponya moko nyoo pyasetala ita dolapo minao keto latala anjoo tambukinea-pyaa.
44016025	Dopa piamopa kukuma andatombe dokonya Polo Sailasapame loma soo Gote lao wee lao peteambino doko anjingi anda dokonya paleamino endakali dupame sepala lenge takatae siami-pyaa.
44016026	Dokopa titiwali andake mende pupae lao minalu piamo dokome anjingi anda dokonya paka andake dupa ema-ema pia-pyaa. Ema piamo dokome anjingi anda kaita dupa pitaka lumbapae soo endakali anjetae paleamino dupa pitakanya ŋili kende dupa mokapae soaka pia-pyaa.
44016027	Titiwali miniamo doko sepala anjingi anda isingi dokome luu paliuu sakatatala anjingi anda kaita dupa lumbapae siamo kandea-pyaa. Kandatala anjetae endakali dupa pitaka pamini lamo lao masia-pyaa. Dopa lao masetala baame baanya konjua doko kolanyetala baa tange pyao kumasalanya pia-pyaa.
44016028	Dopa piamopa Polome puu lao, “Embame emba tange koyasala nayape, naima pitaka angenya palelyamanona,” lea-pyaa.
44016029	Dokopa anjetae isingi akali dokome kia mende peena latala alo pyao andaka kolandea-pyaa. Kolandatala Polo Sailasapa paleambino dosa paka kayao walu lao tombauli sia-pyaa.
44016030	Tombauli soo sakatatala baame akali dolapo laminao kamanda pupala, “Akali andake anelyapo, Goteme namba pyoo nyina lao aipa pyuape?” lea-pyaa.
44016031	Dopa leamopa akali dolapome baa lamaiyoo, “Embame Kamongo Jisasa lao masoo minape. Dokonya Goteme emba pyoo nyeta. Baame embanya andaka awapa palenge dupa pyoo nyetakana,” leambi-pyaa.
44016032	Dopa latala Polo Sailasapame baapi baanya andaka awapa palenge dupa pitaka Kamongonya lao pii lamaiyambi-pyaa.
44016033	Kuka gii dokopaka baame akali dolapo lanyepala pyapae dupa kaimbu pyao nepakamaiya-pyaa. Dopa piamopa dolapome baapi baanya andaka awapa palenge dupa pitaka-pipa Gotenya kaimbu doko pupae pyakamaiyambi-pyaa.
44016034	Kaimbu pyatakamaiyambinopa baame akali dolapo laminao palenge anda namba ketae dokonya kolandatala nee yangao maiya-pyaa. Baame Gote lao masoo miniamo dokonya baapi baanya andaka awapa palenge dupapimi mona yaepeami-pyaa.
44016035	Yuu yongateamopa taono isingi akali dupame yanda singi mendapuame akali dolapo mokena lao anjetae isingi akali doko lamaiya pena leami-pyaa.
44016036	Yanda singi dupame anjetae isingi doko dopa lamaitiaminopa baame Polo lamaiyoo, “Taono isingi akali dupame nyilyambo mokape lao wai peelyamino, dokonya nyilyambo kamaka ipupala mona yaepatala pupa,” lea-pyaa.
44016037	Dopaka doko, Polome yanda singi dupa lamaiyoo, “Nalimba Loma tange dolapo dupame kosa mende nalao endakali dupanya enombanya konjame pyapala anjingi andaka mee anjinya palyetala, dee indupa elyakao mokatala pupa lelyamipi? Doko kapa daana, anjiamino akali dupameaka mokao nyala epena kayalapa,” lea-pyaa.
44016038	Yanda singi dupame pupala taono isingi akali dupa Polome pii leamo doko lamaiyaminopa akali dolapo Loma tange lumu lao sepala paka kayami-pyaa.
44016039	Dokonya dupame ipao akali dolaponya mona auu pisakamaiyoo kamaka lanyiami-pyaa. Dopa petala akali dolapo kandao, “Anelyapo, nyilyambome taono dake yakinatala pupapoko,” leami-pyaa.
44016040	Dokopa akali dolapo anjingi anda doko yakinatala enda Litianya andaka peambi-pyaa. Pupala anda dokonya masoo miningi kaiminingi dupa kandatala mona epe palisakamaiyoo pii mendapua lamaiyambi-pyaa. Dopa petala dolapo peambi-pyaa.
44017001	Polo Sailasapame Amapipolisapa Apoloniapa yuu dolaponya-kaita pao taono Tesalonaika dokonya pyakameambi-pyaa. Yuu dokonya Jutamanya losuu anda mende katenge-pyaa.
44017002	Polome pingiliaka pyoo Juta dupa-pipa awapa anda dokonya kolandatala Sambasa tepoma Gotenya pii pepa pyapae siamo dokonya endakali dupa-pipa pii laloo pyoo katea-pyaa.
44017003	Kataisa dokome tanda nao kumatana lapae siamo dokopa malunya sakatatana lapae siamo dokopa dolaponya tenge dupa baame dupa laitaka pyoo lao panao katea-pyaa. Baame dupa lamaiyoo, “Nambame nyakama langyoo, Jisasa dokoaka baa Kataisana,” lea-pyaa.
44017004	Dokopa endakali mendatupame masoo minatala Polo Sailasapa tole piami-pyaa. Gote lao tama pyoo katenge Gitiki endakali longo paka dupapi dee yuu dokonya tange akali andake dupanya enda longo mendapuapi dupame Polo Sailasapa tole piami-pyaa.
44017005	Dopa piaminopa Juta dupame tilya nyepala endakali limbingi kamapi dokonya akali makongapae mendapua nyoo limbiami-pyaa. Limbatala dee endakali longo mendapua nyoo limbateaminopa dupa pitakame taono dokonya pyao pilya pyana pyoo nimi namu lao limbingi doko minao koyasiami-pyaa. Dupame dopa pyoo akali Jesonenya andaka alo pyao ipao Polo Sailasapa nyoo endakali dupa maiyanya kutiami-pyaa.
44017006	Dupame akali dolapo kutao kayapala Jesonepi masoo miningi kaiminingi mendapua-pipa pyalya lao nyoo taono isingi akali dupa kateamisa peami-pyaa. Nyoo pupala ae lao, “Yuu dupa pitaka minao koyasiamino akali dupa dae ipatelyamino.
44017007	Jesoneme akali dupa lanyoo baanya andaka pupya. Akali dakaita pitakame Kapomane Isingi Mupa dokonya mana setapae dupa tuu pyoo nepengema. Dupame kiŋi waka Jisasa lenge mende kalyamoaka lengemana,” leami-pyaa.
44017008	Dopa leaminopa taono isingi akali dupapi endakali longo kambu piamino dupapimi pii doko sepala mona koo palyiami-pyaa.
44017009	Dopa petala taono isingi akali dupame Jesonepi masoo miningi kaiminingi dupapimi muni peena lao nyepala dee dopaka pitamino kandao doko, muni dutupa etete nyetamana latala pena kayami-pyaa.
44017010	Dopa peteaminopa masoo miningi kaiminingi dupame Polo Sailasapa Betia yuu dokonya kuakama yapa pena leami-pyaa. Akali dolapo Betia yuu dokonya pyakamatala Jutamanya losuu anda dokonya kolandeambi-pyaa.
44017011	Juta endakali Betia kateamino dupame Juta endakali Tesalonaika kateamino dupa ita minao mona palenge akali kateami-pyaa. Dupame Wai Pii Epe doko etete putitimi kumao siami-pyaa. Pii doko Gotenya pii pepa pyapae singi dokonya kiningi dopaka lao pyapae silyape lao koteaka lao kandokondape pyoo kateami-pyaa.
44017012	Dopa pyoo katao dupanya longo dupame masoo miniami-pyaa. Gitiki tange kenge singi enda mendapuapi akali longo mendapuapimi masoo miniamiaka-pyaa.
44017013	Maitakao Juta endakali Tesalonaika kateamino dupame Polome Betia yuu dokonya Gotenya pii doko lamaitilyamoakana lapae sepala dupa yuu dokonya epeamiaka-pyaa. Ipupala endakali dupa minao kyakasoo mona koo palisakamaiyami-pyaa.
44017014	Dopa piaminopa masoo miningi kaiminingi dupame Polo solowata pete singi yuu dokonya yapa pena leami-pyaa. Dokopa Sailasa Timotipa Betia mee kateambi-pyaa.
44017015	Polo mapala peamino akali dupame Atenesa yuu taono dokonya mapeami-pyaa. Polome akali dokaita lamaiyoo, “Sailasa Timotipa namba kalyo angenya yapa epena lamaiyepape,” lateamopa pilyiami-pyaa.
44017016	Polome Sailasa Timotipa Atenesa yuu dokonya malisoo katao kandeamopa taono dokonya sambo gote wasepe dupame tumbatae kateamo kandatala mona koo palea-pyaa.
44017017	Dopa pyoo katao Polo Jutamanya losuu anda dokonya pupala Juta dupapi endakali tata waka Gote lao tama pingi dupa-pipapi pii laloo pia-pyaa. Dee baame koteaka lao makesa singi kamapi dokonya pupala endakali ipao kambu piamino dupa-pipa pii laloo piaka-pyaa.
44017018	Epikutianamanya mana nyepae dupapi Setoikimanyan mana nyepae dupapi dupanya masingi akali mendapuame ipao Polo-pipa pii yanda pyoloo piami-pyaa. Mendapuame lao pituu, “Kaina pii lao paenge akali dakeme aki masoo maku lelyape?” leami-pyaa. Yangimi lao pituu, “Akali dakeme gote yuu waka tange mendapuanya pii lao katata aipape?” leami-pyaa. Polome Jisasanya lao baa malunya sakateana lao lamaiyoo kateamo dokonya dopa leami-pyaa.
44017019	Dupame Polo laminao Ateopakasa kanjole dupa kateamino dokonya peami-pyaa. Pupala lao pituu, “Embame mana enenge lamaingi pyomo doko sipuma laka lao masilyamano.
44017020	Naimame embanya pii doko sipumanopa mendepale jipumosa pii dokonya tenge dupa sipuma laka lao masilyamano,” leami-pyaa.
44017021	Atenesa tange dupapi tata waka Atenesa ipao tisa nao katenge dupapimi pii enengepi mana enengepi dopale dupaka soani kayao katengema-pyaa.
44017022	Polome Ateopakasa kanjole dupanya kaina dokonya toya katapala lao pituu, “Atenesa tange akali nyakama, nambame kandapupa nyakamanya gote dupa lao etete minokondape pyoo miningima lamo.
44017023	Nambame payao pituu nyakamame tama pingima lamo dupa kanjo. Dee olata toko mendenya Naimame Nakandenge Gote doko lao pepa pyapae sipumu kanjoaka. Nyakamame nakandao mee tama pingima lamo dokonya lao nambame indupa langitoo.
44017024	Yuupi kaitipi dupanya silyamo dupa pitaka wapuiyamo Gote doko yuupi kaitipi dupanya Kamongo kalyamo. Dopana, baa endakali kingimi losuu anda petae dupanya nakatenge.
44017025	Baa opale mende daa jala naenge. Dee endakali mendeme baa kingi maipenge nanjingiaka. Baame iki endakali dupa pitaka lete katengepi, imambu singipi, oapi dupa pitaka maingi.
44017026	Baame endakali tata dupa pitaka yumbange mendainya pyakalyina latala yuu dupa pitakanya katena lea-pyaa. Wamba baame endakali dupanya gii dupa setakamaiyoo yuu dupa konjoo maitala dopa pia-pyaa.
44017027	Dupame mina kanda kanda pyoo Gote baa kutao kandapimi laka lao dopa pia-pyaa. Baa naimanya mendaipi mendepa tependa joo nakatenge.
44017028	“Naima baa mambele lete katao kaita payao kalyamano. Wamba nyakamanya wee pepa pingi akali mendapuame dopaka lao lao pituu, ‘Naima apata baanya mandipayakana,’ leami-pyaa.
44017029	Naima Gotenya mandipae kalyamano dokonya Gote baa opale endakalimi masetala kingimi etete auu pyoo golopi, silipapi, kanapimi wasingi dopalena lao masala nayapenge.
44017030	Wamba endakali dupame masala nayao koo piamino dokopa Goteme kanja naele pyoo kateamoaka doko, indupa baame yuu dupa pitakanya endakali dupa pitaka lamaiyoo, ‘Nyakama mona kapilyalapape,’ lelyamo.
44017031	Doko, baame gii seteamo dokonya akali mende yapao nyiamo doko-kisa baame pii lao tolao mana tolatae doko minao endakali dupa pitaka yapata. Baame dopa pitana lao akali doko malunya sakatasiamo dokome endakali dupa pitaka auu pyoo laitaka peteana,” Polome lea-pyaa.
44017032	Endakali kumapae malunya sakatenge pii Polome leamo doko sepala endakali yangimi gii kayao kaa kaa leami-pyaa. Endakali yangimi, “Gii mendepa pii dokonya dee setamana,” leami-pyaa.
44017033	Dopa leaminopa Polome endakali dupa yakinatala pea-pyaa.
44017034	Dopa piamopa yangimi baa tole pyatala masoo miniami-pyaa. Ateopakasa kanjole akali kenge Dayonisiasa lenge dokopi enda kenge Damatisa lenge dokopi dee endakali waka mendatupa-pipame masoo miniami-pyaa.
44018001	Maitakao Polome Atenesa yuu doko yakinatala Kotina yuu taono dokonya pea-pyaa.
44018002	Pupala baame akali Akuila lenge Juta mendepa baanya etanenge Pitisila lenge dokopa dolapo kandanyia-pyaa. Akali Akuila doko Pondasa tange-pyaa. Loma tange kapomane mupa Kolotiasa lenge dokome Juta endakali dupa pitaka Loma yuu dokonya yakinatala pena leamosa endakalipa dolapome Itali yuu doko kuki wambale yakinatala Kotina yuu dokonya ipao peteambi-pyaa. Peteambino dokonya Polo epea-pyaa.
44018003	Ipupala endakalipa dolapome kalai pingi mendai dokaitaka Polome pingi dokonya dolapo-pipa awapa katao kalai pyoo kateami-pyaa. Dutupame sele anda kii pingima-pyaa.
44018004	Sambasa dii lao Polome Jutamanya losuu anda dokonya pao Juta endakalipi Gitiki endakalipi dupanya mona minao kapilyakamaiyanya dupa-pipa pii laloo pyoo lamaiyoo katea-pyaa.
44018005	Sailasa Timotipa Masetonia katao Kotina epeambi-pyaa. Gii dokopa Polome pii lamaingi kalai doko iki kyoto joo pitoana lao masetala Juta endakali dupa kandao Jisasa baa Kataisana lao etete pupu lao lamaiya-pyaa.
44018006	Dopa lamaiyamopa dokaitame baame pii leamo dokonya tanga latala lamba leaminopa Polome baanya yonge pee pingi doko lyanda lanya nepatala dupa kandao, “Nyakama alu pitamino doko, nyakama tange mambele alu pitamina, namba-kisa tenge naseta. Dopana, namba endakali tata waka kalyamino dupanya patoana,” lea-pyaa.
44018007	Dopa latala baame dupa yakinatala Gote lao tama pyoo katenge akali Titiasa Jasatasa lenge dokonya andaka pea-pyaa. Anda doko Jutamanya losuu anda makisa dosa katenge-pyaa.
44018008	Losuu anda isoo katenge akali Kitisapasa lenge dokopi baanya palu dupapimi Kamongo doko lao masoo miniami-pyaa. Dee Kotina tange endakali waka longo dupame Polome Gotenya pii leamo doko sepala masoo minao kaimbu nyoaka kateami-pyaa.
44018009	-
44018010	Kote mendepa kuakama Kamongo dokome kombeame Polo dapa lamaiya-pyaa: “Emba paka kayala naenya pii lamaipi. Namba emba-pipa tole pyao kalyo tenge dokonya minao embame kambu piti napipi. Taono dakenya nambanya endakali longo dupa kalyaminona, mendeme sakatatala emba anguala nayatana,” Kamongo dokome dopa lea-pyaa.
44018011	Dopa lateamopa Polome Kotina yuu dokonya ee kana mendai dee kana tokange pyoo Gotenya pii doko endakali dupa mana lamaiyoo katea-pyaa.
44018012	Akali Galio doko Akaya yuu dokonya kapomane andake kateamo gii ongopa Juta endakali dupame masingi mendai palyetala Polo yanda piamaitala anjoo soo kosimi laa peami-pyaa.
44018013	Pupala lao pituu, “Akali dakeme mana setapae dupa yakinatala mana waka mende minao Gote lao tama pina lao endakali dupa pyalya lao nyalanya pii lamailyamona,” leami-pyaa.
44018014	Dopa leaminopa Polome pii laanya piamopa Galio dokome dokaita kandao, “Kanau, nyakama Juta dupa, akali dakeme kapomanenya mana mende nepatala mana koo andake mende minata pipyali kandao doko, nambame nyakamanya pii doko kapa pao sakapuli.
44018015	Dopaka doko, nyakame nyakama tangenya piipi, kengepi, mana setapaepi dupanya mendenya kosimi laa ipatamino kandao doko, nyakamanya kalai. Nambame pii dopale dupa sala nayatoana,” lea-pyaa.
44018016	-
44018017	Dopa latala baame dokaita watao pia-pyaa. Watao pyateamopa dokaita pitakame losuu anda isingi akali kenge Sosatenisa lenge doko Galiome kosa siamo makisa dosa minatala piami-pyaa. Dopa piaminoaka doko, Galiome kandele nakandele pia-pyaa.
44018018	Polome Kotina yuu taono dokonya masoo miningi kaiminingi dupa-pipa kote longo lao awapa katapala maitakao Sitia yuu dokonya paanya pituu nyakama kalyepape lao lasa lea-pyaa. Lasa latala sipi mende nyalanya Senekotia yuu taono dokonya pea-pyaa. Pupala Polome dokonya katao pii mende Gote kandao latala etete kiningi lelyona lao baanya iti tokea-pyaa. Dopa petala Pitisilapa Akuilapa dolapo-pipa sipi mendenya pituu Sitia yuu dokonya paanya taono Epesasa-kaita peami-pyaa.
44018019	Epesasa yuu dokonya pao pyakamatala Polome endakalipa dolapo dokonya yakinatala baa iki Jutamanya losuu anda dokonya kolandea-pyaa. Kolandatala baame Juta dupa-pipa pii laloo pia-pyaa.
44018020	Dokopa dupame, “Emba naima-pipa kote mendatupa awapa katamana,” leaminopa Polome ŋee nalea-pyaa.
44018021	Nee nalenya lao pituu, “Goteme yakana lao masetamo kandao doko, namba nyakama kalyamino angenya dee pilyetona,” lea-pyaa. Dopa latala baame dupa kandao lasa latala Epesasa yuu doko yakinea-pyaa.
44018022	Dopa petala sipi mendenya pituu taono Sisatia dokonya pea-pyaa. Pupala Jetusaleme pao sosa dokonya endakali kateamino dupa kingi nyia-pyaa. Dopa petala Andioko yuu dokonya pea-pyaa.
44018023	Andioko yuu dokonya kote longoleaka katapala Polome yuu doko yakinatala Galasiapa Pitisiapa yuu dolaponya yuu yakane mendai mendai lao dupanya pupala Jisasa masoo miningi endakali dupa pitaka pupu lasia-pyaa.
44018024	Akali Apolosa lenge Juta mende Epesasa yuu dokonya ipao katea-pyaa. Baa Alekesandia yuu taono dokonya tange-pyaa. Baame pii auu pyoo lao Gotenya pii pepa pyapae singi dupa masingi-pyaa.
44018025	Wamba endakali mendapuame akali Apolosa doko Kamongonya piipi manapi dupanya lao mana lamaiyami-pyaa. Dokopa baame etete kyoto joo pii tolao lao Jisasame piamo dupa endakali dupa mana lamaiya-pyaa. Joneme kaimbu pingi mana doko iki masia-pyaa.
44018026	Baame Jutamanya losuu anda dokonya tee pyao paka nakayao pii pupu lao leamo doko sepala Pitisilapa Akuilapa dolapome baa lanyepala Gotenya piipi manapi dupa etete tolasoo mana lamiyambi-pyaa.
44018027	Apolosa dokome Akaya yuu dokonya paanya piamosa masoo miningi kaiminingi dupame ongo etete yakana puu latala Akaya tange masoo miningi dupame akali dake lanyalapape lao pepa pyasakamaiyami-pyaa. Apolosa dokome Akaya yuu dokonya pupala baame Gotenya mona epe palenge dokome masoo minao kateamino endakali dupa nisokondape pyoo nisia-pyaa.
44018028	Baame endakali dupa pitakanya lengelyaapi dokonya Juta dupame pii kopeta leamino dupa pyanya paliuu tolao pupu lao lamaiyoo katea-pyaa. Apolosa dokome Gotenya pii pepa pyapae singi dokonya Jisasa baa Kataisa dokona lao panao lamaiya-pyaa.
44019001	Apolosa Kotina yuu dokonya kateamo gii dokopa Polome yuu manda dupanya-kaita payao ipao Epesasa pyakanatala yuu dokonya Jisasa masoo miningi endakali mendapua kateamino kandea-pyaa.
44019002	Kandatala baame dupa lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame masoo miniamino gii dokopa Oli Sipitisa doko nyiamipi?” lao pisia-pyaa. Dupame baa lamaiyoo, “Oli Sipitisa mende kalyamo lapae naimame nasiamana,” leami-pyaa.
44019003	Dopa leaminopa Polome dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame kaimbu aipale mende nyiamipi?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa dupame baa lamaiyoo, “Naimame Jonenya kaimbu doko nyiamana,” leami-pyaa.
44019004	Dopa leaminopa Polome dokaita lamaiyoo, “Endakali mona kapilyiamino dupa Joneme kaimbu pyakamaiya. Joneme endakali dupa lamaiyoo, ‘Akali mende namba watao epelyamo doko lao masoo minalapape,’ lea-pyomo doko Jisasa kandao lea-pyaana,” lea-pyaa.
44019005	Polome pii leamo doko sepala dupame Kamongo Jisasanya kenge doko lao kaimbu nyiami-pyaa.
44019006	Kaimbu nyepeaminopa Polome dupanya aiyomba minani pyakamaiya-pyaa. Dokopa Oli Sipitisa doko dupa-kisa epeamopa dupame Gote lao tama pyoo pii tata waka dupa lao Gotenya pii panao lao kateami-pyaa.
44019007	Akali dupa pyasoo kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapomapi mende-pyaa.
44019008	Polome kana tepoma Jutamanya losuu anda dokonya kolandata pyoo paka nakayao Gotenya isingi dokonya lao endakali dupanya masingi sakatasakamaiyoo dupa-pipa pii laloo pyoo kateami-pyaa.
44019009	Dopa piamoaka doko, yangi dupame nyakamanya ingi monapi dupa kana jetala masoo minala nayami-pyaa. Dupame endakali enomba dupanya Kamongonya pii manapi dupa kandao pii koo leaminosa Polome dupa yakinatala pea-pyaa. Masoo miniamino dupa awapa lanyoo pupala akali Titanasa lenge dokonya mana lenge anda mendenya baame dupa-pipa koteaka lao pii laloo pyoo katea-pyaa.
44019010	Baame ee kana lapoma dopa pyoo katea-pyaa. Dopa piamopa Juta endakalipi tata wakapi yuu Esia kateamino dupa pitakame Kamongonya pii doko siami-pyaa.
44019011	Polonya kingilyaka dokonya Goteme kalai pupu lapae tata waka mendepale mendapua pia-pyaa.
44019012	Endakali dupame Polonya lapalapapi kalai pyaanya yonge pee sanga pyao kisa pingi dopale mendapuapi nyepala, nyoo pao endakali yaina pyapae dupa-kisa setapa piaminopa yaina dupa mee jeta pia-pyaa. Dopa piaminopa enjele koo endakali dupa-kisa paleamo dupame yakinatala peami-pyaa.
44019013	Dokopa enjele koo watao pyao paenge Juta mendapua epeami-pyaa. Dupame endakali-kisa enjele koo palenge dupa watao pyalanya Kamongo Jisasanya kenge doko lao makande pyoo dapa lengema-pyaa: “Polome lenge Jisasa dokonya kenge doko lao nambame nyakama pupa lelyona,” lengema-pyaa.
44019014	Jutamanya pitisa mupa Sipaa lenge dokonya ikiningi kalange dutupame mana doko minao kateami-pyaa.
